You're a college freshman with college freshman problems: you've got an awful professor, your roommate's kind of a flake, and this week really just hasn't been going your way.  Luckily, you've got just the thing planned for this weekend: a night in the woods with the girl you've been (sorta?) seeing and your new (sorta?) friends.  But things are never that easy.  As you receive strange phone calls and hear concerning noises from beyond the treeline, tensions arise in your small camp, and choices must be made that will determine your fate... or, at least, the fate of your relationships with your friends.

Don't Take it Personally, I Just Don't Like You is a lo-fi relationship dramedy about  camping illegally on government property in the chill of early autumn, having public anxiety attacks in crowded shopping malls, the people we choose to be with, and what we do when they don't choose us back.

[From [url=https://lockerkid.itch.io/dont-take-it-personally-i-just-dont-like-you]itch.io[/url]]

title: Onee-chan no Kareshi Moracchau ne♪ ~Futago no Imouto no Yuganda Aizou~

description:
Drinks with Abbey is a short, slice-of-life visual novel portraying a more realistic first date in western culture, from a male's perspective. After connecting with Abbey on a dating app, you meet in person for the first time at a local bar. Through many choices of what to say and do, you determine how the date goes - and how well it ends.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1201870/]Steam[/url]]
title: Drinks With Abbey
The Rave
description:
Based on a short story of the same name, The Rave chronicles  Detroit's biggest underground party in years. There's only one problem ... the venue is inhabited by a very real, and very vengeful urban legend. A vibrant mix of campy horror and cheesy comedy, this Halloween-themed visual novel delivers a good time with characters you'll love, love to hate, and never EVER forget!!!  

[From [url=https://countkrew.itch.io/therave]Itch.io[/url]]

Take on your developer dream in Catalina City in Unscripted! Follow the journey of a software developer aspiring to publish their video game into the PackStore's prestigious arcade while starting a new life in Catalina City, the city for software developers. Reconnect and meet close friends like Zen'no, new peers like Katorin, the Kotlin-loving developer, and possibly new enemies like Christina, an enigmatic Python developer.

[From [url=https://marquiskurt.itch.io/unscripted]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Unscripted

aliases: BRG's Tale of the Gallant Jiraiya
description:
All legends contain heroes, all heroes have beginnings, this is the origin of the legendary hero Jiraiya, Young Thunder.

Jiraiya was born in a house of nobility before he could speak his first words, his father was slain. As an teenage orphan, he was forced to raise himself and quickly turn to a life of crime to survive. His young heart still believed in justice, so he stole from the rich and gave to the poor.

One day before he could commit a heinous act, an old man appeared and stopped Jiraiya. This toad sage offered to teach Jiraiya magic. So, Jiraiya could help the innocent and defeat the wicked bandit leader Orochimaru. 

[Edited from [url=https://braverockgames.itch.io/brgs-tale-of-the-gallant-jiraiya]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Tale of the Gallant Jiraiya

description:
"Orgasm Addiction"... a perverted disease that started spreading 5 years ago.

Two sisters are trapped into a hell of orgasms in a "climax ward"...
A nurse realizes that there is something wrong, but...

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE272489.html]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Zecchou Byoutou / Iryoukikan Vol.2

description:
A girl peeps in on some boys love and sex in this ero novel game.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE272793.html]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Psycho Peek

description:
In the near future, a sudden and unexplained sea rise has left much of human civilization underwater.

Ikaruga Natsuki, a boy who lost his mother and his leg in an accident some years earlier, returns disillusioned from a harsh life in the big city to find his old countryside home half-swallowed by the sea.

Left without a family, all he has to his name is the ship and submarine left to him by his oceanologist grandmother, and her debts.

His only hope to restore the dreams for the future that he has lost is to take up an opportunity presented to him by the suspicious debt collector Catherine. They set sail to search the sunken ruins of his grandmother's laboratory in order to find a treasure rumor says she left there.

But what they find is not riches or jewels; it is a strange girl lying asleep in a coffin at the bottom of the sea.
Atri.

Atri is a robot, but her appearance and her wealth of emotions would fool anyone into think she's a living, breathing human being. In gratitude for being salvaged, she makes a declaration to Natsuki.

"I want to fulfill my master's final order. Until I do, I'll be your leg!"

In a little town slowly being enveloped by the ocean, an unforgettable summer is about to begin for this boy and this mysterious robot girl...

[From [url=https://atri-mdm.com/en/story/]official website[/url]]
title: ATRI -My Dear Moments-

description:
At the end of June, the seasons come to a standstill.

Widely known to be of asocial character, Izumi Tomohiro is quietly spending his day in the corner of their classroom... or so it should have been.

"Congrats on being elected! It has been decided that you are now the next student council president!"

By the school's initiative, an election via lottery took place. And Tomohiro is the lucky bastard who won the prize!

Suddenly placed underneath the spotlight, he unanimously became the talk of the school. Unable to back down, he started hunting for fellow members with the help from his advisor.

However, the candidates his advisor nominated are his classmate Kano, his junior Asumi, even his own little sister Hiyori, and the lot of them doesn't even come to school!? And in the midst of the chaos, even the former council president Shio who came from whereabouts unknown suddenly appeared!

Is this fate? Is this inevitable?
Unprecedented. Unparalleled.
The battle of our new (un)lucky student council president starts now!

[From the [url=https://madosoft.net/hamidashi/story]official website[/url]]
title: Hamidashi Creative

aliases: Busty Demon Lord Lucifer is Conquered and Impregnated by a Banished Low-life Summoner
title: Gouman Kyonyuu Maou Lucifer, Tsuihou Sareta Teihen Shoukanshi no Zettai Fukujuu Haramase Tsukaima ni Ochiru
description:
Conquer the haughty demon lord Lucifer, and turned her into an impregnated cum dump servant!

The protagonist is an unskilled summoner who gets banished from his adventuring party due to his uselessness.
However, through a certain event, he events up summoning the busty demon lord himself!?
What more, as part of his contract rules, she must have a sex battle with him!
He imposes his dirty desires on her, and fucks her until she's nothing but an impregnated servant.

He gets to enjoy her slutty body fully as he makes his comeback on the world!

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE270440.html]DLsite English[/url]]

Three unfamiliar people take shelter from the rain together. It pours mercilessly with no sign of stopping. There is only one umbrella, so young people need to figure out how to get out of this situation. 

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2019/01/vn-of-month-august-2000-tsukihime.html]vndbreview[/url]]
title: 8-gatsu 7-ka no Amayadori
Bokuhime Project
description:
Protagonist Minato Ikusa's sister Marika has fallen into a coma following an incident at the Yuriai Private Academy for refined young ladies, so he infiltrates the school by disguising himself as a woman and enrolling under the name "Erika" to investigate.

As part of this, he needs to become the most beautiful woman of the school and win a seat at the Four Princesses organization; to do this, he practices his cross-dressing skills, and partakes in a number of activities to increase his femininity, such as swimming lessons and cosplay.

title: Prison Princess
description:
The continent of Maygard.

The peace and prosperity brought about by the two kingdoms of “Aria Zaza” and “Zanji Zed” lasted countless years.

That golden era is now facing its downfall.

The Demon King, released from his seal, has turned our continent to a sea of flames.

As cities were invaded one after another, a man appeared carrying the blood of ancient heroes… Oh Brave Hero.

During his journey, the hero was met with grave misfortune and perished.

The Demon King’s minions snuck into the capital cities of the two kingdoms to kidnap their precious princesses. All hope seemed to have been lost…

However, it seems our hero is not wholly dead after all.

Even as a spirit, the hero is determined to remain in this world, and has set off to save the princesses from danger.

Now nothing more than a phantom, can the hero succeed in rescuing the kidnapped princesses?!

[from [url=https://gematsu.com/2019/12/prison-princess-details-story-systems-and-characters]Gematsu[/url]]

Europe during Dark Middle Ages. Main character is a monk. A beautiful girl is accused of being a witch in the monastery. Protagonist makes various attempts to help her. What truth hides behind the strict Christian society? Is there only fear and despair ahead?

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2019/04/vn-of-month-december-2002-popotan.html]vndbreview[/url]]
title: Kuro
Void's Calling
description:
To be Pure isn't always about having clean hands. If you decided to become a mage's hunter, you'll see all sorts of things, shitty and bloody things. You just can't sit idle knowing that the high art that was prohibited by a royal edict can easily cause disturbance to the world's harmony crafted by the Almighty and let Void enter our realm, can you?

Lone warriors, led by mysterious Call and who go under the name of The Pure Ones, travel around the continent, always looking for those who decided to violate the world's harmony with the help of their "wonderful" gift. It doesn't mean a thing whether they're doing it out of selfish motives, simple curiosity or desire to help everyone.

A man or a woman, all the same. The punishment is inescapable. No mercy for no one! No mercy for no one!

Forlan is only 32 but he's already seen a lot and it may seem like he's up to anything the world can throw at him. However, at one point he stumbles upon a small town called Krazengoph while following the call of Void, that place turns out to be a real test to the hunter's abilites since Void has already wormed its way into the citizens' souls and poisons them, effect similar to post-mortem poison.

To find a sorcerer who broke the law in the town, citizens of which are slowly but steadily losing their minds and are falling into the cesspool of madness and lust, isn't going to be an easy thing to do. Will the Pure One be able to cope with it alone or should he look for a help from one of the town's citizens? Not matter what turn these events might take, there's one thing to be sure of. Forlan will never be the same after visiting this town, Krazengoph... 

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1212020/Voids_Calling_ep1/]Steam[/url]]

title: Re CATION ~Melty Healing~
description:
Spring -- the season of new beginnings

You've barely been a fully fledged working adult for two years when your life is shaken-up by a sudden job transfer to a branch office in a new town. Despite the unexpectedness of it all, you manage to find an apartment and get settled in.

You make your introductions to the office and meet your quirky boss and new co-workers. Hot-off introductions, you are shoved into a leadership role of a new major company initiative. Feelings of anxiety, excitement, and optimism roil within you as you begin to adjust to your new life and responsibilities. 

As fate would have it, the encounters do not stop at your new coworkers - the Spring of your love is finally set in motion...

A girl finds herself in a dark and unfamiliar forest when a monster appears out of nowhere and attacks. A mysterious boy, wielding a brush as if it were a sword, appears just in time to cut down the monster.

He calls himself Kurofude, and he addresses the girl in a familiar tone as Shirohime. Yet she does not recognize him or the name he calls her. She has lost all of her memories.

According to Kurofude, they are in the land of Adabana, a realm of illustrated books. Their tales are like dreams; no matter how deeply one immerses oneself in them, once one wakes up, they are gone. Thus the name Adabana—a name given to flowers that will never bear fruit. Their duty is to travel through story realms and look for signs of distortions in the tales.

Shirohime, a girl with seemingly all the agency of a doll, accepts this explanation and opens a book handed to her. The title: Hanasaka Jiisan. As she opens the dilapidated illustrated book with its pages riddled with worm-eaten holes, the pages glow brightly and whisk the girl and boy away to a fairy tale realm...

[From [url=https://adabanaitan.com/en/]ANIPLEX.EXE[/url]]
title: Adabana Itan
Tales From The Unending Void: Season 1
description:
Camran is a young minor noble from the Sovereignty, a part of space dominated by humans. Erstwhile cadet of the Terran Naval Academy, Cam has been forced by circumstances to travel the galaxy, together with a band of friends, taking on menial jobs and occasionally smuggling some illicit cargo. As he involuntarily becomes part of sinister plans machinated by powerful intrigants, Camran’s life is changed forever…

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/perverteer/overview]Patreon[/url]]

title: Guide-san Gokko
description:
A plump girl with glasses cosplays as a guide,
and does H things in this ADV with fully-voiced audio.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE272942.html]DLsite English[/url]]

title: Succubus Coming! ~Ero Bunka ga Sugoi to Kiite Isekai Kara Yattekimashita~

description:
--Spring.

I walked to school, bathed in the bright spring sunshine and a cool river breeze on my cheeks.
But my mood was not as sunny as the weather.

The reason for this was one of my classmates.

She was popular with both boys and girls, and always became the center of attention. Her name was Azabu Masumi.

I can't believe that she, the girl of the class, would talk to me...

As expected, she was an annoying girl who didn't know her place.

[Edited from [url=http://www.hook-net.jp/htm/goods/azasumi.htm]Official Website[/url]]
title: Azasumi ~Azatokute Sumi ni Okenai Kanojo~

description:
A sad legend about sacred holy sword is passed down from ancient times. It's a story about two adventures - warrior and wizard - who are determined to get to the bottom of this legend. 

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2019/04/vn-of-month-september-2002-masaru.html]vndbreview[/url]]
title: Solau Cllass Saga ~Seiken o Fuuin Seshi Mono~
Marth
description:
Main character attends high school in an ordinary seaside town. He lives a happy life with his two best friends. But one day father calls him to a familiar coffee shop and says words that start great changes in protagonist's life.

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2019/06/vn-of-month-july-2003-komorebi-ni.html]vndbreview[/url]]

title: Shattered
description:
You play as Blake Blinn, an unlucky guy who had to grow up in slums, but didn't really find his way into thug's life, and due to a series of misfortunes ended up being a maid (yes, a maid) in a rich family's house. And you decide how he's gonna deal with this situation.

The game mainly centers around your cruel and sadistic boss (or rather owner) Melinda; her naughty and enthusiastic daughter Rebecca; her business partner Samuel, a dominant and imposing person; and her friendly and lighthearted assistant Liam. And many others! In this house you'll never be alone. For better or for worse.

[From [url=https://tfgames.site/?module=viewgame&id=2186]TF Games Site[/url]]

title: Study Fighters
description:
Main character is a student who is bullied at high school. But one day he becomes disciple of a fighting school, and his fate changes. For three years cram school becomes a place where the best rival fighters train, grow and develop friendship bonds together.

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2019/06/vn-of-month-november-2003-kurenai.html]vndbreview[/url]]

title: Kanojo no Neiro ni Uta o Nosete

description:
Life is never easy for a college student, what with assignments, peer pressure and the ever-present desire to impress the object of your desires dictated by your raging hormones. But to add that to the fact that you've just discovered vampires, werewolves and all sort of stuff you thought only existed in horror movies are actually real, and you're in for some teenage angst.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/freakshowthegame]Patreon[/url]]
title: Freakshow

description:
Main character feels loneliness and often cries. He may confess his feelings to three little ladies in different stories:

1. Daughter scenario
2. Mai scenario
3. Yumi scenario

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2019/02/vn-of-month-february-2001-tasogare.html]vndbreview[/url]]
title: Little Lady
Rinkaiten no Azrael
description:
Rihito Souda has just started working for a major construction company in April.

Even though he is assigned to a different deparment than the one he was hoping for, he meets a senior employee by the name of Reimi Nagashima, and he slowly begins to fall in love with her.

He has a rewarding job, kind parents, and awesome friends.... All of these things seemed ideal, until one day he begins to have terrifying nightmares.

The frequency of these nightmares increases with each passing month and slowly begins to consume his life.

[Edited from [url=https://www.shinzoutranslations.com/2023/11/release-azrael-on-boundary-of-life-and.html]Shinzou Translations[/url]]

title: Rabbit Heart!
description:
The main character, Rabi, is reborn as a stuffed rabbit. He was being sold in a toy store, and one day, a six year old girl, Himari Naruse, decided to buy him.

From that point, the everyday life of Rabi, a stuffed rabbit with feelings, and the tiny but cheerful Himari began.

[Edited from [url=https://www.shinzoutranslations.com/2023/09/release-rabbit-heart-english.html]Shinzou Translations[/url]]

The protagonist, Gaku Serizawa, is a pachinko addict who goes to a pachinko parlor every day. One day, he happens to stop by a park on his way home from pachinko and meets a mysterious girl who wants sweets. His world starts to change little by little as he comes to know her.

[From [url=https://www.shinzoutranslations.com/2023/09/release-saddest-smile-in-world-english.html]Shinzou Translations[/url]]
title: Sekai de Ichiban Kanashii Egao
Ningyou wa Ori no Naka de Kimi o Miru
Asayake no Blue IV -Mezzo Forte Episode-
Kagami no Ikusame Valmaiden
description:
The evil Gardora Empire means to take over the world,
but two girls have received the blessing of the goddess --
they are Valmaiden Serena and Valmaiden Minori,
and it is their duty to defend the world from evil.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE274004.html]DLsite English[/url]]

title: Asayake no Blue III -Mezzo Piano Episode-
Murder by Numbers
description:
Los Angeles, 1996. Honor Mizrahi was just an actress on a hit TV detective show. But when her boss ends up dead just minutes after he fires her, she finds herself starring in her own murder mystery. Teaming up with SCOUT, a reconnaissance robot thrown away after a mysterious incident, she sets out to clear her name - and a new detective duo is born!

Investigate a range of murders across TV studios, glitzy award shows, drag clubs, and more - all set to an energetic soundtrack from famed composer Masakazu Sugimori (Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney, Ghost Trick and Viewtiful Joe).

Uncover a dark conspiracy by interrogating a wild range of weird and wonderful characters, designed by the incomparable Hato Moa, creator of Hatoful Boyfriend.

90s fashions! Upbeat jams! Sass dialled up to 100! Questionable jokes! Drag queens! All that and more awaits... in Murder by Numbers! 

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1140290/Murder_by_Numbers/]Steam[/url]]

"Why is it them, not you, who will die? Explain that in under 300 symbols."
     "Rejoice; you are the chosen ones."

Principal Sheaffer fired this proclamation at the more than a hundred kidnapped kids.
Their prison for months would be an abandoned school hidden deep in the mountains, nowhere on any map.
To ensure they wouldn’t rebel or escape, massive mannequins stood guard around them.
The first life taken was Malte—he was strung up and thrown from the gallery.
Amidst this chaos, Adolf offered silent prayers while trying to fortify himself.

“There’s no God in this world. There’s no story here.”


This splatter horror unfolds the chilling routine of boys trapped in that mountain boarding school, brutally slaughtered one by one.

[Translated from [url=https://www.freem.ne.jp/win/game/20131]freem[/url]]
title: Mouton Noir
Ejo zvezda
description: The little girl Neya lives in The Village where neither the sun's nor the moon's light can reach it. But every villager has a light in their chest... Everyone has it, except Neya. She is being bullied by villagers and even her own family doesn't understand her. One day Neya runs from the home to get the Star from the sky and get her own light in the chest.

In a regional city in the present day, Sayaka Mimuro manages her family's Shinto shrine on behalf of her absent parents. Along with her childhood friend Haru and a talking furball (rabbit?) god, she lives a peaceful life, but when an earthquake strikes, yokai suddenly appear and her world is torn apart.

Sayaka receives divine news that the only one who can save the city is herself—she is actually an onmyoji with the power to vanquish yokai on her own! However, in order to unlock her powers, she must first perform sex rituals with a man...

"...If I'm the only one who can do it, then I guess I have no choice!"

Sayaka is bewildered to say the least, but her natural sense of justice gives her the resolve to fight...

"There is only one person I can ask to do this and that's you, Haru... Please?"

With no one else to turn to, Sayaka asks a confused Haru to be her partner in the sexual rituals. With Haru's help, Sayaka finally unlocks her battle-princess powers to wage war on the yokai that ravage her city...

[From [url=https://www.johren.games/games/download/warrior-princess-sayaka-en/]Shiravune English page[/url]]
title: Kakuriyo no Saiyaku to Utsushiyo no Ikusabime ~Sayaka Hen~
Aozora ni Utau Kimi no Uta
description:
Someday, let's sing three people's songs- 

A faraway promise that began from the suffering and misunderstanding of Reiji, Katsura, and Eita who became a "family" from that day.

title: Suzumiya Haruhi no Heiretsu
description: During summer holidays, Haruhi wins a ticket to a luxury cruise and invites the whole SOS Brigade to board with her.

The main character is a student who has transferred to a certain school. 
He always had a strong desire for woman, and when he witnessed the school nurse, Yumezomo Hasumi, masturbating, he took her virginity and raped her.
Ever since then, he took great pleasure in ravishing, training, and dominating his female teachers.
His next target is the school's music teacher, Kawamura Yoshino, who happens to be a childhood friend of his, where she used to babysit him.
He has to desire fire his seed into any teacher who catches his eyes and dominate her womb...
To realize his ambition, a scandalous teacher training session begins.
title: Shihai no Kyoudan 2

description:
This visual novel will make you live what would happen if you traveled to an anime dimension. The player discovers a program capable of transporting his human mind to an anime dimension, this program asks for the help of a real human since the anime dimension was unintentionally destroyed by an invention, the machine proposes that he can send an avatar to the past but you need your mind to control it, the objective is to convince the inventor that that machine should fail and unintentionally the girl will open a dimension that contains a devastating energy that will end her world, romance and comedy go hand in hand, but Mystery and suspense are part of this story, don't miss this trip.

[From [url=https://prandygame.itch.io/romance-dimensional]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Romance Dimensional

description:
It started on October 15, in a downtown filled with the presence of long autumn nights.

The one who appeared to Sakisaka Yosuga in his not-so-tight tight spot was an eccentric man named Mikuriya Reki, self-styled "magician."

With that encounter, the environment around Sakisaka Yosuga slowly began to change:

New meetings with new acquaintances bringing fresh perspectives. The belated signs of a rose-colored youth.

This turning point came not only to Yosuga, but also to five others along with him.

Whether this path leads to fortune or misfortune will be up to them alone.

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/bl/dlaf/=/link/work/aid/vndb/id/RJ260221.html]DLsite[/url]]
title: Narisokonai no Yosuga
Summer!
description:
Two and a half years after the previous work. Koma, who moved to Germany, returns to Japan  for summer vacation. Her friend Noboru is invited for a short visit and was thrilled to see her again, but what appeared before him was a strange foreign girl.

Noboru the high school student, Koma the whimsical girl, and Hanna, a German girl who cannot speak Japanese.

A villa area surrounded by the sea, a midsummer impure cross-cultural exchange that takes place under one roof.

title: Deus Ex Machina
description:
In 2010 humanity is wiped out by the Araburugami, hostile deities manifesting as giant monsters. Only one survivor remains in Tokyo, a city converted into an automated military fortress — warrant officer Aoki Itona, pilot of the 100 meter tall anti-deity robot Shinuchi Mark V, a Deus Ex Machina. 

Itona enjoys the loneliness, but one day she meets a fellow pilot and the last survivor from another region, Kurenai Touka. Itona's introverted personality keeps clashing with the upbeat and teasing Touka as they grow closer and join hands to fight against the wheels of fate.
Sequel to Shokushu-kun.
title: Shokushu-kun F

aliases: ゲーム 調教する隣人
title: Choukyou Suru Rinjin
description:
Akino is a bored college student without anything exciting in his life.
But one day, his life gets flipped -- turned upside-down!

A romantic comedy with an SM twist.

[Edited from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE212671.html]DLsite English[/url]]

Egypt in the 1930s -- black archaeologist Lucas and his Indian maid Sera
have located a pyramid untouched by grave robbers.
But when Nazis show up, will the pair be able to get their hand son the treasure first?

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE274163.html]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Maramiddo ~Kodai no Daihihou o Oe~
aliases: Pleasure Pyramid ~In Pursuit of Ancient Treasure~

title: Polarity
description:
You are an attractive, middle-aged professional fighter who retired and is starting over: a new life in a new city.

You're thrust into a world of sex, MILFs, and romance; something your previous life allowed little time for.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/Eternity_Games]Patreon[/url]]

title: Our Red String
description:
Lena and Ian are two very different people who find themselves in a very similar moment in their lives. Both struggling to achieve their dreams, both hurting because of love.
Their lives will become intertwined, with each other and with several characters that will impact who they are and who they will become.
They will be able to experience the heights of love or the depths of lust, friendship or betrayal, moral or immoral, success or failure... And you will be the one to choose. But one's choices can often tangle together and lead to an unexpected mess, so be mindful, for you thread the thread of their Red String.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/Evakiss]Patreon[/url]]

The year is 2XXX. The near future.
In order to avoid another catastrophic war, the maritime city of Tokyo is now a society where every action is monitored. Entertainment is restricted.
The family structure has been dismantled. Even children’s memories before their first day at school are wiped out and they have to live their lives without their parents waiting for them.
Although most people are living happily in this society,
Coda is unable to go along with its ebb and flow.
The only people she meets everyday are Legato, a friend, and Riff, a university schoolmate who does not always see eye to eye with her.
She is also sympathetic to Pracito, a moody and silent woman who she occasionally talks to.
But one day, Placito has become the first ever university student to be executed.
The execution is public for all to see and it is greeted with a rupture of applauses.

[From [url=http://summertimeinblue.net/System/Coda/Coda_site/about.html]official site[/url]]
title: Coda

description:
Yuuga Kamijo and Hotaru Shinonome were freshmen in high school, living in the same apartment building. They were so close that they walked to and from school together every day.
Then one day after school, Yuuga meets an older student who calls herself "Manami."
With Manami's addition to their daily life, the ordinary routine is gradually taking an unexpected turn.
What is life? What is happiness?
Self-love, self-hatred, self-denial, self-made choice, the story of a boy's rebirth after losing his reason for living.
title: AlexiA ~Alexia~

description:
Due to a certain incident the protagonist lived his high school days in black and white. Now he begins a new life in college in the cherry blossom season and meets new people. An occult girl chasing a ghost, a literary girl who longs for the outside world, a skipping genius girl from the United States, a girl who plays bass on the riverbank... They too were tied up in the past.

Youth that remains stationary.

At that time, a woman appeared in front of them.

"Let's go get youth back"

With her words as a trigger, the moment she kept for a long time begins to move.
title: Lilas

description: A story about a mermaid who fell in love and went to land, and a short curse.
title: Tooi Umi no Aria

description:
Your classmate who is always absent is actually the famous idol Megochii!
For the next week, she wants your help taking pictures of her for social media.
What kind of Megochii will you show the world over the next seven days?
title: #Kocchi Muite Megochii v
Shoujo to Tsumi: Shiori Hen ~jalouse~
description:
Holy Innocence Girls’ Academy. A Christian school located deep in the quiet mountains of K Town in Nagano Prefecture. A rumor floats through its halls: “If you offer a prayer to the Virgin Mary, she will grant any wish… but in exchange, something important will be taken from you.” 

When Shiori Kusakabe enrolls as a new student, she is immediately drawn to her roommate, Miki Chigasaki. But, one fateful day, she discovers something about Miki by chance, and the emotions within her begin to stir…

-This is a story of desire and sacrifice-

[Edited from [URL=https://denpasoft.com/product/fallen-maidens-jalouse-shioris-story/]Denpasoft[/URL]]

aliases: はぐくみsacrifice 第1話 呪いの代償

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2020/06/vn-of-month-december-2007-dies-irae.html]vndbreview[/url]]
title: Naisho no Natsuyasumi

description:
"I... want you to read this."

Fukamachi Kae receives a mysterious letter from a popular classmate, Amamiya, but her mean older brother snatches it away and refuses to give it back. Now Kae has a week to try to recover the letter and discover what was written inside.
title: LOVELETTER

description:
Asougi City, on the Seto Inland Sea, is dominated by the corporation whose name it now shares.
The Asougi Group ordains every aspect of the citizens’ lives, but as those everyday lives are peaceful, few people object or question it at all.

Only one thing disturbs the city’s harmonic order: the activities of the “Anti-Aso” hunting clans, who snatch people off the streets by force and then hustle their bodies on those same streets to customers.

The Anti-Aso struggle, the suits plot their removal, and all the while the impending Founder’s Birthday Ceremony accelerates tensions everywhere.
And the balance in the city begins to shift, grinding people to dust in its motion…

[From [url=https://shiravune.com/archives/458]Shiravune[/url]]
title: doHna:doHna -Issho ni Warui Koto o Shiyou-

description: An original fantasy novel game. A love story of three pairs of men and women spun in the same world and the same era.
title: Sweet Raspberry Romantica
Oathbreaker
description:
A veteran Warlock finds herself in a political conspiracy when she is summoned by the Sovereignty as the new Court Mage.
Is the real danger truly one of political intrigue, or is there a darker secret hiding underneath?

title: Shuui Kaigan no Satsujin
description:
Tokyo Bay, 2002. 
A murdered woman is bound in a beauty clinic. Local nurse immediately notifies the Metropolitan Police Department, and investigator Yusuke Takahara is dispatched. Numbers are scratched on the victim's body. It all reminds a notorious case six years ago...

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2019/06/vn-of-month-september-2003-crosschannel.html]vndbreview[/url]]

title: Sukebe na Shojo no Tsukurikata
description:

Her friend introduced her to Toshio, a "gentle mister" to practice with.

After Toshio seeing Haruka, decides to monopolize her since he hadn't seen such a sexy body in ages.
"If I could keep this girl for myself… but that surely make her sad…"
And so, Haruka an Toshio begin a strange "special training".
Will Haruka achieve her confession, or...?

[Translated from the [url=http://binbin1919.com/SKDG/sukebe/index.html]official website[/url]]

In the war-torn Lucana a crackdown on mages has begun as they are believed to communicate with the enemy to get back into war state. Mages flee while only main character mage Astaire remains at the court with the support of princess Aria. Garland Empire sends a groom for princess Aria when a certain incident happens to mage Astaire...

description:

You wake up each day with a different girl beside you, but the rest of the day is the exact same! Which girl will you end up with once you finally make it to the next day?

title: Panacea
description: Panacea, a transformative tale of a young woman and an experimental new drug with metamorphic properties.​

The world  is full of replicants, drugs and prostitution trafficking. Fully biological humans are almost extinct.

Yuri lives in body disposal slums together with Rin and prostitute Nene. One day a girl appears in this dwelling. What's her reason to be in these replicant slums?

Protagonist never had a girlfriend, so he is often puzzled by the unpredictable behavior of the girls.

He was brought to a small country across the sea.
He was taken by the greedy people who used him for satisfying own desires.

A timeless serious story.
The thoughts of two people exist in eternity and realize in a never-ending chain of sadness…

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2019/07/vn-of-month-april-2004-realize.html]vndbreview[/url]]

title: Summer's Gone: Season 1
description:
Summer's Gone is a game about a guy (you) who's still plagued by nightmares about his lost friend.
That friends name was Summer. 
The MC is still kind of traumatized. Has a very dark view on everything.
Especially towards other people.
Only your adoptive mother Nojiko and your sister Nami are an exception.
One morning after speaking to your mother about your nightmare, you're going to head outside to witness an accident.
And then there is college.

How will events progress?
How will the spirit of the main character develop?
Will he find his way back into the light? Or be trapped forever in a web of bitterness and darkness?
And what about Summer?

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/Regium]Patreon[/url]]

title: Andromeda Six
description:
Set in the year 3025, you take on the role of a lost traveler. With no memory of your past, you wake up on the starship, Andromeda Six, surrounded by its crew of outcasts, each with their own vivid backstory and one common goal. 

You must try to recover the pieces of your past to uncover your true identity and purpose, while learning to survive the political turmoil overtaking the galaxy after its recent terrorist attacks.

On your journey you may end up discovering more than what you bargained for, but can you handle the truth of your past or will it end up consuming you? Will you follow the destiny the stars have written for you, or forge a new path?

title: Akari to Aya Ijiri
description:
Main character lives with two girls and does naughty things to them every day. He favors cosplay, so girls take on different uniforms.

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2019/08/vn-of-month-august-2004-sorauta.html]vndbreview[/url]]

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2019/06/vn-of-month-october-2003-lovers-koi-ni.html]vndbreview[/url]]
title: Reign

description:
Main heroine Minori is the only child of an upstream family. She is bright and positive at school, but becomes a spoiled child at home. Her parents are abroad, and maid Chiyoko does all the house chores. Minori and Chiyoko treat each other as sisters and have concealed feelings towards each other. 

One day Minori gets sexually assaulted by her female sempai from art club. Will Minori succumb to temptation or resist and cherish relations with Chiyoko instead?

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2019/01/vn-of-month-december-2000-never7-end-of.html]vndbreview[/url]]
title: M vs M
Hitomi dake wa Mitsumenai
description:
Two female members of the choir fall in love with each other. On a cold rainy night the finally become united.

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2017/11/vn-of-month-december-1999.html]vndbreview[/url]]

title: Freshman Year
description:
Freshman Year is a vignette game about an ordinary night in the life a college freshman named Nina. Nina's best friend Jenna invites her to meet up at a local bar with some classmates. Jenna is sort of flaky though, so Nina has to navigate the party by herself. You play as Nina, texting with her friend Jenna as you mingle, dance, drink and wait.

Please be aware that this game depicts scenarios that may be distressing to people who have experienced abuse.

Freshman Year was developed by designer Nina Freeman, with art by Laura Knetzger and music by Stephen Lawrence Clark.

This game is autobiographical, based on the experience of designer Nina Freeman.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/364450/]Steam[/url]]

title: Kuroyagi ga Ita Kyoushitsu
description:
We created a god.
Even though it’s intangible, it’s slowly consuming everyone.
A cult was born in a school classroom.
Who made it, and why? Where is its path heading?
This is the story of the purest evil cult created by an elementary school student.

A new school horror visual novel. Finally, it’s complete.

[Translated from [url=https://booth.pm/en/items/1371525]booth[/url]]

title: Qian Mian
description:
Amidst the garden of scented dreams
Elite and misfit, two extremes

One stands in spotlight, one cast in shadows
How will sparks flare as feelings grow?

As flowers bloom in the labyrinth
A lone Miss Saigon stands among the hyacinths

Like an apologetic, regretful dove
tells the story of melancholic love.

Melancholy Love is a coming-of-age yuri visual novel set in a private girls' academy. It's a romantic journey that follows an elite student born to privilege and a delinquent who wishes to break free from the chains of the academy.

How will sparks fly between these two people from different worlds? Will their love overcome all obstacles or will their differences be too great and drive them apart?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1387460/]Steam[/url]]

title: Kuroumi no Shousetsu
description:
Two stories included!!

""How I Fell into Eden""

"If someone doesn't die, the curse won't die either."

While working in some warehouse, the phone rings. Even though there's no electricity.
At the same time, in the pouring rain, a woman in a dress without eyes roams the store.
At the same time, the woman rises again and again, and is killed again and again.
At the same time, he is caught in a staircase that never ends, no matter how far he descends.
At the same time, a fragile explorer is drawn towards a forbidden ancient city.
Events that seem like they’re happening in a dream start to occur in reality, centered around a certain man.
Inescapable unreality leads to a brutal answer.

""Boiling Hot Love""

“Are you okay? You don’t look so good.”
“No, I’m fine. Just a bit dizzy.”

My life turned upside down when I became the target of a stalker.
Terrified but determined, I fought back with the help of those around me.
One by one, people were pulled into this madness, and the man I pursued seemed less and less human.
As everything I believed in was stripped away, the one I cared about most stayed by my side to protect me.
But when I lost even that, I learned the stalker’s true intentions.

[Translated from [url=https://booth.pm/en/items/1693840]booth[/url]]

Main character enjoys a carefree life when his blond sister Emily shows up. She insists on washing protagonist's back in the bath. But is it possible to conceal desire after that?

Houkago no Yuuutsu

aliases: Rick and Morty: Another Way Home - Unofficial Ren'Py Remake
title: Rick and Morty - A Way Back Home
description: This is a visual novel based on the TV series [i]Rick and Morty[/i].

title: Lilies and Daruma- Hana's Route
description:
When Sayuri Sato moves away from her childhood home, she leaves behind her first love; an unrequited crush on her female best friend! She vows to never again let her heart get broken: "I'm going to become someone who isn't afraid to confess their love!!"

Play from Sayuri's point of view as she navigates difficult choices about romance and her life. The player will make choices that will teach Sayuri the meaning behind queer romances, shyness, trauma, bullying, demisexuality, family, and the words, "I love you."

A dancer girl loses parents, but retains hope while living in the orphanage. Foster parents greet her with joy, but soon she learns the pain and torture in the basement. Girls are trained into slaves here, and her dark humiliation path only starts now. 

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2017/08/vn-of-month-may-1997.html]vndbreview[/url]]
title: Kojiin ~Kyouki no Ketsuzoku~
Suuhaisha ~Toraware no Canaria~
description:
Idol girl Makihara Karin brings her passionate voice to those who have faith in her. She sings in duet with a dreamy girl Rin Misugi. Entertainment world is full of darkness and craziness. Fans are like worshipers who dye their hearts in darkness for their goddesses to shine brightly. Melody flows from these fallen girls like a sad hymn in preparation for the sacrifice.

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2017/09/vn-of-month-december-1997.html]vndbreview[/url]]

In 2029 two thirds of Japan territory are under rule of socialist governments. Independence wars break out everywhere, but love feelings do not change, and many people try to live quiet lives.

Main character is a college student who one day manages to save a girl from a chase by black glasses men. Girl's name is "Else", and there is something mechanical about her. From this day young people cohabitation begins.

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2017/11/vn-of-month-december-1999.html]vndbreview[/url]]
title: else ~Fuurin no Shoujo~

description:
Beracus and Lee finally have a lead to more information for a potential cure for Beracus' suffering village. 

Upon finding the entrance to an apparently abandoned bunker, the two abruptly become trapped inside and discover the place is still very much lived in by a family of cult members who also happen to be skeletons. (Uh-oh.)
The family mistakes Lee and Beracus for cult members who are simply "late to the party" so to speak, and give them free reign to explore the bunker as they all wait for the surface to become the "New World". (Uh-oh!)

Of course, Beracus and Lee don't have that kind of time! Not only do they need food, water, and air to simply survive, they must return to the surface to continue their search for an the all important cure.
Together they must talk to the skeleton family to discover important information, find clues, collect items, and try to uncover and understand the tragedies that turned this simple bunker, into a tomb.
title: One-Eyed Lee and the Dinner Party
A Knight's Tale
description:
You play as a knight in a fictional medieval kingdom. You live in a castle together with your beautiful wife Cathy and the cute servant girl Lydia.One day you are called to the capital where you meet a young girl called Alice, daughter of your former teacher. She becomes your squire and together you will go on many adventures as you train her to one day become a knight herself. Your love life will get also get a lot more adventurous as you start developing feelings for not only Alice, but Lydia as well. Can this lead to a happy end for you? And what will Cathy so about this? Come and find out!

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/neverluckystudios]Patreon[/url]]

title: Pleasure Thieves
description:
"Pleasure Thieves" put you in the role of a teenager who moves to study journalism in a famous university. Usually, he is not very lucky with girls, but after meeting his roommate, he will discover it might be a way to improve his luck. 

This visual novel is a "comedy" game that takes inspiration from some classic movies like Porky's, Revenge of the Nerds, American Pie... It's mainly linear, but they will be some branching choices in the game, with characters that will remember your decisions and will affect your gameplay or the story.

title: Sin City
description:
This visual novel is about a boy who moves to Sunburn City, where his father went missing three years ago. There are unusual events developing in the city. Will the main character be able to finally find his father?

[Edited from [url=https://www.patreon.com/SparkSincity]Patreon[/url]]

title: Life with Pleasure

You are playing for a young guy named Nick, who lives with his mom and sister and gets into very spicy situations...

He gets a new job in the hospital where a lot of surprises await him...

It's not shameful. It's beautiful. Little Natsuki-chan entrusts herself fully to the will of the master.

Delve into the humble origins of this series with its main creator as he describes the early drafts and assembling the team. See early concept work from JT Sketch and Giao Nguyen, and hear from Solo Acapello as he gives a track by track walkthrough of the music.
title: Crime Opera: Beyond Butterfly

aliases: The last love song on this little planet
title: Saishuu Heiki Kanojo
description:
A visual novel adaptation of the tragic anime and manga series.

Shuji and Chise are ordinary high school students that start dating after Chise confesses her love. However, Chise is very shy and Shuji is insensitive: neither know how to express their feelings very well, but they do indeed have feelings for each other.

One day, while Shuji is shopping in Sapporo, unknown bombers attack the city in broad daylight. He and his friends run for cover, but notice a fast and small flying object shooting down the enemy bombers. Separated from his friends, Shuji wanders through the wreckage—only to stumble upon Chise; here she has metal wings and weapons—apparently grafted onto her body. She tells him she has become the ultimate weapon, without her knowledge or consent, and that she is seen by the Japan Self-Defense Forces (JSDF) as the last hope for defending Japan.

Will Chise and Shuji's love blossom even if Chise slowly loses her humanity and becomes more of a weapon than a human being?

A Touken Ranbu doujin focusing on Heshikiri Hasebe.

"Master, you've finally accepted me..."
"......"
"I wanted to be yours for so, so long..."

Heshikiri Hasebe had worked as an attendant to his master, a female [URL=http://eos.kokugakuin.ac.jp/modules/xwords/entry.php?entryID=1315]saniwa[/URL], for a long time and secretly harbored feelings for her.

The saniwa had a secret she never told anybody.
She suffered from an incurable illness and wouldn't live for long.
For that reason, she was to leave Honmaru tomorrow and give up her position as "master". The saniwa chose to issue a particular order to Hasebe and pondered whether...

To keep her secret, give up being a saniwa and leave Honmaru...
To tell Hasebe everything...
Or perhaps to come up with something else...

[Translation of [URL=https://www.dlsite.com/girls/work/=/product_id/RJ265149.html]Japanese DL Site synopsis[/URL]]
title: Fuji no Kakoime

description:
Detective School Q is the story of a group of young students from Class Q of Dan Detective School (DDS), a prestigious and renowned detective academy founded by Morihiko Dan, the most famous detective in Japan, and the adventures and mysteries they unfold and solve together. They eventually work against Pluto, a mysterious organization which creates almost fool-proof plans that only a handful of detectives can solve. 

This game portrays an all-new adventure where the protagonists must resolve a mystery in a traditional Japanese hostel.
title: Tantei Gakuen Q: Kioukan no Satsui

description:
Popular anime series has been adopted into a full-fledged mystery adventure game. Can you become  protagonist from famous Tandei Gakuen Q and solve difficult cases?

Qunxing Zhan Ji: Yishi de Xingchen

description: Ayaka, Tomoya's girlfriend who went to heaven, suddenly appeared before Shin. He told him she had lost her "Angel Wings" and had to get them back to go back to heaven but... she doesn't have any clue of how do they look like! The only way to find out is to meet people with "wishes" in their hearts, who happen to be the heroines of the three first games in the Memories Off franchise. Through minigames, they'll be able to solve this conflict, and let Ayaka go back to heaven.
title: MemOff Mix

description:
You're a crazy perfectionist who's devised the perfect plan of how your life should go. Everything's up to planifications, but... the date you chose to be proposed to is only 100 days away!

Even if you have to get a dating app and find many liars, the perfect man is waiting for you, within a time limit!
title: Doubt ~Moteru Otoko wa Konkatsu Appli ni Uso to Hisomu~
Lily's Handmaid
description:
Sometimes turning down a job offer may cost you your soul. Sarah, for one, is keen on keeping her soul to herself, so she promptly accepts lady Melissa Duskheart's proposition to become a handmaid for Melissa's daughter, Lily.

Though she had no prior experience of being a domestic servant, Sarah finds herself quite comfortable in her new workplace. The noble ladies and their maidservants are an amiable lot, really, when you get to know them. Granted, they are not big on exclusive relationships like most of the common folk, but that's hardly something that would bother an easy-going girl like Sarah. Especially when she's constantly being approached by, frankly, very attractive women...

Medieval society was divided into three orders: the men of prayer, the men of war, and the men of the plow.

The Kingdom of Litovia, located in East-Central Eurodia, was bordered by two powers: the northerly Kingdom of Armekia, and the Confederation of Minotaur Tribes in the Labyrinth Forest, both of which put great pressure on Litovia.

As the humans began clearing land for civilization, raids and pillages by the minotaurs increased. The Kingdom of Litovia attempted to subjugate the minotaurs with force, but suffered a great defeat... and despite efforts at reconciliation, raids and pillages continued.

The Litovians also proposed an alliance against the minotaurs with its northern neighbor, the Kingdom of Armekia, but the answer that came back was an overbearing one.

"We'll help you if the queen of Litovia becomes my wife."

Such a marriage would mean that the nation of Litovia would have to collectively convert from the Church of the Eastern Rood to the Church of the Holy Rood. The Litovians could not accept this.

Moreover, due to the minotaur raids, Litovian military strength in its border regions was greatly reduced, forcing the queen of Litovia to make a painful choice as to whether to tax her subjects to the bone and buy peace with money... or to reinforce the border garrisons, despite the lack of available manpower. Therefore, she turned to a last and most desperate resort, ordering the monasteries near the border to organize their own garrisons to defend themselves.

One of the monasteries that received this order was called Berensch, and among the monks who lived there was our protagonist, Astor.
title: Kyonyuu Fantasy 4 -Shuudoushi Astor-
Shiika o Tashinamu Re
description:
A story told from two points of view.

On one side, the protagonist is one day masturbating to his little sister when his home which was actually sentient but in hibernation wakes up and forcefully ejects him from the premises. He returns only to be ousted once more. This repeats until the building gives up and the two start their lives together. This is a story of boy meets girl.

On the other side, Agnafire, Blizzarto, and Lie Spark are Devices, automaton created to annihilate humanity. Despite no longer receiving messages from above or any other Devices, they continue to search and destroy human settlements. Upon reaching a certain village, the trio split up with Lie Spark searching the nearby forest alone. Within the forest lies an abode with an unexpected inhabitant: a fellow Device who has been coexisting with humans. This fateful encounter begins Lie Spark's questioning about herself and her purpose of existence.

Main character wakes up with amnesia and wonders aimlessly while meeting different persons. The whole picture forms up only after seeing all the multiple outcomes linked together.

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2019/11/vn-of-month-december-2005-yatohime.html]vndbreview[/url]]
title: Cubic 3
Hyakuiro Megane ~Kalos Eidos Skopeo~
description:
Summer, 2004—  
An old man lies alone on his deathbed.  
Weary and unresponsive, the only sounds that fill the room are the vague echoes of disembodied voices.
The dreams he sees—or rather the flickering images of his life—filled with memories from a forgotten time of his youth.  
Wandering through these memories, the old man seeks lost fragments of his former self.  
For human memory weaves history; what he conjures may ultimately shape the world. 
When he awakens again, what kind of world will he see?  

Summer, 1923—Tokyo—  
As the memories of the Sino-Japanese and Russo-Japanese wars begin to fade, the Empire stands shoulder to shoulder with Western powers as democracy blossoms at last.
Cafés brim with the scents of freedom and progress while young literary enthusiasts gather around coffee tables passionately discussing art.   
In Asakusa, a towering twelve-story building looms over lively six districts filled with penny arcades and theaters. 
Gas lamps cast a warm glow over youths whispering romantic sweet nothings.

The old man had once been that young boy in those lively scenes.
Now a seventeen-year-old military cadet is enjoying the fleeting bliss of his summer break.
What did he see? What did he do? And what did he lose?
The memories of this dying man intersect with the very currents that forge his nation’s destiny—and all converge here.

And it is here that he will meet his fate.
Even if it happens to be in the form of a series of grotesque murders casting shadows over the capital.

[Translated from [url=https://web.archive.org/web/20041113152342/http://globule.info/game/hyakuiro/index.html]the official website[/url]]

In the area around the Imnis Mountains in the northern part of the Raoulversh continent.
The Angel Army, the forces of light, and the Demon Army, the forces of darkness, were constantly vying for control of the territory.

At the end of a long and dizzying war, the dark forces were gaining momentum and advancing the war situation.
One day, the forces of the two sides are in a state of balance.

–The reason for this was because of the rumor of the “demon king’s downfall” that governed the dark forces.

Whether it’s a lie or not, the control of the demon army gradually begins to be disrupted by this news.
The Angel Army, seeing through the confusion launched an offensive and the balance of power was gradually being reversed.

However, a man who sees this situation as an opportunity has launched a new force.

Due to the harsh environment, Klaus, a human, a race that rarely seen in the land of Imnis.
He used to be a Suima, but for some reason he was transformed into a “human body”, a drunkard.

Underneath his fragile body lies the inherent abilities of the Suima demon race.
He has an inborn and unparalleled ability to manipulate scents and control others with his magical powers.
Klaus has expanded his power to become the new king of the demon tribe to rule the land of Imnis.
He led the dark forces and launched an army march to destroy the Angel Army.
title: Tenmei no Conquista
Love More Ordinary ~Mou Hitotsu no Arifureta Love Story~

description:
After spending weeks grinding an otome game in pursuit of its hidden yuri route, a freak accident transports Erika into the body of the game's antagonist: the evil void witch, Queen Esmeralda.

Erika quickly realizes the gruesome situation that she's in. The fact is that every single route she played in the game has led to the witch's death - starting from the moment when the heroine falls in love with one of her protectors - the Heart Knights.

"But what if the princess doesn't fall for one of her knights?"

For the sake of self-preservation, Erika must adopt the role of Queen Esmeralda, her polar opposite, and seduce the heroine for herself, all while fending off otome stereotypes and trying to find a way back home.

Seven years after the destruction of her home, Olenine wanders the land as an exorcist, a specialist who harnesses spiritual essences to confront supernatural forces. Yet with her rare knowledge of inhuman languages, she strives to settle conflicts through words rather than violence. 

Tasked with rescuing an influential merchant’s daughter from Gremach, a fortress besieged by ghouls, Olenine must use knowledge, power, and diplomacy to unravel a grudge spanning generations. When plunged into a maze of unspeakable secrets—including her own—can she bring peace to both the living and the dead?

The Maccialatt’s army doesn’t try to hide the truth: you are going to be sold as a slave. Despite the chains around your wrists, this story is yours. You are the decision-maker. A world that lost 70% of its land because of 'The Collapse'.
Eva, a boy that lost part of his memory from before the world's collapse in a forest of junk in a small island, collecting things that had drifted ashore from other islands that had sunk during 'The Collapse', he passed calm days with a young swordsman Alivio. After one day, Eva regains his past memories with his once best friend 'he'.

This is a story about a boy and a young man living in a heartwarming way in a world after the Collapse, seriously going through memories.

description: There's a website where you can design your own perfect butler. The protagonist has become addicted to this game.

As his whole world crumbles from the rejection by the girl he loves, Vince cannot begin to fathom ever being in a worse situation. But that’s where he’s wrong. The very next day, a spontaneous, blonde-haired girl he never met before decides out of the blue to confess her love to him. Torn between his broken heart and his desire to never subject anyone to that kind of suffering, Vince decides, despite his own feelings, to learn more about this mysterious girl—still hoping in the back of his mind that his unrequited love will one day be reciprocated.

While our protagonists were gone in another dimension, Subaru—who was exiled by Mishiro once upon a time—returned, and made Tamaki the main goddess of the shrine, assuming direct control over the shrine's authority.

As her first order, Tamaki banned all romantic displays of affection between men and crossdressers, which ignite the ire of the newfound brides.
What will become of their now forbidden love?! Will the hidden secret of Kotomusubi shrine be unveiled?!

As men and gods recover their lost connections, a new crossdressing legend arises!

BornWild • Versus is an adult cinematic visual novel series set in a futuristic world where war is big money. It tells the adventures of two former child soldiers.

Before, it was about 50 years of territorial conflicts, political clashes fed by the growing scarcity of the raw material and orchestrate, behind closed doors, by a powerful conglomerate.

Raised in that chaotic world, Alexander “Dragon” Drayzaai and Lushian “Weed” Nicolier are two childhood friends, that started in the “War Zone” at a young age.

"You are an adult, you have to be responsible!!"

One day, Yumemi begins to act strangely, culminating in her simply walking out and wandering around the town. The staff of the planetarium are bewildered, and one of the workers—a woman named Satomi Kurahashi—is ordered to go follow Yumemi and bring her back. description:
Hakata, located in the Land of Shura.
A city overflowing with zombies.

Zombies have no future.
Each day, they devote themselves to hard labor just to survive.

But even in such a world, there are zombie girls who keep their dreams alive.

The protagonist is Maruwata, a former secret service agent who lives a carefree life in the Land of Shura.

By chance, he meets zombie girls who aspire to become idols, 
and having found someone to protect, 
he begins to support them while fighting to save others once again.

He gathers up members and strengthens his bonds with them.
To fund his activities, he sometimes dabbles in the harsh zombie business.
His first live performance saw him experience spectacular failure and success at the same time.
Behind the scenes, he deals with mafia interference in secret.

A rotten life? No. Even zombies can shine!
The girls prove on stage that they are alive now.

After Damon’s parents find out that he’s going through with the move, they cut off all financial assistance. His job search suddenly becomes about more than extra cash. Despite their demands to stay on campus and study during the summer, Damon craves freedom. Rent isn’t cheap in a beachfront cottage, and he needs to find a job quickly.
