description:
A simulation game about sexually training your saucy daughter in law.
Includes brutal route, and lovey dovey route.

Koutarou just can't seem to get along with his new wife's daughter.
One day, he discovers her trying to take his money, and what more,
she shows no remorse with her filthy mouth.
And so Koutarou ends up raping her, and so their warped relation begins...
Will they be able to get along...or will everything fall apart?

[From the [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ283169.html/]DLsite store[/url]]

title: A Cottage Story
description:
Once upon a time a woman named Catriona Neylan built a cottage in the strange and mysterious forest known as Rossenward. There, she continued her study of botany and work as an apothecary, earning the trust of the creatures residing in the forest...

During her time in Rossenward she had only one apprentice, caretaker and adopted kin.

Play the day-to-day life of the apothecary who lives in Rossenward forest completely removed from modern society. Rossenward forest is home to a number of mystical creatures including fairies, goblins, giants and satyrs, many of whom you consider neighbors and clients. The day is like any other as you tend to the cottage left behind by your godmother, until you're visited by a curious stranger with an urgent request...

[From [url=https://ladymeowsith.itch.io/a-cottage-story]itch.io[/url]]

After a disastrous encounter with the Imperial Fleet, you and your hapless crew manage to trundle into Cicero Lunar Station, in the rogue Tucana Quadrant. With your ship in tatters, your crew seriously judging your ability to lead and your bank account as flat as a pancake, you need to think of something really good to get you and your lot out of the station before the next Imperial Inspection.
title: Space Bar at the End of the Galaxy
Hibikino-san-chi wa Eroge-ya-san!
description:
In the residential district Kamiitsukomachi's old shopping district lies Hibikino Shop. This general store closed down after the grandfather owning it finally retired.
His three granddaughters, attached to it, and unwilling to let it disappear, decided to renovate it.
Hibikino Shop, loved by its community since 50 years, under the pressure of Yukari, the good for nothing of an eldest sister, became... an eroge store!

Hibikino Shop finally reopened.
A store of this size being too much for only three sisters to handle, and with only Yukari to know about this peculiar kind of products, they asked the second daughter's childhood friend Kurama Ren, our hero, to help them, as a part-time worker.

This is a story about the eroge industry from the perspective of a salesclerk.

A linear visual novel about the experiences and thoughts of a young boy seeking for his place to live. Animated backgrounds and character sprites will help you fully immerse yourself in the game's history. Feel the experience of the main character, will you agree with him?
title: My Silly Life
Bai Jie Guai Yi Yu Jinyu

aliases: オー!パンツ another story of no pants!
title: Oh! Pantsu

description: Prestigious all-girls school called Saint Orkis Academy was founded by the wealthy Azuma family. Although it was recently made co-educational, it still maintains its reputation as a top school. The academy is currently led by the daughter of the Azuma family's head. However, a new threat emerges in the form of the Nishiki family, a rising conglomerate that secretly trains and sells sex slaves to gain power and influence in the political and economic spheres. The Nishiki family sends a young and skilled female trainer named Kuga Kei to infiltrate the academy and take down the Azuma family. The Azuma family, unaware of his true identity, accepts him as a transfer student into the academy.
title: Saint Dorei Gakuen 2

description:
Meet Kiara. She's your new catgirl servant!

She is a catgirl with an ara ara onee-san personality and a pretty peculiar gift...
Learn about the world you have found yourself in and the pleasures that Kiara has to offer in this ara ara adventure!

After a mysterious accident, you find yourself weakened and on the brink of death on a battlefield where cat girls, elves, succubi and all kinds of exotic girls are fighting to survive.
Fortunately, you get rescued just in time by a beautiful and mysterious cat girl named Kiara. She tells you that from now on, she's your servant in charge of taking care of you, she promises to fulfill all your wishes while you help her with an important quest during this war...

"I'm ready to serve you... Are you ready to be my master?"

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1343090/Kiara_And_My_Ara_Ara_Adventure/]Steam[/url]]
title: Kiara And My Ara Ara Adventure
One → Shota ← One
description:
"Hello Boku-chan, can you please teach us about this world?"
Two adventurers that said they were from a different world came to my rescue when I was being attacked by monsters in the mountain.
Arin, a cheerful elf that can easily become friends with anyone, and Lulu, a slightly shy but still very gentle beastfolk.
The two of them were troubled, with no way to return home or a place to stay.
"If you don't have anywhere to go to, come to my house!"
I asked my mom so we could help my saviors and lent them an old house that wasn't in use.
Everyday I spend looking after the two of them is very enjoyable and exciting (though there were also some very embarrassing days...)
One day, I heard that they came to me looking for a husband, and I started feeling a different kind of excitement...
What is this feeling...
Can these two Onee-chan teach me?

[Translated from the [url=http://azarashi-soft-plusone.nexton-net.jp/oneshota/story.html]official site[/url]]
A dating simulator featuring the members of the band Lovechild of Melancholy.
title: Lovestory of Melancholy

description:
"You are guilty."
Innocent words and behavior changed the trajectory of the next life.
Gentle black-bellied girlfriend, lively and lovely sister, what are their unknown pasts?
Forgotten accidents, horrible legends unwilling to face, and dusty memories gradually peeled away and exposed.
As the head of the high school reasoning club, you need to play reasoning games with them to find the "sin" you have committed before, and to find the truth behind the "sin".

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1372310/]Steam[/url]]
title: Lian'ai Tuili She
Shijian Suipian: Qiji
description:
"Aeon on Mosaic" is a series of time-themed text adventure games, each chapter will be an independent story, you need to play different roles to explore their stories. "Aeon on Mosaic: Anemone" as the prologue of the series of games, tells the stories that Convallar deeply buried in his heart. In an accident, he met the hit girl Ruta, and the trajectory of his life has changed since then.

But is this really the case?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1334020/]Steam[/url]]

aliases: HaremじゃないよKingdom シャルローネ＆マルー 編
title: Harem ja Nai yo Kingdom - Charlone & Marrou Hen

description:
In a world where the supernatural is commonplace and magic flows as freely as water, there reside heavenly beings, beasts, and demons who are as real and numerous as leaves on a tree. 

It's here, under the watch of Ana, the Mother Goddess, that demi-humans of a wondrous variety thrive. But the Mother Goddess' love is not unconditional! By Her decree, the inhabitants of the Otherworld are never to mingle with the mortals on the other side, except to perform their duties.

One such person, an angel whose name was erased from legends, violates this rule and is cast away from the Otherworld in mad fury. You play as this angel! 

You’ve turned into a futanari through a pact with a demon. Now you must struggle to survive in this unknown world. What will you learn about mortal life, and how will it change you...? Romance a unique trio of monster girls, including two other futanari!
title: Reborn in Sin
Sayonara Mr. Stealer
description:
In light, there is shadow.
The suburb of ward 34.

A place with heaps of garbage piled up, sewage seeping out from the ground, and ducts filled with trash.
A hidden side behind the glorious lifestyle. A town that inconspicuously forms its existence in that location.

The town has achieved rapid growth as years passed by, and before one even knows, people have spread the rumors of it becoming the city of crime.
Everything is allowed.
Everything can be bought.
Medicine. Weapons. Human rights. Special abilities.
All the pleasures that one could ever imagine.

They met in such a city, lived together, and eventually became friends.
From the desire of enjoying a little more luxurious life.
At first, it was just that...

Smoldering fire.
A report left undone.
Strange phenomenon. Conspiracy. Public opinion.
What is the exact purpose?
What does the thief steal, and who does the swindler deceive?
The moment the culprit of such phenomenons is known, comes the reveal of a true enemy.

The time such things are realized, marks its beginning.
A fight, to take back what has been stolen.

[Translated from the [url=http://n-hsc.com/?page_id=520]official site[/url]]

Okamura Yuuto is an introverted young boy whose father send a relic which can put anybody into an hypnotic state, ready to obey to any suggestion. Disbelieving first, Yuuto discovers that the relic truly has hypnotic power.

Longing for Asagiri Kasumi, his senpai from the same literary club, he crosses the line and uses the relic on her. He starts by extracting personal information, which is how he learns that the rumor about her dating someone is true.

Jealous, he finally decides to make her believe she is his girlfriend when they are alone.
title: Saimin Datsujo ~Subete ga Boku no Jiyuu ni Naru Sekai e Youkoso~ Asagiri Kasumi Hen
Time for You
description:
15 years ago your family disappeared in front of your eyes. No explanation. No clues. Just questions. You can learn the truth now, but you'll need help. Become the main character and solve the mystery of their disappearance.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1371660/]Steam[/url]]
A completely new mechanic of the defense game. Use magic dice to defeat beautiful girls, explore the world, and find the way out.
title: Faptastic Journey
Shou Yue - Wuming Ren Ou
description:
When I received a life-size puppet, I thought it was a prank, but the puppet moved suddenly...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1354240/]Steam[/url]]
The gatekeeper of an elevator to the moon meets day after day a girl without papers. An archer pining for her love shoots messages to the moon as shooting stars.
title: Moon Archer Shooting Stars
Mahou Senshi Interlude Phantom
description:
Kiel's plan of dominating the world was thwarted by the Mahou Senshi (Magical Warriors). However, it also left quite a mark on the girls' side. Due some scheme behind the scene, the two Symphonic Knights who are one of the leaders of the group were missing in action. Furthermore, Sweet Lip who had been rescued from the other side of the gate was now in a coma.

During this period, Elixir Lime and Elixir Rose who just came back from Roa, the other world, heard an eerie rumor. The rumor is that Sweet Lip who was supposed to be in a coma in the infirmary was walking around in town. To verify the truth, Elixir Knights followed the trails of Sweet Lips into the city.

Meanwhile, Noel, Kiel's assistant, who received a mortal wound from the fight against Mahou Senshi woke up to found herself in another world's town. Right in front of her eyes was someone who shares the same appearance as her, "Noel".

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/pro/work/=/product_id/VJ014089.html]DLsite[/url]]

title: Fit Shichao! ~Kozue no Another Story~
description:
Kozue, who has become the temporary manager of a fitness gym, teases me as usual.
This escalates into a relationship where they have sex.
As I plays with her, I becomes immersed in intense, abnormal sex.
But I wonders if that's all I wants to do with her.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2317310/]Steam[/url]]

title: Zetsurin Yandere Haha ~Musuko no Kyokonburi ni Teisou ga Yoromeku~
Honey Coming Clair Mini Fan Disc
Koridory ih vospominanij
description:
The action takes place in the near future, 2022. The FBI is beginning to use a new technology: reading the residual signals of the human neural network. Scientists have established where the memory is stored and learned to read it. Which means FBI agents can now see everything the victim saw. Including the attackers' faces.

John Victor is a former cop. He will have to pass an exam to be transferred to a special department V, specializing in the use of this technology.

[Is your expression "real"?]
Human words have truth and lies.
There are fake and genuine facial expressions.
This is a new Psychological Crime Mystery that unravels "lie" from emotions!

[What kind of game?]
An adventure game that includes visual novel stories, facial expression analysis mode, Liar mode, and reasoning mode.

[Crime mystery of the "puzzle story" has begun.]
This is human drama featuring a variety of characters, and you are "Lie catcher".
Expose lies in human gestures, voices, and facial expressions!

You interrogate all suspects and discover their "suspicious" testimony.
But not all of them are guilty, deduce what is a lie and what is a fact, and reveal the truth.
title: Liar Trick ~Honkaku Suiri Shinrigaku Adventure~

description:
In an age before the clip-clop of horseshoes disappeared off the streets of England, before the tipping of hats and the wearing of corsets were written off as the tidings of yesteryear, there are stories which have been lost to time — stories of people, of lives, and of love.

Ours is just such a tale, centred on two men navigating the smog-covered streets of Victorian London: Hugo Brooks, an editorialist who never adventures far outside the written word, and Seamus Charkham, a confirmed bachelor who is determined to gulp life down right to the last drop.

Both are set in their ways, and both are in desperate need of a change, loath as they are to admit it. Despite wanting to believe they’re satisfied with continuing on as they have been, they find that sometimes, things can change for the better.

In the London of 1875, their stories — their lives — become intertwined, and together begin to bloom and unfold...

[From [url=https://www.ofsenseandsoul.com/]official website[/url]]
title: Of Sense and Soul
Space Explorer Iyo!!
description:
Iyo, a human space explorer, lands upon Starbius, the infamous planet known for its Shooting Star. Although he wants to explore this planet's gift, he must get the owner, Atom, to trust his intentions. However, as their interactions progress, it seems that Atom has more than just a chip on his shoulder.

[From [url=https://aohisashi.itch.io/space-explorer-iyo]itch.io[/url]]

Due to a totally-accidental fatal injury, you are now on the verge of life or death. 

The grim reaper arrives to off you, however... Can you convince him not to make you see the light just yet?

[From [url=https://pacchistudio.itch.io/404-shinigami]Itch.io[/url]]
title: 404 SHINIGAMI

description:
"You don't have to be on guard! I'm here from the depths of hell to save you from the darkness of this world."

It was the self-proclaimed hell-returned, wacky magical girl, Noroi, who rescued me from punks shaking me down. When she snapped her fingers, some contract magic I saw in my mind's eye activated—

"Huh? Hey Satori, what are you holding?"
"Walther PPK."
"Huh?"

Thanks to this so-called magic, what was in my hand turned out to be a compact automatic pistol favored by the German police... (At this point, I stopped thinking about it.)

Still, Noroi smiled without showing much reflection.

"Try imagining something more fun, cheerful, poppy, and lyrical! Maybe the world might change a little," she said.

Q. Why did Norikawa wish to become a magical girl?
A. To turn this world into hell.

The downer surreal death comedy ADV that no one wanted!

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ291856.html]the dlsite[/url]]
title: Majo Mashou Mahouma

aliases: Busty Beach Babe's Seaside NTR Dickdown
title: Seiso na Bakunyuu Hitozuma o Beach de Dekachin Namahame ~Teisoukan no Tsuyoi Mesu o Nanpa Soku Pako de Haramase Onaho Netori Suru Natsu~
description:
Our hero heads to the beach to pick up some girls, and one in particular catches his eye --
busty and full-figured housewife Kana Misaki! She tries to get away, but the less popular spots
are also the best places to have sex! And as things start to heat up, she gets more and more
into it... And thanks to the wonders of technology, a smartphone video ensures that he can call
her up whenever he wants for some fun she can't refuse!

It's gonna be the best summer EVER!

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE292813.html]DLsite English[/url]]

title: I Got Reincarnated As a Villainess And It Suits Me!
description: This is the story of a villainess who encountered her deadly fate with her own hands.

title: under a starless sky
description:
Under a starless sky takes place in a post-apocalyptic world where the stars are long gone. The world is dark and cold, and much of society has broken into small communities.

Two women from opposing groups who, by fate or by luck or by something else, meet up at an empty hill to gaze upon the empty sky and reflect upon their lives. Despite living completely different lives and holding conflicting values, the two find themselves drawn to each other, meeting upon the same near-barren hill every few years.

Under a starless sky is a visual novel made for Shoot for the Stars Jam 2020, a space and sci-fi themed game jam!

[From [url=https://lenbit.itch.io/under-a-starless-sky]itch.io[/url]]

title: Lilian - the beginning of the end -
description:
An Angel falls in love with a boy who talks to the skies.
Who is he talking to?
A forbidden love story during summer time.

[From [url=https://xiri.itch.io/lilian-the-beginning-of-the-end]Itch.io[/url]]

You two were the perfect love story. Next door neighbors, high school sweethearts, and now, you are finally together. But oftentimes, good things fall apart. You navigate a bittersweet journey coming to terms with death, loss, and painful regrets. 

[[url=https://chuyu.itch.io/love-nora]From itch.io[/url]]
title: Love, Nora

description:
Ever since they met, Eleanor Rose and Georgia Daisy have been inseparable but now Eleanor is gone and Georgia feels lost without her best friend, willing to do just about anything to get her back. Take a deep dive into Georgia's mind. Explore the school, talk to strange creatures, defeat enemies and regain Georgia's memories. Discover the truth about Eleanor's disappearance.

[From [url=https://teamkdg.itch.io/where-is-eleanor-rose]itch.io[/url]]
title: Where Is Eleanor Rose?

description:
You are a resentful alien captive, exchanging hands once again. What do they want from you this time?

[From [url=https://cryoslight.itch.io/the-sixth-prison/]itch.io[/url]]
title: The Sixth Prison

description:
Rika is stuck in a dead-end career as the janitor of a dreary research facility in space. What do they research? She couldn't care less. Not until her concern for a co-worker pulls her into some sinister circumstances.

[From [url=https://cryoslight.itch.io/lavender-link]itch.io[/url]]
title: Lavender Link

description:
From the white sky, the snow fall and running down her cheeks.

We were holding hands, lying on the snow.
When our eyes met, she smiles at me――

――That was the dream I saw when I was a child.
On the day when the town turned white by the snow, me and my childhood friend Mirai lying on the snow.

I wanna stay as it is.

That was what I thought when I was young.
I grew up with a faint love. 

I was certain that our feelings were the same.

Until that day.

"Sorry. I'm sorry, Aoi. But... I'm sorry."

It wasn't supposed to be like that. It wasn't supposed to be that way.

She was the only one who support my heart, of me who doesn't dream of a great one.
I thought she would be with me no matter what.

But she went away.

Feeling despair of everything, getting up from bed becoming troublesome. 
I started to having doubt on "reason for living in this meaningless world"――

Then I, had this particular dream.

Beautiful coast.

White sand beach, calming pale pink sea, a lighthouse that can bee seen in the distance――

――"She" was there.

Mirai's look alike, an ideal girlfriend who will never betray.
title: Dreamin' Her -Boku wa, Kanojo no Yume o Miru.-
Luoma Zhi Lian
description:
This is a text-based adventure game. You play as General Cicero, a figure from the Roman Empire. Through your choices in the text, you’ll step into the battles fought by the Second Triumvirate, witness the glory and achievements of ancient Rome, and come to understand the true meaning of life and freedom.

In the game, you’ll encounter legendary figures like Octavian, Antony, Caesar, and Cleopatra, and through the text, you’ll uncover the stories behind their lives.

Welcome back to the Roman Empire, General Cicero.
You’ll quell internal rebellions, fend off external enemies, and prove Rome’s dominance on both land and sea. You can also pursue your own emotions, choosing to become a free spirit. The oracles of Rome, the druids of Gaul, the priests of Sparta, and the remnants of Carthage will guide you toward the truths of the past.

Octavian, Antony, Caesar, and Cleopatra—these legendary figures will accompany you on your journey, leading you into an epic adventure where you’ll experience the splendor of Rome. Follow your heart and make crucial choices at key moments.

Through this immersive text-based adventure, you’ll explore our world, rendered in classical art styles and accompanied by ancient music, as you take in the sights and sounds of Rome.

[Translated from [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1304790/_/]steam[/url]]

title: Imouto Yuuwaku Ecchi ~Nee, Onii-chan Ecchi Shiyo~
description: Saki has sex with her brother.
Play as Eric and his wife Karen, who moved into the wrong neighborhood.
title: Moving to the Wrong Neighborhood
Reincarnotica
description:
Reincarnotica is an adult visual novel that takes place in the near future where Immersive Virtual Reality games are the norm. You take control of a middle-aged man that has nothing going on for him but due to a freak accident one day, finds himself inhabiting a body of a younger man. Not only that but he discovers that he's going to live with 2 beautiful woman and acquired a new found power unbeknownst to him... 

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/polyrotix]Patreon[/url]]

aliases: やみぞめリベレイター
description:
Haruomi was a hero sent to another world to kill the demon lord and when he did, he wished to going back to Earth along with the Goddess Ninia, however she denied to go with him and decided to just sent him back to Earth alone. He was, once again, in earth attending a very prestigious school he is a part of the student council which he wish to turn into his harem. 

After trying to save a friend of his, Haruoumi find he has the demon lord's soul he killed within him, not only that but the goddess knew that the demon lord's soul went to earth so she selected a few girls that have been previously sent to another worlds to fight demons lord and gave them once again power in order to kill him and destroying the demon lord's soul. Now he has no choice but cooperate with the demon, so he'll try corrupt the heroes and get their magical power in order to save himself, get his long wished harem and be free of the demon lord soul.
title: Yamizome Liberator -Yamiochi Yuusha to Ochiru Senki-
Apocalypse Mutant Erotica
description:
Embark on a road trip in a post apocalyptic world, threatened by mutants and scavengers. Make decisions to move forward and take care of the company you meet along the way, for each day could be the last.

[From [url=https://pent-panda.itch.io/apocalypse-mutant-erotica]Itch.io[/url]]

title: On Affliction and Affection
description:
A medieval narrative featuring magic, mystery, and romance. Follow the tale of two fellows, their budding relationship, and the tale that ties them together. 

Content warnings include references to gender dysphoria - the tale is a happy one in the end, however!

[From [url=https://brodylicious.itch.io/on-affliction-and-affection]itch.io[/url]]

title: The Last Survey
description:
The Last Survey is a narrative essay where you take on the role of a geologist contracted by a Brazilian mining company to survey rare earth metal reserves. Rare earth metals like nickel, silver, cobalt, and platinum are used in most major electronics including PC parts, green technology components, and almost all mobile devices. However, after a year of conducting your research, you've found that there is not enough of these metals on the planet to sustain industries reliant on current supply chains, and you must deliver these findings to the company's CEO, Victor Ferreira.

Based on studies and projections from real-world geoscientists and mineral analysts, recent findings show there isn't enough mineral material on the planet for the growing demands for electric cars, high efficiency fuel cells, solar paneling manufacturing, and even some of the components used to play & produce this game.

Will your choices help steer the direction of your employer away from global mineral fatigue? Or will the urgency of your research fall on unsympathetic ears?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1331620/]Steam[/url]]

You are desperate, and must earn a summer internship or risk being expelled from the University’s Business Program. Fortunately, you have managed to find a position at Voluptas, a famous adult entertainment company.

However, things are not always like they appear to be, and you quickly learn that the people with whom you’ll be working have their own hidden agendas. Will you attempt to resist this constant manipulation, or will you indulge in decadence and allow to become fully transformed?
In any case, your life will never be the same after this summer!​
title: Summer of Shame

description:
Maria is a lovely and faithful housewife, who spends her time mostly on taking care of her husband and her lonely mother. She, now at the age of 36, has been married to Paul for more than 15 years - they got married right after her school graduation. Their marital life is considered to be normal, easy-going and quiet.

Paul currently works for a well-established and healhty IT company, where he holds a managerial position with a decent salary and extra perks. The only issue is that he needs to work overtimes quite often and he seems not to be able to cope with the pressure of this particular job.

Apart from being a faithful wife and a caring person, Maria is still a beautiful mature woman, who needs to draw her husband attention and satisfy her continuously growing sexual needs. Eventually, she'll have to make important choices about her behavior and her life, according to many emerging incidents and sexual temptations.

Will Maria stay faithful, enjoying her marital life or will she succumb to her sexual impulses and her lust? The choice is yours!

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/vangames]Patreon[/url]]
title: Temptations Are Everywhere
Itsu made mo Musuko no Mama ja Irarenai! ~Sewazuki Aoi-kaa-san no Muchimuchi Oppai ni Amaete Ippai Shasei Shitai!~
description:
The main character, Itsuki, loves his mother, Aoi, as a woman.
In order to manage his uncontrollable urges, Itsuki pleasures himself almost every day.

One day, Aoi inadvertently catches him in the act.
The atmosphere is very awkward, and Itsuki begins to fear that he might not be able to control himself.  He fears he will push things even further.
With this in mind, Itsuki decides to live alone when he starts going to college.

At first, living on his own goes very well.
However, over time, he gradually begins to miss his mother.

Meanwhile, Aoi visits him just to check in and see how he's doing... 

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/pro/work/=/product_id/VJ013932.html/?unique_op=af&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=none]DLSite[/url]]

title: Steamy Paradise
description:
A soon to be graduate student is planning a trip with his schoolmates to a paradise island in the Caribbean. During the journey, the plane must make an emergency landing on Lost Island; an island full of mysteries to unveil. The good news is that our protagonist is stranded in the middle of nowhere with the sexiest girls he could ask for. Join this sexual adventure now!

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/impactxplay]Patreon[/url]]

title: Order Made Shokushu
description:
I'm a man, but I became a mama!?

Kenta, who left home searching for a part-time job arrived at the tentacles factory.
Let's grow and ship tentacles as ordered!

title: Honeypot
description:
It is January 2025 and the world is on the brink of chaos, with old alliances around the world crumbling and new powers threatening global peace. As international relations break down between nations, crime prospers, with powerful gangs and mafias contesting for riches previously undreamed of. In the midst of all this corruption, excess, and conflict, intelligence agencies spar with each other in a new cold war, desparately trying to gain the upper hand through any means necessary.

You are not a part of this world - not yet, anyway. You work as a waitress in a coffee shop. You have a boyfriend, a few close friends, and a perfectly normal life. Sometimes you find yourself daydreaming, wishing for something more exciting to come about, something that will truly be able to satisfy your innermost yearnings. Little do you know that your life is about to radically change forever. Who will you become?

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/sinfallstudios]Patreon[/url]]

You play a young university student in a fictional world! Throughout the story you pursue romantic relationships with other characters of the game! Besides the relationships you try to deal with a mystic encounter entering your life!
title: Bloody Passion

description:
You play in a role of a quite known and popular modeling photographer. That's how you met the woman of your life and despite her already having a kid (hot grown up girl now), you married her. It didn't take much time and you managed to give her your own child, a boy. It seems for you that all dreams came true... however, your wife starts to get frustrated after some time... especially due to fact that while you're photoshooting hot girls in their bikinis she must take care of your son diapers.

She insists she wanna get back to work and materialise her skills as event manager. You fully support her in this decision, but problem is she expects now that you're going to spend much more time with housework and son's diapers. However, that is something you can't afford as you're at the top of your career. Older half-sister is not the solution at all, as she is quite spoiled, spending all the free time twitching how she plays the games or makes her make-up.

The only solution is to hire a babysitter...​

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/T4bbo]Patreon[/url]]
title: Babysitters
A Wave of Lights
description:
In a seaside town, Hannah spends her days asleep and her nights wandering the empty beach. Too anxious to hold down a job or go to school, her roommate thinks she's hopeless. Hannah is inclined to agree. 

On one of these monotonous nights, a spaceship crashes on the beach! The cute alien inside disrupts Hannah's life... and her entire sense of self.

[From [url=https://tabbbywright.itch.io/awol]itch.io[/url]]

title: Why Did I Quit Being A Pilot?
description:
A grandfather tries to remember the reason for his unusual retirement.

[From [url=https://jarrett-ang.itch.io/why-did-i-quit-being-a-pilot]itch.io[/url]]

title: Island of the Magnolias
description:
This upcoming summer, the Elderfar camps have decided to do something different: by setting up a summer long camp on Magnolian Island. Originally a company town before the company stopped running, the island features plenty of room for the new campers to explore and learn about its interesting and unique history. All that's left to do is make sure that its indeed safe, and that's whats been assigned to Sue and Harley, both of whom are exceptionally qualified due to their years working with Elderfar, and their dedication to safety.

Join them both as they explore the camp grounds as well as the abandoned town that still exists on the island in order to give the Elderfar camp managers that final green light.

[From [url=https://artandsandwiches.itch.io/island-of-the-magnolias]itch.io[/url]]

title: Wanderlust: Transsiberian
description:
There’s a tension between the two men boarding the Trans-Siberian railway in the fall of 2010.

There’s 9,289 km to go from Moscow to Vladivostok, and it might be just enough time for them to finally start being honest with each other.

One of them is Henry, whom you might know from the original Wanderlust: Travel Stories. This time it's all about family.

[From [url=http://differenttales.com/transsiberian/]official website[/url]]

title: Way to a Vampire's Heart
description:
Being one of the youngest Vampire Hunters, Lucian Lockhart didn't expect to encounter one of those bloodthirsty creatures in his lifetime. After all, vampires were on the brink of extinction and no one heard about a single apparition of them for more than fifteen years.

However, the opportunity unexpectedly appears and Lucian finds himself face to face with the enemy he had only known from told stories and books. As if fighting a vampire for the first time wasn't astounding enough, Lucian also discovers one thing about his family's past that could tear apart everything he had believed to be true.

[From [url=https://hayashi-games.itch.io/way-to-a-vampires-heart]itch.io[/url]]

[url=/c130766]Sakura Rumi[/url] (27)
One day, she heard some intense voices from the couple next door.
Out of curiosity, she peeks through the window.
Her peeking becomes more bold with each day,
and their eyes meet one day.
She leaves in a panic, but..

[Edited from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE294338.html]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Kyouhaku Netorare Seiso Tsuma ~Haramase Shussan made Shikyuu ni Sosogare Tsuzuketa Hitozuma~
aliases: Intimidating a Proper Housewife Into Cheating

title: Bokutachi wa Ikenai Asobi o Oboeteyuku ~Fuuun Aiuchi Gakuen Flat 2~
description:
Tomorrow is the long-awaited entrance ceremony.
But... my house burned down in a fire!
The story kicks off as I crash at my cousin's place.

Dive into a conversation-driven adventure with over 1,000 choices!
It’s mostly a rom-com, so don’t expect anything too intense.

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ293728.html/]dlsite[/url]]

title: The Moon's Cherished Flower
description:
An epistolary visual novel about a missing child and the Lady of the Moon.

"Your niece is missing, her parents just passed away, and their house was burnt down. Her diaries are your only clue now to find where she is and what actually happened to this family. Good luck!"

title: Divine Favor
description:
A man wakes up in Heaven.

Divine Favor is a short (5-10 minute) kinetic novel that follows the story of Leon Montgomery, and the events following his untimely death. Bathed in darkness, with only the voice of a kindly old man to guide him, Leon has no choice but to acclimate to his new surroundings... but since this is Heaven, that shouldn't be a problem... right?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1376640/]Steam[/url]]

title: Lens Life
description:
Your upstairs house is rented to sisters, and as the landlord, you have already installed cameras of various angles in the room. By searching the items under the lens, understand the personality and life habits of the two sisters, enjoy the secret of observing the lives of sisters.

One day, you found that the sister encountered an emergency at home, and your actions may influence the direction of things. What choice will you make?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1346970/]Steam[/url]]

title: Stories of Submission: Learn Your Place
description:
Stories of Submission: Learn Your Place is the story of William, a man who thought he had life all figured out: beautiful wife, good job and a decent house. Then it all fell apart. Several years later, he still hasn't managed to pick up the pieces and move on.

His life takes an unusual turn after his fateful encounter with Freyja, a no-nonsense Mistress looking for someone who can be shaped into the perfect servant. William is far from perfect, however. Can he confront his past and the mess he's made of his present for a shot at a new and unexpected future?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1355370/]Steam[/url]]

title: Sen no Toki o Koete ~Tsukiyo no Chikai~

description:
What would happen if someone naturally evil got almost unlimited power? Well, play it and find out.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/whiteleafstudio]Patreon[/url]]
title: Tamas Awakening

description: You are 18 years old girl and your family is broke. Mom and your elder siblings can't get a job in a small town where you live. The bank will take your house soon. As your family has a bad reputation, the entire town is against you and your siblings. And when it seems like the end of the world, your mom receives a mysterious job offer. She will work as a teacher at St. Johnes College, an old private institution. From now on, your life won't be the same.​
title: Under Control

description:
You woke up with no memory intact and greeted by two girls claiming they're Grim Reapers. What's more, they tell you you're currently in their world and you're no longer human.

[From [url=https://kamuo.itch.io/agrss]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Aren't Grim Reapers Supposed to be Scary?
Saint Dorei Gaiden ~Mesuinu Sousakan Asahi no Sennyuu Report~
Yasuragi Kaoru Ryokan ~Futari to no Utopia~
Saimin Kanojo Holic "Kamimachi Joshi ga Oshikake Saimin!" ~Yandere Iede Shoujo ni Otosareru~
The Outong
description: You're just an ordinary man, who wants to become an adventurer and take revenge for your parents. Sadly you're too weak, but everything changes after you get a very strong magic power.

title: Six Pomegranate Seeds
description:
A young woman, a goddess, ventures into the realm of the dead in search of an artefact rumoured to contain mysterious power: the pomegranate seeds. Power, adventure, love... what is it you seek?

Six Pomegranate Seeds is a visual novel re-imagining of the tale of Persephone's descent into the world of Hades.  Play as Seph as her curiosity drives her deeper into a strange realm.

[From [url=https://decadencethief.itch.io/six-pomegranate-seeds]itch.io[/url]]

title: Love it Hunter!
description:
In a world where the population has plummeted due to war and environmental pollution, Japan is using its state of the art medical technology to promote the "Gene Rich Policy." 

With the development of machine genome science, children can be created artificially from test tubes and the life-span of the dying human race has reached over 200 years of age. However, humanity received more than just medical benefits from this technology...

For the human race that craves "life," will they get eternity (divine punishment) or death (blessing)?

(Info from official website, translated by [url=https://twitter.com/jouhou_bl]☆BL News☆[/url])

title: Sportcon!
description:
You got a magical ring and now able to control muscular jocks' minds freely❤

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1205630/]Steam[/url]]

title: Du Jie x Monü
description:
The orc magician who came down from the sky ended my lonely life. However, my peaceful daily life was also disturbed.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1283210/]Steam[/url]]

title: Future Girls
description:
Having finished university with honors it is time to begin your working life, hoping to get your start at a local laboratory for quantum physics you cannot help but dwell on the missed opportunities during university where you were forced to focus on your studies. Fortunately if somewhat strangely, the universe has decided to alter your fate... Or at least two women from the future have.

When they travel back in time to be with you, claiming a calamity in the future prevented you from being together.

Now you must play host to these two beautiful waifs as they upend your life and ask you to choose between them.
Is the future in the balance? No just your love life in this adult romantic visual novel with just a little bit of time travel.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1160610/]Steam[/url]]

title: Taizai no Majo -A Seacret Sin-
description:
Long ago, four witches called the Witches of Deadly Sin ruled an island country in the air, that is the city of the sky.

1000 years later, witches are severely discriminated against, and anyone found guilty of being a witch is imprisoned and sentenced to death. 

The main character, a Knight of the Kingdom of Arial, Hart-Duraflame, is commanded to hunt witches.

aliases: Hinan Seikatsu -Kimi to Sugosu Sei no 6-kakan-
title: Hinan Seikatsu -Kimi to Sugosu Sei no Muikakan-

description:
A bizarre threat suddenly kidnaps two sisters: Akira and Kaede.
Akira wakes up transformed by the experiments of an organization called "Eitraizen".

Akira's one and only goal is to rescue Kaede,
an epic mission aided by her strange new superhuman powers.
She can now transform into "Blazing Angel Mistletear",
a holy war princess with godlike power... to make her enemies pay!!

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE230030.html]DLsite[/url]]
title: Kyokukou Senki Mistletear
Yandere Series
aliases: ヤンデレシリーズ　安心してヤンデレ成分を補給できる素晴らしいADV

title: Milky Way Prince – The Vampire Star
description:
A visual novel about an abusive relationship, idealization, and intimacy.

Live a summer of dysfunctional love through branching storylines, twists, sudden changes, and a special mechanic where you choose which senses to use with your boyfriend. In these moments, you will learn about him, his personality, and his past, making you question everything.

[From [url=https://www.milkywayprince.com/]official website[/url]]

title: Harry Potter and the NLP Generated Visual Novel
description:
A short and silly story about Harry and his friends at Hogwarts.
The plot of the novel and some quotes were generated using Natural Language Processing (NLP).

[Edited from [url=https://tauntybird.itch.io/harry-potter-nlp-vn]itch.io[/url]]

Play as Male or Female in this short story of an "Apothecary". 

On a quest to do right in this fantasy world, by saving a boys life.

[From [url=https://lightningsheart.itch.io/one-endless-night]itch.io[/url]]
title: One Endless Night

description:
Things have changed quite a bit on Adastra. The Human's arrival has altered the political course of the entire galaxy. After his departure, the friends he knew on the wolven moon are left guessing as to what needs to be done next. The Parents, the supposedly all-knowing, all-powerful beings controlling the Galaxias, have a plan, but it's not like they're being upfront about it. They never are, and Scipio, a young wolf on a diplomatic mission, starts to wonder if these Parents really do hold all the answers. He starts to wonder if there are Others.

[From [url=https://echoproject.itch.io/khemia]itch.io[/url]]
title: Khemia

aliases: Orange Pocket 生録！キャラクター座談会
title: Orange Pocket Zadankai
Hina Carrot e Youkoso♪
description:
Love Hina characters are put in the stage of Pia Carrot to produce a romantic comedy.

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2019/01/vn-of-month-december-2000-never7-end-of.html]vndbreview[/url]]

aliases: ベオグラードメトロの子供達
ベオグラードメトロの子供たち
title: Children of Belgrade Metro
description:
In the year 20XX, reports come in of psychics appearing throughout the countryside of rural Serbia in the former Yugoslavia.The government creates a law to punish those who use their powers. This seems to have kept the peace.

Ten years later.....

Cyzki, a boy who has moved to Belgrade, the capital of Serbia, has just run away from home.
Abandoned for four years after the construction was halted, he wanders into the abandoned Belgrade Metro.
However, it is a hangout for people with abilities who have no time to spare.

Due to the "hunt for Psychics" by the Golden Dawn Corporation, a large corporation that controls Belgrade, Psychics were placed in a difficult situation.

Furthermore, Cyzki meets Mariya, the daughter of Golden Dawn, and falls in love at first sight.
In an attempt to get close to her extreme male chauvinist ideology, he ends up dressing as a woman in order to get close to her.
As he pursues the mystery of the psychic, the more deeply he gets into her, the more ambitious our hero becomes.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1355500/]Steam[/url]]

title: Miami Holidays
description:
In this game you have a chance to get to know a charming girl over the internet. She lives in Miami and you are going to visit this city in 2 weeks... The result of your dating will depend on you. Good luck!

[From [url=https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/535697]SexHotGames[/url]]

title: The Smoke Room
description:
Moving to the town of Echo was a bad idea. Trusting someone he barely knew was an even worse one.

The Smoke Room tells the story of Samuel, a sex worker in the town's most infamous brothel.

After making the biggest mistake of his life, Sam will struggle to keep it a secret.

He comes to realize however, that doing so might be impossible...

Echo itself seems to know what he's done, and it's not keen on letting him forget.

[From the [url=https://tsr-vn.com/]official website[/url]]

Arimori Academy, an art school located a little further from the city centre.

On the day of the entrance ceremony, the protagonist, Ikenaga Ren, had a fateful reunion with his childhood friends, the Saegusa sisters Ayame and Hinata.
He also got acquainted with Kanno Junko, a third-year student, and Sakurada An, a second-year student. All of them spent a lot of time together in their workroom at the school.

Tosu Towako, a student form another school who is in the same grade as An, also joined them and they worked together for the school festival.

As time passed, Junko graduated, while a new student, Katsuragi Nanase, enrolled at the school.

The situation changed, and even the senpai and childhood friends who Ren has been casually spending time with until now couldn't hide their agitation.
How could anything not happened in the summer, when people are exposed and worn swimsuits?

No one can stop this burning love!!

[Translated and edited from the [url=http://products.web-giga.com/aikiss2/introduction/#switch-intro-story]Official website[/url]]
title: Ai Kiss 2

description:
Nerus is a mystery and romance kinetic novel about two souls with intertwined fates.

This tale spans across many eras and places, each one riddled with mystery, suspense and clues to understand the inner workings of this fantastical world. I only ask that you sit down and enjoy the story. But, be wary of that which lurks within the dark.

Our first story follows Shax, a young shapeshifter sent to serve a Great Shapeshifter, Neru Magnus, as punishment for his crimes. As their relationship changes and they grow closer, Shax comes to realize something about himself.

Our second story follows Alessia and Bitey, a detective duo that lives in a ruined world, in their efforts to solve a mysterious crime that took place inside an important abbey.

[From [url=https://roddorod.itch.io/nerus]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Nerus
Dare ka ga Koi Shita Hankagai -Sleep Story-
Lovingly Evil
description:
Welcome to the Villain Conference, your number one opportunity to make connections with other villains, whether you're a necromancer, a criminal mastermind or an evil demi-god! V-con is your chance to network with baddies from countless dimensions and universes, update your villainous expertise at various interesting talks, and learn the latest industry news. You're sure to have a wicked time!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1247020/Lovingly_Evil/]Steam[/url]]
A visual novel featuring VTuber unit Asano Sisters Project.
title: Ruriiro Days ~Heavenly Blue~
Asfr's Story
description: The handsome actor Nagasaki Yuito has decided to spend his first day off in a while at a hot spring hotel deep in the mountains, together with his girlfriend Oosato Momoko and her little sister Chika. However, supernatural danger awaits them there...!

Mika, both of whose parents died in a traffic accident. Her mother's body was taken back to their hometown. To see her mother's last moments, she headed towards Akaza Mountain alone. After arriving, whom she met was a group of boys and girls in the Great Culture Study Club. A free adventure game where you spend a summer in the Danjara Settlement.
[Translated from the [url=http://wata-ame.zombie.jp/skunkvine/]official site[/url]]
title: Hekusokazura
Xing Yue Ye ~Seven Tales in Spiral~
Chou no Doku Hana no Kusari Tokubetsu Hen
description:
On Yuriko’s birthday, a party is held.  
Though the Nomiya family holds the title of viscount, they’re struggling financially, and the party is a desperate attempt to keep up appearances.  
Her father, who loves her deeply, has gone all out to throw a grand celebration.  

Teased by her childhood friend, Hideo, who knows the family’s struggles, and forced to endure the hollow flattery of the gathered nobility, Yuriko can’t take it anymore and tries to escape.  

Set in Taisho-era Tokyo, the story follows Yuriko, born into a prestigious noble family, as she’s tossed about by a cursed fate. 

[Translated from [url=https://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1010230]getchu[/url]]
aliases: 蝶の毒 華の鎖「そして誰もいなくなった」
Tulpa: a day in the life of a tulpa breeder
title: Tul'pa: odin den' iz zhizni tul'povoda
description:
A bit of everyday life from the life of a tulpa breeder. Tulpa is an imaginary friend, but is everything as rosy as some write. This little story will tell you what the day of an ordinary traveling tulpaman would be like.

You have the opportunity to make a decision for the hero and thereby change the possible outcome of the story.

title: Fleet Morals
description:
The Republic is at war with the Conglomerate and each day the balance is tipping in any one’s favor. In the midst of that Laura has signed up to the Republic fleet and is working her way through the bootcamp aboard the fleet’s capital ship when we join her journey. 

Wartime is ripe for secrets, intrigues, near-death-experiences and of course close-quarter encounters where skin touches skin, voices whisper into ears and kisses are exchanged in the few places that offer a modicum of privacy.

Expect shifting loyalties, fleeting morals and characters whose beliefs and motivations align for a while - disaster is a given and everyone has to do their part to quench the fires.

[From [url=https://skirtchaser.itch.io/fleetmorals]Itch.io[/url]]

Nearly ten years after moving away and losing touch with my childhood friends, we are suddenly reunited!

The boarding house I was living in was suddenly developed into a share house. And wouldn't you know it, the two people who started living there were my long lost childhood friends.

But on top of that, the girl living next door who is the childhood friend I've had the longest gets herself involved too. Thus began a slightly mysterious, very sexy, and certainly heart-pounding daily life while living together with my childhood friends!

With my childhood friends who've developed in all the right places...
A small but luxurious living space and a mystery surrounding the boarding house...
It seems that this summer is fated to become "thicc" with sex.
title: Muchimuchi Dakara Mukumuku Shita ~Osananajimi to no Sugoshikata~
Voice
description:
The World Without Speaking

In the near future, the world perished by war. The only shelter of surviving humanity, The Dome City, is dominated by a dictator called The Great Leader. The Great Leader said, 'speaking' is the source of all discords and forbids everyone to speak.  Instead of speak, people communicate in writing through the terminals given to each one.

The Speakers

But, of course, there are also those who resist this irrational world. They are called The Speakers. They secretly gather people to teach speaking and grow their power. More and more people are becoming the speaker with dissatisfaction with the government due to the gap between the rich and the poor and various social problems. The government is using more coercive measures to counter this.

The Cruel Era

The Dome City is the tiny world. Over 50 years have passed and the population is increasing, but there is no way to expand, and construction is limited only. Building a lot of tall buildings somehow accommodates the population, but the jobs that are scarce are unable to accommodate the growing population, and the unemployment rate is at an annual peak. No matter how coercive it is, people's dissatisfaction is inevitably increasing, and the power of the speakers is growing. Because of this, the government secretly prepares a new plan...

[From [url=https://wtfman.itch.io/voice]itch.io[/url]]

As Jacob Lee, you've been sent to live with your Aunt in the last days of winter vacation following a terrible family tragedy.  Meet new people, make choices, and explore the spaces between dreams and memories. 

To Dawn and Back is a non-violent surrealist art-horror game inspired by visual novels and immersive sims. With more than 20 unique dreams determined by your actions and more than a dozen unique characters, I hope it is an adventure that will stay with you when you step away from the screen. 

[From [url=https://paganblack.itch.io/to-dawn-and-back]itch.io[/url]]
title: To Dawn And Back

description:
You haven't seen Daniel for a long time since the accident. He retreated to a hermit like existence on the island. The invitation to visit him came out of the blue - and you hope that he has finally turned over a leaf. Yet, as you step onto the jetty a shudder winds its way through your bones...

[From [url=https://foolishmusings.itch.io/insulam]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Insulam

description:
Because of his cowardly nature, Kousaka Iori never had a girlfriend, let alone a friend. Now that he was entering high school, Iori decided to attend a school far away so he can start fresh and make some friends in hopes of leading a better, happier life. 

First things first, Iori chose to move into a share house for fellow gamers, since it would be easier to improve his communication skills with people who share the same hobbies as him. If he manages to gain enough experience from this, surely Iori would get a girlfriend. 

Iori had high hopes that everything was going to go swimmingly, from his new school life and his new living situation. He'll be able to meet people with the same interests as him. And a willing opponent to play against will always be nearby. He would be able to talk to his heart's content. With a spring in his step and a gleam in eyes, Iori opened the door to his new share house, excited to finally fulfill his dream.

But alas, as Iori opened the door and walked into his new home, his eyes jumped...

As before him was a group of beautiful girls, something he was only supposed to encounter after he leveled up.

[Translated from [url=http://nexton-net.jp/ms-toybox/skyrocket/koinoha/story.html]Official site[/url]]
title: Koinoha -Koi no Share House-
Kagura Reimeiki ~Hatsuka no Shou~
description:
On her way home after completing a quest to exorcise a terrible youkai, Hatsuka Otowa receives a phone call from Mizumori Shrine—the Shinto shrine her family has run for generations. It's her father, who wants her to set out on a new quest immediately. Having barely returned from her previous one, Hatsuka complains. Why does she have to go, and not her older sister, Keika? But in the end she strikes a deal with her dad and agrees. On arriving at the shrine that sent out the SOS, a young priest greets Hatsuka and informs her that youkai have started to appear in the neighborhood, along with some very unseasonable snowfall. Sensing a mysterious force in the nearby woods, Hatsuka is convinced that it's the source of all the local problems and confidently sets off to complete her quest.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1839340/]Steam[/url]]

title: Police hot Tale
description:
Police hot Tale is a visual novel in which you will observe the romantic story of the offender and the police officer.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1333330/]Steam[/url]]

Bonds of Love features you as the protagonist in his last year of high school. You will go to school, interact with lots of people around you, and get to know them as people. 

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/zelathorngames]Patreon[/url]]
title: Bonds of Love

description:
It's 207X and WW3 never happened. Your name is Shiki Kan, a young high school boy who's been recruited to join an academy made for all the androids that were no longer needed for the war.  There's one thing though... it's an all-girls school.. and they're pretty cute...

[From [url=https://waifu-trash-family.itch.io/girls-frontline-tomorrow-with-you]itch.io[/url]]
title: Girls' Frontline - Tomorrow, With You

description:
It's a game about a guy who moved to a new town. Actually, it's the one that he was born in and spent most of his childhood at. There, he gets involved in romantic adventures.

[From Patreon]
title: Dawn of Malice

description:
After a plane crash you and a female passenger find yourselves on an abandoned island.

Will help arrive?
Were there other survivors?
What will happen?
What will you find?
You play and YOU decide!

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/xred]Patreon[/url]]
title: Lewd Island
My Catgirl Maid Thinks She Runs the Place
description:
"My Catgirl Maid Thinks She Runs the Place" is a slice of life comedy where the title pretty much covers what's going to happen. It stars a catgirl named Cynthia who becomes your maid in exchange for getting to live in your apartment. Aside from her being secretive about her past, you quickly discover she's not that great of a maid. But she tries hard damn it!

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/uncleartie]Patreon[/url]]

In order to attend college, A young man must move in with his mother, who had abandoned him.

Will he be able to forgive, or will he not be able to make up for lost time?

[Edited from [url=https://www.patreon.com/posts/second-chance-39282381]Patreon[/url]]
title: Second Chance

description:
The whole thing began a few years ago when Brian's mother had died. She was sick, but he had no idea - she and his father kept it a secret. After she died, his father started to drink heavily. One night the cops came to Brian and told him that his father won't come back soon, so he'd better stay with a relative. When he found this, he did his best in finding out what happened to his father, but no luck.

A few days after the cops came to his door, Phill, the principal of the high school where Brian was a student, came to him and told him that he could live with him for a while. While living with Phill, Brian did plenty of bad stuff, but in the end things got better

The main purpose of the player will be to find out why is his father in prison, while his second goal will be to find out what everybody hides. Everybody has secrets, and your job is to find them. Some characters have big secrets, while other not so much.

[Edited from [url=https://www.patreon.com/royalcandy]Patreon[/url]]
title: No More Secrets
Hillside
description:
The exclusive district of Hillside is home to the country's film industry and to those lucky enough to be able to afford to live there. Among them is veteran supermodel Charlotte Lloyd and her youngest daughter, Emma.

You play an experienced bodyguard hired to protect the 18-year-old Emma from a stalker who has recently begun sending disturbing letters to the shy teen.

But protecting her might be the easiest part of the job as you move into Charlotte's house and live with one of the world's most beautiful models. Will you be able to control your sexual desire and preserve your hard-earned professional reputation? 

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/DarkBlue]Patreon[/url]]

title: Knockout Master
description:
Knockout Master puts you in the role of a boxer, whose dream is to become the champion of the Boxing League, while at the same time dealing with different people in his life. Who will you choose, and what will you do to become the Knockout Master?

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/MooN_Games]Patreon[/url]]

Nearly five years ago, the death of your wife left you in charge of your two daughters. You tried to be the best caregiver you could, but all three of you were scarred and hurt by the sudden loss of the light in your lives. Now your daughters have become grown-up adults, and the grief you share has pushed you apart. Will you be able to overcome the barriers of your own making and help your daughters rekindle the light in their hearts?

The setting is a village in the countryside. Summertime.

description:
Following the Makai Tree incident and the departure of Ail and An, the five Sailor Senshi enjoy a newfound period of peace. With no enemies to fight, they return to their colorful, but ordinary, daily lives. But one night, Luna and Artemis sense several mysterious shadows releasing dark energy – energy like that of a Youma. Could the vanquished Dark Kingdom have somehow returned? The Senshi have dark secrets to uncover, and enemies old and new alike to face…if they can ever stop goofing off at the arcade.

title: Midnight Caravan
description:
Gamblers, prostitutes, murderers, thieves, though moral choices and crimes set the tone for Midnight Caravan, a visual novel by Gamera Interactive. Our players join the main character in a gripping story of vengeance, political schemes, intrigues, espionage double-crossing and much more throughout the entire Italian peninsula. As the leader of a small caravan of outcasts, the protagonist will have for the first time in his life true autonomy over not only his fate but even on that of those who surround him: will he protect his people or pursue his own fortune? Juggle an intricate web of resources and relationships while keeping your enemies in the dark in this highly replayable dark tale.

Only one thing is sure: escape isn’t an option anymore.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/849140/]Steam[/url]]

title: Yome no Imouto no Amai Yuuwaku ~Onee-chan Yori mo Kimochi Ii Desho♪~

description:
Infinite Stars is an interactive sci-fi story where you get to choose how your own adventure unfolds. It is inspired by stories like Dune, Star Trek, and The Expanse.

In the distant but still recognizable future humanity has overcome our differences. We are finally a united people. No longer divided by our nationalities, our religions, or our race, we call ourselves human.

But we weren't alone. The Discovery War was unprovoked and bloody.  It took years of strategic diplomacy before humanity was allowed to join the Interstellar Concordat, and though there is an uneasy peace, not all our new allies seem to have our best interests at heart...

The game features an intriguing narrative filled with mystery, action, and romance told from two perspectives. From one perspective, the player is an observer that guides the other characters and their choices. From the second perspective, the player takes control of their own character; a powerful Mah'Abeu shrouded in secrecy.

Who will you be? A  confident flirt with an optimistic outlook on life? A timid loner with a flair for diplomacy? A bisexual envoy who never lies and likes to be in control? Or a shy yet loyal individual who always has a snarky comment at the ready?

[From [url=https://infinitestars.itch.io/game]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Infinite Stars

description:
Humans, fairies, dwarfs, and beastmen. Laurencia is a remote island where the four races live happily without conflict.

That peace was brought about after the four tribes united to challenge the "Demon King", who once came from the mainland and ruled the island with fear and despair. They were able to defeat and seal him in after a having won a fierce and painful battle. Several hundred years have passed since then. The threat of the Demon King has been forgotten in the prosperity supported by advanced magic technology.

One day, an earthquake occurs that shakes the entire island. The epicenter of the earthquake is the dungeon called "Zvinga" where the Demon King was sealed. The four tribes fear that this might be a sign of the resurrection of the Demon King. The protagonist, Bernard, a descendant of the mage who created the ward, is ordered to investigate it.

[Translated from the [url=http://www.route2.co.jp/Triangle/Products/Princess/index.html]official site[/url]]
title: Princess Crisis

description:
In Tako Kingdom, deep under the sea, soup is an everyday, common meal.     

Princess Takorita is deeply dissatisfied with this food culture and demands a new dish which can spice up her life.
She decides to go up to the land together with the merman "Mer" as her guard.     

On the land, Princess Takorita meets the humans Dino and Ina.
The culture differences greatly surprise the princess.     

Then, finally, she has her fated encounter with the "french fries".🍟🍟🍟     

...Is that all?     
No, that's not all! French fries might look simple, but there's more to it.     

Princess Takorita continues her adventure to make the fries more and more tasty!     

Her journey is far from over.
Even finding her long-lost grandfather is only a small part of her adventure.

Summer is just around the corner. Tokizaki Youichi's air conditioner chose such a timing for it to broke down. It would take quiet a while to repair, so it seems, and as such he's at his wits end. While he is at a loss for what to do, his childhood friend Misora Saku, who is staying in the next room over, makes an unexpected suggestion.

title: Inkou Kyakusen Uzushio -Naraku no Cruise-
description:
---From Japan to the world's ports. A Luxurious Panorama Park on the Sea! 

Enjoy a quality cruise at an affordable price! Skull's Sea Line (SSL) is a newly established Japanese cruise company that merged with a major overseas cruise line. The luxury cruise ship Uzushio has restaurants, bars, lounges, swimming pools, fitness clubs, spas, beauty salons, stores, theaters, casinos, medical offices, and other general facilities, The Uzushio is a luxury cruise ship owned by SSL, and is equipped with state-of-the-art technology, including restaurants, bars, lounges, swimming pools, fitness clubs, spas, beauty shops, theaters, casinos, and medical offices, and even has a diving service.

 Although basically a Japanese ship, the concept is “a ship that transcends categories". The ship is designed to attract a wide range of passengers with the facilities of a casual cruise ship, the attentive service of a premium luxury cruise ship, and a well-trained language staff. The concept is attracting attention with its catchphrase, “The best luxury cruise ship of the century” and, with regular giveaways, tickets for a cruise may be within reach of the average person. The Uzushio is on its maiden voyage with a big campaign.

But this is just the beginning of hell. The most luxurious cruise ship of the century is about to set sail like a whirlpool, drawing in its prey as its name suggests.

[Translated from [url=https://www.turumiku.jp/product/uzushio/]the official site[/url]]

Glenn is a slaveowner who values money over one's life. He won the bid for Claudia, the daughter of a former noble family, the Quinel, at an auction.

To exchange for her freedom, Claudia promised to earn money for Glenn, and agreed to fight in the sinister arena.

Will she claim the triumph of a glorious winner, rejoice in the revival of her family, or suffer in the hell of endless humiliation? With the joining of the mysterious dark elf -- Irene, the fateful three will set off a blushing story.

Astonished by Ai's potential, Yaichi agrees to become her master, and the two then brave themselves together in the world of shogi with their friends and rivals. However, this comes with the condition imposed by Ai's mother that Yaichi is to marry Ai if she does not become a major player before graduating middle school.

The assassin's services go to the highest bidder and she thrives in her chaotic, lavish lifestyle. She's unhinged, unfiltered and becomes obsessed with pushing you to your limits, trying to tap into your darkest secrets.

title: Hassha All Right♪ Inaka Ressha wa Hamerare Houdai!? ~Gyaru to Bunjo no Ojisan Ijiri~
description:
It all started when I got transferred from Tokyo to a local sales branch in small-town Japan.

On my first commute to work, I find the train completely empty.
With everyone moving to bigger cities these days, I guess I can’t be surprised.
It’s just… I’m apparently running the branch office all on my own…
I guess it’s gonna get pretty lonely for me out here in the middle of nowhere…

“Hey you, the guy in the suit!”

Out of nowhere, a blonde babe with a fake-orange tan casually sidles up to me.
Despite her thick makeup and gyaru looks, she claims she’s the train conductor.

“So, mister! Where were you working before?
And where’re you working now? Oh, also…”

She bombards me with incessant questions for the entire ride.
By the time I get to my stop, I’m already worn out with exhaustion.

“Bummer. I guess this is your stop, huh.
How long does it take from your place?
I can time it just right if you like~”

As you can see, I barely have any say in the matter…
Before I know it, she’s already half-forced herself into my life!

And I haven’t even told you about the other girl yet!
Cute, bookish, short black hair… So which one do I pick?

title: Blood: The Last Vampire
description:
Blood: The Last Vampire is part of the Yarudora (やるドラ) game series which are meant to be played as an interactive anime. As is the case with earlier games in the series, Blood: The Last Vampire features full voice-acting and plays non-stop as a regular TV anime with player choices which need to be selected in a time limit of only a couple of seconds and result in story branching or slight alteration of the events. The game has multiple endings and by re-playing it, more choices and ending get unlocked. There is a flowchart show the overall story progress and taken routes so replaying does not become repetitive.

The PSP release of Blood: The Last Vampire is a compilation of first (上巻) and last volume (下巻) which were released as two separate games for PlayStation 2. In addition the PSP release has doubled the CG gallery and also includes special movie edits for each of the three heroines which can be unlocked by completing the game.

Based on the manga and anime movie with the same title, this game focuses on the story set in Tokyo a couple of decades after the original series. While the anime and game stories don't have direct connection, the game setting is based on the same world as in the original series. While Saya is the protagonist of the original story, this story features a young boy who is a high-school student, as the protagonist. One day, while riding a subway, he experiences the strangest sensation... he starts hearing a demonic voice that no one else can hear. This soon starts to affect his daily life and drive him towards madness, but then Saya, the last remaining original vampire enters his life.

Source: Mobygames
aliases: Yarudora Series Vol. 5: Blood: The Last Vampire
やるドラ ポータブル Blood the Last Vampire

title: Pleasure villa
description:
During a difficult period of his life, young Tommy has finally found the perfect job! He was hired as a handyman in the rich and luxurious Pleasure Villa! Everything seems to go in the right way now: a very good salary, a good place to live, and the Pleasures, a nice family to work for! But every member of this family and even its crew seems to hide a different secret! Why does detective Rhonda Robinson want to frame Mr Aristotele Pleasure? Will Tommy resist the incredible sex appeal of the two young Pleasure daughters, Elettra and Marika? What secret is Mrs Venere Pleasure hiding, and how could Tommy use it for his purposes? Sweet waitress Cindy is so gorgeous, but how could Tommy help solve her difficult situation? And how could he evade Ambrogio's and Amanda's (the evil and mysterious Pleasure's crew) attacks? Just one thing is sure for now: In Pleasure Villa every room hides a secret, and they're HOT!

Although the game is packed to capacity with local memes and references, this is a completely independent story that will take you to a world where magic and technology coexist.

The main character of StopGate finds himself in a very strange world and, together with the player, gets to know its customs, laws and, of course, inhabitants. All characters in the game are drawn in slightly different styles, because all authors on StopGame are different and individual in themselves.

"You've followed her your whole life...are you willing to let her go?"

Put on your hiking boots as Dina, an aspiring mechanic working at the Hurangi Spaceport, called to reunite with her childhood friend at an old hangout spot. After three long years apart, her friend Julie has finally graduated from flight school, ready to see the whole universe in its splendid glory. The only problem: Dina prefers to be on solid ground.
