Waifu Outbreak
description:
Welcome to a waifu outbreak game. Build relationships with different waifus and get a chance to know them as you play through the everyday routine. 

[From [url=https://outbreakinn.itch.io/waifuoutbreak]itch.io[/url]]
A mystery visual novel with some spicy romance on the side.
title: Meet Me at Dawn
Therapist: Mind Manager
description:
The game tells the story of a newbie therapist who needs to prove himself to his boss in order to move forward in his career. But while he's doing his best to take care of his patients' mental health, his real challenge is taking care of himself.

Things get more complicated when he starts working with a new patient: an admitted sex offender who not only rebuffs the protagonist's therapeutic intervention, but is determined to convince him of the legitimacy of rape.

title: Catch of the day
description: Catch of the day follows Eric, a young guy working on a comercial fishing boat with his boss Louis. The two of them are having a fairly normal day, when something catches on their net - which turns out to be a merman.

A group of youths arrive on a remote island.
Before their vacation ends, they head towards the island's observatory to watch the stars.
While admiring the starry night sky, they talk amongst themselves, until they fall asleep.
Eventually, the area returns to silence...

... And that is where five corpses hanged by their necks are found.

This is beginning and end of Dasoku's story of "Shisha", by "Shisha", for "Shisha".
title: Dasoku

description:
Rieve spends most of her days alone in the wizard, Oculum’s, ice castle. She was accidently cursed as a child, so her internal organs melt if her body temperature rises too high. Oculum created the castle for her to live comfortably, but her curse still prevents her from living a normal life. She has long since lost contact with family and friends, only seeing Oculum and her childhood friend, Carein, on occasion. She fills her days with housekeeping, cooking, and cleaning for Oculum, and of course, reading books in his study dreaming of a different life. 

One day she stumbles upon a magic mirror sent to Oculum for study, and after touching it, she is transported far from home. Or is it? The three identical men tell her she’s only a few miles from home in the capital’s keep. But they also each claim to be the crown prince? Rieve doesn’t know how or if any of them are telling the truth, but she can’t turn her back on this taste of adventure when one of the Princes asks her to help them. Can Rieve figure out which one of the Princes belongs to the world she’s stumbled into? Or which one should? Will this experience change Rieve’s life forever or help her embrace the magical life she’s already had?

[From [url=https://diedbeforesquire.itch.io/one-to-three-sovereignty]itch.io[/url]]
title: One to Three: Sovereignty
Halloween Party
description:
It's Halloween night, and Karen decides to crash a party! But she discovers that the Halloween party she crashed is a costume party.. for monsters!? Should she run for her life, or find someone to enjoy the party with?

[From [url=https://marinya.itch.io/halloween-party]itch.io[/url]]

After two years you finally wake up from a coma which was caused by a car accident. You are suffering from amnesia and you have not the slightest idea in what kind of situation you are in.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/SLim_Games]Patreon[/url]]
title: The Awakening
Your New Life
description: The protagonist, a young man who hasn't moved out yet, is told by his stepmom Lauren that he will need to find a girlfriend he can move in with by the end of the month, or she will "discipline" him. In the meantime, Lauren hires the college student Mari as a babysitter, giving her free reign to treat the protagonist as she sees fit. The protagonist can try to get together with three dominant women who like to humiliate him: Mari; his personal trainer Alexis; and Shawna, the CEO of his workplace.

From the deepest miasma to the shimmering veil, everything is in its place. The Peakborn rule, the Sunken toil, and the Unmoored trade. But Clear Skies Technology could rewrite the atmosphere, and with it the culture of planet Zé.

It all depends on how you use it.

The Sky Left Us is a sci-fi visual novel about climate change, classism, and how relationships shape our politics. Play as Spire Risan, an off-worlder scientist who becomes entangled in the drama of a mountain they came here to save. Fall in with the denizens of the three castes, and find that things are more complicated than they seem: be it love, family, or the systems that shape us.

[From [url=https://ratworm.itch.io/the-sky-left-us]itch.io[/url]]
title: The Sky Left Us
Won't You Stay?
description:
On The Lunar Eclipse, you and your father attend a charity event for your local church, hosted by The Head Sister.

After an unusual and unexpected encounter with a Schoolgirl, you pass out and wake up in an unfamiliar room...

The first person you come face to face with is a little girl who informs you that you have been abducted by her older sister and that you have to escape as soon as possible otherwise you will be trapped there forever!

[From [url=https://little-missy-otome.itch.io/wont-you-stay]itch.io[/url]]

title: Franken Tutor
description:
Law, often the target of bullies, was rescued by the tall, charming Ein and immediately fell in love. Ein, built like Frankenstein's Monster, lived his life with sneers and jeers at his scars and stitches and wonders for the first time whether he deserves love.

Reunited in Adventuring School, Law watches with concern as Ein gets into fight after fight. When Ein’s grades fall and he's threatened to be kicked out of school, Law offers to be his tutor and to his surprise, Ein accepts.

Play as Law as you try to reconnect with your childhood crush, and learn more about yourself along the way.

[From [url=https://foleso.itch.io/franken-tutor]itch.io[/url]]

title: Spare Parts
description:
Lucy's fresh out of her parents' home and looking for a foothold to start the rest of her life, but with no experience and only one friend, she's having trouble finding a job. That is, until she stumbles into a shop run by a mysterious woman who, for some reason, hires her on the spot. Unable to keep her nose out of others' business, Lucy finds herself caught in a much more complicated position than she bargained for.

[From [url=https://sopy.itch.io/spare-parts-episode-1]itch.io[/url]]

title: UNISTAR
description:
You play as Haruno Hajime, a video game-loving introvert who wants to spend his last few months as a high school senior in peace. Peace never came that easy to him when he was forced to act as senior class president. And unfortunately, to top it all off, chaos is knocking at graduation's front door when he and the council members discover that they are... magical boys!?

[From [url=https://aohisashi.itch.io/unistar]itch.io[/url]]

title: Second Chances
description:
After a bad breakup that ended up in Andrew not wanting a relationship anymore, he devoted his life to his job. After years of dealing with the pain, he's learning how to move on with his life... that is, until 'that' happens. Will Andrew be able to move on and be happy once again? 

Take control of Andrew Williams, a lonely Alpha whose only joy in life is working in a daycare alongside his coworker, as he learns how to love again while navigating the hardship of relationships once again. Will he fall in love with his beta coworker? or, perhaps... the newly met Alpha CEO?

[From [url=https://namaeli.itch.io/second-chances-demo]itch.io[/url]]

"Yeah, an urban myth. Supposedly, there is a 'god' that will grant your wishes...
It's a rumor that's been floating around as of late."

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/eng/work/=/product_id/RE206612.html]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Mikansei no "Negaigoto"

description:
Life Happened is a story-oriented adult fiction visual novel with an emphasis on emotions, and choices.

In the game you play the role of Marco Scozzari, a 40 years old man.

He is a well succeeded and wealthy business man who accomplished everything one could wish for, professionally and financially speaking.

Marco has it all except the most important: someone to share it with but he seems incapable of realizing that.

Relax guys, this is not some tale about a lonely weirdo or something like that.

It's a tale about a descendent of a traditional Italian family that made his fortune from scratch, a good looking and well succeeded man, his past and the things he did to get where he is at now.

As you follow his story you will discover events and people from his past and will must certainly find out that things are never really what they look like at the first glance.
title: Life Happened

description:
Haku is just a normal introvert student who lives in an ordinary world. While he's perfectly content to focus on school rather than making friends, he soon find out that sometimes making friends just kind of happens. 

However, each new friend has a unique magical ability and the secrets to unlocking the truth about the newfound magic making it's way into his otherwise ordinary world. 

Play through each character's story to find out their secrets and make sense of the new, magical world. 

[From [url=https://noranekogames.itch.io/mise-en-scene]itch.io[/url]]
title: Mise en Scene

description:
"Although Yuri prefers to keep to herself, she lives a pretty normal life. Because she's not afraid to be judged by others, she doesn't mind doing things like going to cafes alone; she prefers it.

The one person she makes an effort to talk to is her classmate and crush. However, Yuri finds herself becoming a little too close to her love interest's crush after meeting up with them for the first time."

[From [url=https://noranekogames.itch.io/encore]itch.io[/url]]
title: Encore
Encore -Summer-
description:
The plot revolves around Yuri, a high school student who has a crush on a classmate, Hideki. They spend time with each other, but it's difficult to call the two little more than acquaintances. Yuri hopes to change this during the summer festival being held in their town. He, however, introduces her to another girl, Mitsu, who Yuri sees as a threat to the relationship she wants to cultivate.  While she wants nothing more than to forget the situation, Yuri finds herself being forced to watch her crush fall for Mitsu as he forgets about her.

[From [url=https://noranekogames.itch.io]itch.io[/url]]
Protagonist goes to visit an old college friend, decides to stay at his house because of the rain, and something unexpected happens.
title: Two People One Animal Love

description:
We return to Harvey and Jordan's story, when Candace was only nine years old.
A simple story of forgiveness and loss.

Make It Last: While You Can is a visual novel that  is set during the mid-2000's and is a stand alone story that takes place in the same series as Destiny Fails Us: A New Life and Make It Last, approximately 10 years before the events of those games.  

[From [url=https://sbds.itch.io/make-it-last-while-you-can]itch.io[/url]]
title: Make It Last: While You Can

aliases: Young Yakuza Boss Ririka's Brothel Management
title: Shoujo Kumichou Ririka no Shoukan Keiei-ki
description:
Protagonist Ririka was just a regular schoolgirl.
Until a few weeks ago, that is.

Her father, an underworld crime boss, died, and left the family business to her.

With no time to mourn, she was thrust into a world of bloodthirsty yakuza,
huge loan payments, and more...

The path she chose to deal with this: ruthlessly managing a brothel and adult film business.
Working in a world of crime, she coldly takes advantage of unfortunate women,
and uses them to raise the capital she needs!

What will await Ririka at the end of all this, prosperity, or ruin...?

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE295803.html]DLsite English[/url]]

A short and cute date with your grouchy boyfriend.

Kotachi's found the perfect (first? fifth? thirtieth?) date idea with Ophi- a trip to the planetarium at the local museum. Just a day for the two of them. No fighting shadow monsters, no saving constellations, no life or death situations. Just a date. Nothing can go wrong.

Asterism: Time & Space is a short side story set after the true ending for Asterism.

[From [url=https://crystalgameworks.itch.io/asterism-time-space]itch.io[/url]]
title: Asterism: Time & Space

aliases: Love Prison Tower Mary Skelter: True End
title: Rengokutou Mary Skelter: True End
description:
Romance visual novel included with Mary Skelter Finale in Japan. 

A magical extra edition that will bewitch you with its "lovey-dovey swimsuit dates with the girls."

The scorching heat of the summer rained down upon the young Jack.

Although somewhat exhausted from the heat he has never before experienced, Jack’s footsteps were light and somewhat cheerful.

"Today, I’m going to go to the beach with ‘the girl’ who’s now my girlfriend!"

The shining and radiant ocean. A story as bright as the sea is about to begin.

This is the story of Jack, who enjoys slapstick swimsuit dates where things don’t go exactly as expected, and a lot quite out of harmony themselves.

And after is the strange sequel story, that does not hold back with its tendencies, triggered by a certain event.

[From [url=https://www.gematsu.com/2020/09/mary-skelter-finale-pre-order-bonus-romance-visual-novel-princess-kaguya-gameplay]Gematsu[/url]]
That feel when no girlfriend!
title: TFWnoGF

description:
On the third planet of the Sol system in the Milky Way galaxy, there lives a remarkable species.  Known as humans, this race has the incredible ability to change reality through the power of belief.  When enough humans believe something is true, it becomes true.  The stronger their belief, the stronger the effect.  No other species in existence can interact with metaphysical energies the way humans can.

For millennia, alien races have traveled to Earth in order to exploit this power.  In days long past, a few thousand credits could get you anything you dreamed of: eternal youth, control over nature, clairvoyance - even the power to transform others into animals.  When enough humans believed it, it became true, and convincing them wasn't much of a challenge.

That all ended once the Federation figured out what was happening.  Travel to and from the Sol system was heavily regulated, and Earth became the most locked-down planet in the universe.  On top of that, humans are advancing, and convincing them of the impossible has gotten tougher than ever.  This hasn't stopped the flow of fortune-seekers, who even today will give up everything to get a ticket to Earth, and a chance to get something no other race in the universe can provide.

One of those fortune-seekers is Farien Aanarhi, an Earth-jumper from the planet Phaelon.  Three years ago, Farien sold off his most prized possession to pay for his ticket to Earth, thinking he could easily convince humans to believe he was insanely wealthy.  Things haven't worked out the way he'd hoped. He now finds himself flat broke, deep in debt, and on the verge of being deported back to his home planet.  He only has seven days left on Earth, and one last chance to turn things around before he loses everything.
title: Change the World
Thirsty For My Guest: Season 2
description:
When you met Vicki all those years ago, you had great fun together. She already had a young daughter, Jenna, who was a joy to be around. The relationship was doomed from the start and eventually things fell apart. You remained friends, despite everything that happened.. Now, years later, you've agreed to let Jenna stay with you for 2 weeks. What could possibly go wrong?

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/user?u=15977272]Patreon[/url]]

title: 3 Tsu no Negai
description:
Main character approaches a vending machine to buy milk and presses three buttons in a row. Suddenly a demon appears before him and promises to fulfil three wishes. Story proceeds in omnibus format for different wishes.

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2017/07/vn-of-month-november-1995.html]vndbreview[/url]]

101-kaime no Approach Shot is a golf game with erotic scenes. The player can choose to play in the training mode, alternating between five courses of various difficulty, and setting the strike limit. The versus mode allows the player to choose one of the many available female opponents of different appearances and professions (e.g. a schoolgirl, a teacher, a nurse, etc.). The game is played from first-person perspective; the player must stop a moving bar at the right time to regulate the strength of the shot and its angle. Having a lower score after four holes makes the opponent undress and assume an erotic pose.
title: 101 Kaime no Approach Shot

aliases: Anna Exciting Affection: Unofficial Ren'py Remake
description:
You will be playing the role of Anna and making decisions in her life as she will discover herself through the journey.

An unofficial fan-made Ren'Py port of the original RPG Maker game "Anna Exciting Affection". The original game is not a visual novel.
title: Anna Exciting Affection: Unofficial Ren'py Port: Chapter 1
Starwatchers: The Search for Cosmic Jam
description:
Startwatchers: The Search for Cosmic Jam is a visual novel about Jovia and Caelia, two alien best friends, and their roadtrip across the the galaxy all in search of the tastiest jam imaginable.

[From [url=https://3hg.itch.io/starwatchers-cosmic-jam]itch.io[/url]]

title: Lifelines
description:
"To someone with depression, every voice and relationship they know is a lifeline. A step further or closer to the edge." - Isaiah Shepherd

Story: A walk through the life of Hanson, a freshman and commission artist struggling to find social bonds throughout his new high school life. Follow him and the lives of seven others through a story of love and loss.

title: Sakura Knight 3
description:
After spending a couple of months in the city of Grimoire, Estelle has begun to make a name for herself as an accomplished swordswoman. She, alongside the ditzy elf Felicia, the devious catgirl Tart, and the sweet wolfgirl Rune, has taken on dozens of quests at the local guild, and has completed them all.

She's come a long way from her humble beginnings in a small village bakery... but soon, Estelle will have to brave her toughest challenge to date.

Deep in the woods, in a withered glade where the grass is dead and nothing grows, a disturbance is lurking. The fierce half-dragon, Saga, once an underling to the feared demon queen who ruled over Lemuria, is beginning to gather forces to avenge her fallen leader.

Will Estelle and her party be able to stop Saga - and will Estelle finally be able to settle down with a cute girlfriend or three?

Find out in Sakura Knight 3!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1351370/]Steam[/url]]

title: Pretty Mahjong Soldier Mu
description: Space aliens come to earth and turn an ordinary Sailor Moon look-alike into a magical mahjongg girl. You then play several opponents in mahjongg, who look like they've been ripped from other animes. Relatively easy as far as mahjongg games go.

title: Zakaz 43.20
description:
Time is a priceless and irreversible thing. But you understand that only when you are at the death’s door.

But he still has some time.

During the first few decades of the space era, humanity was able to exist in a relative peace. But soon rogue organizations collectively known as space pirates began to terrorize space stations. This led to a series of violent conflicts. Both sides developed various types of giant mechs operated by human pilots, called "Metal Movers". A special police force was founded to combat the pirates. The young pilot Gingie and his lovely companion Windy must defend the space station and eventually venture into enemy territory.
title: Metal Mover Jastrike
Elemental Ou
description:
The Guild Master and the Protectors of the Elements had the best intentions. All they wanted was to use the Grand Card in order to summon the Grand Master who would protect the world, just like the legends said. Surely they could not predict would would happen. That the Grand Master would be a sexy, but decidedly unfriendly girl. That she would quickly realize that she wields the power over all Elves. That she would kill all the Protectors. And that she would swear to destroy humanity...

Only one person can stop the Grand Master. A simple young human boy named Nemo, but with mysterious ties to the race of Elves. When his father is killed by the Grand Master's minions, he knows that it's not just about saving humanity - it gets personal!...

[From [url=https://www.mobygames.com/game/pc98/elemental-]MobyGames[/url]]

title: Dengeki Division
description:
The powerful god known as Black B was securely sealed, preventing his powers from corrupting humans. The people of the Kingdom enjoyed a prosperous, peaceful life. But that ended when the nearby country, ruled by a ruthless Empress, heard of the sealed god. The Empire attacked the Kingdom, which had no other choice but release Black B and use his powers to defend themselves. Black B readily agreed to help, on one condition: all the generals in his army must be female...

[From [url=https://www.mobygames.com/game/pc98/dengeki-division]MobyGames[/url]]

A simple point-and-click game to undress 24 different girls while talking to them.

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2017/06/vn-of-month-october-1992.html]vndbreview[/url]]
title: Ikuiku Pakkun

description:
A sports milking competition for high school boys!?

Set in modern Japan, in a world where the God of creation came up with the idea: "Let's make milk come out of boys'', "competitive milking'' was the most popular sport. Above all, winning the Milk Crown Cup is considered the greatest honour for boys.
The main character, Nakano Hagumu, together with his friend Nagaoka Maki, is recommended to enter a top school for milking. However, during the entrance exam, he is reunited with his childhood friend, Shigehara Taiki, who transferred from a rival school...?

The competitive milking BL in which three childhood friends put their love and youth on the line is about to begin!

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/bl/work/=/product_id/RJ295259.html/?unique_op=af]DLsite[/url]]
title: Shounen yo Ochichi o Shibore - Boys CHIKU-be Ambitious
Saimin Arbeit ~Ten'in Gyaru ni Tenchou Meirei wa Zettai Dakara~
description:
(I give her a job and this is the thanks I get!)

She's covering the late shift part-time, and her name is Airi Kurusu.

She's rude, disrespectful, and lazy to boot.
She treats the customers like trash.
She's completely useless as an employee!

The shop is chronically understaffed—we need anyone we can get who has two hands and two working brain cells.
But at this point I'm not sure she meets our standards.

Firing isn't good enough for her.
Somebody has got to teach this girl a lesson, and as always, the Internet has a solution.
"SUPER EASY! Change hearts and minds NOW with HYPNOTIC SUGGESTION!!!"

It might not be the world's most legit-looking link, but I'm just going to fire her anyway.

It can't hurt to give it a shot.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2375180/]Steam[/url]]

title: Onna ni Saserareta Ore ga Osananajimi no Kanojo ni Naru Nante... ~♂×TS wa, Ore!?~
Nana to Debi no Kenkou Chindan
Mixology
description: This is not just any drinking game! Welcome to the Mixology Hostess Club, dear customer! You seem to have accidentally stumbled upon this club but, oh well! Time for drinks and most importantly... the hostesses! Chat them up, buy them drinks and learn their stories. Successfully woo them and you could become more than just a customer!

Sunny Shine Funland is an adult visual novel filled with comical romance and slice of life. It follows Dustin, a young man who's moved to the city after graduating college and is desperate to find a job to cover the rent! Luckily, he's hired to work at a brand new amusement park! Once arriving, he soon encounters a wacky boss and three lovely coworkers who sweep him off his feet!

Will he be able to find true love this summer while maintaining his crazy new job? Or will the unfamiliar tasks prove to be too much for him to handle? You decide – Special memories await! Have some fun under the sun!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/924520/]Steam[/url]]
title: Sunny Shine Funland!

description:
The discovery of a rare gemstone draws people to an exhibit held in Ashiya Tower. Just as the event begins, the tower is flooded with smoke and the emergency shutters activate, trapping 8 people in the tower for the next 12 hours.

With no clear facts about the events occurring inside the building, the public and police can only speculate. Why can't the shutters be opened? Is anyone behind this, and if so, who? Are the people inside even still alive?

These questions can't be answered until the time is up. Even then, describing the events that transpired might prove to be a challenge. Prepare for twists and questions that will keep you theorizing, second-guessing, and searching for the ultimate truth.
title: The Sekimeiya: Spun Glass

description: While visiting her sister in Los Angeles for thanksgiving, Hannah finds that she doesn’t quite have enough money to do all the sightseeing she’d like to do. Fortunately, her sister’s best friend offers Hannah work at her café for the three days before Thanksgiving. Those three days become crucial as Hannah discovers who she truly is while working at the “Café Deux Femmes”.
title: Cafe Deux Femmes

description:
Belle is actually a boy, an accident lets him and a bright girl named Bambi begin to live together.

"If she find out I am not a real girl, I will lose my best friend."

A warm and healing friendship + love story.

[Edited from [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1301620/]Steam[/url]]
title: Nüzhuang Shaonian & Duanfa Mei
Nana Eiyuu Monogatari II
description:
The kingdoms of Clarence and Garla are at war with each other. The priestess Mirelia leads a group of children refugees through a forest, and is attacked by Garlan troops. Guy, a Garlan officer, doubts the methods of his superior, general Neston, and helps Mirelia and the kids escape. On their way they meet other heroes who are willing to protect the children and together resist the Garlan invasion.

[From [url=https://www.mobygames.com/game/nana-eiy-monogatari-ii]MobyGames[/url]]

title: Vacation
description:
The Destiny of 6-people in the island
Unique story with in 6 different storiesThese stories can be turn follwing your choices.
Collecte achievements and CG! Rewarding by percentage! Mini games!
What is the ending you will make by?

Your choices will lead to misery, and No one may be happy.
Seriously, Do you wanna play?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1376730/]Steam[/url]]

Simple Flash sex game featuring a muscular big sister type.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE084855.html]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Anekin 2.
Onee-san o Chikan
description:
During crowded train hours, a beautiful unaccompanied woman drops her glasses This is seen by a group of randy, burgeoning young miscreants.
They push up against her until no one can see her, and she is overwhelmed by groping, invasive appendages.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE061166.html]DLsite English[/url]]

title: Bistro Days
description:
You are an aspiring food blogger in the city of Wisteria. One day, a giant raccoon guides you to Bellflower Bistro, where you meet three charming characters that will prove to be your life's turning point.

What fate awaits you at the bistro? Will you answer to your true calling and become a food blogger that will make your mom proud? Are you able to help your romantic partner achieve their dreams? What choices will you make? Who will you date? 

[From [url=https://kikaidigital.itch.io/bistro-days-demo]itch.io[/url]]

A high school boy reminisces about a friend that disappeared.

Entry for the VNDS Community Collaboration Project which was cancelled due to only getting one entry, which was submitted past the deadline.
title: Addendum
Isekai Haramase Harem Party~ Saijaku no Kaiseki Skill ga Ijou Hattatsu Shite Ecchi na Jakuten o Maruhadaka ni! Saikyou no Bakunyuu Boukensha-tachi o Nikubenki-ka!~
description:
Our hero had nothing going for him until the day he was lucky enough to be reincarnated in a fantasy world like he'd always dreamed.

Unfortunately, he didn't get any of the special powers that usually entails, so he was still just an ordinary guy.

Eventually he was subjected to a magical drug trial by the ill-tempered mage Luka -- and it worked! His power awakened! The power to see a girl's most sensitive spots and fetishes. A rousing success!

With his new ability, all the beautiful adventurers in the world can be his!

[Edited from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE292818.html]DLsite English[/url]]
aliases: Isekai Impregnation Party! ~From High Level Adventurers to Harem Whores~

title: Miłość na Papierze
description:
Daniel is a writer. But lately, he's having issues. His editor said he should start going on dates to get some inspiration for the next story. However... how will it end? It's up to you!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1109800/]Steam[/url]]

title: Time Tenshi
description:
Team up with Rose, Kyo and Michelle - the beautiful Time Tenshi (Time Angels) - in this exciting visual novel as you enter the amazing world of time travel, made possible by the work of Tensai Shiro, the genius inventor behind the Time Window: mankind's first functioning time machine!

Playing as Kenji - a young man who loses everything to a terrible house fire - you'll discover just how far the limits of time can be pushed as you join the Time Tenshi in their missions into history!

But a mysterious, malicious force soon emerges, seeking to alter the flow of time for their own purposes! What secrets does time hold, and what consequences await those who tamper with it?

Choose wisely in decisions throughout the story to gain positive Affinity Points for the three girls, influence the story's outcome and maybe even unlock some secret endings!

We at Silver Cow Studio have worked hard to bring you a high quality production, and we're confident you'll really enjoy Time Tenshi!

Can mankind truly be trusted with the power to travel through time?

What dangers will Rose, Kyo and Michelle face on their adventures?

And can Kenji ever reclaim the reality he tragically lost?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/862280/]Steam[/url]]

They asked for help with solving the case of recent disappearances in the neighborhood of this city. While Kuon and her new comrades gathered information and exorcised malicious spirits, Kimihiro went to meet his acquaintance, whom he thought to hold important information.

At that time, enemies made their move. Due to their attacks, Setsuna and Yuuka were captured by the enemies, and Kimihiro was incapacitated. Kuon, who found out about the cult, leading the demons from the shadows, strongly decided to fight to save her father and Setsuna with her sister.

Sure enough, you may already know, what awaits her at the end of her struggles...

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/pro/work/=/product_id/VJ014013.html/?unique_op=af&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=vndb.org%2F]DLSite[/url]]
title: Nightmare x Onmyoji ~Kindan no Paradox~

description:
The court jester, Madion, wakes up and finds the king's body. He doesn't recall how he got there, and has difficulty remembering the recent events. A curse has struck down every true citizen of the kingdom. Yet, there are still survivors.

There are different versions of the past. Your choices will determine what really happened. Playing as Madion, you can build a relationship with one of three characters (2 female and 1 male), or no one, if you prefer. Discover what happened, gather the survivors, and escape the cursed kingdom.
title: Jester / King
A Frigid Space
description:
You awaken in a town and meet a mysterious young man. He tells you the town has been abandoned.

Who is he and why is he here? How will you get home?

Will you trust him or avoid him?

There are six rules that were established so that humans and youkai can co-exist:

You must never harm a human.
You must never show your true form to a human.
You must obey the laws that humans have made.
You must never enchant a human.
You must never have children with a human.
You must never bring a human into youkai territory.

The Minatsuki family has existed peacefully in the human world and has prospered by obeying these rules. This is a story about Airu, the only daughter of the head of the Minatsuki family, the Minatsuki family butler, Raito, and his co-worker maid, Fuuka.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amanojaku]Amanojaku[/url] Airu can't honestly express her feelings and bosses people around. Fuuka has a stiff exterior but can't help teasing whenever she sees an opportunity. This is how they spent their peaceful, everyday life.

One day an incident occurs in the town where they live. Minatsuki Onizou, the head of the household, asks Raito and Fuuka to protect Airu. The two of them must now stay by her side day and night. They accompany her, not just inside of the mansion, but at school as well.

[Translated from [url=http://azarashi-soft-plusone.nexton-net.jp/youjou/]Homepage[/url]]
title: Uchi no Aruji wa Youkai no Joushiki o Shiranai
aliases: My master doesn't know the monster rules
Uchi no Aruji wa Youkai no Rule o Shiranai

title: Powers That Be
description:
When a young girl has the ultimate power over your emotions… do you want to resist?

A successful middle-aged man takes a break from work to take care of his shy goddaughter who for unknown reasons is developing empathic powers that can influence emotions. As they spend more time together and explore a dark event from their past, the story explodes into a mix of drama, old secrets and sensual revelations that involves a desperate married boss, a curvy ex-wife, a sporty stepdaughter and a mysterious exchange student.

This is a story-driven, slow-build game with emphasis on quality content.
John, the protagonist of Vampire Lips, is missing! Play as Daryl to investigate John's disappearance. You might discover more secrets than you expected.​
title: Private Investigator
Jain no Ikenie 3 ~Shin Shou: Nerawareta Gakuen~
Claudia's Spy
description: John, the protagonist of Vampire Lips, was sent by Claudia to discover her rival's secrets. Will he manage to do it while keeping his cover?​

Catarina Claes, the young daughter of a noble family, one day bumps her head and regains memories of her past life as an otaku. It is then that she realizes she has been reborn into the world of the otome game Fortune Lover, reincarnated as the game's villainess who, regardless of what route the player took in the original game, is doomed to be either killed or exiled. In order to avoid these routes that lead to doom, Catarina begins taking countermeasures to try and avoid things going the same way as the game. This, however, ends up having unexpected consequences on her relations with the other characters of the game's world.

[from [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/My_Next_Life_as_a_Villainess:_All_Routes_Lead_to_Doom!]Wikipedia[/url]]

This game puts the player in the shoes of Catarina and introduces new plot and characters as romantic interests.
title: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag Shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei Shite Shimatta... ~Haran o Yobu Kaizoku~
Telechronic Static
description:
Meet Vatiel

This young man has gone through many events in his life.

It is your job to decide these events and save him from harming himself.

This may take a few tries, so good luck. You may get the same ending multiple times.

Telechronic Static is an experimental visual novel that was created in the span of six months in 2017, to test out imagemaps, yet was never meant to be released (until now) due to the heavy amount of bad endings/triggering content within the game.

The goal of the game?

Keep Vatiel alive.

Do not play this game if you are sensitive to heavy topics such as death and depression. You have been warned!

You jolt awake as the bus hits a particularly nasty bump. You feel like you’d only just managed to start drifting off, and now here you are, awake again and still exhausted.

For a moment, you’re hazy on the details of where exactly 'here' is, confusing this bus with the many others that came before it. But as your mind continues to reassert its existence in the waking world, the past few days come back into focus. The long-lost cousin, the bad news, the twenty-six hours of bus rides with countless late-night stops in seedy depots that felt unsafe even in the middle of the day. You wouldn’t normally find yourself traveling like this, but your cousin bought the tickets. The funeral of her mother, your aunt, seemed like something you shouldn't ignore, even considering your own late mother’s rocky relationship with this side of the family.

Fortunately, the end of your long journey is in sight. You're almost in Scarlet Hollow.
title: Scarlet Hollow

description:
Cheerful slacker Olive thought that taking an outdoor ed. class during her final year of high school would be an easy credit, but the year-end camping trip turns out to be a lot more than she bargained for. 

When an argument with another classmate spurs the hot-tempered Sage to run off alone into the woods, Olive follows her, hoping to lift her spirits and make sure she’s safe. But the bubbly and energetic Heather has the same idea, and tensions between her and Sage threaten to turn the trip into even more of a disaster than it is already. 

Olive just wants her classmates to get along, but they seem to disagree on everything—and to make things even worse, they’ve lost track of how to get back to their campsite! Follow three stressed-out teens on a journey full of bickering, mosquitoes, and self-discovery.

[From [url=https://janetitor.itch.io/take-a-hike]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Take A Hike!

description:
Casual Desires is an adult visual novel, focused primarily on our half-Japanese, half-German protagonist, and her growing perversions and exhibitionist tendencies.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/ionDivvy]Patreon[/url]]
title: Casual Desires

description: You move into a new country for work. At your new home you live with several girls with ‘interesting’ tastes. Things start to get a little weird. Then your entire world gets flipped upside down when you get caught for embezzling at work. Now you are getting blackmailed into doing their bidding.​
title: Femdom Fiends
Erisa's Summer
description:
Erisa Langley is a graduating college senior who's looking to recoup her hours spent studying with a wild and wet summer of love before heading off into the wilds of real life. Better yet, in the process of moving out, she hears about the prospect of a cruise the college's highest achievers are being reward with.

Could it possibly be real? Will she qualify?
Either way, she's determined to make this a summer to remember!

[From [url=https://im6.itch.io/erisas-summer]Itch.io[/url]]

title: A.O.A Academy
description:
June 2020, the month after your father died.

He was the only motivation for you to stay in the old town. Now.. You didn't know where else to go or what else to do. Due to his bad heart, you decided to take care of him full time, causing you to drop out of high-school to focus on the farm. There's absolutely nothing else left for you here...

Until one day, you found a letter from the A.O.A academy, claiming that you have been accepted into their academy. This surprised you, since you've never attempted to enroll in any academy. Not only that, this letter also contained the number of your old friend, Ashley.

Determined to face your new future, you headed to the A.O.A Academy.

Follow the story of a young man returning home after years abroad, suddenly faced with the prospect of shouldering life-changing responsibility and stirring the embers of a repressed childhood love.

This sprawling tale will take you from the Boston suburbs to Russia, Sicily, Tunisia, and the fictional island nation of Tonalu, where you will cooperate (or compete) with your estranged sister to fulfill your parents' final wishes.

Against the backdrop of a looming lawsuit, a landmark medical breakthrough, and the sudden appearance of a beautiful and quirky investigative reporter with a keen interest in your family, you will make the choices and cultivate the relationships that will determine what kind of man you become...And what kind of woman you want by your side.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1783110/]Steam[/url]]
title: Chasing Sunsets

aliases: Descendant of Lighting: Chapter of the Azure
description: Set in ancient China about 600 years before the Three Kingdoms era, in "Kashiwaetsu" located in the south of the Chinese continent in the era called "Spring-Autumn Warring States Period". A young man decides to take opportunity to gain power by assassinating the previous king and putting his friend in his place, only to find he and the new king following a dark path of chaos and cruelty...
title: Raishi: Konpeki no Shou
Doki Doki 4chan Club!
description: This is a mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! in which, rather than joining a literature club, the protagonist instead joins a club for 4chan.

title: Cooking Companions: Appetizer Edition
description:
Play hide and seek with Cabbage and the Chompettes in this self contained story! Who knows what mysteries you'll discover?

Featuring Eastern European folklore in an unexpected package, the Cooking Companions: Appetizer Edition will give you a taste of what's to come.

More than a demo:
-Six available endings
-Different dialogue with each playthrough!
-Short and sweet: 40 minutes to play through it once, longer to unravel the mystery!
-No swearing
-No blood or gore
-Easter eggs and secrets...but be careful!

For the true Cooking Companions experience, this game should be played in a pitch black room with headphones

WARNING: This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.

This game is not suitable for children
or those who are easily disturbed.

title: What's Mine Is Yours: Season 1
description:
A married teacher's life is turned upside down when his wife reveals that she wants him to have sex with his students. However, the students may be just as crazy as his wife.

[From F95Zone]

title: What's Mine Is Yours: Season 2
description:
A short time after "What's Mine is Yours", a man and his cuckquean wife continue their (mis)adventures in sex with their students. Growing more comfortable in their roles, their sexual encounters become less awkward. But just as the main character was starting to get used to the status quo, several more girls decide they want to join in on the action. Plus his wife makes an even crazier request: finding a "secret girlfriend?

[From F95Zone]

In a place and time far removed, in a Fragment that should not exist, a minor player takes his first steps onto the stage.

A Forgery for Umineko no Naku Koro Ni (When They Cry). Not an official work. No association with 07th Expansion is claimed or implied.

[Edited from [url=https://renall.itch.io/umineko-sunny]itch.io[/url]]
title: Umineko Redacted: Some Kind of Sunny Little Dream
A○d Senki CG-shuu Juuyoku no Ori 2
aliases: Cage of Desires 2 - Ar*d Senki CG
Arad Senki CG-shuu Juuyoku no Ori 2

title: Inshitsu Joushi no Bakunyuu Bijo Tensei! ~Buka no Kuse ni Ore o Hameruna yo!~
Anna: Hard Exam 2
description: The story continues where it left at Hard Exam first part.

title: Absoljutnoe Zel'e Alhimii
description:
The most brilliant and mightiest scientist in the world found a way to make an Elixir of Immortality, and produced it. She immediately reported to the Ministry of Mages of her success. Now those snobbish sorcerers will be sure to fall at her feet and permit her to return to civilization.

Everything would’ve been wonderful, if not for a couple of insignificant - as the young woman says - nuances. The potion hasn’t been concocted yet, and her latest attempt to make it failed due to unknown reasons. An unexpected side effect occurred in addition to it all - Celsia’s power got sealed off thanks to a curse, and her body shrank to half size.

title: Doll City
description:
After taking a helicopter to a new city, you wake with no recollection of the past 24 hours.
You need to find clues and piece together your lost time.

Is your mother a bat-shit-crazy leader of a criminal enterprise? Are there more players than just her? How are you involved in all this?

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/SlootySlots]Patreon[/url]]

title: Bewitched Hearts
description:
A trio of young hearts take a break from the stresses of visual novel development with a Halloween party. However, things quickly get heated after some horror stories and... somehow you accidentally hex your childhood friend, Lilia!

Embark on a journey with brash and impatient Irma, to save Lilia before time runs out...

Will you be able to realize your true feelings and find love along the way?

[From [url=https://keppatea.itch.io/bewitched-hearts]itch.io[/url]]

title: Eye of the Storm
description: A group of college girls who flee to a mountain resort to avoid a terrible storm. The caretaker (you) must do everything he can to keep them safe from the storm, each other, and someone that may or may not be lurking outside in the woods

title: Pactio 31 ~Class Zen'in Boku no Geboku~
description:
One day, a mysterious magician encircled the academy with a magical barrier.
In response to this emergency, the dean orders you to make pacts with all of your students.
Under the graceful leaves of the great world tree, you ought to have sex with
them in the guise of contracts with your students.

Can you make pacts with all of them and discover the one who threatens the academy!?

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE055482.html]DLsite English[/url]]

title: Diabolus in Musica
description:
"There is a glamour in belonging, or at least appearing to belong. I suppose that is what drew me towards the friends I made that summer, and towards the most eventful night of my life."

In an attempt to make the most of their last summer together, a group of clever, eccentric misfits break into their music school to perform one last concert.  Following along with them as their sole audience member, you'll foster friendships, reveal a generational curse or even meet the devil himself. 

[From [url=https://amesyflo.itch.io/diabolus-in-musica]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Dirt Party
description: A group of teenagers go camping in a forest that is located on a mountain. But this mountain has its own secrets. Crimson tells her friends about a legend of a Golem who lives on the mountain and captures everyone who comes there, and the victims never return.

title: Heroine for Hire
description:
Lyre Harmoniel deals with a chronic, yet relatable issue: the inability to keep a job. Having lost eight of them in the past two months, she's starting to border on desperate.

All she wants is a job where she can have fulfilling life and make a difference. And then she sees it... an ad that changes her life forever.

Will Lyre finally get the job of her dreams or will she crash and burn again?

[From [url=https://chouette.itch.io/heroine-for-hire]itch.io[/url]]

In Doll House you're renting a giant house with busty roommates. Date and progress through their story lines to unlock them. Piece together the puzzle of your mother's disappearance and bring those responsible to justice.
title: Doll House

description:
An erotic comedy visual novel, centered around a day in the life of a busty cow-girl who has a severe crush on her younger male caretaker. 

Sally, a cow-human hybrid girl, is one of many creatures owned by Farmer Edmund. She is a milk maid, but has “special status” among the other creatures of the farm, as she is quite beautiful. Ed treats her as his personal companion pet.

Ed’s young nephew Jimmy works on the farm, as it’s mostly a family affair. He has come of age and is beginning to take notice of the voluptuous Sally. His uncle has tasked him with tending to her, but this may be prove to be problematic.

[From [url=https://steampowered.com/app/1173410]Steam[/url]]
title: My Breast Friend Sally
Were|House
description:
What if the monsters in the haunted house weren’t just wearing a costume...?

By accident, Dori stumbles across the monstrous secret behind popular haunted house, the Were|House - and then they get roped into working alongside the crew on Halloween night! 
A job's a job, right? But will Dori make it through three days of hard work preparing for the big night - and will they grow closer to any of the monsters...?

[From [url=https://sad-ghost-studios.itch.io/werehouse]itch.io[/url]]

title: GiseiHero
description:
Among the 18 people who have a heart of justice, there is an evil that seeks murder. It is a mysterious and malicious death game of justice ADV.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1367580/]Steam[/url]]

Resolving to succeed, R18+ mangaka Muraoka Ume (name changeable) moved from her country hometown to Tokyo. Ume had confidence in her manga and put her all in its cover art but it was panned on social media as being "unfappable". Due to this, she wasn't able to get her manga serialized and now had to work part time at a café to make ends meet.

"I wonder if I really can live off of being an adult mangaka..."

Unable to confide in anybody, Ume participated in a doujin event. There somehow, was her childhood friend Hisaomi and a regular at the café she works at, Gingo. On top of that, Hisaomi was a huge fan of Ume's manga and Gingo was a super popular doujin creator!?

This is an R18+ otome game about geeking out, creating doujin and ending up in lewd situations.

[Taken from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/girls/work/=/product_id/RJ291834.html]DL Site[/url]]
title: Real mo Manga no You ni Ikitai!
Josou Onani Bare Kara Hajimaru Shuuchi Mesu Inu Seikatsu
aliases: Humiliating Life as a Dog After His Cross-dressing is Exposed

title: Kantsubo Netori ~Amaki Mitsutsubo de Boukensha wa Netorareru~
aliases: The Sweet Nectar of Cuckoldry ~Adventurer Cucked By a Succubus~

description:
An ice planet called Iclantia is dying. The civilization inhabiting the planet are highly advanced, but not able to stop the coming catastrophe that will wipe out their civilization. What we know from historians is that in an effort to save their dying planet, the Iclantians created what is known as Comets.

The Iclantians crafted these time capsules of rock and ice, mixed with technology, to form pods to launch into space. Once discovered, the pods open to reveal a treasure within. They contain the heritage of their civilization: From technology, to history, toys, art, and even weapons.

Players find their place in a cluster of suns known as the Rimshot Galaxy. You start in the Remnos system which is home to a variety of alien species. The Remnos system has prospered from the discovery of the comets.
title: Crypterion

developers.name: Jixie Shen Hu Jiao Zhizuo Zu

title: Antang de Xinli Zixun Shi: Bei Zhong Zhi Xin
Damned Soles
description: Tina awakens inside a stone coffin within the Hell of Unconventional Tortures, with a particularly smelly pair of feet in her face and female voices telling her she loves them. What lies beyond? Does she even feel like leaving in the first place?

aliases: デッドエンドイージス
title: Mahou Shoujo Shoumou Sensen - DeadΩAegis
description:
――Magical girls are weapons――
――Magical girls do not create hopes or dreams――
――Magical girls drown in pleasure and bodily fluids――

In the not-too-distant future――

Mankind has been waging war with a mysterious race of aliens.

A group of young girls is sent to the front lines, where they take the aliens' power into their bodies, and gain powerful abilities. By being violated by the enemy, they absorb their power, and defeat them while writhing in pleasure.

And so the war continues.
As the minds and bodies of the young girls are consumed by the world.

[Translated from the [url=http://metalogiq.jp/games/deadendaegis/]official site[/url]]

title: Night of the Lesbian Vampires
description:
What’s more pathetic than being alone on a Friday night? Being alone at work on Halloween night because of a stack of paperwork, of course. What’s a girl to do when she gets two visitors at midnight who both want her- and some blood?

- - -

The year is 1997.

After a successful blood donation drive, Mina is left working the graveyard shift on Halloween to catch up on all the paperwork. In the middle of yearning for her cheesy VHS rentals and the comfort of her pet rats, she hears something - someone? - outside. It’s two people- or rather, two vampires, both demanding a bit of blood. 

Once that small, sorta shady, detail is over with... Mina thinks she can go back to work.

However, the night isn't over yet!

[From [url=https://scribbles.itch.io/night-of-the-lesbian-vampires]itch.io[/url]]

title: Crown & Cauldron
description:
Zerlinda was a child when she escaped the witch trials that robbed her of her mother. She has lived as a recluse ever since, enjoying her garden and the company of her familiar.

When an intruder manages to breach the barriers around her woods, Zerlinda realizes just how deep her scars run and how fragile her inner peace is.

Also, the intruder is a princess. A strong-willed princess who refuses to be married off and wants to live just like Zerlinda does: freely.

You are a 20 year old young ordinary man down on his luck. You try to put some order into your life, but then you meet two ladies who have plans of their own...

[Edited from F95Zone]
title: Futa Groves
Treacherous Desires
description:
The main character moved in to stay with his cousin and her friends. He could never have guessed the bizarre and lustful experiences that awaited him.​

[From F95Zone]

title: Guilt Free
description:
Guilt Free is a visual novel crossed with a point and click made to offer perspective on mental health and eating disorders. Navigate a couple's rocky relationship and encounter "flaws" or "quirks" that may actually be symptomatic behaviors.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1385950/]Steam[/url]]

title: Joshikousei Oshikko Omorashi Jijou ~Jugyouchuu, "Toilet Ikitai!" ga Ienakute...~
description:
A girl is in class but can't find the right time to ask to go to the bathroom.
She tries her best to hold it in but...

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE254508.html]DLsite English[/url]]

A yuri retelling of the fairy tale Bearskin. 

Penniless after returning home from the war, Isako makes a deal with the demon Maku. In exchange for an endless amount of money, Isako must survive ostracization and attempts on her life for seven years without once asking for help. Should she fail, she yields her soul to Maku.

Can Isako come out alive?
title: Heart's Blight
Devil's Door
description:
A horror drama visual novel set in the countryside town of Marbrooke. Being the new kid in a small town is never easy. Will you live long enough to discover Marbrooke's secrets?

An ode to classic horror films, tropes, and the good ole' spirit of Halloween.

title: Mokrye shagi
description:
The main character of this story isn't just the ordinary high-school student, or no, he is not! Nature endowed him with physical strength and charm, and good looks, thus he often faces all kinds of maidens aiming for his heart.
One fine day he notices a charming young girl Iris dressed weirdly who follows him mumbling some sort of magical words. But what if these words aren't "love spells" and the concern of being stalked comes from where he least expects it?..
Despite being called DLC, this is a standalone sequel that takes place after the events of the gentleman ending from the main game.
title: My Girlfriend's Amnesia DLC

description:
Hundreds of years have passed since humanity began to immigrate into space. Humanity has spread too far and created their own agendas and interests. Soon enough, war occured with the usage of battleships and robots.
The protagonist was once an excellent test pilot. Now, he is a humble mechanic after an accident forced him to be transferred.
Unable to quit the army, he spent his days aimlessly. Soon, he was assigned to a newly established battleship that focuses on reconnaissance and collecting data.
However, during maintenance, he discovered a secret hidden in the ship. One that caused him to shake in anger. And the words that appeared in front of him.
'Please enter what you want me to do'.
That changed the fate of the protagonist in the future.
title: Kyonyuu Onna Shikan Sennou Saimin "Omae no You na Otoko no Meirei ni Shitagau Wake ga Nai Darou"
Apathy - Shougakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - Getsuyoubi
Apathy - Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi 2008 vol.1
Senjou de Shoujo wa Kokoro o Sasagu DS
Pinnacle or Precipice
description: A former black ops operative returns home after a ten year long absence. Complications arise when he is immediately involved in a murder plot, and hired to be a bodyguard for a teen pop star.

title: Haru no Hi ni Michi ga Tsuzuku
description: Two boys find a secret underpass leading to a women's college and sneak through in search of adventure.

The story is about a young guy who's graduating from high school. Before his school life ends, he wants to confess to his crush. Her name is Rei and she quickly turns him down, crushing his dreams in public. The embarassment turns to motivation as he continues spending the following years in solitude. During that period, he turned his ordinary smart phone into a time travelling device. His goal was to undo his confession mistake but only ends up sending himself back all the way to the 90s, where he meets a different kind of girl. One that might end up being his true love.

[From [url=https://osjey.itch.io/my-darling-in-the-90s]Itch.io[/url]]
title: My Darling In The 90s
Yokubou Kaiki Dai 411 Shou -Josei Sousahan Series "Yokubou no Denpatou" Makie Ikenie ni sareta Onna Caster Ayano-

description:
The protagonist is the son of a wealthy and influential family, and he's always had a thing for his older cousin Nodoka. Just seeing her getting lovey with her new husband pisses him off to no end.
Just then, the family head summons him, and tells him that he's fed up with that husband's inability to get Nodoka pregnant, and they want you to get her knocked up in his stead!
If she doesn't want her happy married life to end, she has no choice but to accept your seed, but along the way she might just become your loyal slut...

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE298335.html]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Kekkon Seikatsu o Mamoru Tame ni Dairi Kozukuri de Netori Ana Yome ni Sareru Niizuma
aliases: Holey Matrimony ~Newlywed Wife Accepts a Surrogate to Save Her Marriage~

title: Throw Me in the River
description:
A visual novel about a man experiencing his family relationships through a state of compressed time.
In Throw Me in the River, each scene takes place 20 years apart and examines the state of Joseph's life in Canada at that time through conversations he has with his various family members.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1422210/]Steam[/url]]

Curious about the history of visual and interactive fiction? Funded my Miami University, and with help from Dr. Phill Alexander, the Interactive History of Interactive Novels not only dives into the development of games such as Zork and ADVENT, but explains the motivations of their creations, libraries of games where one could buy and purchase interactive fiction, the different genres of interactive fiction, how people create interactive fiction, how to write your own interactive fiction, and more!

[From [url=https://games.renpy.org/game/the-interactive-history-of-interactive-novels]Ren'Ai Archive[/url]]
title: The Interactive History of Interactive Novels
Bewitching!
description: Mabel is the new girl at Hawthorne Academy; a prestigious magical institution for gifted witches. Will she manage to find her place in her new school and, perhaps, find love before the big dance?

The man, who was the victim of mass stalking, said something strange that he was being tapped further. Meanwhile, at that time, Otomo met with a serial killer man in a detention center. Taking the opportunity of a certain AD suicide, the incident leads to "the secret of humankind".
title: True Colors of 3/4oz
Arizona: Unbridled
description:
Arizona has just turned 18 a few months ago and still resides with her parents in the family apartment.

Arizona is a very happy and a little naive girl despite her age and she has recently started a relationship with her boyfriend Frank. Frank is the captain of the high school basketball team, despite how typical this can sound. 

From the moment one, you will decide the destiny of Arizona's life, depending on the situations in which she finds herself...

Step by step you will know Arizona better and better, are you ready for her?

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/Sylviedreams]Patreon[/url]]

title: High School of Memories
description:
Haru Takahashi, a foreign exchange student, travels to Japan for his first year of high school!
With his natural blonde hair and his love for anime and manga, he's ready to live in Japan,
the land of his dreams!

From the priceless friends at school, to the enjoyable family time at home, to the exclusive
JRPG Spirit and Katana... Haru is sure to experience lots of happy memories and an abundance
of exciting and precious moments!

Get ready to watch Haru's journey and reminisce at every turn in the visual novel...

High School of Memories! 

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1415670/]Steam[/url]]

title: Path of Dreamers
description:
"Please, help me free my beloved."

With those words, the young informant Keir pleads for the help of one of his skilled peers: a man named Lloyd. For without an effective escape plan, his loved one is certain to die.

Lloyd agrees, but even with his help, the flight from the castle will be anything but easy. The path to his future: can Keir reach that dream?

[From [url=https://circlepegasi.itch.io/pathofdreamers]itch.io[/url]]

Remember your crush from High School? Well, she needs some immigration help. Specifically, she needs you to marry her--but not a "real" marriage! Just a paper marriage until her citizenship is granted. But this is the chance you've always wanted! Can you succeed in getting her to have the same feelings for you that you've always secretly had for her? Or will things go wildly, horribly, terribly, but erotically wrong?

[From F95Zone]
title: My Virgin Bride
Scarlet Law
description:
In the land of Burgundy, there is a law that's existed since its founding... The Burgundy Law. Every woman born into this country has a price tag placed on their heads. As long as they are single and of age, the Burgundy Law allows wealthy patrons from faraway lands to purchase and buy women within the country.

[From [url=https://jypgames.itch.io/burgundy-law]Itch.io[/url]]

You are an overly privileged 20-year-old man who is forced to return to school and become a knight. Along the way, you will meet several other students of the opposite sex and form the ultimate harem.​
title: Three Houses

description:
As a newly appointed royal minister, brought in after the previous minister was deposed, you take your position during a time of uncertainty. You've been loyal to the king ever since you two rose up the military ranks together. After the previous king died under mysterious circumstances, the current king took his position. You were sent to reinforce the eastern part of the kingdom, and your victories earned new territory and riches for your king, your soldiers, and yourself.

Three recent assassination attempts, mercifully failed ones, have left the entire kingdom on edge. Are you entering a greater position of power during a time where your role can be solidified? Or will you be swiftly removed as the kingdom continues to unravel? Throughout your time, you'll learn more behind who really controls power in the kingdom, uncover plots against the kingdom, and have the possibility of romance (but you'll have to tread carefully as each romance can put you at risk). Your choices will determine not only your future but that of the kingdom.

[From [url=https://www.thunderlinestudios.net/to-be-a-king-summary]Official site[/url]]
title: To Be A King
Soft Serve
description: When a young woman and her new friend visit an odd ice-cream parlor deep in the city her world becomes strange.

Jennifer is a 24-year old girl living in New York with her fiance Mark. They just moved into a new apartment due to Mark getting a new job. Jennifer had just finished college so she was still unemployed. She hopes to teach in a highschool as that is her dream job. She even already got an interview in a highschool not too far from her apartment. Everything was going perfectly until today...​

[From F95Zone]
title: Corrupting Jennifer
Yokubou Kaiki Dai 415 Shou -Josei Sousahan Series "Yokubou no Denpatou" #3 Yuukai Rape Eizou Haishin sareta Onna Caster Ayano-
Daten ni Itaru Monogatari
aliases: 堕天ニ至ル物語─クロスブリードジョーカー外伝２─

description:
Every visual novel under the sun has you assume the role of an average guy meeting beautiful anime girls who magically fall for him after a few clicks. In Class of '09 you play the anime girl and verbally destroy any guy in your path.

Set from 2007 to 2009, relive the late 2000's with a twist! Experience the high school life pre social media and cancel culture, make all sadistic choices you always wanted to towards painfully accurate depictions of all the personalities encountered in any American high school.

description:
After narrowly escaping a masked assailant, Adrien attempts to go back to their regular college life, but the killer is still out there... Spend your time with one of three love interests, avoid dying, and find the real killer... though they may be closer than you think!

In a new take on the murder mystery genre, the killer is randomly chosen from one of the love interests at the start of every new game. Every playthrough is different, with each killer and love interest having different plot lines.

[From [url=https://crystalgameworks.itch.io/drops-of-death]Itch.io[/url]]

You work for a modeling company called R/HUSH and you work with the amazing photographer named Hisao Yori . You've been working with him for 3 years and you had fell in love with him ever since the moment you guys have met. He was so sweet to you and such a free spirit. One day, you muddled up the courage to confess your love to him on a date! The date happens and the night is over, you confess and he confessed that he had loved you too! Your heart pitter patters all the way and you're the most happy you've ever been! You are now dating the amazing photographer but he wants to tell you a secret. Later on, he shows you his secret photograph collection. To the basement was a horrific discovery! He murders women and makes terrifying art using every single part of the body!  What do you do? Do you run for the hills? Do you call the police? It's a game about morals and guilt! Choose wisely!!
title: Hedonistic
What's Mine Is Yours: Season 3
description:
Having finally gotten through the year and after the students have graduated he spends time with his wife thinking she has been cucked enough and finally wants her husband all to herself. However, the day before class she drops a bomb, she refuses to have sex with him until he assembles another harem. Now, with Molly no longer "helping," it will be up to the MC to figure out a way to cuck his wife.

[From F95Zone]

Marcus is the only heir to one of the largest private military companies in the world, called The Company. At the age of eight, he becomes an orphan when his parents die in a mysterious accident. With no living relatives, it falls on his father's best friend, and business partner, to take charge of the young man and his family business until he reaches his eighteenth birthday.

[Edited from [url=https://www.patreon.com/Lenniergaming]Patreon[/url]]

description:
It is a story based on a couple from Verona, Augustus and Lucrezia, who live a quiet and peaceful life. After three years of marriage, Augustus receives an important phone call. The long-desired job position opens in a Milanese company "Sassosapori". Enthusiasm and happiness will soon be tempered by harsh reality.

It is possible that a married couple may not have told each other the whole truth about their pasts and their sexual desires? Is it possible that a move to another city could bring back bad habits?

title: Moglie a tutti i costi

description:
You have survived the zombie apocalypse and manage to make a living as a soldier in a community of survivors. You and your squad are out on a mission when things go wrong and the zombies attack! But you're saved by a mysterious man and you begin to wonder if zombies are the most terrifying adversary you'll face...

[From Genius Inc official Facebook page]
title: Attack of the Dead
Yokubou Kaiki Tokusen Shuu #11 -Ane's GAG MANIAX2 Akogare no Hataraku Bijotachi ga...-
Intertwined
description:
The story centers around you, a 18-year-old man who returns to his hometown after living with his dad for the past 5 years.
Discover what you left behind. Rekindle old friendships, start new relationships. Find out how all of them are "Intertwined"!

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/NyxVN]Patreon[/url]]

description:
A human man and elf woman meet for their monthly hookup deep in the forest and find an unexpected surprise.  They love each-other and are a secret couple because of the human vs elf prejudices of their world.

You take on the role of Joel, a guy who is serving house arrest and lives with his niece Alanna. It's up to you to train Alanna to develop the skills needed to be a good maid, while getting involved with her and other girls.
