title: Fluid Angel

description:
Boa Retina is a game that dives deep into messy gender uncertainty. It is an uncomfortable blend of abstract golden-age arcade design, retro computer aesthetic, the unhealthy ways my gender feelings manifested before coming out, and external conflicts from things trying to keep life in order. It is a story of breaking free…

[i]breaking free…[/i]

[From [url=https://jenniferraye.itch.io/boa-retina]itch.io[/url]]
title: Boa Retina
Buka Ore x Onna Joushi/Kashidashi Play = ??? ~Buka no Ore ni Kashidasareta Hitozuma Onna Joushi, Yukana~
description:
Misato Yukana is my female boss at work. She is a famously stubborn woman who never talks about anything other than work. She told me to make time to talk to her, so I reluctantly went to meet her, and there, I found my female boss and her husband.

"Would you like to have sex with my wife?"

Apparently, her husband has a so-called "cuckold fetish" and was looking for a man to have sex with Yukana, who is both his wife and my boss. I didn't like this woman and was hesitant, but I thought I could get revenge for work, so I accepted the offer.

So I ended up having sex with her, and she was incredibly sensitive and came over and over again. As her husband wanted, I made my female boss come crazy to the point of almost fainting, which also served as my usual revenge.

It was the most refreshing event in my life. A few days later, her husband asked me to continue the act, and I agreed. I never knew that after this, "I, the subordinate and the female boss" would lead to an unexpected outcome.

[Translated from [url=https://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1120822&gc=gc]Getchu[/url]]

title: The Edge Of
description:
Coming back home after week-long business trip (convention), Sam can't help but sense that something isn't quite right the moment he set foot inside his house. Is it the fact that his newlywed wife was sleeping in the afternoon rather than waiting impatiently for his return? Or is it because she was rather evasive the moment he questioned her about it? Or maybe it is simply his weary mind playing tricks on him?

The latter seems like the most compelling answer, or so he thought, but as he finds himself gazing at a selfie his wife sent him during his business trip--a selfie in her lingerie-- he notices something he didn't catch when he first received it; the presence of three inconspicuous fingertips peeking at the edge of the frame.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/HangoverCat]Patreon[/url]]

title: The Space in Between
description:
What if you could create your own constellations?

The Space in Between is an emotional dating sim about Asian-American identity, mental health, and stargazing.

Meet June, a spunky Chinese-American college student trying to make sense of her complicated relationship with her immigrant mother.

This is the love story between her and Miles, a quiet artist who is recovering after a harsh past with mental illness.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1430240/]Steam[/url]]

title: Yukki to Asobo!
description:
A protagonist does housecleaning around the village.
R-18 spring love romance comedy game!

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE098417.html]DLsite English[/url]]

That day, I transferred to a new school.
But on the train ride there, something unbelievable happened—I got groped by a pervert!
And to make things even stranger, the perpetrator turned out to be a beautiful girl… who was also my junior at the same school.
Later, I found out her true identity: she was actually my younger sister, who had been taken away by my father when our family split up years ago.
This is unbelievable…
—And so began a peach-colored, forbidden love between siblings.

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ303340.html/]dlsite[/url]]
title: Ji Lian ~Fu Yu de Qianpian
Neko to Osananajimi to Mikkakan
description:
I'm an average high schooler. I have a valued childhood friend.

Her name is Miyoko.
We never dated or anything like that but,
we're always together, and that's more than enough.

One day, Miyoko brought home a strange charm.
That night, she showed up in my bedroom with cat ears.

"I have taken this body," said the goddess who now resided in Miyoko.
"If you want it back you'll have to win my game!"

My eyes were spinning. What sort of game?

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE154608.html]DLsite English[/url]]
aliases: 3 Days With My Neko Childhood Friend

description:
Fandisc of Nie no Machi, which includes continuations of the good and bad ends of the original game and newly written side character backstories.

The main character Hisora gets lost in a strange world when he chases after a man in mourning dress, who dropped a bouquet of white flowers. While staying at the inn in this strange world, he looks for a way to return to the original world.

Will he return, or will he stay at the inn?
title: Nie no Machi -Iro Musubi-

description:
Hachi Hachi Mystery is a interactive Visual Novel taking place at university. It's your first year as a university student and you're going to discover this new life! ...Well, that's how it should have happened.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1501480/]Steam[/url]]
title: Hachi Hachi Mystery
Rebels - Under the Spell of Magic
description:
The story revolves around Folken, who is considered a low-class human by society, because he has no magic abilities. In this world, people with magic abilities are automatically vested with high privileges and the rest are not worth much and are being discriminated against.
Folken has no family and has to fight for his survival each and every day.
But his life changes when an old man claims to have known his father, who was a legend and had incredible powers.
Does he actually have powers slumbering inside of him that he wasn't aware of?
Can he change the hierarchy of this world that has treated him so badly throughout his life?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1493460/]Steam[/url]]

The story revolves around Amami Souma, a young man with the ability to see lies due to a childhood accident, and Natsugami Haruna, a girl known for her frequent dishonesty. Souma, who had always experienced peaceful classrooms, is bewildered by the delinquent atmosphere in his new class. He prefers to keep his distance to stay safe and has a strained relationship with his family. Souma's sole aim is to quietly graduate and leave home to start working, treating school as a means to that end. However, a certain action draws him into an unexpected problem, disrupting his plans for a trouble-free graduation.

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ354311.html]DLsite[/url]]
title: Natsugami-ke ni Okita Koto
aliases: What Happened at the Natsugami Household

title: Play Dead!
description: A story about a band, their junky, broken down van, an abandoned house, and a surprisingly lively dead dog.

title: Ten'yoku no Asklein
description:
Due to the attack from the unidentified life forms, Tousuien City was flooded with blood of the victims. The tragedy is called Tousuien Incident, and among the survivors is a student named Senba Shinkurou. Shinkurou lost both his parents from the incidents, so he carried the loss with him when he grew up alone. One day, Shinkurou encountered the same monster from Tousuien Incident. Facing each other, Shinkurou was outmatched and fell into a dangerous situation. In that moment, a beautiful female knight appeared and saved him.

Her name is Asklein Christa. She is a transformed heroine of justice who came to Shinkurou's world to hunt down the monster... the Fallen Demon. Christa's real identity is Luana, who actually a beautiful member of a royal family from the other world. Since she came only to exterminate the Fallen Demon, she has trouble living in Shinkurou's world. So, she moved in with Shinkurou to adapt to the world and help him out. During the fight against the Fallen Demon, Shinkurou and Luana deepened their bond together.

In the meantime, Sayaka, who is Shinkurou's childhood friend, just finished her miko training at a Shinto shrine and was returning. When Shinkurou found out that she fought against the Fallen Demon under the alias of Sukuna no Himemiko, the relationships between the three of them became more complicated.

[Translated from [url=http://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1121712]Getchu[/url]]

Mizusawa Nachi, a young man captivated by the beauty and kindness of a woman named Amagi Rina, experiences his first love. Despite their slight age difference, Nachi and Rina share a close bond akin to siblings, enjoying their days together. However, their relationship takes a turn during a shared bath when Nachi can no longer resist his desires and confesses his love to Rina, embracing her.

Following the confession, their relationship evolves into a forbidden affair, filled with secret rendezvous after school, concealed from their parents. They promise to keep their relationship a secret. Their love deepens, and Nachi envisions marrying Rina in the future. However, their lives are disrupted by a deadly global virus outbreak, causing Rina's father's company, Tenjou Foods, to face financial troubles. As a result, Rina is forced to move to Tokyo.

Before leaving, Rina reveals her desire to have a child with Nachi, hoping it would allow them to stay together. They consummate their love, but the next day, Rina disappears without a word, leaving Nachi heartbroken. Time passes, and Nachi successfully gains admission to Tokyo's prestigious university, seeking to find his lost love.

[Translated from [url=https://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1121698]Getchu[/url]]
title: Boku One ~End of Summer Days After~

description: A tale of two sisters, "The End of the Summer" is a meditation on how we face loss — be it the dramatic disappearance of a family's housecat, or the slow wearing away that can go unnoticed for years at a stretch.
title: The End of the Summer "Saigo no Natsu"
Does Anybody Really Know What Time It Is? "Glass no Naka no Shoujo"
description: The intertwined story of two young women: a nurse working in a Japanese psychiatric ward and her patient, a rural girl with 11 unique personalities living inside her. Before long, however, those personalities start dying off one by one, and the line between what’s real and what’s not quickly begins to blur… with deadly results.

Michael, the Main Character, spent the whole summer on a very luxurious yacht. But the summer ended and now it's time to come back on the mainland. Before leaving, Michael decided to say goodbye to some of his travel companions, greeting them in the best way he knows!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1511580/]Steam[/url]]
title: Leisure Yacht - The Epilogue

description:
The future is here, and it totally sucks. No one has any money, and the the environment is a mess. It's all good though because you've got a hot date tonight. You met Mel on the internet. They are half melon and might have psychic powers. They seem a little weird, but at least they're cute. What could go wrong?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1509830/]Steam[/url]]
title: Superstorm Melon Date

description:
B-Project‘s first console game!

An unknown past and hidden secrets now revealed.

What road will the troubled boys choose as idols, and as people—?

B-Project is a special unit formed of the three male idol groups Kitakore, THRIVE, and MooNs. And last year, the four members of KiLLER KiNG joined as a new addition.

Shining more and more each day, their presence in the industry is more prominent than ever. The 14 members, each wholly unique, are all running toward the same dream, one much more difficult than anyone else could imagine.

And yet even today, all 14 members of B-Project gave their fans the ultimate performance on the country’s largest stage, the Japan Dome. If you close your eyes, you can still hear the voices of the 14 members echo in harmony throughout the venue.

That was step one towards greater success. We were promised a bright future.

—Until that moment, we believed it without a doubt.

[from [url=https://www.gematsu.com/2021/01/b-project-ryuusei-fantasia-launches-in-2021-in-japan-adds-ios-and-android-versions]Gematsu[/url]]
title: B-PROJECT: Ryuusei * Fantasia

description:
A town of four districts...

This city is militaristic, with teams dividing up the four quarters: north, south, east, and west.

Hikage of the Vermilion Birds rounds up delinquents.
Tamao of the intelligence group, known as the Azure Dragons, specializes in information warfare.

As the entire city is engulfed in a dire crisis, you'll discover everyone has different hopes, dreams, and motives.

Will you reach for money, glory, or...?
title: EmulateThrill

description:
Determined to not spend a single day away from his love, Nobu infiltrates an all-girls summer school to be with Tiara. To do this, he does something unthinkable: becoming a girl.

While blending in, he meets Izumi, Tiara's older sister, who keeps an eye on her at all times. If that wasn't enough, Nobu notices how Tiara befriends Emi, a reserved dark-haired girl who's attracted to Tiara and her flirtatious personality.

Nobu must juggle his secret life of pretending to be a girl with his real identity in a desperate attempt to make Tiara fall in love with him. Follow Nobu and his misadventures to conquer the girl of his dreams!

Who said that love was easy?

[From [url=https://gogen-soft.itch.io/oh-mai-tiara]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Oh Mai Tiara: The Road For Love

description:
Taking place before and after Spirit Blade: The Winds of Destiny, our naive hero Blayde has just been given the ancient Spiritual Sword to protect free will for all mankind.

Unfortunately, things take an immediate turn for the worst.

Spirit Blade II continues the tradition of using broken english throughout the entire experience for comedic purposes, but the story it tells is darker, edgier, and even more existential.

[From [url=https://hounddoge.itch.io/spirit-blade-ii-the-dichotomy-of-eternal-victory]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Spirit Blade II: The Dichotomy of Eternal Victory

description:
The Eternal Winter.

This was the name of the curse that killed the heirs of the Esternian Empire, whose heartlessness and cruelty were known far and wide. The bearer of the curse would be born with a small fragment of ice near their heart. As they grew older, the ice would slowly encroach upon their heart and encase it until they die. Although the age of death varies, none of them made it past their 20th year.

And so, the Esternian Empire met its doom and was replaced by another ruling family.

One day, the Estern family’s last descendant and bearer of the curse discovered a possible way to break it. But can she believe in a solution derived from a long-lost fairy tale? Is 'true love' the answer to her family's long-lasting predicament? And if it is, will she ever learn to truly love someone?

[From [url=https://abyss-team.itch.io/eternal-winter]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Eternal Winter
Tai Zhongguo de Di Zhi Shaonü
description:
Wang Cheng-En is just an ordinary pharmacist without being on the forefront in cutting-edge technology.At first, he works in Taipei, but he is forced to return to his hometown in Miaoli Empirebecause Taiwan has split into multiple small states after the Age of Great Independence years ago.

On his way back to his hometown, he comes across a mysterious animal girl - the leopard catgirl Pisuka,and he joins forces with her to resist the oppressive Miaoli emperor.After a series of events filled with danger, the two of them flee Miaoli Empireto follow Cheng-En's long-lost sister, Mika, to their next destination - Taichung State.

What awaits them in the theocratic state of Taichung?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1368780/]Steam[/url]]

The Zodiac Trial has begun, and everybody's life is on the line! Will these 12 jurors be able to solve the mysteries and cooperate, or will they resort to betrayal, deception, and violence? Get out alive or die, die again! 

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1513120/The_Zodiac_Trial/]Steam[/url]]
title: The Zodiac Trial

description:
"Let's get leaning into the Shadows, Beautiful Flower."

The collection of after stories of "Secret Agent ~Knight Academy no Shinobi Naru Mono~" is available that features after stories of the four main heroines and the truth route. This also includes the harem story of Anemonori Sisters, who won the most popular heroine in the popularity contest.

After solving the bat incident, Jin spends his time as a student. While he is thinking about being a ninja and his future, a new incident occurs in the school city. Jin decided to investigate it. Then it develops into an incident that shakes the organization to which he belongs. 

The story follows the true story of the main story. This story is the culmination of the Secret Agent storyline.
title: Secret Agent Kagebana ~Shadow Flower~

description:
A couple, Tatsuya Iwase and Kaori Iwase lived in a certain apartment.
One day, the Kayabe couple moved into the next room.
The two are relieved that it they seemed to be a good couple.
But....
They can hear the moans from the other apartment night ...
They didn't notice it until now because it had been vacant, but the walls of the apartment were unexpectedly thin.
The couple are bothered by the lustrous voices that they hear.
In order to put an end to the frustrating days, they decided to talk to the couple next door. 
The noise problem that seemed to be solved after that, but then they heard that voice in the daytime ...

[Translated from the [url=http://www.hs-crowd.co.jp/anim/product/pro_pc/pc068/introduce.html#story]official website[/url]]
title: Kabe no Mukou no Tsuma no Koe 3 ~Usukabe kara Hibiku Rinjinzuma no Tsuyagoe wa, Itsushika Ai Suru Tsuma no Midareta Yogarigoe e to Kawatteita~
Onii-chan Chou Suki 99 Jikan Ecchi Shiyo!
Nostalgici Anonimi
description:
Nostalgici Anonimi is set in a dystopian future where emotions and old narrations are considered a disease.
To help recover from this illness the government has created the program Nostalgici Anonimi.

Your story will begin in the classroom of the Nostalgici Anonimi program. Here Angel the android lead the therapeutic journey of three teenagers who are suffering from the nostalgia disease. They love past narrations and Angel wants to stop this and turn them in good citizens.

And this where your journey starts.

Will you help Angel or the teenagers?
Will you be able to come back to the present?

What are you waiting for? Sign up to the Nostalgici Anonimi program now!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1494390/]Steam[/url]]

Follow Sophie as she embarks on her latest adventure in making money, working alongside the enigmatic Rias as they put on a special camgirl show for their viewers. Your decisions in this short Yuri/Lesbian story will determine how successful the show is and whether Sophie finds a new source of funds to live off, or must resort to drastic measures to keep going!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1398660/]Steam[/url]]
title: CamGirls: Sophie X Rias
2ECONDS TO STΔRLIVHT: My Heart's Reflection
description:
"The day I put that uniform on, I saw myself in the mirror for the first time. And I dared to think, maybe, just maybe..."

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1479030/]Steam[/url]]

This visual novel is a prequel to the rhythm game [url=https://anarch.games/starlivht/]NOISZ STΔRLIVHT[/url].

Trouble Comes Twice features two playable protagonists, twins Jace and Hazel. Already halfway through their university years, the twins realize neither of them have ever been in love before. Like any other not-so-rational person, the twins decide to turn finding love into a competition. 

Whoever gets into a relationship first wins. May the best twin win!
title: Trouble Comes Twice

description:
A short, mostly kinetic story that follows the protagonist coming to terms with signing Grendel's Friendship Contract.

In addition, it also explains the planning that the antagonists in No Regrets conducted in order to carry out their mission
title: Welcome To... Chichester 2 - Part II : No Extra Regrets For The Future
Winning Love by Daylight
description:
Welcome to a small town. You're just an average kid in their final year of highschool. You and your best friend Maya play videogames most nights.

On your first day you meet a new student who you're pretty sure is a demon.
 
You're introduced to another girl, who you don't realise is an alien, in highschool to learn more about her new home: Earth. 

What these girls all have in common, is that at night they defend the town from all kinds of monsters. 

[Edited from [url=https://cutlassboardgame.itch.io/winninglovebydaylight]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Psychic Connections
description:
Psychic Connections (PC) is a male romance visual novel placed in a familiar setting with a light sprinkling of supernatural flavor.

Follow Mason (Name changeable if you so choose) who has just moved away from home for college. Upon arrival he finds himself inducted into a support group for individuals with psychic abilities a member he will face several choices in his day to day life as he balances college with keeping his newfound friends' abnormalities a secret.

Meet our cast and entangle yourself further with one of our four eligible bachelors as you learn more about their troubled lives as psychics. You'll have the chance to help them cope with the issues their "gifts" bring — by doing so, you may even find yourself forming a deeper connection.

[Edited from [url=https://rookfluffy.itch.io/psychic-connections]Itch.io[/url]]

Awakening to a stranger. An arcane laboratory. A ritual went awry.

The Remainder is a story of mystery and romance, where you, a magus who’s lost your memory, are trying to find a spell to save your life by connecting bits and pieces from your past.  

This is an intimate tale about two characters, about the journey they were on, the differences they had, and the fate they must now face. It is also a story about love, acceptance, forgiveness, and sacrifice.

[From [url=https://nimphradora.itch.io/the-remainder]itch.io[/url]]
title: Chronicles of Tal'Dun: The Remainder
Space Paws
description:
Space Paws is a hybrid between visual novel and point'n'click adventure game where our main character should explore new planets to find a new home for mankind. There you'll be able to meet sexy furry girls that you'll have to convince to somehow, give you permission to make humanity grow in their planet.
You won't be alone because Alison - you human partner - and your robot E-Millio are with you in the spaceship.

From [url=https://taifunriders.itch.io/space-paws]itch.io[/url]

title: Artificial Selection
description:
Saeva, a socially anxious teenager, finds himself trapped in a building along with 13 other young adults. They are all accused of being criminals and are told the only way to escape is by proving their worth and potential for improvement. 

Saeva is fairly confident he's innocent, but can the same be said about everyone else?

[From [url=https://kigyo.itch.io/artificial-selection]Itch.io[/url]]

You wake up sitting across from a beautiful stranger.

"There is nothing I want more than to talk to you right now."

And so you talk.

[From [url=https://kigyo.itch.io/locked]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Locke(d)

description:
You go to an aesthetic salon together with your childhood friend Mami unaware of
what experience awaited the two of you...

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE299633.html]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Shasei o Gaman Shite Kanojo o Mamore!
aliases: Hold in Your Cum and Protect Your Girlfriend!

title: LOVE BAKUDAN
description:
LOVE BAKUDAN is an 18+ erotic yuri dramedy, focusing on the life of Haruka Mishima. When she returns to her coastal hometown of Akiyama after a long time away, she finds that there’s much more waiting for her than just inheriting her family’s erotic bookstore, Bakudan Books. But between romancing girls and selling erotica to the locals, Haruka finds that she’s in for an even wilder ride than she expected...

With the option of dating the beautiful lovelorn bartender, your cheerful best friend, a dangerous mobster, a drop-dead gorgeous firefighter, a mysterious Korean idol or a shy mangaka in the making, which girl will steal your heart away?

[From [url=https://noodletub.itch.io/love-bakudan]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Ane wa Tsurezure Naru Mama ni ~Otouto no Ecchi na Osewa wa Ama-Ero JK Sisters ni Omakase!~
description:
Shimizu Taiyou is a nerd and socially awkward high schooler.
For some reason, he doesn't want to get involved with anyone and spends his life immersed in a two-dimensional world.
He has triplet sisters who are all high school girls.

The cool and intelligent eldest daughter, Satsuki.
The athletic yet naive second daughter, Chiho.
The family oriented youngest daughter, Sora.

One day, the sisters realize that Taiyou's lack of interest in others was due to the fact that he didn't get to be spoiled much in his childhood.
So they declare that they will become his Mama in exchange!

"Leave all your everyday needs, including your sexual need to us!"

Like that, Taiyou's sweet and erotic life with the triplets began.

[Translated and edited from the official site]
Made in one week for Anivisual Jam #1 "Horror".
title: Love/Pain

description: Made in one week for Anivisual Jam #2.
title: Pod serym nebom
Koshkin Dom
description: Made in one week for Anivisual Jam #1 "Horror".

title: Kromka
description: Made in one week for Anivisual Jam #2.

title: Kagura Reimeiki ~Keika no Shou~
description:
When Keika receives a request to vanquish youkai, her younger sister, Hatsuka, is already out on another quest. Determined to set a good example for her less disciplined sibling, who often fails to show up to training, Keika visits the village Shinto priest who made the request. This priest tells her of a giant monkey youkai who has led other youkai on a rampage in and around his village. She confidently accepts the request alone, believing that her powers as a priestess would help overcome them...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1839360/]Steam[/url]]

title: Memories of Tomorrow
description:
You and your friends Genki, Sakura and Hinata all want to have one last fun memory to remember each other by just in case you don't see each other again after high school. You have grown distant from them in recent months but are doing your best to reconnect. Follow the story, your story, of rebuilding friendships and strengthening your bonds with the people closest to you.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1459020/]Steam[/url]]

title: Coming Out Simulator 2014
description:
A half-true story about half-truths.

You play as a semi-fictional version of me, on a night that changed my life forever. Choose your (my?) words wisely. Every character will remember everything you say -- or don't say -- as you figure out how to approach my (your?) hyper-conservative Asian parents. And if all that seems confusing or awkward... well, that's the gist of coming out as queer, isn't it?

title: Osananajimi no Iru Kurashi
description:
Spring——the season of exciting new encounters.
In this warm season of beginnings, Aikawa Kazuki has made a decision.

He will express his feelings to his childhood friend, Sakurazawa Mayuki. The girl has been like family to him since before he can remember, cooking meals for him in the place of his frequently absent parents. He's never been able to take the first step to advance their relationship, but today is the day. With that in mind, Kazuki calls Mayuki into the classroom after school and tells her how he feels.

"Yes, I like you too!"

The confession was accepted so easily that it was hard to believe. She surprise him even more by suddenly asking for a kiss, which he did not see coming at all.

"Since we're going out, you wanted to do something like that too, right?♪"

"What? We're really going out?"

Mayuki has always thought they were already lovers because she has accepted his childhood "crush" a long time ago. All that aside, although there have been some weird dissonances during the process, they have now become real boyfriend and girlfriend.

They are childhood friends, and from now on, they are also lovers. The same as before, but slightly different, "Life with a Childhood Friend" begins...

"She is here again, huh...?"

Upon entering, he found his childhood friend, Saotome Ai, fiddling with her phone, relaxing as if it were her own house. The spare key (AIKAGI) to the house was hanging from her neck. 

"Ah, welcome back, senpai~."

A girl one year younger than him welcomed him home with a smile, (though she was lazing about while doing so.) 

"I'm back... Hey, how many times have I told you not to come in as you please? Also, give me back my spare key already..."

Revolving around the AIKAGI, this is how the love story between our amiable but easy-to-tease protagonist, and his mischievous junior begins.

As their love blossoms into marriage, Lithia ponders their future. Should they have a traditional monogamous wedding, like humans do? Or should she embrace her roots, where polygamy is the norm?

"You know what would make my relationship with Raito-kun perfect? A second bride!"

Without breathing a word to Raito, she starts her secret mission to find them another wife!

Meanwhile, out of nowhere, a mysterious plane touches down on the school grounds!

"Could Raito-kun's father be alive...?"

The sudden appearance of this enigmatic aircraft and its passenger - a girl who's lost her memories - marks the beginning of an extraordinary adventure at Verbena Academy, as autumn leaves begin to fall...!!

The expression on the girl’s face as she cried out, begged for forgiveness, and pleaded for help was somewhat ecstatic, and Kyosuke felt a perversion of his own situation.

Alone in a room of an uninhabited mansion, Kyosuke let out a big sigh.

He wonders if this is his punishment for committing crimes in order to get money to pay off his debts.
It was all fine and dandy until he hijacked the school bus that the young lady took to school and brought her to his current residence.
However, the girl I had just held, Yuzuri Shiramine, had talked me into it.
But the girl I had just held, Yuzuri Shiramine, had her way with me, and before I knew it, she had switched the purpose of her crime from ransom to devouring the bodies of the young ladies, and even forced me to do so.

In addition, none of the daughters defied him, and they looked at him expectantly, hoping that he would rape them.
While I was wary that there might be an ulterior motive, I decided to dance in the palm of my hand for now.
He wanted to make it known that it was he, and not the lady, who was in control of the situation.
