Typical Werewolf Love Story
description:
In Typical Werewolf Love Story, you're a girl who moves into a new apartment building in a city called Cagin. Within the first night you learn that your neighbors are more supernatural than they seem.  You go through three "dates" with a neighbor of your choice.

[From [url=https://wolfblood-games.itch.io/typical-werewolf-love-story]Itch.io[/url]]

Heartbeat Singularity is a slice of life with a hint of lore visual novel that follows Alyn, a journalist, as he travels to a mysterious city state, Terrace City. He is tasked to cover various stories of the city and find out what lies within it.

[From [url=https://deenkei.itch.io/heartbeat-singularity-demo]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Heartbeat Singularity

description:
Only one of these two souls is worthy of entering the afterlife. The other is an imposter. Investigate each wagon, and decide who to send back to the limbos.

- Play as a merciful or ruthless controller in a life-or-death investigation!

- Discover colorful characters and stories and make choices with huge consequences!

[From [url=https://mathilde-conte.itch.io/terminus]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Terminus

description:
There is only one way to win, DON'T FALL IN LOVE.

Erotic Infiltration is not an easy branch of the Military. Can you make it out alive? Can you complete your mission of saving the world before its destruction in three days and NOT fall in love with Harold?! Many people have tried, and only a few have left without a broken heart! In this comedic Visual novel disguised as a dating sim, you play as the newest member an Erotic Infiltration unit for a trans-dimension branch of the military. As you and your comrade's attempt thought conversation, battles and small choices, you will find different routes that will save, harm or destroy everyone...

Join your colorful comrades as you start your dangerous mission to unlock his secrets and save the world. But remember, DON'T FALL IN LOVE WITH HAROLD!

[Taken from [URL=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1228960/Harolds_Harem_The_Neckoning/]Steam[/URL]]
title: Harold's Harem: The Neckoning
Cold Hearts
description: Cold Hearts is a visual novel about refrigerators, loneliness and the meaning of life. Befriend and date household appliances, melt their frozen hearts, solve the crime story and uncover the truth - the real reason why these girl-fridges made contact with you, of all people!

title: Still Alive
description:
"Still Alive" is a sci-fi visual novel about Mirai Alloris who lives with her mother and sister in one of the inhabited sectors hidden from the radars of the enemy. One day some mechanical monsters attack their sector, they slaughter Mirai’s mother and her sister Aila is kidnapped. After the attack, Mirai finds herself in the human resistance movement's headquarters. She thinks that the members of the resistance who save her can also help save her sister, but it turns out that they have other plans. Thus she escapes and goes to City-5 where the enemy base is located, trying to find her sister. However, it is no easy task, as death waits around every corner there...

[Taken from [URL=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1092560/Still_Alive/]Steam[/URL]]

title: Baihe Hunyin Jieshaosuo
description:
You're a girl who likes girls, walking into this Yuri dating agency to find yourself a date.
Here, you will be able to get to know lots of girls, including a genius scientist, a filthy rich vampire, a cute apple, and more! Although they all want to find a girlfriend, it will still be anything but easy for you to get the ball rolling with them.
Will you be able to win their hearts? Or will you get a reality check then continue to live a miserable single life?

This is a speed dating simulator. Players will play as "I/me", the protagonist in the game and get to date with more than 7 characters.
Some hidden lore will be discovered as the story progresses. After dating the characters, players will acquire the knowledge of the hidden details of each character.
This game contains a large number of choices, and each option will lead to different endings.
Enjoy all the possible choices in dates and the background stories coming with them!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1452020/]Steam[/url]]

title: Nighthawks
description:
Six months ago, you died and were reborn. A vampire. A predator. Not a mere creature of the night, but one of its masters. At least, that’s how things were supposed to be.

Unfortunately, the world has changed. The secret is out. Vampires have finally been exposed, and though your existence is tolerated, your new thirst is not. You came to the one city willing to promise a fresh start, only to find suspicion and starvation waiting on its dark streets. But death could not hold you, and fear will not hold you back. When the sun goes down, outcasts *rise*.

It’s time to seize the night by its throat.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1221950/Nighthawks/]Steam[/url]]

Ever wondered where dragons come from? How about talking animals?

Enter a world on the brink of massive change. A world full of weird and exotic dragons and animals, all trying to figure out where they fit. Take a journey to try to find answers to those questions, as well as make strange and new friends along the way! Engage in the day-to-day life in this brave new world, all the while making connections with your fellow Furries and Scalies that will determine your future. Because nobody goes it alone.

A visual novel format with choices per scene. Not every choice will lead to massive change, but it will determine your friendship levels with each individual that you spend time with. Part Adventure, part Dating Sim, all weird and wild.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1349170/Furries__Scalies__Bears_OH_MY_2_Return_to_Kale_Bay/]Steam[/url]]
title: Furries & Scalies & Bears OH MY! 2: Return to Kale Bay

description: An adventure/horror visual novel heavily inspired by Radical Dreamers for the Satellaview.
title: Hurricane
Lara's Escape
description: Lara Croft attempts to escape from a yacht.

title: Kirameki no Hane no Biyondetta
description:
He was gravely injured in a traffic accident. An angel seemed to appear before him.

"Do you want my help? I want something in exchange......"

This angel was in fact Biyondetta, the queen of the netherworld.

"You will concentrate your white essence for two weeks.
It belongs to me. I will take it when it is ready."

Each night Biyondetta visited him, slurping and stroking and frotting his engorged member.
She brought him to the loving brink of explosion, but he was absolutely forbidden to cum.
The potent sperm accumulated... tantrically sealed in aching balls.

And finally, sweet release. Together they ascended to a new level.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE129775.html]DLsite English[/url]]

"The goddess who promised to marry me when I was a child...!?"

In order to shorten the commuting time to school (five hours round trip!), which had been bothering him, the protagonist, Kotarou, ends up living in his grandparents' mansion.

What awaits him there is a girl named Lilium, who calls herself: "Your wife"

She is the girl Kotarou promised to marry when he was still a child. What's more, she's a goddess——!?

"From Good Mornings to Good Nights, please leave all of it to the Goddess♪"

[Edited from [url=http://www.baristalab.jp/story/]Official Website[/url]]
title: Lilium Wedding Plan

description:
Soul Union takes place in a world of elves and magic.  It tells the story of a cynical magic weaver named Ilyon.  After volunteering to undergo an unknown ritual, he awakes to find himself trapped in a manifestation of his own psyche, his soul labyrinth.  Thankfully he is not alone, as his teacher prepared a stranger to serve as his vassal.  Using power, empathy and logic, he must confront the deepest unknown parts of himself if he is to successfully escape. 

[Taken from [URL=https://coffeedripstudios.itch.io/soul-union]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Soul Union

description: You are a mild-mannered PhD candidate studying superheroes. More specifically, how they form bonds in high-risk situations. That is, until another you from an alternate Earth contacts you and warns you against the impending destruction of the Earth at the hands of Gidheron, Eater of Possibilities. To stop Gidheron, you need to find the Possibility Stone and you need two heroes to wield it. And they need to be in love.
title: Mission: It's Complicated

description:
Chloe is a young hacker who seeks to help her missing friend Rebecka in a militarized near-future biotech city. With political intrigue and private police surveillance at large, how will Chloe find her friends, her people, and influence an increasingly constrained society? How can they build a place of belonging again?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/928000/Solace_State_Emotional_Cyberpunk_Stories/]Steam[/url]]
title: Solace State
aliases: Solace State: Histoires émouvantes de cyberpunk
ソレイス・ステイト：情動のサイバーパンク物語
Solace State: Historias emotivas de ciberpunk
迷城寻心:赛博朋克故事
迷城尋心:賽博朋克故事

description:
"Vain Riser" is an AVG developed by Team Strrationalism. In the game, girls gather in the Victorian coastal town "Golden Sand Town" to achieve their dream of flying into the blue sky step by step. The youthful journey, however, was completely corrupted by the successive emergence of mysterious figures. Entanglements within family-ship and friendship gradually surfaced during these young girls' research, and the misted truth must be revealed. What was hidden in the past history of Golden Sand Town?

Perhaps the story will remind you of the days when you had nothing and even confused about the future but still struggling to work hard, the days during which you grow up with your relatives' help. Though the destination may be too illusory to reach, one will finally be more clearer when facing themselves.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1059850/Vain_Riser/]Steam[/url]]
title: Kongmeng
Maniac Circle Hakusho ~Hentai Shukujo-tachi no Monogatari~
description:
The story of four heroines who belong to the “Pervert Club,” a maniacal circle of serious adult perverted gentlemen and ladies.

The story of each of the girls who are currently active in the circle is depicted, including their daily lives, their motives for joining the circle, and how they came to be in it.

There are a total of four stories, one each from the heroine's point of view, focusing on each of the heroines, with each taking the lead role.

This is a six-part visual novel that continues to the story of the heroines' gathering at the circle, and finally the current story at the circle.

From [url=http://www.cyberworks.jp/wendybell/circle/Concept&Story.html]official site[/url]]

title: Densetsu no Yuusha to Saiyaku no Maou no Ren'ai Jijou ~Yuusha wa Maou no Haha ni, Maou wa Yuusha no Mama ni Koi o Shita~
description:
On his journey, the hero met a beautiful woman with a sorrowful expression.
Meanwhile, the demon king, while burning down a village, fell head over heels for a spirited woman at first sight.

The hero fell in love with the demon king’s mother.
The demon king was captivated by the hero’s mother.
The two women they loved soon realized who the other was.
Though guilt toward their sons gnawed at them, they couldn’t turn away from the pleasure and love they found.

And so, they didn't stop, even as they knew the men they loved were destined to kill each other…

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/pro/work/=/product_id/VJ014409.html/]dlsite[/url]]

title: The Sound of Fireworks: The Haiku
description:
The Sound of Fireworks: The Haiku is the first part of a (hopeful) trilogy following the friendships, hardships, and path of Amimi, an 18 year old student who's recent move from home has left her succumbed to a new high school and new life without the friends she's had by her side. But as a few weeks pass by, Amimi gets to know Uta, another student recently transferred living the same issues that Amimi is going through. While the chemistry is, well, off to say the least, a budding friendship is soon to be made, and Amimi's high school life will change: like the night sky from the bang of a Firework.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1534630/The_Sound_of_Fireworks_The_Haiku/]Steam[/url]]

Leah, the count's daughter, lives a carefree life until she falls under the curse of an evil hex. Will someone help her remove it, or will she have to take fate into her own hands?.. paws?

This is a sweet story about a cheerful heroine. Each character with whom you can build a relationship has its own little secret. In addition to Rion - he is simply incomparable and will not leave you indifferent. Magic, deadly dangers, friendship and romance are waiting for you.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1553740/]Steam[/url]]
title: Princessa Koshek

description:
Two girls from another dimension have appeared in your room! And it's raining sakura petals...? What is going on?

Find out more about the girls as you try to find a way back to their own dimensions. Or... would you like them to stay with you instead?

Win your girl's heart by talking, writing or battling into their heart!

[Taken from the [URL=https://www.sakuradimensions.com/]official website[/URL]]
title: Sakura Dimensions
My Girlfriend's Friends
description:
You are a freelance programmer who recently got a girlfriend.

You are going to slowly befriend your girlfriends friends and maybe something more will develop out of it.​

title: Harem Night ~Futari no Neko to Okosamazukuri!?~
description:
It was business as usual in your life as a freelance writer, until you were tasked with writing about your first sexual experience. You try your best, but how can you write about something that never happened?

There is a knock at your door. Who could it be?

Standing at your doorstep, drenched from the rain, is a young, beautiful... catgirl?! She seems to know you, yet you have no recollection of her. She claims to be on a devine mission - to make a baby with you! But she's not the only unexpected guest. A second catgirl shows up soon after with the same higher calling...

This must be a dream, right? Well, you might as well have some fun while you find out.

[From [url=https://jastusa.com/games/jast045]JAST USA[/url]]

title: Seirei no Nemuru Mori - Forest Of Fate
Dialtown
description:
Dialtown is a dating sim where most people have phones for heads. Women have typewriters. Also, dogs have gramophones for heads. Aaaand, cats have keyboards. The list goes on. Yeah, I'm being serious right now. No, put that straitjacket away.

The game's a visual novel where you wander around the town of Dialtown, seeking romance, all because you want someone to pay you into a funfair, all so you can find a dank pit in which to lay your eggs. Yeah.

There's several dateable protagonists, from Karen, a bored bank-teller printer who's extremely dissatisfied with her life and just wants to feel things again, to Randy, who juggles working as an operator for a local phone sex hotline and working as a bird-wrangler for animal-control.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1035990/]Steam[/url]]

title: Story-Time at Freddy's
description:
As the name suggested, the game tells a story (with choices that the player can make) about a man named Jeff who was hired at the Utah Location.

[From [url=https://dayshift-at-freddys.fandom.com/wiki/Story-Time_at_Freddy%27s]Dayshift at Freddy's Wikia[/url]]
Following the king's death, the commoner Maria must help her friend Princess Collette gain the support of the Regency Council over her rival, Prince Adelin, so that Collette can become queen.
title: Naked Ambition
When Stars Fall
description:
When Stars Fall is a gay (semi-linear-leaning-toward-non-linear) furry visual novel dating sim set in the fantasy world of Eamia. The main character, Marcus Carver (customizable) wakes up in an empty field with no memories save for his name. On his journey to find answers, he finds himself enrolled in an academy for adventurers and meets a few different persons of interest who may help or hinder his search for his lost memories. In this tale will Marcus find his answers, make new friends or foes, find love or sorrow? The choices are up to you.

As the story progresses Marcus meets four datable characters (with a fifth to join sometime after January) who can be friend or foe depending on the choices made.

[From [url=https://mattmalificum.itch.io/when-stars-fall]Itch.io[/url]]

Trying to get away from trouble, June moves to a small town... to find even more trouble! Oh my, why do these embarrassing situations just keep on happening?!

It appears June's new house is haunted! And if that wasn't bad enough, seems like she's being pursued by a female stalker! The strange girl is sure looking good, but what about her intentions? And what's up with those strange dreams June started seeing since she moved in? And, most importantly, are there fox-girls involved?!

[Taken from [URL=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1555110/Chasing_Tails_A_Promise_in_the_Snow/]Steam[/URL]]
title: Chasing Tails -A Promise in the Snow-

description:
[url=/c53830]Periwinkle[/url] is a witch who makes perfumes for a living and spends his free time dressing up, partying, and sleeping around. When he meets a cute boy named [url=/c97254]Pastille[/url] in a candy store, he finds himself growing much more attached to Pastille than to any of his previous dates, which is a feeling he is not used to at all. However, they agreed to keep their relationship casual, so surely nothing will ever come of it...?

[Edited from [url=https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/VisualNovel/StarryFlowers]TvTropes[/url]]
title: Starry Flowers
Krasotki, otstan'te! Ja lish' hochu smotret' anime i igrat' v videoigry! Hentaj izdanie
description: You want to find a girl, but you are constantly distracted by something. Right during dates, you receive notifications about the premiere of a new series of your favorite anime, or about the release of the long-awaited game, or about a sudden Vtuber's stream. You know how to prioritize correctly, so you should get rid of the girl on a date as quickly and less painfully as possible... or succumb to temptation?

title: Give an Imp a Chance!
description:
Give an imp a chance is a new visual novel about John Johnson, a frustrated salaryman. After weeks of preparation, he is finally ready to summon a succubus. However, he botches the ritual and summons an imp. Despite his initial disappointment, the imp begs him to give her a chance.

GAIAC has multiple hentai scenes and several startling transformations, along with a light hearted story about demon summoning and how dramatically life can change when you meet the right person.

title: Army of Tentacles: (Not) A Cthulhu Dating Sim 2
description:
Humanity was destined to fall.
Your people, the Great Old Ones, were legends among the humans. Tales were told about their might, and whispers rose of how they would one day claim the entire human planet as their own. Of how mankind would simply go insane at the very sight of their malevolent beauty. Finally, the day came for the armies of the unspeakable horrors to rise.

But this isn't that tale.

You are the B Squad, a band of misfit monsters deemed too unworthy to fight in the Battle of Innsmouth, the conflict that has been planned as the first stage of monster domination over the humans. But you'll show them. You'll show everyone! You are a tough band of monsters! Yeah, you're so scary!

Traverse the town of Innsmouth, the local college of Miskatonic University, the dark caves and corners of the planet where no mortal fears to go, all in the name of carving out your own legend! Er, legends, as there are a lot of other people in your squad, too.

[From [URL=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1082690/]Steam[/URL]]

title: Sklepik z Ciasteczkami
description:
Running a cafe is not an easy job. Especially when you're not making profits.

[Taken from [URL=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1461500]Steam[/URL]]

title: Josou de Sennyuu! Futanari Senmon Esute ~Ochitara Ikenai Gokujou Massage~
description:
To preserve his school's strict regulations, the disciplinary committee chairman protagonist
cross-dresses, and infiltrates a certain massage parlor where students are rumored to be working.
However, he ends up receiving a free trial massage from the manager, and soon,
he can't hide his boner...

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE316793.html]DLsite English[/url]]
aliases: Sneaking with Crossdressing Costume! Futanari Aesthetic Salon

title: ValiDate: Struggling Singles in Your Area
description:
ValiDate is a visual novel in which you maneuver yourself through the twisting paths of young adulthood.

Set in the Jercy City area, twelve struggling singles in their twenties navigate through the trying ordeals of capitalism to find meaning in their lives. Includes a hint of love, cosplay, and even mediocre mixtapes in the mix. 

[Taken from [URL=https://validategame.itch.io/validate-demo]itch.io[/URL]]

A new coffee shop suddenly opened in the city. On-time, because Visa really needs a moonlighting. She gets a job with her classmates: cheerful Frank and quiet Estr. What could possibly be wrong?

[Taken from [URL=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1268200/]Steam[/URL]]
title: Espresso For The Demon

description: You just got assigned team of the best adventurers on the travel following North Star. Will one of them become your love?
title: North Star
At Eve's Wake
description:
At Eve's Wake is an interactive horror story inspired by Lovecraft's work about surviving a family you never knew and uncovering their sinister practices. Will you embrace them or rid humanity of their taint? Your actions will shape your fate and that of the family.

---

Raised by your mother, you’ve never known your family. Her sudden passing left you with many questions she never answered you: Why can’t I remember my family? Why did she split with the family? What happened to my father?

Until that letter arrived; your grandmother had passed away. Here you are now, letter in hand, before the gates of the family estate. At what should be just a funeral and nothing more.

Soon you realize why your mother left, as you are thrown into a gauntlet of fire — for a new successor must come. The time for Convergence has begun...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1395120/At_Eves_Wake/]Steam[/url]]

title: Neighbors by Chance
description: Yuuhi’s days are dull and grey, brightened only by the gacha game she plays religiously. She avoids everyone—even the new neighbor next door—until she can’t anymore, and she learns that said neighbor is… her long-lost best friend from third grade?!

title: Black Heaven: A Necromantic Dating Sim
description:
In Black Heaven, you’re a former scholar and one of the last survivors of a plague that’s destroyed the world you used to know. 

After nearly succumbing to the disease, your life is saved by a mysterious necromancer named No-Eyes, who offers you the chance to escape death forever and relive your past. All he asks are the souls of your former classmates:

 - Ru, your shy but brilliant tutor
 - Lyse, the fiery, sharp-witted debutante 
 - Izagi, the idealistic and stoic martial artist

As you return to the ruined academy where you spent your happiest days, you’re haunted by the pleasant memories of your old friends, and the line between memory and madness becomes dangerously blurred.

[From [URL=https://oldnoeyes.itch.io/black-heaven]itch.io[/URL]]

The Good Queen has passed, as all must. The burden to rule falls now to The Naïve Heir, and their table of knights.

To You, and your advisors.

[From [url=https://sweetheartsquad.itch.io/round-table]itch.io[/url]]
title: ROUND TABLE

aliases: いもうとちゃんと!With my little sister!
title: Imouto-chan to! With my little sister!

description:
Our lives are not like before. Everyone must get used to new way of living.
You're stuck within four walls but it doesn't mean you can't creatively spend your free time! 

But the question remains. What should you do today?

[Taken from [URL=https://pryzmat.itch.io/lockdown]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Lockdown
You've Bean on My Mind
description:
"You've bean on my mind" is a romantic visual novel, with an unusual gameplay element. Try it out for yourself, keep your hand ready on WASD, and let us know if you'd like to see more chapters, content and overall polish added to the game!

[From [url=https://woutervanvugt.itch.io/youve-bean-on-my-mind]Itch.io[/url]]

"Have you ever heard a myth about cafes that turn back time?”

I no longer care about anything after what happened two years ago. I made a mistake... and now I lost the most important person in my life. I don't think I deserve anything. I’m simply disgusted with myself. Guilt, regret, and loss... they will haunt me for eternity. Even the gift I have for him is meaningless now.

Mina is a shy girl who lost her dearest one. Guilt, regret, and sadness haunt her after that accident, causing her to blame herself. Two years has passed and she's still trapped in her past. Two days before Valentine’s day, she meets Taku, a waiter who introduced her to a cafe named EDDA. Dragged by her little curiosity and her friend's compulsion, she finds out that through magic in that cafe, she was given a second chance. Will it save her heart? Will she move forward or stay in the past?

“And when the coffee starts to drip, the magic begins...”

[From [url=https://mushroomallow.itch.io/edda-cafe]Itch.io[/url]]
title: EDDA Café
Without You
description:
You are a student who tried to take advantage of all his opportunities to get a girlfriend and failed disastrously, and now it depends on your decisions that this last year of school is wiil be different.

[From [url=https://renzofly.itch.io/without-you]Itch.io[/url]]

Runa is the new kid at school, so she's a bit confused about the whole "making friends" thing. I mean, who wouldn't be confused when the ceiling vents are haunted, her classmates are recreating the French revolution in the school bathrooms, and the student council is run by a power-hungry chuunibyou of 4-foot-2? Seriously, who put that kid in charge!

 Completely against her will, Runa goes on an admirable (and whacky) quest to save Valentine's Day in the name of love. Or something else. She's not very keen on the whole idea.

[From [url=https://kale-chips.itch.io/super-choco-win-the-game]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Operation: Val-O-Gram
The Colors of Love
description:
The Colors of Love narrates the story of a teenager that is unmotivated in life. He's healthy, has two good friends, both of his loving parents and does well at school.

However, he feels empty. Feels that life is boring. That even though he's doing well, it's not enough.

That's until he finally falls in love for the first time in his life.

What kind of new things will he experience?

Will he find some motivation thanks to his new love interest?

Will he be able to overcome the obstacles that life has in store for him?

[From [url=https://aldoram5.itch.io/the-colors-of-love]Itch.io[/url]]

Astor got pushed by his sister on a trip to Heavenly Mist, a mountain with   romantic  legends.  As he accidentally  got in to a strange place, his only companion  a mysterious man, what would be  the outcome of this encounter?

[From [url=https://saitoki.itch.io/the-legend-of-heavenly-mist]Itch.io[/url]]
title: The Legend of Heavenly Mist
Monochrome Valentine
description:
"It tends to hit us by surprise, doesn't it? When a relationship ends, our lives can change so drastically. This is the story of Blake N Lawrence and his chance encounter with the endlessly positive, Selena."

5 chapters Manga-style Romance Story of a chance encounter after depressive break-up.

title: Pumpkin Spice Café
description: Become a barista and talk with Café’s customers. Who knows? Maybe you'll change someone's life?

title: She's a Bit Sluggish
description:
A simple story of a date between a copper robot weeb and a beleaguered slug girl. Nothing can possibly go wrong.

[From [URL=https://cavemanon.itch.io/shes-a-bit-sluggish]itch.io[/URL]]

title: Deformed Heroine ~Jibakurei no Doukyonin~
description:
A man finds an extremely cheap place to rent and immediately moved in.
But the house he is staying in is haunted by a mischievous girl...

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE221020.html]DLsite English[/url]]

title: Far Beyond the World
description:
"Wake up!" says the voice and you open your eyes in a strange cabin in the woods with only vague recollection of the life you've left behind. Despite appearances, you know that something isn't quite right. 

Set on an adventure, trying to piece together the puzzle of your past, as well as forge a new life among the Wolves of Avalan as you try to steer clear of their tribal politics. Your heart will be your compass, but can you trust your feelings when they're so easily clouded? Love can be both a boon and a distraction. Choose your friends carefully and your enemies more careful still.

You had one life already… there might not be a third.

[From [url=https://echoesofarcane.itch.io/farbeyondtheworld]Itch.io page[/url]]

title: Fuyou no Joudo ni Okitamau
description:
In a certain city that was flexibly developing...

A vagrant named Mi Tao and her childhood friend Ryou used to live in the slums together but due to political reasons, the slums were demolished. Nowadays, Mi Tao works at a strip theater as a dancer and the two live in an apartment. In the past, Ryou was addicted to illicit drugs but he's now being cared for by Mi Tao and is trying to get clean. 

One day, the very wealthy Utsubushi sees Mi Tao perform, falls in love with her at first sight and begins to follow her around. He said to her:

"Perhaps someone like yourself isn't meant to be in a place like this."

Little by little, Ryou and Mi Tao's relationship falls apart.

[Translation of [url=https://succulent01.wixsite.com/huyoudo]official website story summary[/url]]

Conversations and events.

[From [url=https://hubol.itch.io/hubol-got-emotionally-poisoned-in-iowa]itch.io[/url]]
title: Hubol got emotionally poisoned in Iowa

description:
Your Divine gave you one last chance to repent for your crimes.
Will you obey her command and break her free, or will you defy her wishes for the last time?
title: Oathbreaker: Season 2

description:
Based on the hit Shonen Sunday manga and anime.

At the age of nine, Megumi is an aggressive boy prone to always fighting. One day he saves a strange man from a gang of other children. In return, Megumi receives a magical book. After accidentally bleeding on the book, a genie named Pierrot appears and offers to grant him a wish. Megumi wishes to become a strong man's man. Pierrot, a trickster, inadvertently turns Megumi into a woman. Megumi, furious, throws the book into the riverbank. Believing the only way to reverse the spell is to retrieve the book, Megumi begins a 6-year-long search but is told that she can find the book if she attends Furinkan High School.

[from [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cheeky_Angel]Wikipedia[/url]]
title: Tenshi na Konamaiki
Pillars on Poppy Hills
description: Atop the poppy hills are ruins to what was once revered and feared. One man wants to paint this scenery, while another wants to research it, while the forgotten god wants to have silence once and for all.

title: Jie Di
description:
In the year 3059, the furries are about to release new civilian technology products, and the Homo sapiens alliance has already obtained information about the military power they are flaunting and expanding behind. Under this threat, the hacker group hired by the Homo Sapiens Alliance secretly investigated that the highest technology of the furries was a set of super computing interactive modules [Empty Infinity]. The hacker group's crack team also went to the free countries at this time, attempting to crack and master the core of the system of the [Empty Infinity].

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1543330/]Steam[/url]]

aliases: ホーンテッド・オバケストラ Vol.1
title: Haunted Obachestra Vol.1 Awaking
description:
A multi-media project by Poni-Pachet.

Set in Tokyo, the fictional Ayakashi Ward, where humans and monsters coexisting.

Nasu Yukiha, a second-year high school sophomore from Aomori Prefecture came alone to Tokyo, encountered the monsters and lives their springtime of youth together.

The first volume gives a closer look on [url=/c96022]Exnaz von Enterstein[/url] and [url=/c96023]Merry Christhrnova[/url].

Fantasy Trainer puts the player in the shoes of a prodigal soldier who's just been tasked with overseeing a newly conquered kingdom and convincing the Princess to give up her right to the throne. In this medieval Fantasy you'll come across Orcs, Drows, Elves and Human women who you'll either develop a relationship with, or make use of right away if you know what I mean.

[Edited from [URL=https://www.patreon.com/KyleMercury/posts]Patreon[/URL]]
title: Fantasy Trainer
Paper Shakespeare: Very Naked Hamlet
description:
We've all had that nightmare where we're back in college, on stage, naked, and absolutely failing at performing Shakespeare's Hamlet. Now it is in video game form! You wake up in a strange dorm room, with a strange cat boy or cat girl roommate, depending on what gender you picked during character creation. Everything looks funky, probably because of all the backgrounds are pre-made art assets. Before you know it, you are thrust into a week of Shakespearian thrills, chills, and literature! Survive the entire week and hope to wake from this dramatic nightmare, where you go to school during the day, but perform a play that you keep forgetting the lines to by night!

In this visual novel/dating sim/anxiety simulator, either know the entire text of Hamlet, or perish. Only don't really perish. There's no fail state for not knowing Hamlet. You just might not get laid.

[From [URL=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1312380/]Steam[/URL]]

In a fairy tale world where the Queens rule with the power of magic, the princesses are sent out to rescue the princes in need!

Princess Amaltea is sent out on this quest, and rescues Prince Ossian. They are both unwilling to play along in these traditional expectations of them, and after fleeing their own wedding they are now out on the open roads – on to new adventures in this gender flipped world!

This Visual Novel game is a stand-alone sequel to the manga Sword Princess Amaltea, made by the Swedish manga artist Natalia Batista.

[Edited from [URL=https://senpaimediagroup.itch.io/swordprincessamaltea]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Sword Princess Amaltea

description:
The protagonist and Kazuyori are two lovers who started dating by chance.
Their hobbies and tastes are complete opposites, but they get along very well and spend their days enjoying each other's company.

However, the main character has a little problem.

Kazuyori was cheerful, kind to everyone, and generous, but at the same time, she was uninhibited and defenseless.

She liked to dress flamboyantly, and it was not uncommon for her underwear to be visible.
When her classmates see her and point it out, she just laughs it off.

As he remembers this, he struggles to figure out what this feeling is and how to express it...

[Translated from the [url=http://www.at-sakura.net/ntr/brand/083/index.html]official website[/url]]
title: Gyarukano! ~Wagamama Body na Honpou Kanojo~

description: At school, Mishima meets a mysterious pair of twins. They seem to recognise her, but she doesn't know why.
title: Venus Flytrap

description: The main character joins a female theatre company.
title: Yotsuba Struck -Spring-

description: The main character injures her leg a few weeks before an important theater performance.
title: Yotsuba Struck -Summer-
Aso-BD Dokidoki Taikenban!
description: A free promotional Blu-Ray disc designed to promote the Aso-BD line. Includes a Kud Wafter trial and a Saya no Uta demo video, as well as a short, fully voiced story featuring the mascot of the line, Aono Rei aka Blue Luminous.

title: Loli-Pop!
description:
Have you ever dreamed of having a romantic encounter with a Loli? Well my friend this is your chance!

Dive right into this passionate story of forbidden love with Mochi, one of your students and feel yourself fall for this bubbly girl.

Will you let the inquisitive eyes of society destroy both of your dreams, or will you fight for love?

[From [URL=https://variousartists.itch.io/loli-pop]itch.io[/URL]]

Join the Various Artists in an informative masterclass on making the essential food: a sandwich!

[Taken from [URL=https://variousartists.itch.io/]itch.io[/URL]]
title: How to Make a Sandwich

description:
Protagonist who was brutally murdered must proffer a confession from her killer in order to cross over to the other side. Her trials begin anew after her death. Walk alongside her in this story of betrayal, conspiracy and love… 

[From [url=https://bigdeal.itch.io/hereaftercompleteversion]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Hereafter

description:
What rests beyond the darkness of lies is a light so bright that it blinds those who do not wish to see it and becomes a guide to those who search for it, what will you choose to be?    

In a world where there are Humans, Vampires and Hunters, you are born in a hunter family. Unable to cast spells, you can only wield Hunter weapons, betrothed to a fellow clansman, you await the same fate all of the hunter women are supposed to meet, but what happens when you run into someone you are supposed to kill?

[From [url=https://bigdeal.itch.io/mer]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Mercurial

description:
Wish upon a star and fold me a thousand paper cranes, hold my hand and walk on the trajectory of eternity by my side, for I ask only one thing of you, your forever…

You run an ordinary antique shop in a small city of Japan, living your life like a normal person would that is until you save a stranger from freezing to death in a cold winter night…

[From [url=https://bigdeal.itch.io/untilyou]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Until You

description:
You, the Protagonist, betrayed by her own father, is fated to live a life worse than death. Betrayed and used as a tool, to fulfill the whimsical wishes of her family to attain profitable gains. Join her in her journey to find true love and emancipation from the shackles of relations holding her down. 

[From [url=https://bigdeal.itch.io/a-cage-of-gold-a-love-story-episode-01]Itch.io[/url]]
title: A Cage of Gold A Love Story
Obsession
description:
The story revolves around you (the Protagonist) who struggles in her life after the untimely demise of her husband. She has to put up with her husband’s brothers who have taken it upon themselves to make her life even more miserable.

One of his brothers is obsessed with her while the other one blames her for his brother’s death.

This is an exciting journey which will take you on a trajectory full of emotions and betrayals during your search for love and comfort…

[From [url=https://bigdeal.itch.io/obsession-the-complete-version]Itch.io[/url]]

The thing about lies is that once you start lying, every little lie entails a presence of its own and that presence cannot be denied by any means, whether you close your eyes, put your hands on your ears to block away the whispers, the presence looms in the shadow over you…

[From [url=https://bigdeal.itch.io/beautifullybroken]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Beautifully Broken
Under The Blue Sky
description:
When you are sacked from your previous job, you lose everything, your apartment, bank-balance and the lifestyle you were used to up until now. Without any means of subsistence and in a dire need to save money, you move to a dilapidated apartment complex, but life isn’t easy in that place, especially when a guy who lives in the same apartment complex is hell-bent on making your life miserable with his sharp tongue and bovine nature.  

Your best friend, Yui brings you good news about a job opening in a well-known group of companies, following her advice; you apply for the job and secure a position for yourself.

Once you join the company you uncover very dark secrets which involve the boss and his underlings. You begin suspecting the boss when he targets you with his sexual harassment, eventually you find out his true motives.

[From [url=https://bigdeal.itch.io/under-the-blue-sky-demo]Itch.io[/url]]

Play as a jellyfish in an underwater world filled with anthropomorphic fish.

You've been hired by Boss, a finance shark, to convince Mairead, the owner of an independent bar, to leave the establishment and sell it to Boss !

Look for info by talking to different characters and by clicking on interactive elements. But beware, your time is limited, so don't linger too much on insignificant details or the bar will get destroyed !

So, will you do what Boss Hired you to do or will you help Mairead to save her bar ?

[From [url=https://fadagames.itch.io/conque-promis]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Conque-Promis

description: You are a burgeoning writer that is living well from inheritance. Rashad and Lindsay are your best friends and have stuck with you through good times and bad. Now you have met a young woman named Sarah with a mysterious past. Will you be kind or manipulative? How close will you stay with your friends? The choices are yours to make.
title: From Darkness
church on the hill
description: Anna, a girl who believes she's cursed, meets Drew, a boy who struggles with his faith in God.

title: ToHeart
description:
In this game, you play as Fujita Hiroyuki, a high-school student who seems to have more interest in romance than in his studies. In his school there are several pretty girls, and his goal is to be nice to one of them, to make the right decisions when talking to her, and ultimately to win her heart.

[From [url=http://www.mobygames.com/game/playstation/to-heart]Mobygames[/url]]

Remake of the original PC version featuring a completely revised script, with some of the heroines having completely different stories as a result, full voice acting for all characters except the protagonist, new art, and mini-games.

In the rainy city of New Stone, Blake, an average office worker at the world's leading tech company ICC, finds his world turned upside down when a series of events incriminate him and cause him to question what to do and who he should become.

[Taken from [URL=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1538680/]Steam[/URL]]
title: Blake: The Visual Novel
Her Sign
description:
Rika arrives in the cold, rural town of Kovsrahan with one mission: she must locate Vasil Rovenski, a xenobiologist who disappeared from a research laboratory in space many years ago. He may hold the key to unraveling the sinister secret kept in the laboratory.

Time is of the essence, but the man is nowhere to be found. Instead, Rika is ambushed by two delinquent women who seem to know more than they should. What is it they want? Will Rika's mission end in failure?

[From [url=https://cryoslight.itch.io/her-sign]itch.io[/url]]

title: Pervert's Paradise
description:
Alan is a single guy who recently turned 25 and decided to leave the small town where he lived to try life in the big city. With little money and without having attended colleges, he simply took the few savings he had and went to try life in the great metropolis of Esidarap (fictitious name). Even with little money he was greedy and rented a room in a mansion, super perverted, fan of exhibitionism and a charismatic manipulator, Alan will try to transform his life.

[From [url=https://caxrgames.itch.io/perverts-paradise]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Blue Christmas
description: You've died on Christmas Eve and now you must navigate a conversation with the guardian of the afterlife who has been sent to collect your soul.

Follow the story of Ellie and Wanda as they work to catch the mysterious species, The Wumpus, using their newfound, "scientific" magical powers.

[From [url=https://nyanbacon.itch.io/are-you-certain-about-that]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Are You Certain About That?

description: Kuroyuri is a girl who distrusts men. It's been half a year since she entered her dream boarding school for girls. She's having a great time and she's planning to confess her feelings to her best friend...
title: FAKE LILY
Namari no Majo
description: You're an apprentice witch, and you're about to graduate. Travel to the strange forest, the ominous underground, and the mysterious house!

title: Mystery House
description:
Mystery House is likely the very first Japanese full-scale text adventure game with pictures. The game is inspired by [url=/v26969]Hi-Res Adventure #1: Mystery House[/url] and although it uses the same name and gameplay, there is no Agatha Christie-esque subplot, no competitors and the player is alone. The objective of the game is to find a treasure that is hidden somewhere in the house and then escape with it. Several items can be found around the house that can be picked up and used in order to proceed. There are also various hazards that will kill the player's character if not careful enough.

[From [url=https://www.mobygames.com/game/mystery-house]Mobygames[/url]]

title: DATING START!
description:
Fall into the Underground and fall in love with Sans the skeleton! You can also befriend others along the way! Have fun spending more time with the monsters you've grown to love!

[From [url=https://derpychocho.itch.io/dating-start]itch.io.[/url]]

Stellis, a city that rose from the clash of civilizations.

Modern tech has given it its radiant neon lights but also cast long shadows of obscurity. Lately, there has been an abnormal increase in the number of mental illness cases as well as incidents that threaten Stellis' social security.

Many gentle and good people of Stellis have somehow grown violent and volatile.
These incidents may have been recorded, but they are often drowned out in a flood of data.
Yet someone took notice of them and compiled them for detailed analysis...
Codenamed "X-NOTE", the project aims to peel away layers of obscuring data and reveal the hidden truth beneath.

When all is put on the scales of the law before Lady Justice, you will be the one to weigh their crimes in the balance.

[Taken from [url=https://tot.mihoyo.com/en-us/story]Official site[/url]]
title: Weiding Shijian Bu
Sutoraiku High
description:
Sutoraiku High is a visual novel about drama, friendships, prejudice, bullying, total societal upheaval, and high school romance - by which I mean it is a Scyther dating sim. Have you always wanted to date a Scyther? Stand against abusive authorities alongside a revolutionary-minded Scizor? You have come to the right video game.

[From [url=https://www.dragonflycave.com/sutoraiku-high]author's description[/url]]

As the sun rises for yet another Valentine’s Day at the Blooming Buds Flower Shop, Viola must prepare both herself and the store for those who seek to show their love to someone. And what better way is there to show that your love is in bloom than with a bouquet of flowers?

[From [url=https://astrigera.itch.io/blooming-buds]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Blooming Buds
Hexed Pet: Hamster
description:
Micah loves pets so he was ecstatic when his grandma gave him a pet hamster to take care of. But one day when he returned home from school, he discovered that his pet is missing! Instead there was a naked man on his bed with...Hamster EARS?!

There he discovered that his pet was actually human. An unfortunate soul who got cursed and transformed into a rodent. The hexed individual had lost all his memories of when he was human, now thinks he's a hamster! Micah then learnt the reason why his grandmother gave him the hamster was because Micah himself, is a witch. A good witch. A white magic practitioner. And his first task? Is to help the cursed man recover his memories and turn him back fully into a human.

Maybe somehow, their feelings could develop into something?

[From [url=https://crownea-vn.itch.io/hexedpet-hamster]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Aquarium Girl
description: Bad habits bring Denis to the hospital, and upon returning home he sees a girl in his bed with no signs of life. Everything turns out to be not as creepy as it seems at first glance.

title: My Celestial Journey
description:
In the year 20XX, space travel and exploration is a common occurrence. Astronauts venture to other planets and meet aliens for trade and treaty. Our player is one of them, he/she sets out for a mission on day but unexpectedly finds romance across galaxies.

[From [url=https://crownea-vn.itch.io/my-celestial-journey-earlydemo]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Demons Rise Up!
description:
Demons Rise Up! is a kinetic futanari visual novel about a pro-gamer named Suzy who summons a succubus through a cursed video game created by developers from the pits of hell. After a night of lovemaking with her creation, the succubus decides to bring along some of her demon friends for some multiplayer action. There's just one problem! After finding Suzy playing on her console, it's now up to the three demons to push her away from her gaming session so that she can push them onto her bed! Can they do it? Read and find out! 

[From [url=https://berryguild.itch.io/demons]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Konglomerat
description:
The Fukushima Exclusion Zone on the brink of winter.
Four people are there.

A returnee who decided to visit his abandoned ancestral home.
A scientist who has lost faith in humanity and herself.
A schoolgirl on her last journey.
And a criminal who finds himself back where he committed his first murder.

So different, so unlike one another, will they all be able to gather around the same campfire? Or will their respective journeys end in yet another tragedy, in a place where thousands of lives have already been cut short?

[translated from [url=https://unming.itch.io/conglomerate]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Serenity
description:
Serenity is a kinetic, adult visual novel. You lose your mother to cancer after caring for her for 5 years. She left you a magical book that transports you to Serenity Island... a paradise with nekos, romance, and adventure.

Serenity is about love, forgiveness, and acceptance in a world where pleasure feeds your magic, enabling you to build your paradise to live in peace with a harem of nekos, demons, and more. If you enjoy AVNs with a good-hearted MC, harem, nekos, comedy, romance, and just a touch of drama, then you're in the right place. Good wholesome and sexy fun is waiting!

[From [URL=https://n2thefire.itch.io/serenity]itch.io[/URL]]

People receive a book when they are born. A play that includes all about their world, meaning of life, and destiny. It's called Book of Fate, which people use to follow the stories narrated by a Storyteller. They portray and act out the roles written in the book from their birth, until their death.

The story follows the adventures of Ex and his friends (whose Books of Fate are completely blank) through various fairy tale worlds in order to defeat the Fortem Cult, a mysterious organization that seeks to free people from whatever pre-written fate the Storytellers had in mind for them.

The game was originally an online game whose service ended in June 17, 2020. This offline version was re-released with its gameplay system removed, but all of its cutscenes were made available to read.

Before playing Grimms Notes, it is recommended to have an episode list in hand so you can follow the story from beginning to end without missing anything, since the majority of chapters are not listed in chronological order. [url=https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Recap/GrimmsNotes]Here is one[/url].
title: Grimms Notes
Dungeon Friends
description:
Join Pepsi and Fritte on their roleplay adventure as they travel through a dungeon inhabited by some droll folks.

[Taken from [URL=https://deaundfroggy.itch.io/dungeon-friends]itch[/URL]]

You're an executive assistant - starting today!
The charming, talented executives and a rival who shows up out of the blue - want to know: whose assistant do you want to be?
title: Senzoku Hisho Otona no Koi

description:
Minecraft Lovehunt is a free-to-play visual novel that was made to celebrate Valentine's Day with the Dream Team fanbase! With 9 endings to go through, I sure hope you're in for a ride.

[From [URL=https://kiolite.itch.io/minecraft-lovehunt]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Minecraft Lovehunt

description:
The story centers around Lorys, a girl who is a part of an uncommon fire species and an exile from her father's southern island.

In order to avoid execution, she agreed never to step foot on the island again, and live out the rest of her days in the north. She had been battling death in the brutal odds of the north for many years, experiencing unusual changes in herself ever since she first set foot in the snow, sedating them with medicine from her homeland that she always carries with her.                                                                                                                                       

Her simple rogue life had been stirred, ever since her mother contacted her after decades to ask for help, bringing up the dark reasons behind Lorys' punishment which changed things on the island forever.

Lorys' dear childhood friend 'Neiva' had fled her home on the island for a mysterious mission in the north. She is told to return her home so she doesn't face the same damage as Lorys. 

She pushes herself to her limit and finds herself vulnerable more than ever before, but she is kept standing by her companion Rowen, a disreputable cut-throat whose motives seem pure.

Explore a small portion of this mysterious world that holds both medieval ways of life and advanced technological artifacts of a forgotten time.

[Edited from [url=https://eilohhs.itch.io/shelled-flame]itch.io[/url]]
title: Shelled Flame

description:
A game in which you take the role of a person who had been given the mission to collect an array of cards, each containing an element (Water, Earth, Fire, Darkness and Air). 

Convince the five characters, each with their own motive, to give you the card they possess, in order to reach the goal of keeping the world from destruction.

[From [url=https://eilohhs.itch.io/elements]itch.io[/url]]
title: Elements
Bed of Corn
description:
A short story about a corn merchant and his daughter, trying to make it in the world without a real home, other than a simple wooden carriage and the donkey that pulls it.

[From [url=https://eilohhs.itch.io/bed-of-corn]itch.io[/url]]

title: Eleikke the Withered
description:
The thriving world slowly and gradually decays, and the characters whose lives are in the midst of great change are the ones who hold the ability to change it.

Glyn, an orphan newly entered into adulthood is abducted in a whole new life of hardship, blood spill and love. She chooses to follow her abductor, Folker,  willingly after he rips her from her peaceful life and drags her into his paid mission. Conflicted with murder and justice, she must ascend from brutal character defining events and come out alive, and willing to live with herself after this sensitive crossroads of her early life. 

While Roswyn, the eldest princess of Crast, faces her struggles in an entirely other form. Her predictable life is stirred with the arrival of a famed witch in her home. She is convinced the witch is up to something, and she must do everything to rid her family of her malicious grips.

[From [url=https://eilohhs.itch.io/eleikke-the-withered]itch.io[/url]]

In this adult visual novel you will take the role of a video game's genius, his spicy girlfriend and his nerdy best friend who, during the creation of a 5d videogame, will be transported into a fantasy world, trapped into the characters they are creating: a rude barbarian hero, a submissive goblin girl and a futanari half-ork... In order to come back to the their previous life, they will face a lot of spicy quests and will meet a lot of strange, horny, and perverted creatures!..."

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1549930/]Steam[/url]]
title: Fantasy 5D - An Erotic Quest

aliases: 魔法少女消耗戦線 DeadΩAegis外伝
Dawn of the Special Warfare Troopers
description:
Humanity's first contact with aliens was far from peaceful, and now these hostile monsters from another galaxy are coming for the destruction of Earth. Every attempt to push back the advancing waves has been met with tremendous losses, as conventional weapons are practically useless against these invaders. Now in humanity's darkest hour, there is a new beacon of hope in the form of Special Warfare Troopers, known to some as just "magical girls".

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1839960/]Steam[/url]]
title: Tsuki Kidou Kaisen ~Saisho no Tokushu Sengihei-tachi~
SEEK ~Chikashitsu no Mesu Dorei-tachi~ Jisshaban
description: Remake of [url=https://vndb.org/v8102]Seek ~Chikashitsu no Mesu Dorei-tachi~[/url] using real photos.

It has been a few weeks since Judgment Day, when dragons filled the skies of the world.
People were trying to adjust to a new normal life.

However, in the distant skies of the… Star world, a situation was brewing.
The dragons are split in half over the treatment of humanity.
In the midst of this, the king of the dragons of the “sea” and “water” factions descends to earth (at his own discretion).

In the blink of an eye, he chases humans away from the world’s oceans and declares, “This ocean belongs to us,” and “Humans are off limits."
The world, deprived of summer resorts, fishing rights, and even the right to travel freely between nations, is in a state of great weakness.

And a few days later…
Takeshi and Haru are still lazing around, and Suzuka is taking care of them, when Dorami comes to invite them for a sea vacation.
Although they feel some kind of suspicion, they can’t resist the temptation of the sea.
What awaits Haru and her friends when they stand in the sea, which has now become a magical land ruled by the sea dragon tribe?
(For now, we’ll have a barbecue and fireworks.)

[Translated from [url=https://whirlpool.co.jp/drapri-2/]Official Site[/url]]
title: DraPri Guu-ta-life 2

description: A short visual novel about a person that wants achievements.
title: The Game For Skippers

description:
Obsessed with occult rituals, you have finally obtained the last thing you need to summon the eldritch horror that has been haunting your dreams; a strange, bright-pink Necronomicon.  You perform the only ritual that doesn’t appear to be insane ramblings, and inadvertently summon Ln’eta, a cute cthulhu-like girl.  She agrees to a kiss, on the condition that you perform a few rituals from the book for her first.  Looking back at the Necronomicon… all of the other pages suddenly make sense?

Made in 10 days for the Dread X Collection Volume 2!

[Taken from [URL=https://akabaka.itch.io/sucker-for-love]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Sucker for Love
Fuyu no Ame to Haru no Niji
description:
Just before closing, a girl visited the cafe.
She lost her memory and didn't know why she came here.

title: The Dream Alchemist
description:
Set in an Art Nouveau style fantasy world, The Dream Alchemist follows a young woman with the unusual ability to see and act in the dreams of others, to influence their minds and learn their secrets… and to trade those secrets.

When assigned to visit the dreams of a foreign ambassador, Nova learns more than she knows what to do with, she questions who she can trust, and sets in motion events that quickly spin out of her control.

In a story about identity, family and love, can Nova find her way back to her old life? That is, if she even wants it… 

[Taken from [URL=https://clarafayegames.itch.io/the-dream-alchemist]itch.io[/URL]]

title: Kedamono Joushi wa Yakuza ni Tsuki

aliases: Rikei Danshi no Houteishiki ~Omae o "Ore" ni wa Watasanai~
description:
Set in Japan, somewhat into the future.
Misaka Yue, who works at a major robotics company, has feelings for her eccentric and self-centered boss, Kakuregi Hajime.
One day, an identical Hajime appears! (He has none of Kakuregi's flaws, making him a perfectly lovable guy.)
He starts meddling in Yue's business and private life.
What will come of this odd office love triangle?

[Translated from [url=http://riccaricca.net/tl-rikedan/]official website[/url]]
title: Rikedan no Houteishiki ~Omae o "Ore" ni wa Watasanai~
Hatsujou Playroom
description:
Moriya Kazunari works as an accountant at an advertising company. For a long time, he's had feelings for Tsujimura Arata, who he used to be classmates with in high school; Arata happens to be working at the sales department.
Moriya's serious and easily irritable, so while Tsujimura's easy-going and friendly nature tends to upset him, he can't seem to discard his feelings for him.
One day, when they're the only ones to stay behind at work, a sudden blackout leads them to lose consciousness.
When they come to, they're in a hotel room with no means of exit.
Their confusion only grows when a mysterious voice tells them to follow its orders if they want to escape...

[Translated from [url=http://riccaricca.net/playroom/]official website[/url]]

title: Gokuhana ~Futari no Yakuza ni Dekiai Saretemasu!~

description:
Hatori Kurumi has been working as a nurse for three years, yet she's still terrible at her job.
Under the watchful eye of a hot doctor, Kamishiro Nagi, she somehow manages to handle working at the surgical ward.
However, as punishment for her constant slip-ups, she's chosen to become a personal nurse for Asuma Taiga, an actor currently admitted to the VIP ward!
She does her best to try and nurse him well in spite of his attitude, all the while Nagi keeps worrying about her.
What's going to come out of this hospital love triangle?

[Translated from [url=http://riccaricca.net/tl-hospital/]the official website[/url]]

30-sai Shojo desu ga, Prince no Tsudou Auction ni Shuppin Saremashita.
description:
Takahashi Yuki is an office lady and worried about still being a virgin at the age of 30.
After she puts herself up for sale on an overseas auction site, a helicopter suddenly lands on the roof of her house and before she has a chance to protest, she gets taken away by men in black suits!
Then they tell her that [i]the[/i] Prince Dawood and Prince Liam are the ones who won the bid!
The princes let her enjoy their lavish lifestyle, all the while they seduce her with their sweet words.
Only after she gets used to the situation, does she begin to uncover their true motives...!

[Translated from [url=http://riccaricca.net/game/tl-30th/]official website[/url]]

title: Saimin Tanetsuke Jugyou
description:
Keiko is a cool and strict instructor with a rocking body that makes all the male students go wild.
You were content just using her as masturbation fuel...until you acquired the power of hypnosis!

You're able to overwrite her consciousness, and make her turn her class into a creampie lesson!
It's perfect, that cool and unfazed expression on her face as she's forced into an impregnation fest!

Now, teach' is your personal impregnation vessel!

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ318003.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]

title: IMPOSTOR
description: You come home from a long day at work to find your partner cooking dinner for you, but something isn't quite right...

title: Wrong Number
description:
Don't you hate getting phone calls from random people you don't know? I sure do.

But Luka? 

Nah, he's got his way of turning a wrong number into a free movie date. 

What happens after meeting the person on the other line though? Is this the start of a beautiful friendship, or something more?

... Or something less?

[From [url=https://red-baby.itch.io/wrong-number]itch.io[/url]]

title: Darling Duality - Winter Wish
description:
On one fateful night in the middle of winter, a lonely soul's wish is granted. In a world where everything is either black or white, which path will you take when you encounter the living, breathing version of a love interest from the most recent visual novel that you've been playing?

[From [url=https://melancholy-marionette.itch.io/darling-duality-winter-wish]itch.io[/url]]

title: Love in Lockdown - ELLA version
description:
It's the year 2025 in the United Kingdom. 5 years have passed since the initial coronavirus lockdown, and with the gradual spread of dangerous new variants, life is still far from what it was. Fighting a losing battle with no certain end in sight, the government has invested billions of pounds into new technology to help aid Britain's single adult households, struggling to deal with the state of perpetual isolation.

You have been selected to participate in a new wave of trials testing the effectiveness of the latest synthetic model. Meet ELLA, your emergency lockdown loneliness assistant.

[From [url=https://melancholy-marionette.itch.io/love-in-lockdown-ella-version]itch.io[/url]]

title: Cunzhuang
description:
In this work, you play a country doctor who just graduated from university. What seems to be a quiet and peaceful village is a mystery.

The content of the game is real and intense, with a strong sense of bringing in! Can you survive in this village under many crises? The true story behind the village is waiting for you to discover!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1560560/The_Village/]Steam[/url]]

Experience the soul-crushing goodness of being stuck in corporate hell from the comfort of your couch.

[From [URL=https://nil-denada.itch.io/home-office-hell-demo]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Home Office Hell

description:
A girl is about to pee before heading home with her brother but he rushes her
to go and she misses the chance. As she makes her way home she can't hold it in!

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE257529.html]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Kayo no Oshikko Gaman Jijou -Gekouchuu ni Oshikko Gaman Dekinakunatte-
Bound to College
description:
You play a young man in his second year of college. On our first day back from summer break you are excited and nervous to meet your new dorm roommate. Find out why the Headmaster need to speak with you so urgently about your grades? More importantly, find out what you can do to improve your grades. Just how far will you go, to avoid failing your courses and being kicked out of school?

 
Along the way, you’ll meet Ned. A bashful, nerdy guy who might help you improve your scores. Will you be his study partner, friend, lover or just another bully who uses him?

 
Of course, every school has bullies and this is no exception. Vincent is the popular captain of the school’s soccer team and a bit of an asshole. Will you be another victim, join forces with him or prove yourself his equal?

 
As in life, the choices you make will shape how your relationships everyone you meet at school develop over time. What will you study, how will you maintain your school marks and what will the people at your college think of you? There is only one way to find out!

[From [url=https://pridedrawing.itch.io/bound-to-college]official site[/url]]

title: Omega no Shikai -Aki Kaketa Shiki no Ai: Zan-

description:
You inherit $16.8 Million dollars, and a cast of townspeople who make you feel more at home than ever. Only, one of them killed your grandmother and you must figure out who it is.

After grandmother's passing, you leave the U.S. for the family coffee plantation in rural Colombia only to find out that she may have been murdered. As the only living heir to the estate, decide how to manage the large inheritance. Upon arrival, you fall in love with the lavish farm, and the striking cast of locals. But on the first night you receive an anonymous letter with a haunting threat, and you wonder Who Killed La Dama Roja? 

You must descend into a web of lies and criminal activity that plagues this rural oasis. After collecting a long series of clues and solving the mystery—you will face a shocking final choice with both their life and love on the line.

[From [URL=https://nix-hydra-games.itch.io/heir-to-love-lies]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Heir to Love & Lies

description:
As soon as you step inside the theatre, you find yourself literally transported into a 1920s Gatsby Era with a gorgeous gangster that offers you adventure and the love you always wanted. Can the glitz and the glamour, and the arms of a loving man win you over?

[From [URL=https://nix-hydra-games.itch.io/two-against-the-world]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Two Against The World

description:
Buckle up for the road trip of your dreams! The GPS is set for Hollywood, and the van is filled with attractive new friends. What could go wrong?

After graduating college in New York City, four artistic friends decide to move west for Hollywood. They pack their van and embark on the cross-country road trip of their dreams. But when a strange event brings every horror movie villain to life, they encounter their nightmares. With monsters stalking the bold, wide country ahead, our heroes must make a decision: Run, Hide, or Fight?

[From [URL=https://nix-hydra-games.itch.io/roadkill]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Roadkill

description:
When an ordinary cosplayer gets trapped in their favorite fantasy game, they'll have to team up with a mischievous mage, a spirited knight, and a mysterious mercenary to find a way home.

One moment you're cosplaying at a convention, the next you're sucked into your favorite fantasy MMO and trapped. How's that for immersive gameplay?
You'll have to team up with a cunning mage, an enigmatic knight, and a roguish mercenary to find your way home — But can you survive the journey?

[From [URL=https://nix-hydra-games.itch.io/last-legacy]Itch.io[/URL]]
title: Last Legacy

description:
Private Investigator Marion is acting as a consultant for the police today. Well, in this case, it's mostly to interview a troupe of dancers, most of whom are attending the local all-girls academy. A peculiar incident has happened at their dance theater, and it only gets stranger from then on.

[From [url=https://waffrus.itch.io/scarlet-heels]itch.io[/url]]

description:
Ardel’s life is simple: she follows the rules, and she tries to be good. But when a new student crashes in to her bland life at the Pondgulch Girls' Charity School and townspeople start looking for someone to blame for recent tragedies, "simple" gets, well, complicated.

[From [url=https://cloudnovel.net/FishyFeathers]CloudNovel[/url]]

The Host Shiyouze! ~DX Night King~

title: Pandemic Love
description:
You play as Trond, a self-reliant loner who's forced into quarantine for the next two weeks after making it out of Italy's lockdown. Stuck at home you meet other lonesome souls, isolated in the darkness, trying to stay sane. Together, at least.

Who will you be when the quarantine is over?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1558900/Pandemic_Love/]Steam[/url]]

It's the last day of school for Plymouth Academy, but what should be a joyous day quickly turns into a nightmare. Six high school students suddenly find themselves trapped inside their school. To make matters worse, they only have 12 hours to escape before they are all killed through asphyxiation. They are offered only one way to escape: murder one of the other trapped students and get away with it.

Can you unravel the many mysteries that await you?

[From [url=https://westeford.itch.io/12hours]itch.io[/url]]
title: 12 Hours to Die

description:
It's 2008 and AIM is dead.

Emily is Away <3 is a brand new story set on an old-new social media. Sign up for Facenook, send some friend requests, and choose your way through the branching narrative.

Emily <3 strives to tell a story that can only be experienced on Facenook. Interact with friends via wall posts, poke wars and of course, cryptic statuses. Customize your profile and see how other characters react. Chat with multiple friends both new and old. Everything you do will help determine the outcome of your senior year.

[From [url=http://emilyisaway.com/presskit/]press kit[/url]]
title: Emily is Away <3
Getting the best shot
description:
A visual novel where you play as an aspiring professional snake photographer and practice on the snakes in your area. First find the hidden snake and then photograph it before it gets away!

[From [url=https://www.glorioustrainwrecks.com/node/11885]Glorious Trainwrecks[/url]]

The Game: The Game is a feminist video game exploring consent and the practices of the male seduction community. In this unconventional dating simulator, infamous pick-up artists attempt to seduce the player using techniques taken from their instructional materials. Pitting players up against six prominent seduction coaches who are vying for your attention at a bar, the game provides the opportunity for players to explore the complexity of seduction social dynamics as well as the experience of being a femme-presenting individual navigating this complicated and often dangerous terrain.

[From the [url=https://thegamethegame.org/download/]official website[/url]]
title: The Game: The Game

description:
A young man visits Hinawari Onsen, where the story takes place, and is stunned when he sees that the innkeeper and her waitress both have incredible breasts.
This is the story of an erotic romance in a mysterious, hidden hot spring.
Keitaro Yamagishi, the main character, visits a hot spring resort after a long day at work.
He finds out that the beautiful married landlady there is having a secret affair with a mysterious young beauty,
A youthful sense of justice and morality lead him to want to find out more.
The married woman who allowed her skin to be touched by the same sex... and the mysterious young woman, who has a secret.
And finally, the young waitress in the middle of all this. When she finds out about it, she, amazingly, joins in.
Their relationship become deeply and intricately entangled, and the story takes an unexpected turn...
title: Bakunyuu Hitou Kitan ~Hitozuma Okami no In'yoku Hiwa~
Iede Gyaru o Hirotta node Sodatetemita
description:
On a certain night, the protagonist witnesses a school girl being forcibly dragged away in the shopping district of the city. That girl happened to be one of his students, Kandachi Kanami, who would always look down on him. Without thinking, the protagonist saves Kanami from the thug, and takes her back to his home. 

When he asks Kanami the reason she was being harassed, she suddenly makes a request of our protagonist to let her stay one night at his place. It becomes clear to the protagonist, seeing Kanami with a large bag with her late at night in the shopping district, that she has run away from home. Seeing the usually haughty and rude Kanami helpless like this wakes his inner demon, and fueled by his desire for revenge, he demands Kanami to sleep with him. She resists, but he throws her onto his bed, and forces himself upon her.

Come next morning, even after what happened, Kanami still does not show any signs of leaving the protagonist's home, as she has no one else to turn to for help. The protagonist originally planned on apologizing for he did the previous night, but the situation ended up exciting him all over again.

This marks the start of a life of the two together where the girl pays back the man in "installments", using her body.  

[Translated from [URL=http://getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1125248&gc=gc]Getchu[/url]]

title: Nawa Geunyeo X Geunyeo X Geunyeoui Geonjeonhaji Moshan Gwangye

description:
The Last Act is a mystery-romance visual novel about a young woman named Sarah, who aspires to be the lead in a play. She finally lands her big break, but then disturbing supernatural incidents start happening around the theater. All she wanted was a smashing opening night, but instead, she might be breaking a leg... LITERALLY.

Can she solve the mysteries of the theater before opening night? Will love bloom along the way?

With the help of the lovable and friendly ghost Silas, sultry detective Gavin, and her skeptical co-star Joshua, she might just be able to solve the mystery before their premiere!

[From [url=https://www.snowhavenstudios.com/the-last-act-press-kit/]press kit[/url]]
title: The Last Act
Kitto Zenbu Watashi no Sei
description: The plan was simple: ignore all the phone messages, get a new girlfriend, and move on with life. Surely she'd take the hint... Or would she?

title: Not It
description:
Katie has just moved to a new town on Halloween, only to discover that there’s a curse that plagues the town every year on the spooky holiday. Though she may not necessarily believe in the curse, she gets wrapped up in this old mystery that unfolds throughout the night.

As the unfortunate events with the curse transpire on Halloween, Katie and the townsfolk are all trapped in the inn, with no understanding of how and why they’re being held. The only goal they have is to make it until morning, and get everyone out alive.

Will the curse take anyone throughout All Hallows’ Eve?

[From [url=https://snowhavenstudios.itch.io/not-it/]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Sanities Lament
description:
You are trapped by a strange entity that toys with you, and you must try to help your friends escape. A nightmare? A dream? Or reality?

[From [url=https://denpadev.itch.io/sanitys-lament]Itch.io[/url]]

Follow Marvin's journey in this  super robot action-comedy  where he is recruited to power up VolTitan a  giant mechanical  foot fetish  God of War and defend the planet Feeternia against a puritanical galactic empire and its army of giant monsters

[From [url=https://voltitandev.itch.io/fff-voltitan-vs-the-jundoh-empire-volume-1]Itch.io[/url]]

KISS x CAT x GIRL! A cozy and somewhat chaotic cohabitation life! A young lady cursed into cat form needs your morning kiss every day to lift her curse! Become close through all kinds of intimate interactions, but don't forget you still need to work for your food!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1409770/CatsKiss/]Steam[/url]]

Saishuu Densha is a first person adventure game that begins when a business man arrives at the train station at midnight and he's just in time to catch the last train of the day, as soon as he boards the train he met a woman (that is a teacher) that is also in his wagon, soon they realise that the train is not stopping in the train stations and that their wagon's door is locked, they manage to open it and go through the next wagon when they find a young kid alone.
They decided to go the next wagon and there they see some kind of liquid in the floor and when they are going to take a closer look the liquid take form of some kind of horror creature that attacks them, they escape to the previous wagon and realise that for sure this will be the most dangerous trip that they will have in their lives and wonder if they could surivive that night.

[From [url=https://psxdatacenter.com/games/J/S/SLPS-01257.html]Playstation Datacenter[/url]]
