Boku wa Yuuki o Dashite Ecchi na Omise ni Denwa Shite Mita.
Roommate + One
description: A expanded version to the Roommate games. Features a normal visual novel interface and adds a new character: college student Izumi Suzuki.

title: Misaki Aggressive!
description: Yuzuriha Misaki is the heiress to a martial arts dojo, but she has always ignored it and lived her life as a normal girl. However, one day her grandfather became the dojo's instructor and noticed its dwindling attendance. "If nothing changes, the dojo will close!". And thus, her grandfather has a radical idea: transferring her to Shirayuri Gakuen, a school with a strong martial arts focus, and orders her to become the strongest if she wants to get her normal life back. And thus begins Misaki's battle for the top, in order to become a normal girl again!

title: Fuyu Kiss
description:
Japan was in the midst of a record setting cold wave.
My city - Uetsuruto - was no exception, as we were beset by day after day of freezing weather.
Then, one night, I received a text from an unknown number.

"Look outside your window! Snow! It's snowing!"

Sure enough, the world outside my window had been transformed into a white wonderland.

"I'm sorry to text you so late. It's just... you were the first person I wanted to tell."

That was the final message they sent me.
I had no idea who the sender was.
Yet I had the strange feeling that, very soon, I might just fall in love.

In a world of snow, a warm and gentle love story is woven.

[Translated from [url=http://products.web-giga.com/fuyukiss]Official Summary[/url]]
aliases: First Yuki Kiss, First Snow Kiss

description:
My Sweet Zombie! is about Sam Chen, a recent college graduate who loves to bake. However, she can’t  remember the last time she touched an oven, unless you can count the conventional one they use at the cafe she works at. Sam’s job usually involves putting out fires at her store, so whether it's dealing with a annoying customer or fixing the leaky espresso machine, it’s Sam’s job to take care of it. Thus it's no surprise she finds herself exhausted from her job.

However, now that Sam has graduated from college, her parents are pressuring her to get a "real" job.  Will Sam be forced to take the path her parents want, a stable, but boring career as an accountant...? Or ... Will a cute girl with a bony arm change that?

[From [url=https://tsun-angelique.itch.io/my-sweet-zombie-demo]Itch.io[/url]]
title: My Sweet Zombie!

description:
You play as Ikuro, a gambling addict looking to fuel his other addiction to his personalized A.I robot wife. But of course, other unexpected things happen along the way in this town of eternal twilight...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1572990/Twilight_Town_A_Cyberpunk_Day_In_Life/]Steam[/url]]
title: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk Day In Life
Neon Nights
description:
Lately, Kate has been a little restless. The glowing lights of Metropolis 12 simply don't hold the luster they once did in her precocious youth. Now, the only things that give her joy are intimacy, and hoverbike racing. And since the intimacy has been sparse lately, she's taken to speeding her bike through the dark alleys of the city at night, trying to outpace her life.
This night, however, might be a little different…

In TriumviDate, you play as the curmudgeonly Doctor McCoy as he navigates the turbulent shores of his love life. Caught off guard by the declaration of a shipwide holiday--Valentine's Day, of all the damned things--McCoy finds himself slowly admitting his own feelings for his two best friends. But as he's pulled in multiple directions at once, how will he balance the friendships of a lifetime with his newly burgeoning realization that it's okay to be loved?

[From [url=https://lonelycryptidmedia.itch.io/triumvidate]itch.io[/url]]
title: TriumviDate

description: After failing to get into the university of his choice, Naoya puts his further education on hold to take a job at a quaint seaside café. There, he meets two cute waitresses, and he becomes more intimately involved in their lives than he anticipated.
title: Would you like to run an idol café?
Dimensions: Story Mode
description:
Dimensions Story Mode is the stories from the Dimensions universe, without the gameplay from Dimensions VIP.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1207820/]Steam[/url]]

title: Ijiwaru Onee-san no Otsumami! ~Kare no Otouto wa Sakusei Shihoudai no Sei Gangu~
Yuukyuu no Campanella
description:
The kingdom of Atlastia --

North of the world, there's a group of flying islands - this is where the flying continent of Atlastia and its well-known titular kingdom is located. And not only in Atlastia itself - everywhere across the flying islands - the legend of a particular clan is being passed down from generation to generation.

The legendary heroes clan, "Oasis."

Even though they had saved the continent 100 years ago, their sub-commander Chester Silver has laid dormant for ages now. Now, about 100 years have passed and as Chester wakes up from his long arduous slumber he...

...bears witness to the Idol Princess Claria singing her songs to entertain the public. He wakes up as being one of her supporters cheering her on.

And then --

Spurred on by Claria's admiration for the Heroes Clan "Oasis," Chester Silver gathers his former companions, the twin sisters Angelique and Juliet Gilbert, to embark on a new adventure.

At the same time, a mysterious woman who had woken up from her slumber in the crypt of a ruin, Colette says: 

"Now that Colette has woken up, this world's fate is sealed."

Strange incidents begin to occur in the world and with the causality of 100 years past intertwining, the adventure Chester seeks is closer than he thinks.

[Translated from the [url=https://windmill.suki.jp/product/uq_campanella/story.html]Official website[/url]]

title: Ore Dake ni Bitch na Itoko wa, Yankee-kei Otoko no Ko! Zutto Issho na Vacation!
Ryuusei World Actor: Badge & Dagger
description:
The Seventh Republic—the city despised by the sun.

Sunlight hasn't reached here since the last great war, and the shadows teem with vicious criminals.
With evil threatening on every side, the National Police Agency is a stronghold of justice.

Detective Ruka Hiryu belongs to the 13th Division, nicknamed the Sideliners, and treated like shit by the rest of the force.
With no major incidents to keep him distracted, Ruka has been investigating the sealed Cult Massacre case in secret.
Things change when the 13th picks up two new members.

The agency is shaken with unreliable rumors about the semi-mythical Shining Union, and as suspicions and conjecture fly like bullets, will Ruka, the 13th, and the NPA be unscathed?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1819160/Meteor_World_Actor_Badge__Dagger/]Steam[/url]]

The sound of seagulls woke me up.
Sunlight streamed through the train window, and outside, the train raced across the sea, kicking up spray from the swollen waters after yesterday’s rain.

The summer sunlight was blindingly white, and the wake trailing the train was just as bright.

The sky was a gradient of blue, indigo, and turquoise.

Ahead, a peaceful island where seagulls gathered floated vividly green against the horizon.
Was my heart racing with excitement? Or was I on the verge of being crushed by anxiety?

The only thing I knew for sure was that, on that island, a life without nights was about to begin.

All to remember the dreams (memories) of rainy nights.

—Morning glories don’t know the night (love).

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/pro/work/=/product_id/VJ014697.html/]dlsite[/url]]
title: Asagao wa Ai o Shiranai.
aliases: アサガオは夜（アイ）を識らない。

description:
Zhang Xiao, a senior high school student, has a strange power called “Master Key”. Since he was young, he can communicate with other “worlds”. One day, Zhang Xiao’s classmate Miao Xueling had an accident.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1560400/_/]Steam[/url]]

title: Mind Rite
description:
Aina is a young investigator in a distant city in the north, but when mysterious magical murders begin to take place in it, it is she and her partner who are entrusted with the case. But what if everything is not what it seems? What if Aina itself become a victim?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1562870/Mind_Rite/]Steam[/url]]

An otaku with a cosplay fetish gets a full day of wish fulfillment with the girl of his dreams.

I'm a villager. A regular villager.
I returned home one day to find an angel and devil waiting for me.
The angel is wearing white knee socks. The devil, black tights.
They suddenly ask me to make the choice. Which do I prefer?
This is a toughie..!?

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ308030.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]

Your classmate challenges you to a game of rock, paper, strippers!

Kanraku ☆ Mahou Shoujo Idol ♪ ~Butagoya no Satsueikai~
Ephemeral You ~Tozashita Kioku~
description: A ghost girl, who has lost her memory, suddenly appears in front of the protagonist one day. He decides to help the girl find peace.

title: Ano Hi no Kioku
description: The protagonist, who has been in a coma, wakes up after a year. However he has lost his memory of before the accident. In order to regain his memory, he goes to talk with his childhood friends Kazuma and Ayumi.
Kameoka Satoshi, a a first year high school student, fell of a roof. He survived the accident but the fall reminds him of something he had forgotten.
title: Kame to Usagi

description:
"Dear Kenji, please help me. I'm in Osaka right now."

After school, Kenji, a sixth grader, found a letter in his classroom which reminded him of the urban legend "Mary's Phone Call". At first he didn't pay any attention to it, but after finding the second letter, he realized that it's not just a prank.

[From Itch.io]

Chronicles from 4.012 is a episodic multi-choice otome game and visual novel, that takes place in a future world on the brink of a environmental collapse, and it recounts the fights for the dominance between the oldest forces of good and evil of history. As the main character you’ll have the opportunity to change the balance forever, as you make choices crucial to their life and to all the others that surrounds them. You’ll also explore the culture and history of this dystopian world, while you discover ancient supernatural creatures with unbelievable powers. And all of this without forgetting you’ll have the opportunity to develop your own love story.

[From [URL=https://toxic-squad.itch.io/chronicles-from-4012]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Chronicles from 4.012
Witch Tales
description:
Witch Tales is a visual novel and otome, which includes three different and self-concluding stories, with diverse characters and new and endearing settings in each one of them. Meet a world full of magic and legends in a charming environment and for all audiences. In addition, it includes multiple choices, scenarios with point & clicks, secret scenes and different endings.

[From [URL=https://toxic-squad.itch.io/witch-tales]itch.io[/URL]]

When you suddenly lose your job under mysterious circumstances, you're relieved to find that a local coffee shop is hiring—although, you don't remember seeing this particular café before today...

But Mosspoint is a weird little town where the strange is a part of life.

Take orders from some of the cafe's strange regulars, learn about their (surprisingly mundane) lives, and maybe brew up a little friendship in the process.

[From [URL=https://neonpolygon.itch.io/monster-cafe]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Monster Café

description:
Over video conference, Mara and her family celebrate the 2nd birthday of her nephew. Even though she cries over missing the magical moments of Mikel growing up due to COVID-19 restrictions in the Philippines, Mara’s Kuya only teases her for being almost 30 and still single.

Her family doesn’t know what they’re talking about! Who needs romance when Mara gets all the happiness she needs from watering pixelated plants, ranting to her online friends, and inhaling ice cream by the carton?

Love and all the melodrama it entails? Overrated! She wants none of it!

[From [URL=https://ilyilaice.itch.io/loveless-on-lockdown]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Loveless on Lockdown
MYTHI-Kilig Romance
description: Mythi-KILIG Romance is a parody Visual Novel Game for Philippine Folklore enthusiasts who wish to see a fresh perspective. Play as Ernesto and enter a world filled with beauties. It features various Philippine Mythical Creatures that are ‘toned down’ to be physically attractive humanoid beings that players will encounter during the game. The game gives a fresh perspective on mythical beings in the Philippines, to put aside the scary and unsettling thoughts of many Filipinos who grew up to be told these stories. This game aims to bring awareness on Philippine Folklore, though the characters will not be traditional, there are various characteristics each Mythical Creature has that are interesting. Mythi-KILIG Romance is a game that wishes people to put aside their fears that hinder them to learn more about Philippine Folklore.

Keiichi Maebara has just moved to the quiet little village of Hinamizawa in the winter of 2006 and quickly becomes inseparable friends with schoolmates Rena Ryuguu, Mion Sonozaki, Satoko Houjou, and Rika Furude. One of Keiichi's classmate start to act strange and ask him all sort of weird question. While trying to help her, he unearth the darkness that lurks over seemingly idyllic life they lead.

This games is a parody of the visual novel/anime Higurashi no Naku Koro ni. It contains spoilers for both the original and the 2020 anime (Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Gou).

[From [URL=https://manpaint.itch.io/canadian-higurashi?password=satoko]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Canadian Higurashi
Yuki's Palpitating, Passionate, Phenomenal, and quite frankly Proficient quest for a (hot) girlfriend!!!

Help Yuki get a girlfriend!!! (or maybe three?)

title: Seleos

Kore, a troubled noblewoman, meets Seleos, an oddly helpful deity. Can he be the one to resolve her problems?

[From [URL=https://circlepegasi.itch.io/seleos]itch.io[/URL]]

Varsha is a young witch who has just graduated high school. While their friends were off jet setting and travelling around the world, Varsha had to go back to their hometown Lynnsdale to take care of their grandparents who ran a small magic store. There were two major issues though: one, magic is strictly banned and two, their grandparents store is on the verge of bankruptcy.

[From [URL=https://crystalgameworks.itch.io/a-pinch-of-magic]itch.io[/URL]]
title: A Pinch of Magic
Pirated Code
description:
When an advanced AI program named Seren  awakens to find they've been installed as the co-pilot of a smuggling ship, they can't help but be annoyed. This is clearly not what they were made to do... right? 

Actually, they can't remember.

With no memories of their previous directive, they'll have to (begrudgingly) rely on their newfound crewmates to help them find where they belong.

[From [URL=https://hitormissy.itch.io/pirated-code]itch.io[/URL]]

As the Guiding Star, you’ve always watched over Pharandel, laughed and cried and worried with the mortals and dragons as they warred and made peace. When a miasma starts to consume Pharandel bringing chaos with it, you wish you could be closer, you wish for a way to make them happy. And your wish comes true in an unexpected way: you fall from the sky.

You meet a cynical mystic elf who grants you a mortal body: at a price. They give you six moons’ time to prove that you can make the mortals of Pharandel happy: you must fill a crystal with pure happiness, or they’ll consume you to replenish their magic!

And so your quest begins. Your journey to heal the mortals’ hearts brings you to Dimlight Café: a sorely under-appreciated establishment, run by a diverse group of six dragons. You decide to stay and make it your mission to make the crew happy, and so, for the coming six moons, you get entangled in the fate of the café, the crew and the creatures that patron the place. And it’s when people in need stumble into the Café and the Dimlight family slowly grows, that you realize this is where you belong.

Will you manage to fulfill your wish of making the world of Pharandel happier? Can you free them from the suffocating unhappiness, and avoid being consumed by the mystic elf? And will you find your own happiness along the way?

[From [URL=https://celesteadev.itch.io/dimlight-cafe]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Dimlight Cafe

Saimokujutsu: the way of turning statements into actions

After helping a bloodied man who lay in the street, a typical timid student is awarded the power of "saimoku". With a gaze and a word he can entrance people. The boring life of Yuuta Uchida is changed forever.

You decide to grab a coffee at a famous restaurant, recommended to you by a close friend.

Your visit to Femboy Bangers turns into a memorable encounter with various employees, eager to please.
Don't forget to tip your waiter!

description:
The year was 432 BC.
This year marked the zenith of Athenian greatness.

You are a sculptor who has just finished their work on the Parthenon.
Set out on an adventure and meet Femboys and other characters as you make your way through this interesting time in history.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1565080/]Steam[/url]]

A retelling of the original story with brand new visuals.
It took place in the same setting: Kabukicho in December 2017.
The story divides into five short chapters, which feature Takeo, Azami, and some other familiar faces engaging in increasingly wild and cool antics.

[Translated and edited from [url=http://clockup.net/yrg/]the official site[/url]]
title: Nemurenu Hitsuji to Kodoku na Ookami -A Tale of Love, and Cutthroat- Gaiden

description:
Kanda Alice was worried about her first year at Miyukinomori Girls' High School. Her best friend Hodaka Akira stopped attending their archery club for a while due to an incident. She is said to have wrecked the archery club's championship cup, but Alice didn't believe her best friend could do such a thing. Despite of Alice’s worries, her best friend decided to leave the archery club...

"There is an amazing fortune-teller in this school!" Alice heard from her classmates. Alice told her best friend about the rumored fortune-teller in the tea ceremony club, located in one of the club buildings in the back of the schoolgrounds.

When Alice and her best friend headed to the tea ceremony club after school, they were greeted by an unbelievably beautiful, black-haired girl—so beautiful that you'd question whether she really exists. Her name: Sawaragi Houju. Houju asks, "What don't you want taken away from you?"

Their encounter in the twilight restarts a heart that had come to a halt.

[Edited from [url=https://www.gematsu.com/2021/03/yuri-short-mystery-visual-novel-kanda-alice-mo-suiri-suru-announced-for-switch]Gematsu[/url]]
title: Kanda Alice mo Suiri Suru.

description:
A young man wakes up in a decrepit prison cell alongside a ragged looking girl and no memory of who he is. Before he could ask her anything however, a mechanical voice speaks:

[I]Throughout this test you will be asked a series of questions. The answers to these questions are written on the front of these cards.[/I]

On the first card he sees, the word "Participate" is written on it.

[I]To begin, we will ask a simple question: Will you participate in this test?[/I]

And thus begins a trial of life and death for these two souls. Can they overcome the trials and escape, or will they fall victim to the myriad of traps that fill this prison?

[From [URL=https://hijiri.itch.io/psykhofly]itch.io[/URL]]
title: -Psykhofly-

description:
Welcome to the city of Rhineway: a merciless metropolis where gentrification spreads like cold sores. Its wear and tear has been pushed to its outskirts, and the crime rate is higher than ever. Meanwhile, the government-enforced superhero program draws mixed reactions among the populace.

Not that it matters much to you. 

You're flat broke, living in a rundown apartment in the city’s outskirts. While job-hunting, you’re unexpectedly recruited by a civil servant - who, as it turns out, seems to be a super dork in his own right.

[From [url=https://wudgeous.itch.io/herotome]itch.io[/url]]
title: Herotome

description:
For Rue to appreciate the privileges as a prince of Hiemswald, he sets off incognito, to tour the land which he must soon serve.

But… a rite of passage comes with its challenges. 

He gets ambushed by bandits en route, and soon after, a certain warning from his adviser is realised…

He wakes in a remote village, under the care of a quiet apothecary and carefree hunter. They have a strong bond with each other, but also a seemingly sorrowful tie to the forest.

Inexplicably drawn to their mysteries, what turmoil might Rue uncover amidst this apparently serene woodland? 

[From [URL=https://kimiyoto.itch.io/flowers-which-bloom-in-winter]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Flowers which Bloom in Winter

description:
[i]"Welcome aboard the Gemini 22, dear pawsenger! I do hope mew have your ticket ready, hmm?"[/i]

In the depths of space, without a memory or face, you find yourself aboard a train of mystery and stars.

The passengers abroad-- Some dangerous, some odd-- Offer you no answers as you search throughout the cars.

The clock is slowly ticking. Your stop is coming into sight.

Will you find what you are looking for on this lonely, starry night?

[From [URL=https://kale-chips.itch.io/midnight-on-the-milky-way]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Midnight on the Milky Way
The Masterpiece
description:
[i]Altocelarophobia[/i]. The fear of high ceilings. 

The shy and introverted art student Iris has spent much of her life avoiding gymnasiums, shopping malls, and churches. Challenging herself to drop her unwanted nickname of 'Umbrella Girl' - due to always carrying an umbrella indoors - she joins best friend Audra on a school trip to a power station-turned-art gallery in the city. However, deep inside the gallery, Iris loses both Audra and her umbrella, and is left to navigate the twisting, confusing corridors on her own. Worse, a dark, old, and hungry something watches her every step, waiting for a moment of weakness...

[From [URL=https://yxt0531.itch.io/the-masterpiece]itch.io[/URL]]

Everyone's going to adore you.

Play as an android! Go on dates to learn about humans!

Do your best to be useful, okay?

title: Pinkmatch

description:
Etienne, Hanae, Adélaïde, Lena, Marco, Tatiana, Jean-Christophe… 
Within the space of one week, learn about their lives. Each one has his own joy and pain. Will you share their conception of life?

Interrogation is a difficult noire detective game about ethics, morality, radicalisation and the nature of authority. Strategically manage the special police department tasked with bringing down a terrorist organisation which threatens the very structure of society: The Liberation Front. Uncover their mysteries in iconic movie-like Interrogation scenes, using a complex conversation simulation system. Solve hard conversational puzzles by psychologically manipulating realistic suspects. Decide their fate, your fate and the city’s.

[From [url=https://interrogation-game.com]official site[/url]]
title: Interrogation
Appetité Amor
description:
Fianna is good at anything she puts her mind to — which usually involves trying to max out her stats, inhaling copious amounts of food and doing her best in avoiding getting into Guild House brawls. A pleasant twist of fate leads her to find Cafe Amor and its otherworldly — quite literally — chef, Leon. 

Join Fianna and Leon as they face magical beasts, mysterious entities and something far more strange and wonderful than anything they have ever faced: their growing relationship.

(taken from itch.io page)

title: Canvas Colors: In The Moving City

description:
One lazy morning an old man wanders into a witch's shop. The young witch Marjolaine greets him at the counter.

The old man produces a box which he claims to contain his heart, and asks for it to be delivered.

The store's owner, the wise Madame Odette, refuses to do business with the man, but a revelation leads the apprentice to accept the request, even if it is against her master's wishes.

With nothing but a picture to go on, The Witchling heads out into the city.

[From [URL=https://unfinishedcircl.itch.io/the-witchling-marjolaine]itch.io[/URL]]
title: The Witchling Marjolaine

[From [URL=https://icyvalet.itch.io/coppelive]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Coppélive!

description:
An immortal fairy picks up a disciple, raising the disciple so that one day the disciple may slay her and fulfill the end of a prophecy in which the immortal must either die or cause the end of the world.

[From [URL=https://4noki.itch.io/from-that-moment-she-neglected-the-world]itch.io[/URL]]
title: from that moment she neglected the world

description:
The story develops around Taro, a soft, chubby cat who has to move from his beloved, calm country to a noisy, chaotic city.

Suddenly he finds himself thrown in a new reality, in a new school with completely different rules and habits. It isn't easy for him to find new friends so he decides to spend the early days at school alone, avoiding any relationship with the other students.Time goes by and he realizes there's something wrong going on at school:

cases of very aggressive bullying take place every now and then but the teachers cannot intervene because of the lack of evidence.

He condemns his schoolmates' indifference but he also fears the bullies so he ends up doing nothing about it at first but one day after the umpteenth bullying attack against a student fellow, he steps in between the poor victim and three bullies, interrupting the fight. From that day on he becomes the bullies' favorite target, they will not miss any opportunity to make him regret his bravery by ruining each and every day of his life at school.

He doesn't want his family to worry about him and lest his father decides to move again and lose his job in the city he keeps what's happening a secret and pretends everything is all right.

Even though everyday looks like a war to him, with the help of some friends Taro will try to overcome this obstacle as best as he can without losing heart.

[From [URL=https://www.fantasiaofficialcompany.com/taro-off]the official website[/URL]]
title: Taro

description: The girls' videos went viral on the Internet and they decided to invest in content production. 6 months have passed since the events of Season 1, but there are things that never change. Girls are always getting involved in naughty situations. Help them decide how to deal with it.

A brief moment in time. Two young girls get offered a lifetime opportunity to model for a famous clothing line.

A lot is at stake for them, and it all depends on the outcome of an interview with one of the top executives of the advertisement agency.

Just how far will they go to score these jobs? Will their boyfriends be able to rescue them should the girls need it?
title: The Interview

description: The story takes place in Pandora City. Confident, capable, and handsome, our hero is a divorced middle age man who simultaneously manages a decaying medical spa and an active and precarious love life, which includes a lustful affair with his sultry, married assistant. Bitter from the serial infidelity of his ex-wife, Bella, he had isolated himself not only from her, but his teen daughter, Teresa, an unwitting victim of circumstance.
title: Elysion

description:
En-Fem-E No. 9 sees the main character start out as a normal college student.  His adoptive parent's relationship is on the rocks and he and his father move in with his father's new mysterious girlfriend.  When the father is suddenly called away on important unknown business the manipulative transformation at the hands of his father's new girlfriend begins.

[From [url=https://silk-savannah.itch.io/en-fem-e-no9]Itch.io[/url]]
title: En-Fem-E No. 9
I Wish
description:
If you could have only one wish... what would you ask for?.
"I wish" is a story that follows a group of friends that are granted each one wish.
The only problem is that they had no idea that it was actually going to come true.
You will decide what path will each of them take after their wishes came true.
You will also help them to face the troubles that comes with such a power.

[From F95Zone]

aliases: Attack on Titan: Escape from Death
Attack on Titan: Escape from Certain Death
description:
Set before the Female Titan arc, the Survey Corps are ordered to investigate Elsnir Castle. The protagonist is an original Survey Corps member and a local of the area; they guide the group to their location. During their investigation, Titans surround them and the ground gives way beneath them, scattering the group. The protagonist's omni-directional mobility gear is broken from the fall. They must escape the castle's underground ruins by working alongside the characters from the series.

[From [url=https://attackontitan.fandom.com/wiki/Attack_on_Titan:_Escape_from_Certain_Death]Attack on Titan Wiki[/url]]

What happens if a vampire, zombie, alien, necromancer, and ghost form a team? Everyone's gonna be fucked... including them.

Welcome to Korthaven, one of the wretched dark elven cities of the underground. When you're home one night you get a visit from an elf called Kim, who claims to be your slave. As it turns out, despite your orc-ish appearance, you're the bastard son of a dark elf lord. You've inherited most of his fortune and his slave. 

There is a condition to his fortune however...

[From [url=https://la-cucaracha-studios.itch.io/the-sanctum]Itch.io[/url]]
title: The Sanctum

Ria is a young and beautiful girl with dreams of the future. She sings beautifully and waits for someone to discover her talent.

Ria will soon become a famous singer and her life will become more fast paced. As her boyfriend, can you keep up with her?​

Futari no Alice ga Kurasu Uchi

A high class spoiled girl named Saya gets a part time job at a maid cosplay cafe to learn more about the world. When she starts to fall for the guy she meets there she eventually ends up alone with him inside the cafe when...

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ037992.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]

aliases: Punished for Invading the Girls' Dorm
title: Joshi Ryou ni Shinnyuu Shita Danshi ga Tetteiteki ni Oshioki Sareru Hanashi
description: The main character is a male college student with no female friends and only serious relationships. It is unfortunate, however, that he has been seduced by a friend who can peer into the bath of a longing senior in a new women's dormitory, and he is caught by a junior who teases the senior of the matter by more. The two girls were attempting to rule the body and mind with severe punishment in order to prevent the main character from going against the girl again....

title: The Mermaid of Zennor
description:
Lilac is miserable.

Ignored by her callous parents and bullied by her peers at school, the young girl finds herself quite alone. Nobody wants to talk to her save Aislinn, her bubbly classmate, and Mrs Khoury, the school's councillor - but, even then, Lilac suspects they only do so out of pity.

The only person Lilac feels able to trust is her older brother, Jesse, but she has not seen him in what seems an eternity. He moved away from their small Cornish village two months prior to attend a university in the bustling capital of the country, London.

Lilac misses Jesse so intensely she can think of nothing else. As the days pass, she becomes more and more fixated upon him, until her obsession threatens to consume her.

When she learns that her brother will be coming back home for Christmas, at long last, she can't contain her excitement...

But her brother, as she soon discovers, is not alone. A strange woman has ensnared his heart in his absence, and Lilac finds her already fragile mental state unraveling faster still. She knows she must free her beloved brother from the grip of this wicked enchantress, no matter the cost, if she is ever to be happy again - but just how far is she willing to go...?

[From [URL=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1502520/]Steam[/URL]]

title: Somewhere Better
description:
Lyra, a gun-witch living at the border, a place marked by destruction and supernatural phenomenons, is tasked to take a duo of magical girls across the land to try and save the world.
All the while, she gets to know them, becomes friends with them, and maybe, just maybe see that there's more to life.

[From [URL=https://tangledvirus.itch.io/somewhere-better]itch.io[/URL]]

title: Yoga Bear
description:
What happens when a struggling artist falls in love with a complete stranger?

[From [URL=https://high-tea.itch.io/yoga-bear]itch.io[/URL]]

New maid Eloise is excited to escape her tiny hamlet to take care of the reclusive Lord Fox's estate, Chapelle Bleue. The castle is situated in the outskirts of town within a sprawling forest. 

[From [URL=https://rachelu.itch.io/chapellebleue]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Maid of Chapelle Bleue
A New Don
description:
Fia grew up on her mother's hog farm, always dreaming about running away to the bustling city that dotted the horizon. 

Just when she thinks this is all her life will ever be, a letter comes in the mail from an old eccentric man she used to call "Grandfather". 

He asks her to come to the city so that he may give her something. When she gets there, it turns out that his gift is the ownership of his crime family! 

But not everyone is excited to see Fia and internal tensions threaten to tear the family apart.

Can you survive the 6 days it takes to inherit the family?

Become the new Donna, or die trying. 

[From [URL=https://heiden.itch.io/a-new-don]itch.io[/URL]]

You wake up in a mystical cabin, tied to a chair and facing a boiling cauldron. Next to that cauldron is a very eager witch who soon explains that he is making soup.

And you are the final ingredient!

Try to escape this disastrous encounter, or else you could become his very delicious witch soup!

[From [URL=https://a-ohisashi.itch.io/witch-soup]itch.io[/URL]]
title: WITCH SOUP
Ljubopytstvo
description:
"Curiosity killed the cat ..." - says the main character of this story and "come between the bark and the tree", because he knows that "...  satisfaction brought it back." He knows a lot of idioms and doesn't believe in omens. He don't gift you adversity or failure, when he crosses your road, but just living its life.
Curiosity can bring you back ... or not. Would you like to check it?

This story is full of funny and sad moments. In some places, it is able to bring a smile or tears.
Your choice will determine the fate of the protagonist and only you decide how this story will end.

The main character of the story is a black cat. He has own character, opinion and truly "feline" point of view on everything that happens in his life.

The genre of this game is a visual novel, an interesting story with images and a pleasant soundtrack, in which you are able to influence the plot.

The game has several puzzles for greater immersion.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1575320/]Steam[/url]]

title: Bright Lord
description:
Bright Lord is an adult, erotic horror game in which you become Bright Lords servant.
Will you let him take over your mind completely or fight his will in his conquest for power and revenge.

title: Tsuioku no Kanata ~Kako to Mirai no Yakusoku~
Tsuioku no Kanata ~Wasurenagusa no Yakusoku~
description:
“There’s something I really wanted to tell you… but now, I can’t…”  

After his parents’ divorce, Shou moves back to the town he spent his childhood in.
He dreams of reuniting with his childhood friend, but…

[Translated from [url=https://faraway.work/game/forget/chara.html]the official website[/url]]

title: Coding Lovers ~Bartender to Haitoku-teki na Koi~
Colorado Cocoa Club
description: Mikaela Cohen, a workaholic junior architect based in Boston, is in for a surprisingly long vacation. While accompanying her boss on a business trip in Aspen, an unexpected blizzard traps the two architects at the ski resort where they are staying.

A revolutionary, romantic, visual novel where your choices change the course of history!

It’s March 19th, 1789 and King Louis XVI rules over France from the gilded halls of Versailles. France is a country of elegance and poverty, of ancient tradition and unstoppable change. It is a country on the brink of revolution.

Attend parties, mingle with the rich and powerful, learn their secrets, and use this to get the wealth and power you deserve. Find true love in an opulent world of ever-shifting alliances, that grows more dangerous by the day.

Still, you must always keep your eye on the coming revolution. After all, it’s better to be on the right side of history, than the wrong side of the guillotine.

[From [URL=https://store.steampowered.com/app/949200/]Steam[/URL]]
title: Ambition: A Minuet in Power
Kikou Etsuda ~Kedakai High Elf-sama wa Ningen no Ma no Te de Yorokobi ni Ochiru~
Domina School
description:
Expelled from your current school, you are faced with the harsh reality: your life is falling apart. Indeed, it is common knowledge that the school administration only grants students three attempts. After 3 failures, it is impossible to re-enter the school system. How did you come to this point? You were not the most conscientious student, but you never thought it could happen to you...

Dishonored and ashamed, your family rejects you, and you find yourself without resources, without any diploma, obliged to find a precarious job in order to feed yourself, and without any vision for the future. You had big plans... everything has really gone wrong... Little by little you get used to the idea that your life will never be what it should have been, this idea makes you deeply sad.

Until one day a glimmer of hope finally appears. By a happy coincidence, you hear about a school, a private institution, which would have obtained the right to educate students who have failed more than 3 times. You don't believe your ears, how is it possible? The opportunity is too good, you must absolutely join this school, whatever it costs. This time failure is not an option.

However, you will slowly discover that in order to get your ticket to a future full of opportunities, you may have to give up both your free will and your dignity...

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/Sp0nt3x]Patreon[/url]]

Play as Nina, an introverted gamer waiting for her breakout moment in college. At the start of Holiday Break, You've been invited by classmates to join their team and try a brand-new VR MMORPG: Realms of Legends. There's only one catch: your party is attractive!!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1433130/]Steam[/url]]
title: Ravished Realms

description:
Protagonist Kuonji Jin has a lovely younger sister, Kiri.
One day a succubus possessed Kiri's body and she starts act differently.
Is it the end of peaceful days? Well, it's a chance to bang the sister!

[Translated from the [url=https://hamham-soft.net/imosucc/]official website[/url]]

Watcher
description:
Known as first mobile visual novel developed/published in Korea.

Main Chapters
- 1st: Watcher Intro, Watcher Dayfly R, Watcher Inverse R
- 2nd: Watcher Idol Intro, Watcher Idol
- 3rd: Watcher M1, Watcher M2 intro, Watcher M2, Watcher M3

Watcher IF1, Watcher IF2, Watcher IF2.5, Watcher IF3

Our protagonist Hugo lives a peaceful life, far away from war in a remote country named Portland. One day, Hugo witnesses a plane crash and hurriedly checks for survivors. On board he finds only a single girl, Fiona, who is chased by armed forces. 
Hugo, without fully comprehending what is going on, sees himself forced to use his late fathers robot Pirot in order to protect Fiona and flee with her. 
Eventually their adventure leads them on board of the floating battleship Starlight. 
Thats when the cogwheel of destiny starts to spin.


[Translated from [url=https://www.bestmedia.co.jp/game/piroto/story.html]Official Website[/url]]
title: Dengeki no Pilot ~Tenkuu no Kizuna~
TwinEgg ~Kyouki no Mura to Futatsu no Kami~

description:
Right now, in a dimension an unknowable distance away, an Elven Princess, Farina, faces off against a Dark Elf, Riza, in front of the sacred tree that all elves draw their strength from. Riza has an ace up her sleeve; she sends Farina to a world without a sacred tree to draw power from. Our world! Luckily for Farina, she ends up in the bedroom of the greatest power source in all the multiverses; our horny elf-loving protagonist!

Fuck that arrogant attitude right out of Farina as you get her to use her invisible magic to fuck her in public, have her cosplay as a maid or a bunny girl to service you, and fuck her like the cum hungry elven pig she is with a nose hook + collar combo! She'll love whatever you can dish out baby!

Let's not forget about Riza, who assumed that without the sacred tree to give the Princess strength, could hunt Farina down and finish her off. Little did she know what would be waiting for her when she came through the portal was our elf-addicted protagonist and a turbo cum-charged Farina to put Riza in her place as Elf Sex Pet #2.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1721460/]Steam[/url]]
title: Kouki na Bakunyuu Elf Himekishi o Wakarase! Mesu Kobi Haramase Ana ni Suru Seikatsu

description:
You are on an expedition in the legendary Amazon jungle.
Your team has been tasked with exploring an unknown area.
You end up wandering off only to be captured by a tribe of futunari Amazonians.
Find out what exactly it is, that these strange beings want from you.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1579320/]Steam[/url]]
title: Futanari of the Amazon

description:
You are a monster known as the “silver-tongued”. Your goal is simple: convince the most powerful cosmic terrors to steal their souls and rule the world.

But will your greatest obstacle be them underestimating you... or your past?

The game takes place over three conversations with different great terrors of the OUTERWORLD. These are your interlocutors. Use stat raising, INSIGHT and strategy to get them on your side.

This is a game about the power of words so anything goes. Robust chains of reasoning, emotional manipulation or even blackmail are all on the table!

[From [url=https://arkicade.itch.io/a-monsters-insight]Itch.io[/url]]
title: A Monster's Insight

description:
1926, Berlin. Gerda has left everything behind to run away with her boyfriend Joseph, but sitting in a dingy hotel by herself, she‘s not so sure anymore if she made the right  decision. Some things just don’t seem to add up. Maybe Joseph is not what he seems?

[From [URL=https://f-ulmen.itch.io/doubts]itch.io[/URL]]
title: doubts
Limited Space
description:
A lonely guy’s life gets shaken up suddenly when he finds an alien in his room.

[From [URL=https://f-ulmen.itch.io/limited-space]itch.io[/URL]]

title: Loving You Fully
description:
Bianca is an 18-year-old girl with the dream of going to medical school, owning a flower shop, and eventually, finding love. However, there's one big hurdle that she's constantly reminded of that preventing her from doing all three: her body. When she feels like she can't go anywhere in life because of how she looks, she discovers Jasmine, a plus-size model who exudes the energy that Bianca only dreams of. Will she be the one to help Bianca?

[From [url=https://husbandogoddess.itch.io/loving-you-fully]itch.io[/url]]

title: ALLBLACK -Phase#2:Promise-
description:
Broken and limited.

That's when and where human's collective thinking works best.

After my battle in Mombasa, I accepted an invitation from The Supervisor and crossed the continent until I stopped in Istanbul. The Supervisor who I thought was dangerous turned out to be no more than a mediator.

But thanks to her, I'm sure that I am certainly different from a normal person. The hovering raindrops around me the other day is the proof.

My identity is their trump card. They took my memories away as a "hostage" so I would surrender myself.

I honestly can't see any other way, but it seems like fate has other plans.

When I left the Supervisor's place, an unknown girl slipped the phone into my jacket pocket. Through that cell phone, she confessed that she knew me for a long time - she also confessed that she had been looking for me for almost 2 years.

My lost past turned out to be more complicated than I thought.

I still have a choice. The presence of this old friend of mine gave me hope. But now I have to choose, which part of my past do I want to know?

My name is -----, my story continues

[From [URL=https://nsaid.itch.io/allblack-phase-2]itch.io[/URL]]

title: Shokushu Seishoku Jikken -Scape-
description:
Wakana opened her eyes. She was in a white room.

It was a featureless room, like a sterilized chamber.
She was alone, and then she was not. The tentacles came.

The experiment begins to see how these two species mate.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ149396.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]

This is the story of you and your wife. Every day you come home from work to see her and the two of you spend time together. You love your wife more than anything and hope that this time you spend with her will last forever. Things aren't perfect though. The two of you will make mistakes from time to time, but in the end, you'll still love each other, right?

Since this is a story about you, you get to name the protagonist and set their gender. Not only that, but you can also choose your wife's name.
title: My Loving Wife
Drama in the Office
description: You are a photographer for a small agency. You don't know how your boss runs the office since he rarely has a customer. As the story progresses, you find out that the office is just a cover for his dark business. He uses his agency to attract young women. He tells them that he will make them become celebrities. But in fact, he persuades them to become porn actresses.

title: Kaiju Noir
description:
Deep beneath the surface of the earth the monsters of ancient times live in a city of stone and corruption. Unwelcome in the light of the sun, they exist in a world shaped by their experiences with humanity but never to be part of it.

In this city of ever-night you take on the role of Detective Caribaras, private investigator of New Monstropolis, as they and their assistant Alixorus struggle to keep their agency running. Until a new client arrives, bringing with her a case that could either lead to wealth, or a watery grave.

Kaiju Noir is a piece of queer pulp fiction tale of giant monsters in a world rebuilt in humanity's image, for better or worse. Mysteries, corruption, & deception abound in this twisted city of stone.

[From [URL=https://enbykaiju.itch.io/kaijunoirdemo]itch.io[/URL]]

Oookuki sets stage in the Edo period where the warring times has passed and the Tokugawa Bakufu has unified Japan. Although the land has regained peace, to ensure the nation's stability, the Shogun seeks to reclaim power from the daiyos. This strategy adventure game tells the story of Tokiko, a daughter of a lesser daimyo who was falsely accused and latter forced to commit Seppuku. The young Tokiko narrowly escaped death and was brought up by one of her father's retainers as his own. But to avenge her biological father, Tokiko gave up her stable life and enters the political whirlpool that is the Shogun's harem (Oooku) as a servant girl and seeks to eliminate her enemies one by one through clever ploys.

Taken from [url=https://psxdatacenter.com/psx2/games2/SLPM-66441.html]PSXDataCenter[/url].
title: Oookuki

description:
Minato is an amnesiac boy who remembers only his name, banished as an exile—someone who has committed a crime—to Ikishima, an island far from the Wa no Kuni mainland.

Unable to comprehend the situation and confused, the mysterious Minato is accepted by island boys Kazuya, Nagisa, and Reiji, with whom he gradually forms strong “bonds” as they interact, occasionally fight, and grow.

Although his memory had not returned, Minato was living a new and peaceful life. However, the powers of darkness were gradually stealing the sunlight from this peaceful island far from the mainland.

Several months prior, the Honnoji Incident occurred on the mainland. It is said that Nobunaga Oda, the lord who was close to unifying the country, was killed by insurrection, but his corpse was never found.

What happened at Honnoji? What future will Minato arrive at and build up as he defies, follows, and faces the difficulties of the destiny and mission expected of him by the gods…?

[From [url=https://www.gematsu.com/2022/07/soukai-tenki-launches-december-8-in-japan]Gematsu[/url]]
title: Soukai Tenki

description:
After a crazy run in with two supernatural monsters, you, an 18 year old dude, have ended up a superhuman freak with the ability to shapeshift!!! You must come to terms with your new powers and use them for good or for evil.

Don't get too comfortable though, the monsters that you thought were a once in a lifetime occurrence are showing up all over the world, even on the news. It's only a matter of time until someone else gets their own set of superhuman powers! Keep your identity safe and don't neglect strengthening your powers!

[From [url=https://tfgames.site/index.php?module=viewgame&id=2446]TF Games Site[/url]]
title: Superhuman
Radiant Tale
description:
Today's customers at Rebel where Tifalia works, are a unique group of people who called themselves the CIRCUS.

Their first performance was not a success. Tifalia forces to join as an assistant and producer after hearing "What is lacking in the current CIRCUS is mediocre like you!"

She was worried all night wondering how she going on a journey, but with her family's words, she decided to participate.

A crazy dragon that loves to tickle, a spikey clown that doesn't make you laugh, a water creature who doesn't want to use water magic, an acrobat who doesn't know how to entertain, a drunkard furball, an unmotivated leader, and an amateur producer who just joined.

Will they be able to perform successfully in front of crowds?

[from [url=https://www.play-asia.com/radiant-tale/13/70ecs1]Play-Asia[/url]]

title: U-ena -Toohanabi no Shoujo-
description:
―Far fireworks―
That flash orange and white in the sky, and bloom blue flower at the end. This celestial event has recently begun to appear and people call that "Far fireworks."

The story is set in nondescript rural junior high scool. Tomoki belong to a club that mix literatureclub and tea ceremony club. That called "Kotonoha Circle."

It was the night he saw Far fireworks. He meets soaked girl in the center of lake. He spend usual days with Yuena and club president of Kotonoha Circle, Utano Shinonome,but suddenly accelerated unreality approaches the peaceful reality.​ An unreal secret that approaches when you meet someone you thought you couldn't meet.

― ■■ in the world. Even if taking her hand will eventually change the world, I am ー.

A summer seem to prolong the moment cross between two people for all eternity. I'm still praying in the sky that time should continue forever.

[From the [url=https://en.u-ena.com/story]official site[/url]]

title: Corpse Party: Re-Call
description:
Fan game spin-off on the game Corpse Party: Blood Covered. The main characters are brother and sister Jun and Chio Camada (19 and 13 years old). 
Jun finds a job in another city, Chio, in order to never lose contact with her brother, offers to perform the "Sachiko Ever After" ritual.
aliases: コープスパーティー リコール

title: Hikeback
description:
HIKEBACK is a short visual novel about trust, self-sabotage, and never-ending cycles. You play as a driver passing through a mountain road late at night, when you spot a hitchhiker flagging you down up ahead. How you proceed from there determines not only the fate of you and the wide-eyed stranger you meet, but your combined fates across multiple planes of existence. In a cycle that seems to torment you for INFINITY, how long will it take for you to finally arrive at the THRESHOLD? Will you find the better ending you seek? Or will you succumb to what fate has in store for you?

[From [url=https://clowndream.itch.io/hikeback]itch.io[/url]]

title: Ooe
description:
A commemoration for the second anniversary of an actress’s death is being held on Ooejima, a remote island beyond Hachijoujima, south of Tokyo. Oosaki, a detective, receives a request to attend the ceremony on someone’s behalf.

However, the ship meant to bring them back fails to show up at the appointed hour, no one has heard a thing from the coordinator of the event, and there seems to be an inexplicable fear and hatred between all of the attendees.

Stranded on an ominous island, ten people try to unravel the mystery of the threads weaving their past and the death of the actress named An Ooe.

An unconventional mystery set in the Showa era with a Japanese twist on the classic closed circle literary device.

It is the year 1955, mid-showa period. An era characterised by chaotic sentiments, with traces of war still visible. The attendees, accompanied by doubts and their devotion to An Ooe, come to the memorial service in an abandoned village. They manage to overcome the barriers of status and spend their time in harmony. However, the situation changes when the servant who helped them until then is found dead. Driven by extreme suspicion, they start to search for the murderer, but this is followed by a second and third crime...

Attendees = All Criminals = Love Interests.

All nine attendees can be pursued, including the servant, who’s the first to meet an unnatural death. In each route, the focus lies on solving the mystery and romance. The number of attendees who can be pursued increases as you pass through the prologue, and more options and profiles are added each time you clear the game. Enjoy this classic detective fiction while indulging in the perverse pleasure of being deceived by those you believe in.

[Translated from [url=https://adeltaz1.wixsite.com/owen]the official website[/url].]

title: A Forsaken Place
description:
Centuries ago, Ingrid the Great waged war on demonkind with the power of black magic and won. Demons were banished to the underworld where they could no longer harm humanity with their wicked ways.  Or, so the legend goes.  

After finding her great ancestor's journal, Titania wants to become the greatest enchantress to ever live. So naturally, she summons the Demon Prince, Asmodeus, using Ingrid's notes. What could go wrong? 

Romance, befriend, or even make an enemy of Asmodeus. Will you be able to uncover the truth about the relationship between humanity and demonkind, or will you be left in the dark?

[From [URL=https://legendex-games.itch.io/aforsakenplace]itch.io[/URL]]

When I was a child, I had a girl who promised marriage to each other.
But, a war burned down the town, we both lost the parents and got separated.
Ten years after.
I found her on the front line fighting for the vengeance.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ044843.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Henkyou no Onna Senshi
Ningen x Mamono Fantasy ~Fukushuu no Da mou

description:
Battle Royale: For Your Heart! (BRFYH) is a battle royale themed romance parody game in development. This game is a critique on common visual novel and anime tropes, online gaming communities, and, of course, the ever-growing popularity of battle royale games.

After watching SamuraiStriker, world famous streamer and competitive battle royale player, invite gamers of all skill levels to join him in LegendEx Games' Fighter's Cup, you decide to enter the tournament to try and win the highly sought after mystery prize.

The only problem? You are a complete noob, mistakenly entered the duos tournament as a solo player,  have to scramble to find a partner, and attempt to win the competition!

Select your avatar, player voice, gamertag, and possible duo partner, as you venture into an expansive virtual world alongside a colorful cast of characters. It is up to you to decide how the game unfolds. Unlock hidden scenes, build a bond with your partner (or enemies!) and try to win the competition! 

[From [URL=https://legendex-games.itch.io/battle-royale-for-your-heart]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Battle Royale: For Your Heart!
Phasmohentaia
description:
It's been over a month since strange things began happening around your home, you can't sleep, your work suffers and your love-life is over.

Maybe now that you have a ouija board things might change and you can get some answers? There's no way this can possibly backfire on you.

[From F95Zone]

title: No Honour Among Thieves
description:
“You are yet to realise the power you hold.”

Step into the shadows, taking up the role of an infamous underground contractor - a hard-working master of all trades that would get you sent to hell. No Honour Among Thieves is a queer, crime thriller visual novel that takes you on a suspenseful journey to con your way into the heart of a Mafia boss; what you do from there is up to you. Do you fulfill your contract and rip his heart into pieces, or do you find they’ve wormed their way into your heart instead…?

The journey won’t be a simple one, that’s for sure. The boss is guarded by a biker gang leader with her own agenda, heart locked behind equally sturdy doors - and a one-way ticket to death’s door if you make the wrong move. Everyone has their eyes on you, from the man you work for to the dealer of secrets, and everything comes at a price.

Where will your choices lead?

[From [url=https://trynx.itch.io/no-honour-among-thieves]itch.io[/url]]

title: Midheaven: Winds of Ambition
description:
Midheaven: Winds of Ambition follows the tale of a young Mahyine (an original species of the Midheaven saga, with naga-like features) noble in court who determines to follow their ambitions, along with the presence of one of the four Regals.

Winds of Ambition is a stats-raising visual novel, where every choice can result in the most fatal outcome. The objective of the game is keeping the protagonist alive for 12 seasons, and marry one of the four Regals.

[From [url=https://midheaven.itch.io/midheavenwoa]itch.io[/url]]

Old Gods. Old regrets. New life.

Sigurn the Divine hates her title. Blessed by a God and tasked with saving her kingdom, she was a hero in every sense of the word. She fought monsters, slew dragons, and battled the forces of evil, armed with a divine sword and holy lightning.

And then she failed at a definitive moment, forcing her to slink away into the night.

Now living with the ever busy warlock (or sometimes witch) Thistle, Sigurn is merely a shadow of her former self. She spends most of her time in Thistle's home plagued by irritability and nightmares.

All Sigurn wants to do is move on from her life as hero. But to do so she will need to confront the God that blessed her. And then, of course, there's the small matter of new, not-so-small feelings regarding Thistle...

[From [URL=https://that-wannabe-cat.itch.io/merely-a-regret]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Merely a Regret

aliases: Laid-Back Camp: Have a Nice Day!
title: Yuru Camp△ - Have a Nice Day!
description:
Take on the roles of Kagamihara Nadeshiko and Shima Rin, and enjoy a branching story where the camp contents change in a big way based on your choices. With “what if” scenarios not depicted in the TV anime, this is a game Laid-Back Camp fans will not want to miss.

The game features various "what if" scenarios. What if everyone went to the Takabocchi Highlands, where Rin originally went solo? What if Rin camped solo at Shibire Lake, where she originally went with Nadeshiko? What if Rin brought a portable grill to Lake Motosu? Despite featuring the same scenes as the anime, you can still enjoy a fresh camping experience!


In Laid-Back Camp: Have a Nice Day!, you can relive the Laid-Back Camp experience by visiting Lake Motosu, Fumoto Campsite, Eastwood Campsite, Takabocchi Highlands, Shibire Lake, Jinbagatayama Campsite, and Fujinomiya. Furthermore, Lake Tanuki Campsite, which only appears by name in the original comic, has also been added as a campground. But whether you are able to camp there depends on your actions.

[edited from [url=https://www.gematsu.com/2021/04/laid-back-camp-have-a-nice-day-launches-september-30-in-japan]Gematsu[/url]]

This story takes place on a parallel world where registered nudity and indentured slavery are legal under a government known as “The State”.

Tech student Casey Reine finds herself the victim of a mysterious blackmailer who slowly coerces her into a life she never expected.

[From F95Zone]

An adaptation of the erotic web-novel "[url=https://www.literotica.com/stories/memberpage.php?uid=5399309&page=submissions]Casey's Fall[/url]".

Source- Project EGG, D4 Enterprise

title: Fantasy of the Mind
description:
The kingdoms of Idram and Armeria are locked in a war over territory. Caught in the conflict, the heroine is rescued by a self-proclaimed wizard. But one day, she drinks a potion that makes her hear people's thoughtsーー

[From in-app]

title: Time to Love! Share-House in Shirokanedai Lovers Part
description: You were finally in a relationship with the person you were interested in. Although you were leading a life full of joy, problems arise between you and your boyfriend... Will you be able to overcome the hardships and discover true love?

title: Naxie Nian, Women Yiqi Shou Dao de Haoren Ka

description:
As my friends get married one after another, I'm still single ... One day in front of me, an angel appears by chance and tells me that my wish will be granted.

"If that love had been successful, I could be married already!" I thus start traveling through time, going through my former lovers again...
title: Time Slip: Koi no Kiseki
Dousoukai wa Koi no Hajimari
description: The protagonist reunites with her high school classmates ten years after graduation. At the second party, they invite her to join their Tokyo drinking club, and she decides to move to Tokyo and join the elite!

Main character 「Hataro」has a girlfriend and is a socialable regular high school student
It’s a diary exchange. It’s popular these days Hataro-kun. Don’t you know? Everyone’s doing it.
The girlfriend 「Utsuro」’s idea to start the popular diary exchange.
The slightest trigger was the beginning of a nightmare...
