Shin Hayarigami 3
description:
A new set of occult incidents are investigated by police detective Houjou Maki and her partner Sena. 

[From [url=https://vndbreview.blogspot.com/2021/11/vn-of-month-july-2021-fuuraiki-4.html]vndbreview[/url]]

Ten years before the events of Ace Attorney Investigations: Miles Edgeworth, the story follows Protagonist, a podiatry student at Allebahst Academy, as he falls in love on first sight with the impenetrable Ambassador Quercus Alba, and becomes involved in an incident that would forever scar the school.
title: Quercus Alba Dating Simulator
Geunyeoga Gongjakjeoro Gaya Haetdeon Sajeong
description:
After a mysterious death, Park Eunha enters the world of a novel. She is revived as a minor character, Raeliana McMillan, who is to be poisoned to death by her own betrothed. In order to break up with her dangerous fiancé, she offers a surreptitious deal to the male protagonist of the novel, Noah Wynknight, but winds up romantically with other men that are not part of the plan. Noah Wynknight of inescapable but suspicious charm; honest Justin Shamal who loves only one person; or Adam Taylor for whom you have a soft spot for no reason whenever you see him. Will Raeliana successfully get out of this crisis and create a new ending for herself? Who will be the one that will join Raeliana in her new ending?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1564710/]Steam[/url]]
A companion visual novel to Adastra...
title: Interea
Nora to Oujo to Noraneko Heart 3
Zengaku!! (2)
description: The start of naked week is here.  Chris remains partners with both [url=/c76899]Arisu[/url] and [url=/c76901]Sana[/url]. As new students this is their first real experience with naked week and they won't be alone. Friends they have made include [url=/c96844]Rinka[/url] and [url=/c76902]Kanon[/url]. Chris and the girls watch out for each other during naked week, supporting each other during hardships they encounter as they perform duties such as community service and after school jobs. Meanwhile the girls get an idea to present a dance for the last day of naked week. Their ability to handle the embarrassment will be stretched to the limit!

[url=/c76904]Masumi Chris[/url] passed the entrance exams for the prestigious school Nihon Daiichi Academy. However each year for one week Nihon Daichi takes part in an old tradition of naked week. A tradition in Japan many schools once took part in. It seems only Nihon Daiichi Academy, from Kindergarten to College, in the heart of Tokyo, still upholds the old tradition. To strengthen the body, to reinforce the heart, to build lifelong relationships, and to foster community. These are the 4 points of Total Nude Scholastic's Week. To help new students adjust to the embarrassment they will feel during naked week a special school has been created, Zengaku! Here students may practice being naked in a safe and controlled environment before having to bear the shame of being naked in the heart of Tokyo.

In this append, [url=/c76901]Koori Sana[/url] does not have a partner due to an odd number of girls to boys so she is paired up with [url=/c76899]Amamine Arisu[/url] and Chris. Chris enjoys having two beautiful partners to watch over during naked week practice. Sometimes he even helps [url=/c76902]Toujou Kanon[/url] when she finds herself in trouble too.

Note: This append depends on having played the original version [url=/v22214]ZENGAKU! ~Zenra Toukou Shuukan Tokubetsu Taisaku Gasshuku~[/url] to understand. Scenes are played showing where in the original version they take place with additional information assuming Sana becomes Chris's partner too.
title: Zengaku! Sana Append

description:
A Sound Novel adaptation of a Web Novel.

The city of ancient ghost tales, Kodamamachi.
In the art club of the Kodama north middle school, a group of local girls gather every day to talk about their shared interest: ghost stories.

They still don't know that by doing so they're slowly breaking the lock of something that was sealed deep within the school.

On that faithful May, two club members, Karasugai Itsuka and Kuroume Maki, have a sudden encounter with a real youkai who calls himself Kanon.
He says their ghost stories weakened the seal of the "Great Spirit Way", and he commands them to take responsibility for it.

In order to seal it back, they need to solve the mysterious occurrences that start happening around the school.

[Translated from the [url=https://6045.moryou.com/ayasigoto_R/story.html]main site[/url]]
title: Ayashigoto Banashi R
Mycorrhiza
description:
Mycorrhiza is a love letter to horror manga in the form of a visualnovel. Some of our biggest inspirations include the works of Junji Ito and Masaaki Nakayama.

While the protagonist is trying to find a way back home, reality distorts and people’s morals start shifting in cruel and unexpected ways. A strange plant transforming animals, a strange comedy trend and a strange building trapping people. Each of the three arcs explores different terrors.

The game features a manga aesthetic (with CGs drawn by a manga artist), as well as a higher focus on dynamic audio.

[From [URL=https://fulminisictus.itch.io/mycorrhiza]itch.io[/URL]]

Join Rigo and his "friends" as they engage in everyday activities in a not so normal world. With his unique brand of stupidity, guide Rigo's choices so that you can discover every single route in the game (or just rush to the end to say that you finished, that's fine too).

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1056370/Rigo_The_Movie/]Steam[/url]]
title: Rigo: The Movie
Vignette
description:
Rory, on a particularly stormy night, stumbles upon a surprisingly charming abandoned home. After showing this discovery to their younger sibling, Desdemona, the two pass their time fixing up the place, and adding their own charm. Years pass, people change, friends come and go, but their secret base still quietly remains. 

[From [url=https://watercress.itch.io/vignette]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Tetsu no Sougiya to Haiiro no Koi
description: A story about a man with a strange disease that gradually turns his skin into iron.

One day, delinquent Usami Mitsuki saves Doll, a guy dressed up in a fox costume, from getting hit by a car.
Doll then asks Mitsuki if he'd like to become a hero and fight the demons causing havoc in the human world.
Mitsuki agrees, expecting to wear a suit and cape, but instead, he's forced to transform into a magical girl outfit!
Not to mention, he can't wield magic unless he has sex with Doll?!

[Translated from [url=http://riccaricca.net/game/bl-magic/]official website[/url]]
title: Mahou Danshi Rabirabi Cute

description:
Based on Hans Christian Andersen's fairy-tale 'The Story of a Mother',  this mini-game accompanies its female protagonist through the pain of loss in a dark-fantasy landscape. There are six different ways to end her story, what will become of her is up to you.

[From [url=https://brownegg.itch.io/mother]itch.io[/url]]
title: Mother

description:
To avoid the arranged marriage, Mikoto lied to her father that she had a boyfriend.

If she doesn't introduce her boyfriend to her father by the promised day, she'll be forced into marriage.

"Are you sure you have your boyfriend?"

"Nope..."

"Do you have no brain?"

Train your boyfriend with a toxic butler?!

Talking to a stray pimp through tap and auto-play, turn him into your perfect boyfriend!

[from [url=https://apps.apple.com/us/app/my-puppy-fianc%C3%A9/id1567148474]App Store[/url]]
title: Kon'yakusha (Kari) Hiroimashita

aliases: Harvest flowers that bloom several years later.
title: Hanagane Kanade * Gram - Chapter:1 Kozakura Yui
description:
Tokyo Bay Area, somewhere in the Minato Ward.

Today is the last day of the second semester, the end of the year approaching. Godai Tomori, a member of the Twilight Club, the anything-goes club at Seiryou Academy, sighed even louder than usual.

Kanade, the club president, skillfully works and simultaneously converse with him. While emphasizing her big boobs.
Then, the former student council president Kotona interrupts them with a handful of sweets. And also shaking her big boobs.
Meanwhile, his underclassmate Yui would tangle and tease him whenever she has the chances. Not to forget pushing against him with her obviously—again—big boobs.
In this situation, the maid secretary, Sumire, made him a cup of tea with a smile. The glimpsing views of her deep cleavage is very soothing, and that indicates a presence of yet another pair of big boobs.

The Twilight Club... is not actually that kind of booby club. Surrounded by pretty girls, Tomori is happily working away despite the hustle and bustle. It's an end-of-the-year tradition, an annual cleaning in gratitude for the year. As they are all noisily cleans up the club room, Tomori find an ''old box'' that he doesn't recognize. When he opens it, he find a small key and a letter from an unknown sender inside.

"I am the Black Traveler."
"The Celestial Sphere of Time has been destroyed, and the world's balance has been disturbed."
——is the nonsense that is written on the letter.

This is the last mystery (Alicegram) left behind in the Twilight Club.

What is the meaning of this letter? And how will this change his relationship with the girls? What kind of future will they choose?

The mysterious and exciting erotic story of the protagonist, Godai Tomori, is about to begin.

[Edited from [url=http://nanawind.jp/product/prj06/chapter1/]Official Website[/url]]

title: Rurizakura
description:
「If it can be true——a happy, end」

Strange lifeforms known as 「demons」which took people’s lives in the past are rampaging, bringing chaos to the current world.

In order to fight with them, half-demons known as 「dance princess」 were created by the people. In addition, by worshipping the sacred Sakura tree to seal the border with the other world, the appearance of the demons gradually decreases.

But as time goes on, the sacred tree was eroded by impurity from the demons.
Demons are starting to appear again due to the seal being worn off.

Then, the people successfully created a half-demon who bears the curse of immortality. By offering to the 「gods」, the impurity and himself was sealed in the land and balance of the world is brought.

800 years has passed by since then.

Being the one offered to the「gods」, 
the boy carrying the curse of immortality —— Mikoto.
Battling as a「dance princess」,
the girl who seal the demons at the cost of her own life —— Sakura.

A boy wandering in his own solitude, and a girl searching for a place to spend her final time.

This is the story of their last 29 days of meeting and spending time together——

[Translated from [url=https://www.lumpofsugar.co.jp/product/rurizakura/]official website[/url]]

A man followed a woman onto a train. He pushed her into a corner and touched her body to see how she would react. She didn't resist, so he went further and made her feel pleasure until she climaxed. This happened every day, and eventually, he tried to make her give him oral sex. She initially resisted, but then began to enjoy it. He ejaculated in her mouth just before they arrived at the station, and she swallowed it. The man left the train, and the woman left feeling weak and disoriented.
title: Kaikan Soku Iki Man'in Densha ~Kono Densha wa Kairaku Ochi Chokutsuu Desu~
Houkago⇒Education! ~Sensei to Hajimeru Miwaku no Lesson~
description:
Rurinofune (lapislazuli ship) Academy ––

The school where ambitious young students from all over the country gather day after day in the pursuit of knowledge. It's not a boys school per se, however, the student body consists of 100% males, which makes people refer to it as the "aromantic stone ship." 

However, lately the principal has been employing more professional women teachers, who are adept in many fields. Those women have been enjoying reverence and popularity as though they were idols by the male student body.

Our protagonist, Arato Kanata, had been moving away from his prestigious hometown and came to Japan and attends Rurinofune Academy as an off-season transfer student.

In order to have a chance at graduation, he has to take some after-school remedial classes for several months. And the girls responsible for these classes are those cherished girls that all the students yearn for. 

Being closer to these teachers than the average student, the character of Kanata's relationship with them soon turns intimate...

[Translated from the [url=https://www.escude.co.jp/product/education/about.html]Official website[/url]]

title: Aisai ~Tsuma to Oyaji Dake no Toki~
description: The protagonist, Tomokazu Mihara, lives with his beloved wife, Maho, and his father in their family home. They started living together about a year ago, after Tomokazu's mother suddenly passed away from an illness. His father initially lost the will to live and quit his job, but with Maho's support, he eventually recovered. However, as his energy returned, he began to develop inappropriate feelings towards his beautiful and young daughter-in-law. Unaware of his father's lust, Tomokazu and Maho start trying to conceive a child. They struggle to get pregnant, and Maho worries it's her fault. One day, after Tomokazu leaves for work, his father approaches Maho and offers to help with their fertility issues. He takes advantage of her vulnerability and forces himself on her. This continues, with the father-in-law pursuing Maho whenever he can, and Maho, fearing her husband will find out, being unable to resist. As time goes on, Maho becomes increasingly drawn to the intense and passionate encounters with her father-in-law.

title: Fantastic Poor
description:
It is a wholesome story about a first-year student girl who lost her wallet. She encountered fantastic poor students due to the situation. It has a slight of comedy and romance with meaningful slice-of-life lessons from the Creator.

[From [url=https://acg-visual-novels.itch.io/fantastic-poor-vn]itch.io[/url]]

Rosie and Emily are best friends, they know each other for years, and today they'll have a sleepover at Emily's place but...

Why is Rosie having this weird feelings when she's with Emily? And, why is Emily teasing her so much?

But one thing is for sure. This will be the start of something amazing.

[From [URL=https://tangledvirus.itch.io/the-start-of-something-amazing]itch.io[/URL]]
title: The Start of Something Amazing.
My Home is You.
description:
Casbah is going to move in with their cute and excentric partner Marta! Then they find out that they both are going to live on abandoned morgue... Y'know, where there used to be dead bodies?

Follow Casbah on their first week of living together with their partner.

[From [URL=https://tangledvirus.itch.io/my-home-is-you]itch.io[/URL]]

[url=/s23600]TheLastYuriSamurai[/url] and [url=/s23479]TangledVirus[/url], two devs that decided to make a huge game for a jam in just 4 days... And they just... missed the first day...

SURELLY NOTHING BAD WILL HAPPEN? Right..?

[From [URL=https://tangledvirus.itch.io/gayme-jam-the-experience]itch.io[/URL]]
title: GAYME JAM: The Experience!
Suki Da! Suki Da! Daisuki Da!!

description:
Camila, the coolest goth around*, is at a tough spot in her life. Stuck in her goals in becoming a vampire and with a crush on her best friend with benefits Lucy, who already has a mysterious girlfriend; Camila doesn't know what to do. Fortunately, she knows the coolest** spot for local monsters: The Dreadful Hearts Club.

Unfortunately, the Dreadful Hearts Club rule on humans is invite only, and Camila and Lucy are humans. All that changes on a graveyard picnic where Camila learns three important things:

 - Lucy is a Vampire.
 - Camila is a Human.
 - And most shockingly of all... Camila is Lucy's girlfriend.

* According to Camila
** Also according to Camila

[From [URL=https://tangledvirus.itch.io/my-vampire-girlfriend]itch.io[/URL]]
title: My Vampire Girlfriend.
No More Future
description:
You're a young adult yuuman (homo anthropomorphis), living in a futuristic America in the late 22nd century. Though you had a life, dreams, and aspirations once, it all got swept away once you were diagnosed with incurable late-stage brain cancer; now you're stuck in a hospital, living the last few weeks of your life in existential agony, incapable of processing what you did wrong to deserve this fate.

Everything changes when, one day, you're approached by a scientist from the world's largest mega-corporation, who offers you a chance to escape your dying body and have your mind transplanted onto an android synth vessel; the only catch being, nobody knows whether the process works or not, whether you'll survive the transition or ultimately perish. With little holding you back, you eventually accept...

...You awaken in your new body, feeling quite different from how you were before. Nobody can tell whether it's truly you inside the machine, or an AI pretending, believing that it's you. Not even you can tell. In a world where technology's constantly evolving, advanced AIs are viewed with fear and suspicion and few things are certain, you have to rebuild your old life from scratch, convince those who abandoned you on your deathbed that you're still here, and ultimately figure out whether you truly are who you claim to be.

[From [URL=https://sedgelord.itch.io/nomorefuture]itch.io[/URL]]

In the distant future, humanity has learned how to upload memories onto physical VHS tapes called MemROM to usher in an era of digital immortality. MemROM has allowed memories to attain permanence with just two limitations: once uploaded, it cannot be copied onto another tape or retrieved by its user. With a one-time upload constraint, illegal markets run rampant to buy and sell coveted memories.

Across the urban sprawl of holographic high-rises, cyber augmentation, and scientists playing God, the line between human and android continues to blur.

Sabrya Kayal has lived her whole life in Reaverdrift, a washed-up town at the end of the NeoRail train line, working a monotonous job as a bartender. Her father's untimely death a few years prior has left her family in fragments, especially when his memories are nowhere to be found.

Sabrya believes his MemROM has been stolen, but it's hard to prove with nothing to go on but a hunch. In between piecing together what she hopes is the truth, mysterious strangers filter in and out, bearing links to the conspiracy she is already ensnared in. 

[From [URL=https://narcissos.itch.io/contactee]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Contactee
Medieval Favours
description:
Welcome to a magical world full of-!!! *Sighs* Who am i kidding? This place is not very magical... but maybe you can still have an adventure in it! Meet some wierd af characters in this world that was totally not inspired in different  IP's like Dave the Barbarian, Shrek and the Office! Can you help them with the favours they need?

[From [URL=https://satoshi98.itch.io/medieval-favours]itch.io[/URL]]

title: Queen Succubus no Wana
description:
The Queen Succubus was defeated by the Hero.
With this, there should have been no more men to lose their lives after being toyed with by a succubus.

However, the Queen Succubus mustered the last of her strength and appeared in the Hero’s dream.
In order to steal the Hero’s energy and reappear in the real world.

Her attack method wasn't by a sword or magic, but sweet paizuri.........
He must endure that.........

You follow Valerie Campbell, a curious college student visiting Hale, England to meet her best friend, Persephone Drake, for the first time in person. She knows going into this that Persi is in a family of witches, her particular passion being demonology, so it's no surprise when Persi offers to summon a demon with Val. But what happens when Val decides to summon someone by herself?

[From [URL=https://astralmars.itch.io/midnight-demo]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Midnight

description:
The Blue Cloth is a short kinetic visual novel made for the NaNoRenO game jam. It takes place in a fantasy setting on the road south of the shipping town Galebras.

Levis is a blue mage of The Circle, traveling southward to the town of Cullion. His job is to investigate a plague that had stricken the town. Alfrin is the guard from the capitol traveling along with Levis to ensure he arrives safely.

Join them on their journey south through the lush countryside of Southern Oshova, as they reach the head of their travels.

[From [URL=https://eymonart.itch.io/the-blue-cloth]itch.io[/URL]]
title: The Blue Cloth

description: Gallery Fake is a pure adventure game that takes after the anime/manga of the same name. You play as Fujita Reiji and must solve the mysterious events surrounding a few priceless pieces of artwork. Gameplay seems to be centered on dialogue, giving you options to "break" into conversations and determine when you're being told something that's "fake." New scenarios featuring famous real pieces of artwork will feature in this portable adaptation
title: Gallery Fake
Cracked Moonstone
description:
Melanie has finally married the man of her dreams. Their wedding went off without any problems [s]minus the lack of flower petals[/s] and off on a week-long cruise to enjoy their honeymoon.

Maybe now, the two of them can finally put the past behind them as they plan to say their final goodbyes to a friend long gone missing.

[s]But she isn't ready to say goodbye to them.[/s]

[From [URL=https://sunlit-dreamer.itch.io/cracked-moonstone]itch.io[/URL]]

A couple visit Echo to do some paranormal investigating, the town now abandoned five years after the mass hysteria. Despite this, something evil still lurks in the town, evil enough that it's kept the horrors alive.

[From [URL=https://echoproject.itch.io/arches]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Arches
Okaa-san ga Daisuki ~Toaru Oyako no Doutei Zei Taisaku~
Project: Eden's Garden
description:
16 talented participants enter the game. Only 2 will walk out alive. Don't let history repeat itself. Break the cycle.

Project: Eden's Garden will be a Free-To-Play video game inspired by the popular visual novel series known as Danganronpa. While this game will be heavily influenced by the property, it will be an original story with diverse characters and gameplay experiences.

[From https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GVpepDKH9kk]

Shirogane Akemi is a normal 19-year-old who has been into idols ever since she was a kid. Except the normal part isn't particularly right: She's the daughter of WHITE Production's President.

One day, Akemi was assigned a mission: Assembling an idol group in less than a year. Will she be able to reach that goal?

[From [URL=https://mirkatz.itch.io/starlit-reach]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Re☆ch!

description:
Quinn Edwards is a senior at a fancy private school, who's in love with their best friend, Berry, an adorable but oblivious girl who goes to the local public High School. They've been way too busy pining to do anything about their crush, but one day Berry asks them out! Is it a date? Maybe???

[From [URL=https://morningtou.itch.io/raspberryquinn-sweetheart]itch.io[/URL]]
title: RaspberryQuinn: Sweetheart

description:
When Alliya was summoned to earth to help a human's "Dream come true" she thought this'd be a typical job. However, her and the man known only as "Boss" have very different ideas of what a "Dream" is, and she's stuck here on earth until she can complete this seemingly impossible task! What's more, The Boss has also more than one succubus working for him?! 

[From [URL=https://jonfawkes.itch.io/bus-tea-succubus]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Bus-Tea Succubus

description:
Garland is a mid-level adventurer who was tricked by a senior adventurer into taking on a quest that left him badly injured. Luckily, he survives, but his injuries leave him unable to lead a normal life.

He needs someone to take care of him until he can return to being an adventurer, but after being deceived by his trusted senior and becoming distrustful of people, Garland buys a former princess knight and her maid of honor who are cursed to absolute obedience to their master.

The relationship between the three of them changes during their self-sufficient life with nature deep in the remote mountains.

[Translated from [url=http://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1132424]Getchu[/url]]
title: Dorei Himekishi to Dorei Jijo to no Slow Life
CORPSE FACTORY
description:
//TOKYO, 20XX: Whispers and rumors are spreading through the streets of metropolitan Tokyo like wildfire. Murmurings of a bizarre website have started to pique the interest of more than a few people—people willing to take extreme risks in order to fulfil their darkest desires.

Corpse Girl's Website supposedly allows users to request the death of someone they know. All that is required is a photo of the proposed victim. Once an image is uploaded, the website promises to snuff out the victim's soul within a matter of days.

Victims of the website apparently receive a photograph of their own corpse—even before they are dead. Photos are time stamped with a date... Perhaps a predicted time of death? 

The website's authenticity is questionable at best. It has become an interesting topic of conversation and nothing more. And yet... When people start dying in odd ways across the city, the website instantly returns to the limelight.

All of the recent victims were found in possession of strange photos—photos of their own corpses, received only hours before they died.

Who—or what—is truly behind the deaths remains to be seen.

Somewhere in Tokyo, inside a dark apartment, a young woman who refers to herself as Corpse Girl begins to tighten her grip on the trembling city... 

[From the [url=https://www.rivercrow.studio/corpse-factory]official website[/url]]

title: Clownpiece o Ore-iro ni Someageru!?
description:
The protagonist needs to find a way to repay his debt to Rinnosuke as he accidentally ruined a pair of "female-scented" socks while browsing the Kourindou, to avoid having to work there for free for all his life.

On his way home he meets Clownpiece, the hell fairy. Upon taking her to the Kourindou, Rinnosuke suggests he can get her help to make another pair of "female-scented" socks.

title: Kakuriyo no Saiyaku to Utsushiyo no Ikusabime ~Kirie Hen~

description:
In the midst of leading an ordinary life, I began to feel the urge to find myself a girlfriend. Yet somehow, I couldn't bring myself to take the first step. But one day...

"What's this...?"

A single notebook had fallen right in front of me.

"Hey, you! Yes, you! Why aren't you picking it up?"

Before my eyes appeared a strange young woman. Seemingly human, yet seemingly not.

"I'm an angel of love! Tell me, is there someone that you have a crush on?"

She couldn't sound more sketchy if she tried.

When I decided to ignore her, the girl thrust the notebook angrily toward me.

"This is the Love Note, you know. The Love Note! With this, you're sure to find romance with any girl you like!"

Apparently, by writing the name of the person you're interested in, the notebook will tell you your current level of "fatedness" with said person, as well as what to do in order to raise it.

"What's more, I'll lend you my assistance too!"

However...
If the owner of the Love Note is unable to find the bride of his dreams within 90 days, he will be rendered impotent. Forevermore.

"So there you have it. Do your best, 'kay?"

And so, with the help of this angel of love, I began putting this so-called Love Note to use in order to fulfill my romantic endeavors.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2370540/My_Klutzy_Cupid/]Steam[/url]]
title: Ore no Cupid ga Ponkotsu Sugite Kowa~i.

description:
June, the rainy season.
Kei, a fourth-year college student, is at a major crossroads.

Since the day of the fireworks display when he interrupted the confession from his younger sister Haruka, the relationship between them has gone cold, and still remains in this way for three years.

To become truly happy together, until the "Answer" is found, there is no way to respond to his sister's feelings. While desperately holding back the feelings for his sister, Kei continues to act as a "good older brother". On the other hand, Haruka is acting coldly towards her brother, who does not respond to her feelings, despite being aware of each other.

As the rainy season continues, Kei's worries deepen.
To become truly happy together.
If he can find the "Answer", he should be able to respond to his sister's feelings.

One day, as a result of consulting with his friend Daichi, Kei reluctantly goes to a hostess club, since there is a girl whom his friend really wants him to meet. Appearing in front of Kei is a girl who could have been mistaken for his beloved sister, a face that looks exactly like Haruka. The girl introduces herself as "Mitsuki", feeling "Similar", the two of them become intensely attracted to each other.

With the appearance of "Mitsuki", the relationship between the siblings "Kei" and "Haruka" begins to change drastically.

[Translated and edited from [url=https://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1241534]Getchu[/url]]
title: Imouto to Kanojo - Sorezore no Sentaku

description:
Jackie Huang learns more about the clients that carry a heavy past who frequent the shop for a little sleep therapy. This 4-month project that serves as both a visual development and motion graphic school project invites you into the mysterious yet magical world of Dr. Feng’s apothecary.

[From [URL=https://klaiis.itch.io/serenity-at-dusk]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Serenity at Dusk
Nyotai-ka Hero no Torishimari! Ore-sama wa "Watashi" ni Nanka Naranai shi. ~Aku no Soshiki ga Chijoku Zenkai Lesson~

description:
Humanity has gone nearly extinct. A vast number of people have died for no explainable reason. The everyday lives of all humans everywhere have been utterly shattered.

Just one month after this horrible tragedy, there are only four sole survivors on a floating island south of the capital—two men and two women. They must work together to survive, gathering information and securing food in the morning and eating together at night.

However, as time passes, tensions begin to arise as the reality of their situation sinks in. Can the four of them work through these difficulties to survive the apocalypse?

[From [URL=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2377410/]Steam[/URL]]
title: Immoral Quartet ~4-nin no Seiyoku ga Karamiau, Ai to Netorare no Monogatari~

aliases: World of Seduction ~Don't Lose to Temptation on the Succubus Planet~
description:
Enjoy a new succubus adventure game—a thrilling heroic fantasy that takes an erotic twist as irresistible succubi train you in pleasure!

Resist temptation! If you fail and give into temptation, your journey might come to an end quickly. But! Multiple endings means all you have to do is try your best to resist again. Be careful, the situations are indeed... tempting...

[From [url=https://medibang.itch.io/succuseka-resist-succubus-temptation-global-version]Itch.io[/url]]
title: SuccuSeka ~Yuuwaku ni Makenaide: Succubus ni Kanri Sareta Sekai de~
Tomodachi ga Sukunai Hinnyuu Musume o Haramasete Mita
Outerspace Cafe
description:
You're just chilling in your cafe and [B]BAM![/B] A small alien child comes to bug you! It's up to you to decide her fate into the alien she grows up to be!

[From [URL=https://spicyskull.itch.io/outerspace-cafe]itch.io[/URL]]

title: Tethered
description:
Bea is an overworked secretary whose boss keeps dragging her up to the space station for no reason. She wasn't expecting this trip on the space elevator to be more than yet another boring five days she'd spend reading trashy romance novels, she certainly wouldn't expect any fateful romantic encounters with any cute, quirky girl insisting that she try to have some fun.

[From [URL=https://dllott.itch.io/tethered]itch.io[/URL]]

title: Good Lookin' Home Cookin'
description:
Play as Jessica and Amira, childhood best friends, running their dream food court during the busy month of Ramadan. 

Will their friendship withstand the pressure?

Or will the stress of running a business together shut down the GLHC food court for good?

You decide. 

[From [URL=https://teamtoadhouse.itch.io/good-lookin-home-cookin]itch.io[/URL]]

Ever just wanna run away to a cottage in the woods. . .
Surrounded by a loving group of kind, interesting friends. . .
And feel. . . happy?

Same. So what do we do?
Impulsively move to a picturesque town and start over!

At first, everyone wonders, but their suspicion gradually fades. After a while, the influential people at the time name this era "Kowa".

With the leaves slowly spreading throughout the region, a small cult worshiping the crimson leaves, calling themselves [i]Shuukyou[/i], has risen among the people.

Time passes, and it is now the 18th year of [i]Kowa[/i]. When the hapless fates of those who live in this harsh world intertwine, the end of an era begins.

description:
In an elementary school in Tokyo, there's a group called the "Go-Getters Club," made up from oddball kids from all over Japan. Reycho and the other members are somehow different than the other kids around them. 
Then, one day, during the summer... 
While on the bus for their class trip, they get into an accident.

When they wake up, they're in a theme park under the sea. Reycho and the others are trapped inside this strange, long-abandoned place. Suddenly, from out of nowhere, a mysterious clown appears and orders them to play a "Fate Game"! Before any of them can figure out what's happening, they're fighting for their very lives. Will they be able to survive and make it out of this weird place?

The kids are all lost and confused...
But then, extraordinary powers begin to awaken within them.
While at the same time...
Abnormal events are occurring all over the Earth.

Anna: The Series Test
description:
Confused, alone and suffering from chronic narcolepsy you awake in the presence of the sadistic Dr Alleyne who informs you that you agreed to volunteer in her psychological experiment testing the humanity of artificial intelligence in exchange for a hefty sum of credits. That sounds like something you would do, right? It must be because you're here and you don't remember anything from before. So, where is here exactly and what's your job?

The Anna series test is set in five stages with five different participants, artificially intelligent replicas of a real person. To push through Alleyne's test and make it out the other side, hopefully alive, you'll have to converse with the replicas. Follow their stories and make them believe they are human. The complication? Only one replica is needed to end the test.

Each phase Dr Alleyne will have you power down one of the machines. Removing them from testing and ending their stories. Sounds simple enough on paper. Flick a switch and turn off a machine. But you've got to know these women, their stories, their lives, seen their humanity. Can you bring yourself to keep flicking the switches? Can you separate their humanity from your own? Should you feel guilt for sentencing a machine to an unknown fate?

Take a psychological trip into Alleyne's deprived test of mental stability to find out. Good luck Volunteer.

Once every hundred years, a village must offer a sacrifice to appease the gods or face destruction. 
Kouzuki Sayo comes from a family of priestesses with special powers. As the day of sacrifice approaches, Sayo's older sister, Mahiru, volunteers to take her place. Sayo protests, but is imprisoned while Mahiru disappears as the sacrifice. To break this tradition and save her sister, Sayo takes up a sword and ventures into the lair of the monsters responsible for the sacrifices.

Netghost
description:
Ian Newfield is a talented grey-hat hacker who works as a high-ranking cyber security engineer at Daikon Industries, an Information Technology company that is part of a shadowy branch of a larger conglomerate of corporations. His job is to type in the letters and numbers that make up the encryption for top-secret software his company is hired to guard, details of which he knows nothing about.

Ian basks in a frail sense of financial security - that is, until he is told by his boss that their product was cracked and posted anonymously online. Now, Ian is tasked with finding the leaker among his peers by using any method at his disposal, in a workplace where anyone, from his fellow coders to the janitor of the building, could be the perpetrator...

Meanwhile, Ian's sister, Vivie, is confined to a hospital bed for years now, ill from a bone-wasting disease, and Ian works overtime to cover all her expenses and keep her happy. Despite his generous salary at Daikon, their situation has them living from paycheck to paycheck, and their objective of going for an expensive, experimental treatment for Vivie seems way out of reach.

With Ian's earnest effort to uncover the elusive Daikon leaker, his life and career begin to converge with the criminal underworld of Tri-State City. As fate would have it, opportunities rise for Ian to cut corners and make big money, money that could, perhaps, help find a cure for his sister. An age-old question is brought forth: 

Does crime pay?

[From [URL=https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/dragonfirestudios/netghost]Kickstarter[/URL]]

title: Isekai Sakaba no Sextet ~Vol.2 Adventurer's Days~
description:
One day, several days after our protagonist the young cook in the back of an Akihabara maid cafe got transported to another world, our hero gets paid a visit by the lady knight Dahlia at Lupine's tavern.
Dahlia proclaims to the hero, "I want you to make me a woman," which leads to all kinds of misunderstandings with Lupine and Daisy, who have a barrage of questions!

After getting filled in on what she actually meant, it's revealed that Dahlia's aim is to defeat a monster who only preys on women. However, for Dahlia, who has only ever lived by the sword, femininity feels like an alien concept.

To help increase her feminine charms, Dahlia becomes a waitress at Lupine's Tavern, and her inexperience leads to all kinds of trouble with the guests!

Sick of working for some crappy company, one brave employee takes a stand! Now out of a job after kiboshing their plans to destroy a nearby forest, karma won’t let this good deed go unrewarded. Turns out he's pretty famous among the local spirits and monster girls, and all of them are eager to show their savior some serious "appreciation" during his stay at an illusive hot spring that was hidden deep in the forest.

There is the sexy foxgirl Hatsune, Ruri the shy bunnygirl, the cute and quiet catgirl named Shione, and the charming big momma herself, Yuuna the wolf girl; all four of them are all yours to enjoy, from their bouncy tits to their fluffy tails, during your stay at the Tails & Titties Hot Spring!

description:
You’re a young college student studying an ancient scroll, which is said to have ties to the Chinese Zodiac. Though it hasn't been opened for centuries, you manage to remove its seal. Before you can read it, a flash of light blinds you and the scroll is stolen from your hands!

Luckily three handsome Zodiac Guardians appear and offer to help recover the scroll. You soon learn that the content of the scroll is the yin and yang that keeps the universe in balance. If someone tampers with it, it may destroy the world as you know it...

You'll have to act fast to get the scroll back, since the Zodiac boys’ personalities all seem to clash. To make matters worse, they’re all hung up on the results of the Great Race held between the Zodiac animals centuries ago, and see this as their second chance to prove themselves.

Can you help these boys work together to save the universe? Will this be the year you find true love? Discover your destiny in Guardians of the Zodiac!

title: Himekishi Do Gehin Haiboku Jinsei
description:
A small country where the sacred three blesses the land with fertility and abundant resources, giving to his habitants a peaceful and carefree life.

If other countries tried to take their land away from them, the blessing of the sacred tree gives them powerful magic that only they can use.

Among their magic combatants, Alicia, the first princess, also known as the “Princess Knight”, is unreviled in strength. Thanks to her combat ability and her charisma she has become a public figure trusted by the citizens of Yggdmilia.

Even the military nation, the “Dominus Empire”, which is trying to rule the whole continent, has been unable to invade the Sacred Tree Country thanks to Alicia’s resistance.

However, the tip of those scales changes abruptly when the Empire manages to block the magic of the Sacred Tree Country. Without their magic, they weren’t able to resist and princess Alicia was captured.

Now, to further crush any kind of resistance the empire turned Alicia into a show of public disgrace and humiliation. But after being forced to countless tortures, pleasures, and humiliations, what’s going to happen to the sanity of the charismatic warrior after being turned into a public slave?

[Translated from [url=http://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1138622]Getchu[/url]]
She's here to help! Let Sakuya Izayoi from the Touhou Project comfort you after encountering some hardships in this beautiful visual novel that aims to heal your troubles away!
title: Save Me, Sakuya-san!

description:
Spring, the season of encounters and partings. It's spring break, and Sakawa Haruki is about to go into 3rd grade. 

His childhood friend group includes: Kuriyama Tomari, Tokorozawa Iku, and Sugou Chisato. 2 new girls just joined the group: Harunohara Yuuna, who lives in the next town over, and Nishitani Shizuru, who just moved into the neighborhood.

Ironically, at the same time these 2 girls joined, Haruki had to move away from home and his childhood friends.

During spring many years later, Haruki's father gets transferred to work overseas. Haruki decides to stay in Japan to concentrate on university entrance exams, and ends up living in an apartment owned by a relative. This apartment happens to be in the same town where he parted from his childhood friends.

Thus, the rails of fate cause Haruki and his childhood friends to meet once again.

Haruki was worried that the girls wouldn't accept him in the group like they did in the past, but despite the long gap, they were happy to see him and welcomed him back warmly. However, the fact that these girls have grown into beautiful women has caused Haruki to feel more embarrassed than happy.

As they reminisce about the past, filling in the blanks between the time they parted, he'll get to know them and perhaps enter into a relationship with one of them...
title: Omoide Kakaete Ai ni Koi!!

description:
The Life and Suffering of Sir Brante is a narrative-driven RPG that comes to life on the pages of the protagonist's journal. Set in a ruthless world where any form of dissent is mercilessly crushed, the story follows a man who has dared to challenge the existing order. Set out on a lifelong journey and become an individual able to carve out their own destiny... But remember that freedom never comes cheap.

Life in the Great Arknian Empire is harsh and its hardest Lot is yours by the circumstance of birth. You are a commoner, holding no rights and no title. To seize your fate and become the rightful heir to the legacy of the Brante family you will have to come to grips with ossified tradition and prejudice. Embarking on a life-long journey from one's birth until true death, you will have to endure great upheavals, face adversity, and make many difficult choices. Every decision will affect not only the protagonist, his family, and loved ones, but may even topple the foundation of the Empire itself.

At the turn of time
Every imperial citizen's life is predetermined by their estate. The deities known as the Twin Gods have bestowed this truth to the world, dividing mortals into Lots. The nobles lead and rule over others, while the clergy guides people on the one true path, and the lowborn suffer, toiling away for the glory of the Empire. You may accept your fate without question, but it is also in your power to change the cosmic order that governs all.

title: Sousaku Kanojo no Ren'ai Koushiki
description:
[i][b]Let's soar together again—aiming high with love, creativity, and youth――――[/b][/i]

Starting this year, Kagami Toshiki is packing bags and moving into his cousin's house in Tokyo. And Toshiki's got a mission in mind rather than just a change of address: to get his creative mojo back, reignite that spark he once had.

Back in the day, Toshiki had a childhood best friend named Ayase Aisa.
They were two peas in a pod, constantly pushing each other to be their best regarding their creative pursuits. However, as time passed, Toshiki increasingly felt they were on different pages. Later on, Aisa moved to Tokyo due to family circumstances.

Even though they were miles apart, Toshiki and Aisa kept in touch by sending letters about their lives and exchanging the novels they had written. However, when Aisa started school, she suddenly ghosted Toshiki, completely cutting off communication without explanation and leaving him in the dark.

Nonetheless, Toshiki wasn't about to throw in the towel on his creative hustle. He kept grinding, making indie games, and even hitting it big with his first published light novel.

Toshiki was on a roll, levelling up as a creator, but about half a year ago, something knocked him off his game. He found himself stuck with the writer's block. Then it hit him - maybe if he surrounded himself with other creators his age, it could be the spark he needed to regain his mojo. That's when he set his sights on Saika Academy, a private school in Tokyo that brings together creators from diverse fields.

As spring arrived, Toshiki successfully passed the entrance exam for Saika Academy. He moved to Tokyo, ready to start this new chapter. 

But then, in a twist of fate, Toshiki unexpectedly bumped into Aisa, his long-lost childhood friend, in the city's heart.

[Translated and edited from the [url=http://ainolinks.com/]official website[/url]]

aliases: Even if tomorrow is not sunny
title: Tatoe Asu ga Harenakutemo.
description:
"---Die. You have nothing to live for."　

Hinata Itsuki was told these words by a girl who saw him as nothing more than "human scum".
It was an abrupt warning sign telling him that he was destined to commit a heinous crime.

Should he accept his fate, or should he fight to change it?
But in a world where numerous thoughts and feelings overlap, each path will surely lead to someone suffering.

What path is there that will allow everyone to smile?

This is the story of a world in which a boy discovers a "destiny" he was never meant to know.

[translated from [url=https://www.freem.ne.jp/win/game/9387]Freem![/url]]

title: Oshi no Love yori Koi no Love ~Love or Die~
description:
"A shotgun wedding?! Will the brides make it down the aisle?!"

The distant sound of bells chime through a pure white chapel...
She never thought it would happen to her, but this is even more than she dreamed of...

Unlucky otaku Akuru Hayahoshi could never pull her husbando in the gacha game she's obsessed with,
no matter how much money she threw at it--
Until one day, she ran into the garishly gorgeous and freakishly lucky Ren Furutachi.

A series of misunderstandings led to a proposal, and Ren started to full-on pursue Akuru...
Until they ended up dating for real!

It's been a year since the couple started living together in blissful cohabitation.
One day, Akuru catches a glimpse of Ren's plans for after she graduates:
"Number 1 life goal: Marry Akuru!"

Of course, Akuru's not interested in marriage...
But one day, struck by a fit of jealousy over Ren's long-time friend, Aira Udou,
she ends up unthinkingly accepting Ren's proposal.

By the time she realizes what she's done, it's too late...
Ren's already in bridezilla mode and starting to plan the wedding!

Now Akuru has to deal with wedding planning on top of fending off Aira's advances toward Ren.
Will the two be able to get hitched without a hitch?!
And will Akuru still have time for her 2D husbandos?!

It's time to woman up and commit, Akuru!

[from [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1644150/OshiRabu_Waifus_Over_Husbandos_Loveordie/]Steam[/url]]
aliases: OshiRabu: Waifus Over Husbandos ~love or die~

title: Obaa-chan, Mama wa Sasete Kureta yo? ~Musuko Mitai ni Ubawasenai wa!~

description:
A heartrending Japanese love story between human and spirit.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/home/work/=/product_id/RJ160854.html?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Hana Ichige

description:
"Northern Blades" is a visual novel about warriors who gave part of their humanity and soul for the benefit of the inhabitants of the northern lands. But what is their real purpose?

Enjoy an exciting adventure in the northern lands with our heroes! You will have to endure many trials, see the death of your comrades, feel the pain of betrayal and lies. All this for the sake of one... Freedom.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1598840/]Steam[/url]]
title: Northern Blades

description:
"You" woke up in a mansion and found that you've lost all your memories.
A woman named Kagomiya Karen appeared in front of "you", who'd forgotten everything.
She said that she's your girlfriend, and she was caring for "you" while you were asleep.
Karen tells "you," who just woke up, about yourself-

-and thus begins your life with her.
"Your" actions will determine the course of this story.

[Translated from [url=https://novelgame.jp/games/show/3642]the Official Website[/url]]
title: Torikago Seven Days

description:
"Catzauberer"
A hidden village of witches protected by magical barrier where
Catgirls and Witches live in secret.

One night, the protagonist followed his pet cat into a narrow alley and
accidentally stumbled upon a barrier opening, leading him into a village.

The protagonist was rescued by a Catgirl and ended up living in this village with
only women until he found his pet cat.

-From DLSite English
title: Majo to Neko no Kakurezato

description: Follow Rafa and Duda in Natal Explorers: an exciting journey through the city of Natal, in which you will learn historical, scientific and cultural curiosities in the capital of Rio Grande do Norte!
title: Natal Explorers

description:
Diane Carter never expected her folklore degree to get her a job offer from the local police department, but when a rash of occult-themed fires sets the city on edge, she is called in as a special consultant on esoteric religion to help find the culprit.

There's just one problem: the woman she's assigned to work with. She's cocky, beautiful, and far too familiar.

Can Diane and Jackie overcome the obstacles of their past and find the truth?

Set in an alternate New Age 1980s where belief in paranormal powers and secret Satanists is at its peak, but same-sex love is still taboo. 

[From [url=https://hanakogames.itch.io/night-cascades]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Night Cascades
Halloween Galaxy
description:
A soul floats through a strange Halloween themed galaxy, running away from a monster. They come across 3 strange planets, with 3 strange worlds:

A world where stuffed bears fight monsters in order to protect their owner.
A world where a girl sneaks out from her troubled home to have the Halloween she has always dreamed of.
And a bleak future where Halloween has ceased to exist.

[From [url=https://actawesome.itch.io/halloween-galaxy/]Itch.io[/url]]

Your comfortable life is shattered by the disappearance of your father and the spread of a mysterious scourge. While searching for a cure, a dangerous vampire lord steals you away for some unknown purpose and introduces you to a world of night. Mesmerized by Gothic castles, secret passages, and endless opulence, you fall further into the darkness.

Will you stop the scourge and find true love in the light, or pursue forbidden desires and take your place in the underworld? Choose wisely and uncover the intrigue of vampire aristocracy, the truth about your mysterious companions, and the secrets within yourself in this two-season romantic epic!
title: Blood Moon Calling

description:
One fateful night, you look up to see a mysterious creature being attacked - a dragon! Despite your efforts to help him, there’s nothing a mere human can do to fight against his assailant. As a last resort, you agree to let the dragon drink your blood.

He saves you in return, but you soon find yourself facing another problem. A strange emblem has appeared on your skin, prompting the dragon to spirit you away! You land at a mansion to find a group of men claiming to be Guardian Dragons. According to them, you are a special being who possesses something called the Blood of the Covenant…

They ask that you release them from a contract you don’t remember signing and return their true names, but you have no idea what any of this means. With the wheel of fate already set in motion, will you learn the truth behind the Guardian Dragons and your connection to them?
title: Sealed with a Dragon's Kiss

description:
Dear Guest, welcome to Moonwake Manor – a place that will grant your deepest desires. It is with great pleasure and honor to invite you to a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. 

You may find that the sun never rises and that your only way out is to participate in this game I’ve organized for you and your fellow guests. Do not be frightened, however. Remember your desires lead you here and with desires comes sacrifice. I look forward to seeing how far you will go to reunite with your long-lost brother.

Which of these guests will you allow to claim your heart and do you truly wish to learn the truth of this Manor?

Please bear in mind that this is a death game after all…
title: The Rondo of Oblivion

description:
The story begins 9 years after The first Crime Opera tale. Xander Gallo is now bitter, alone, and out of control. He is causing problems for not only other families within the crime syndicate, but for the younger Gallo members as well. Those who remained behind to continue the family legacy are soon forced to take sides with or against Xander Gallo, while others who have seemingly moved on with their lives are pulled back in against their will.

Crime Opera is a tale of loyalty and deceit, murder and survival, and both the strength and frailty of familial bonds. This particular novel serves as the second part of a much longer saga, following the Gallos from childhood to old age as they are pitted against the outside forces of the mafia world, and eventually, each other as well. 

[From [url=https://crimeoperastudios.itch.io/crime-opera-ii-the-floodgate-effect]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Crime Opera II: The Floodgate Effect
Minazuki Natsuki wa Kashidashichuu!
description:
Natsumi Minazuki is working part time as a house cleaner, but she's been troubled by some clients who won't stop sexually harassing her.
Her husband Yuta suggests she do some cuckoldry play, and while Natsumi is hesitant, things progress quickly...

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ322172.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]

A cute comedy fluff about taking care of a man who acts like an animal.

In a world where curses exist, those with a grudge or some sort of evil purpose cause misfortune on others by placing a curse on them. Like this young man, who was cursed into a hedgehog. Forgetting everything about his life as a human, he thinks he's an animal.  Now he behaves like one! 

Micah is a good witch, who was taught to help those in trouble. Because of his abilities, he's one of the few who could only see the hedgehog for who he really is, a human. The only way for those who are under a curse to turn back to normal is by helping them remember their human identity. So. Who is this man? And why is he cursed? 

[From [URL=https://crownea-vn.itch.io/hexed-pet-hedgehog]itch.io[/URL]]
title: Hexed Pet: Hedgehog

description:
This entry is only concerned with the original content featured in the console exclusive releases of the Higurashi series, known as 'Matsuri', 'Kizuna' and 'Sui':

Matsuri:
• Taraimawashi-hen
• Tsukiotoshi-hen
• Miotsukushi-hen (only what mostly corresponds to the content later labeled in Sui and on as "Miotsukushi Omote")

Kizuna:
• Someutsushi-hen (Kizuna 1)
• Kageboushi-hen (Kizuna 2)
• Hirukowashi-hen (Kizuna 2; was rewritten for this version, namely the addition and removal of certain characters and removal of references to plot details not yet revealed in the Kizuna series.)
• Yoigoshi-hen (Kizuna 3)
• Tokihogushi-hen (Kizuna 3)
• Kotohogushi-hen (Kizuna 4)
• Miotsukushi-hen (Kizuna 4; for the most part, only the content later labeled in Sui and on as "Miotsukushi Ura" is new to this release, but it also includes "Omote" content, albeit with some changes)

Sui:
• Hajisarashi-hen
title: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Console Arcs
Milk outside a bag of milk outside a bag of milk
description:
A sequel to Milk inside a bag of milk inside a bag of milk. Dive into a demented and bizarre world once again and help the girl become a little happier.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1604000/Milk_outside_a_bag_of_milk_outside_a_bag_of_milk/]Steam[/url]]

title: Psycho-ga Aejeongpyohyeonhaneun Bangbeop
description:
One day, I met boys who are the most popular in school.
While I was in pain because of bully from others.
They come closer to me at the same time.
Why do they talk to me? AND Do they fight because of me?!

When I opened my eyes… everything I knew was changedㅡ.

Born an orphan, Seri struggled to survive. As it turned out, her father whom she thought was dead had promised her soul to devils in exchange for unlimited wealth. Each one of the devils demanded Seri to be their bride....

As she slowly starts to fall into the hands of these devils, she's pulled into crimes, will this be her end or a brand new start?

[From [url=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kr.co.studiolumiere.devilspropose]Google Play[/url]]
title: Agmaui Propose
Only Girl in High School
description:
Finally, I'm a high student now. I dreamt about my fun school life,
but wait, Am I the only girl in this school?!

Who is going to be your school boyfriend?

title: Xing tu Lian qu
description: In Startale City, we start off your journey in the game with romance and love. Surprises are about to happen and special encounters are waiting for you. All kinds of handsome confidants and fans will follow and grow with you to overcome your obstacles. They will bear witness to your ascension to become the most outstanding streamer.

You are on an online drinking party with a close friend. But you noticed that behind him, there's a person holding a knife. 

What action will you chose in order to rescue your friend?
title: MOOZ
Kanojo-kei Seimei Shinkaron Perfect☆Girl
aliases: Perfect Girl: Theory of Evolution in Her

title: My World Still Burns
description:
Life on the run has not taught Lio Fotia the first thing about domesticity, laundry or cooking.  Still, that won't keep him from creating the World's #1 Dinner for his second anniversary with Galo Thymos.  Lio used to lead the Burnish in their fight against oppression, surely he can manage one simple meal!  Meanwhile, Galo has planned an anniversary surprise of his own...

This game contains spoilers for the movie Promare. 

[From [url=https://cloverfirefly.itch.io/still-burning]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Convergence
description: It is the present. World War III has been averted. Claire, a time traveler, only has to live out the rest of her days as an ordinary citizen.

title: Kajgrad
description:
What if there was no Sun? If you had to fight not only with others, but with the universe itself for the crumbs of light? The darkness is near. In such circumstances, a person's values are overturned. People stop being people. There was only a slim chance to fix it. But the path is thorny. And only you can choose the road!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1530760/]Steam[/url]]

Up to your neck in the debt your father left behind, you worked your butt off until you suddenly received a mysterious offer to have all your debt paid off right away. Maybe, if you can survive with your choices in the dungeon filled with uncontrollable and extremely handsome vampires.

"Since you've found out our secret, you can't leave here alive."
title: Blood Kiss
Snowkissed Romance
description:
During your final winter break before college in December of 1994, step foot into the mythical town of Yukihari, based in the Northern mountains of Japan. Arrive at your Aunt’s charming ski resort where there’s plenty of new faces and fun to discover since your last visit!

What begins as a peaceful holiday with your best friend quickly transforms into an emotional journey when your older brother crashes with his three college roommates, who happen to be your childhood friends who moved away years ago.

You must navigate through old memories and new emotions while relationships unfold during this magical season of love and self-discovery. Every choice you make and action you take matters - Will you build cherished memories with an old flame, connect with new friends, or end the season alone?

[From [url=https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/lovelyinc/snowkissed-romance-a-90s-winter-getaway]Kickstarter[/url]]

title: Infatuation
description:
An adaptation of the Wattpad book, Infatuation, written by MaskCover.

The story is about six new boys who move to the town of Rosalind, a small mountain side town. You, a resident of the town since birth, meet the new residents.
Something is a bit off about them... 
who would want to move to Rosalind anyways?

The game plays out with you learning about them, interacting with them before things goes wrong...

What are they hiding?

title: Ai Yu Ming de Bi Duan

description:
One day during the summer holidays, while all the other dorm residents headed back to their family's homes, the members of the Takamura class were enjoying the remainder of their holiday to the max at the academy.
During this time, Momiji realises that there just happens to be a day where everyone else is out of the dorm apart from her. Thinking that she could have Iori all to herself, without having to worry about the gazes of the others, she barged into Iori's room.

There's just over 24 hours left!
Momiji's many delusions finally explode!
And so their sweet lovey-dovey flirty-flirty day begins.

[Translated from [url=http://crystalia.amusecraft.com/oneroom2/index.html]the official page[/url]]
title: Momiji to One Room ~Toaru Natsu no Ichinichi~
Asahi to One Room ~Toaru Natsu no Ichinichi~
description:
One day during the summer holidays, while all the other dorm residents headed back to their family's homes, the members of the Takamura class were enjoying the remainder of their holiday to the max at the academy.
Asahi has completely become a commuting wife with how she regularly heads to Iori's room without worrying about those around her. However, she's seeming a bit overworked after the Enbu-sai. Deciding that things can't go on like this, Iori makes a certain suggestion to her on a day where the other members of the Takamura class aren't around.

"Today is your day completely off, Asahi!
I'll obey anything you tell me to do!"

Asahi's lust finally explodes!
And so their sweet lovey-dovey flirty-flirty day begins.

[Translated from [url=http://crystalia.amusecraft.com/oneroom2/index.html]the official page[/url]]

title: (P)lunge All the Way, Super J! - An Oppaidius Short Story
description:
Jimmy meets a beautiful camgirl, but it seems like someone is trying to put some censorship on her body... this is a job for Super J! Will you be able to beat the censorship and unlock the secret "hot" art...?

[From [url=https://sbargisoft.itch.io/superj]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Wiheomhan Shelter
description:
10 years after the stories of Dangerous Fellows…. The whole world has been completely destroyed by zombies. Doing your best to survive in this world with your choices. You end up in a Shelter, the only place where mankind can live safely….

[From [url=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lucydream.dangerousshelter.otome.story]Google Play[/url]]

title: Tsuma no Kyonyuu Ane to Tsundere Imouto kara no Inmitsu Yuuwaku ~Barete wa Ikenai Kateinai Furin~
description:
Yuuji Nakagawara works as a history teacher at an all-girl school. There, he meets the director's daughter Satsuki Sakuragaoka. They soon become friends and get married.

After that, Yuuji decides to live with his wife's parents. Satsuki is the second daughter of the three sisters, and her eldest and youngest sister, Yayoi and Hazuki, also live there.

They began living together under the same roof. As his wife's sisters start acting weird towrds Yuuji, he ends up deepening his relationship with them.

[Edited from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/pro/work/=/product_id/VJ014594.html/?unique_op=af&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=vndb.org%2F]DLsite[/url]]

You play as Jason, a deadbeat college student who lives with his step mom. Jason rarely goes to class, and bums around home all day playing video games and watching porn - overall being a mooch.

He has one big goal - his "Big Score" is getting the girl of his dreams, Emma! However, his life is about to change suddenly, whether he likes it or not. Jason's about to meet some lovely ladies who enjoy nothing more then to make his life a living hell.

Will Jason manage to find true love, or will he be overwhelmed and defeated by the dominants!?​

[Edited from F95Zone]
title: The Big Score

description:
No Saints is a visual novel focusing on the lives of several characters, whom you will guide through a world of debauchery and moral ambiguity.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/DynamiteSaint]Patreon[/url]]
title: No Saints
Shark Riders
description:
Two brothers on a raft, a gorilla head, a great white shark and hallucinogenic cactus spines.

[From [url=https://lcbgamestudio.itch.io/shark-riders]itch.io[/url]]

Dragons once roamed the skies. Now they are only old tales.

Visual/Kinetic Novel about love, sacrifice, family, and loneliness with a bit different approach to the concept of dragons.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1636270/]Steam[/url]]
title: Miłość Smoków
Watashi wa Ano Shitai o Gomibako ni Tsukkomitai
aliases: I Wanna Throw a Girl in the Trash

title: Muttsuri Megane Tosho Iinchou wa Jitsu wa Dosukebe
Kkumkkunikka Romance-in Geojanh-a
description: After a terrible breakup with her boyfriend, Jaime finds a white phone amongst his belongings. Jaime ends up connecting to her dream through the strange app on the phone named 'Dream Connector' where she ends up meeting a mysterious man...

title: My Hero's Love: Horax
description:
War reigns over the planet Zargoa. Gods against humankind. A handful of fully trained warrior‘s, also known as Protectors, have taken ownership over the powers of the godly beings and now protect the villages and cities against demonic and godly attacks. Their headquarter is the “Academy of Protectors”, which is located in the huge capital city Marvall. The Academy is lead by the vicious and cunning half-demon Lady Daria. She has the command over all Protectors and is the most feared woman of Zargoa.

Little did you know about all those fighting, since you grew up in a small faraway village. Until NOW. To get a job, you decided to go to Marvall. But as soon as you set foot into the capital city, you get tangled up into a fight between a demon and a Protector. A little later you also meet his meddlesome Adjutor named Luke, which decides to take you with him to the Academy.

A magical mirror throws you into another dimension. That’s where you meet the charismatic Horax. A young attractive guy with a striking scar across his blind right eye. Find out what horrible things happened to him to sooth his silent pain. But be careful of his secrets, because they could be dangerous. Meet also the charming Rahab. But be careful to not fall for his alluring gaze! In the course of the story, you will learn how those two men stand to each other and will also have to decide which way you want to choose. But choose carefully, otherwise the wrong ending might take everything from you, that you learned to love in that dimension.

You head to the capital city Marvall to escape the dull village life and to start your own little career. But destiny decides instead, that you end up at the “Academy of the Protectors”. It’s a world-famous training school, in which the best and strongest warriors of Zargoa get trained.

As different the protectors might be regarding their character, there’s still one thing that connects them all: they are and always will be, emotionless killing machines – meaning, they are tactless bullies. And since life is cruel in Marvall, you get put to the test by the headmistress of the Academy, Lady Daria.

To motivate you, she offers you a profitable job, should you succeed: to be her right hand! The only thing you have to do, is to get one of the protectors ready for a gala dinner. There is much at stake for Lady Daria herself, as well as the name of her Academy.

What sounds like an easy job, soon turns out to be an impasse, because the protector you’re supposed to tame, is none other than Drake – a stubborn and easily provoked man, which learned in his life to go his own way, regardless of the consequences. He’s one of the most successful protectors, which knows perfectly well on how to wield his sword, but sadly not how to be charming and good mannered.

To make things worst, a new demon appears disturbs the peace and quiet of the town and keeps the protectors busy.
title: My Hero's Love: Drake
My Hero's Love: Rahab
description:
It‘s been five years since you managed to leave Horax and his dark dimension thanks to Rahab. But since then, there hasn’t been a day that you haven’t anticipated Rahab’s return. In the meantime you’ve also become a mother of a five year old girl, through which veins flows godly blood. Until now it seemed like your daughter wouldn’t possess any godly powers, until that one fateful night, in which San calls for her granddaughter. Lady Daria gets aware of your little daughter as well and personally comes to take her away from you and carry her off to the Academy.

Can you get your daughter back? Are you going to meet your true love Rahab again? If you do, what are you going to do? You know that Rahab can‘t survive in your dimension. Is there even a way for a future together for you two? And what happened to Horax?

title: My Hero's Love: Tristan
description:
You‘re working at the capital city Marvall, in the bar of your best friend Lina. Your love-life has just been shattered into thousand pieces and you try to start over a new leaf. However, not only do your daily life problems haunt you in that world you‘re living in. No, because there are also powerful goddesses that seem to be threaten human lives. Fortunately there are the so-called Protectors. Mighty warriors, whose life-task is to defeat the gods and to free humanity from them.

Since your deep friendship with Lina though, you can’t shake the feeling that you get followed by those Protectors. What might be the reason for that? Destiny, in any case, still has a big surprise in store for you. You get to know the attractive and charming Tristan, who is a rebel that fights the Protectors and whose aim is a world in which humans and gods live peacefully together, like back in ancient times.

But is that dream even possible to realize? Tristan’s friend Leon and Lina also seem to know each other from long ago. What secret might those two be hiding? Maybe a secret that connects them? A secret that’s going to put you and Tristan to a hard test? Which side are you going to choose?

[From [url=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.your.visual.novel.tristan]Google Play[/url]]

title: My Hero's Love: Cronos
description:
War reigns over the planet Zargoa. Gods against humankind. A handful of fully trained warrior‘s, also known as Protectors, have taken ownership over the powers of the godly beings and now protect the villages and cities against demonic and godly attacks. Their headquarter is the “Academy of Protectors”, which is located in the huge capital city Marvall. The Academy is lead by the vicious and cunning half-demon Lady Daria. She has the command over all Protectors and is the most feared woman of Zargoa.

Little did you know about all those fighting, since you grew up in a small faraway village. Until NOW. To get a job, you decided to go to Marvall. But as soon as you set foot into the capital city, you get tangled up into a fight between a demon and a Protector. Unintentionally he saves your life. You learn from his Adjutor Luke that the Protectors name is Cronos. He’s one of the most famous warriors of Zargoa. Luke takes you with him to the “Academy of Protectors”, in order for you to have a shelter for at least one night. But in the very same night, Luke gets kidnapped by a demon. Lady Daria sends the Protector Cronos and you onto a dangerous journey to bring back the captured Luke.

Can you and Cronos get back the Adjutor save and sound? Are you going to survive the wilderness side by side with this fearsome warrior? Can you win his frozen heart all for yourself or is he going to break yours?

You're going to start your first day in a new position - as an assistant in the Department of European History! This is a brand new and challenging field to you. To make it even more challenging, the department is about to publish a huge work soon, which is nowhere near done.

Fortunately, there are some nice colleagues willing to help you out, and a not so nice supervisor... You will have to make up your mind and choose one of them to work closely with. Will you be able to help, or will you drag the department down?

[Edited from [url=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.icequeenmedia.android_workwithme]Google Play[/url]]
title: Office Love Story
Kissed by the Baddest Boss
description: What a surprise! You received an immediate invitation to work at a prestigious laboratory right after graduation. Shortly after your arrival, more unexpected opportunities presented. Who would you choose to work with? The aloof scientist, the arrogant millionaire, the enthusiastic peer chemist or the kind but mysterious man...

title: My Guardian Angel
description: As a shy girl and an amateur stargazer, the astronomy club might be the only place you could fit in on campus. Trying to make some friends there, you soon realize the other two members are just like you - cast out because of their differences. Later, the fourth member makes his appearance, who turns out to be your childhood friend! In the meanwhile, a student psychologist starts meeting with you to help improve your social skills. You begin to develop emotional bonding with these guys. What will happen next? Will you be able to find your true love?

title: Honey Sweet Lies
description:
Michiru Hoshikawa, a 3rd-year student and president of the Tea Party Club, has a wonderful fun-filled life. Every day after school she gets to meet with her friends, drink tea and eat cake, and chat. What could be better? 

But, ever since the start of the year, something has been off with her bestest friend, Aoi. Michiru can’t figure out what is wrong, but she’s determined to get to the bottom of it.

[From [URL=https://fyshku.itch.io/honeysweetlies]itch.io[/URL]]

description:
I’m a middle-aged guy who’s recently gotten into solo camping.
Today’s campsite is completely solo—just me, alone.
And to make things spookier, the area was covered by an unnervingly thick fog.
Feeling a bit on edge, I decide to grill some meat.
Out of the fog emerges a girl who, no matter how you look at her, is unmistakably an elf.
And of course, she’s busty (this is important).
At first, I thought it might be a cosplay, but something about her felt… real. Like, actually real.
Turns out…
While I was busy grilling meat, I’d somehow been transported to another world!
I’ve even gotten younger, and now I’m smack in the middle of a massive forest.

With nowhere to go, I’m taken in by an elf named Chris, who offers to help me—in exchange for my magical energy.
Wait, my magical energy? Since when do I have that?!
And as it turns out, the method of transferring this magical energy is… just regular sex!

In the sacred forest, a sanctuary for elves, I’m appointed as the guardian of the World Tree.
Living in this forest are Chris and three other busty elves.
Of course, I’m expected to supply magical energy to all of them!
And to make the energy transfer more efficient, they’ve even set up something called a “Gakuen.” Wait, “Gakuen” as in… school?!

Here I am, a former ordinary middle-aged guy now living it up in another world, alongside four busty elves tasked with protecting this sacred place.
Is this a dream or reality?
My harem life with the elves, centered around “magical energy supply,” is about to begin.

With a polygamous setup and a school-themed twist, my magical energy is about to get even more… potent.

Hard cock! Thick loads!!

[Translated from [url=https://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1135913]getchu[/url]]

"——What kind of winning battle is this…?"
Joseph Manaudou, leader of the mercenary group Eagle’s Claw, cursed as he surveyed the sorry state of his forces, now reduced to less than half their original number.

The rebellion war between the two kingdoms of Quaarl and Moltoba, both under the Gareth Empire’s dominion, had turned into a disaster.
Hired by Quaarl, Eagle’s Claw had joined the fight, only to be utterly outmatched by the Empire’s cunning strategies, tactics, and sheer military might. Now, they were in full retreat.

Before the war, promises like "Take the imperial capital, and the rewards will be yours for the taking. We’ll even turn a blind eye to looting" had rallied soldiers from both within and outside the group. But now… how had it come to this?

Quaarl and Moltoba had fallen into the Empire’s trap, caught in a pincer attack that shattered their forces. It was only a matter of time before their homelands fell to the Empire’s counteroffensive.

The Empress, Berta Christanford, wasn’t the type to simply forgive something like that. If anything, surviving this long was a stroke of luck. The real problem was what came next.

Even though Eagle’s Claw was just a ragtag group of mercenaries, losing so many comrades had left many of them disheartened and simmering with discontent. If Joseph didn’t let them blow off steam soon—and find a new employer to keep them fed and secure—their frustration might turn on him.

To avoid that, he needed to act.

"———————Boss, there’s a small town up ahead," reported Gaston Delacroix, one of Joseph’s most trusted men.

"…Oh? That’s convenient—"
Joseph’s eyes lit up like those of a predator spotting its prey, a sharp grin spreading across his face.

At first, Mikoto thinks it's a prank--until Yumi gets hurt.

Mikoto starts dating Shiori believing her to be the blackmailer.

As you grow, you will form bonds with many of Catena's diverse and colourful citizens. Nurture these relationships and learn about their struggles and beliefs, and help (or hinder) them achieve their dreams. Your choices have the power to alter the course of their lives, for better or worse.

You must not forget your purpose. You were designed to bring stability to Catena; to balance the needs of the many against the needs of the few; to guide the city into an age of prosperity. But this will be no simple task.
