There comes a point in life when we are faced with darkness. Times when nothing seems to go our way and despite our hardest efforts, it feels as if we still aren’t rewarded...

And such is the case with our heroine, a young artist who has lived her whole life amidst looming skyscrapers in a superficial city.

One day, without notice, she loses both her job and her home.

Lost, frustrated, and with nowhere to go... she wanders through a farmer's market at a local park.

There she meets an elderly farmer who hails from a distant valley in the countryside. The man smiles at her, warmth and kindess radiating from his eyes, as he hands her a flower.

"You know... where I'm from, that flower there is usually given to people who leave on a journey, in a way to hope for prosperous new beginnings wherever they might find themselves."

And just as life is filled with despair at times, it comes to show us it is also filled with incredible wonder, beauty and adventure.

description:
Age: Forties
Lifestyle: Obese, depressed, and exhausted
Employment: Wageslave
Marital status: Recently divorced

All of the above factors lead Kouta Urabe to leave his lucrative job at the company his ex-wife’s family owns. Once they learn about her affair, they offer Kouta not only a considerably hefty bonus for his many years of work, but also settlement money to make up for her shameless infidelity.

With his newfound fortunes in hand, Kouta pledges to begin his life anew. His deceased grandfather had owned a dilapidated, practically abandoned house out in the boonies, which Kouta sees as the perfect opportunity to fix the place up and settle down in the countryside.

Beside his new home is a small shrine. And while the house's upkeep has been neglected for some time, the shrine has been maintained remarkably well thanks to Kouta's parents. A miniature archway stands in front, flanked by two even smaller, moss-covered statues, representing goddesses of harvest. Kouta can't even remember a single time he's visited this shrine before, but from now on he'd be its caretaker.

"It's in pretty great shape considering how little my parents tended to it," Kouta muses to himself out loud, and to his surprise, someone responds.

"I take good care of it if I do say so myself."

Suddenly appearing before him is a woman with silver hair, bronze skin, short in stature, but plump in proportions, with fuzzy ears, a fluffy tail, and dressed--at least somewhat--like a shrine maiden.

This is how the two meet for the first time. Her name is Onatsu, a kitsune who's resided in the shrine beside Kouta's grandfather's house for generations. She shares this shrine with her tanuki companion, Otama.

So begins Kouta's new life with a kinky kitsune and tantalizing tanuki as his neighbors!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2178090/]Steam[/url]]
title: Muchimuchi Dekapai Marakui Okitsune-sama & Otanuki-sama to Noukou Koubi Shimakuri Hame Pako Inaka Gurashi.
Gacha Gacha
description:
Collect 3 sets of cute figures with your host, Brady, the gacha machine object head!
[From [url=https://potentialforart.itch.io/gachagacha]itch.io[/url]]

title: Dark Onirisme 2
description:
Ten young teenagers are trapped into a strange virtual world...

They don't know why they're here, they don't know how they got here in the first place... But they know one thing for sure: they have to escape from this hell! Unfortunately, it will be not easy for them... The world around them is twisted and makes nonsense. Moreover, nightmarish creatures are lurking from the shadows and crave to kill them all.

[Edited from [url=https://overtired-fox.itch.io/dark-onirisme-chapter-2]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Cicada: Into the Mist
description:
A simple family vacation marks the beginning of an interesting adventure, but something is not quite right.. Is it a spell? An individual? The place itself?

Will you take action and uncover the truth of the mystery using it to your advantage? Or will you get taken in and become the passive observer?

It's all in your hands.​

[From F95Zone]

title: Border of her Heart 2
description:
Congratulations, you've been hired as the new guard!

Harlston Castle, the craddle of modern civilization. This amazing castle attracts many visitors and people who want to move to live within its secure confines. As a guard, it is not only your right, but your duty to choose which of these people gets to live within the castle. Whatever you choose, be prepared to live with the consequences...

Play as a guard of the castle, determine who gets inside and see the game's storyline evolve and change based on your actions and who you let inside.

[From [URL=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1592590/]Steam[/URL]]

Volt and his friends came to visit Hanako-Land, one of the biggest theme parks in Kemono Town! But what's waiting for them there...monster balloons, blood demons, and a vicious terrorist?!

Can they escape from the hellish amusement park? And what is the terrorist's true purpose?!

[From [url=https://i-am-rawfish.itch.io/purrfect-apawcalypse-if2]itch.io[/url]]
title: Purrfect Apawcalypse Infamous Furiend?!
My New Memories
description:
In My New Memories you play a (male) character that lost his memories after a terrible car accident. You wake up in a hospital, confused and lost with no idea how you landed there. But you are not alone. Your family is there to slowly help you back into your life. Your wife, who was also involved in the car accident, has fallen into a coma. But that doesn't mean that she is gone. Through circumstances that you don't yet understand, she appears in your dreams, showing you things from your past life that you forgot.

On your journey to finding New Memories you will uncover things that seem unspeakable to you; moments you experienced with your wife that are of a more precarious nature. Will you embrace this side of your life or will the morality that you didn't care for before your accident come back? You can decide everything yourself.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1637070/]Steam[/url]]

Your holiday at the beach was the most boring week of your life. All you want is to get back home. Then, on your last evening, you meet Jacky. She happens to live in the same town as you, and she will be on the same flight back home as you, the next morning. You may think that meeting Jacky is the start of an adventure. But missing that flight and being separated from her, is the start of an even bigger one.

Back Home will be a road movie. On your journey you will meet girls and women. They all have their own story. Some will help you to get back home, some will bring you further away from it. There's a bit of mystery in it, too. Back Home a story driven game, where you don't have to read long pages of text without the image ever changing. I believe in "show, don't tell". The characters are all unique, because I've created them myself.

To get back home, you need to stay focused. But if you don't look around you, you won't get anywhere.​
title: Back Home
Akutoku Shitsuji ~Fukujuu wa Suit o Nuide kara ~
Love Slave ~Namida wa Fukushuu no Ato de~
Zankai
description:
Late at night, in a busy area, a murder occurs—four people are killed.

The perpetrator, a young girl, doesn’t resist and is arrested on the spot.

Detective Shirou Mukai tries to uncover her motive, but…

[Translated from [url=https://www.freem.ne.jp/win/game/8181]freem[/url]]

aliases: Summer Clicker ~Sweet Summer Vacation With Oneesan~
description:
I met her at the library during summer break, and it started with her forgetting something.
From then on, I started coming around to her house to play.
Then, our secret relation begin...
title: Summer Clicker ~Onee-san to Amaama Ecchi na Natsuyasumi~

description:
Wretched gatekeeper Chico is in love with the kind and beautiful white knight Minerva.
Coming off maternity leave and setting out on a mission, Minerva makes Chico her attendant...

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ266860.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Teisatsu Ninmu

description:
A story in a world where Yokai coexist.
In Hinomoto, a country that had chosen to coexist with Yokai, many incidents occur because of evil Yokai, but the existence of "Onmyoji" was the way to solve these problems.
However, a new "Curse" has been spreading...
Many Onmyoji have gathered to exorcise the "Curse" except the protagonist "Zen Kamono", due to being a member of a fallen onmyoji family.
While researching on his own, he discovers that a "kiss" is the most effective against the curse...!
title: Bukkake Onmyouji Emaki ~H na Oharai Itashimasu~
Our Life: Now & Forever
description:
Begin your life anew in this second installment to the lovingly nostalgic “Our Life” series.

Fall has settled over a quaint town high on a mountain as the story begins. But it isn’t only the leaves that are changing. You and your mother were leaving behind everything you knew before, having just moved into that well-worn house in the middle of a tight knit cul-de-sac. It’s there where a delicate paper airplane lands at your feet and leads you to unanticipated crossroads…

Make your own path through life as you grow from childhood to adulthood with your two closest neighbors. Even in the chilly autumn weather, it’ll be a truly heartwarming time

[From [url=https://gbpatch.itch.io/our-life-nf]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Slimy Sextet
description:
The hero Quinn has slain the demon king and brought peace to the world with the help of Celeste, the great fairy of the forest. Now Quinn must repay Celeste for her aid with the promised cost: her firstborn child.

However, Quinn boasts that no man is worthy of being her husband, so she'll never have a firstborn child that Celeste can claim. Using this loophole, she plans to get out of ever paying what she owes.

Angered by Quinn's ungrateful arrogance, Celeste begins plotting her revenge. She'll make sure Quinn has a baby, but not with a normal husband... No, she'll create a monstrous, evil creature to sire the child. A slimy, tentacled beast made of mind-melting love potion will make the so-called "hero" and all of her companions regret leaving a debt unpaid.

Slimy Sextet is a visual novel where you play as Celeste's slime minion, helping her carry out revenge via tentacle sex! Do your job well by fucking all the girls silly, and who knows... maybe you can even turn the tables on the great fairy herself?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1189070/]Steam[/url]]

title: IdolDays
description:
A young man working at an Akihabara-based agency that manages underground idol groups has been ordered to discover new idols by his boss. Now, he's at the end of his rope.
The protagonist is at a loss, finding that girls with the talent to become the kind of idol he's picturing are few and far between. He's sitting defeated on a park bench when he comes across a girl singing to herself while feeding some cats.

The girl's song is delicate, but her voice shakes him to the core. His heart stolen in an instant, the protagonist turns to the girl and tries to scout her to become an idol. However, the girl flatly refuses him, saying the idea is stupid, only to then disappear.

The next day, the protagonist gets called into the office, where he learns that the daughter of their sponsor has been hired as a member of staff and gets assigned to be her training supervisor. The girl who appears before the bewildered young man is the same one who turned down his scouting offer the day before.

The girl's name is Tsubaki Akanesaki. Though she's had several jobs, she got fired from all of them for getting into fights. What does fate have in store for a young man who's been assigned to train a girl whose a total delinquent?!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1576130/]Steam[/url]]
aliases: 愛怒流 (あいどる) でいず

title: 2021.06 Tokuten
description: An untitled, unfinished fantasy visual novel that has ceased development. The visual novel was released in its incomplete state as a bonus for Ci-en backers for June 2021.

title: Uchuujin ni Rachirarete, Seitai Kansatsu to Shoushite Omata o Iroiro Ijirarechau JK no Ohanashi
-Black Cherries-
description:
A long and horrifying night is in store for Dee, a young woman plagued by a failing relationship, as well as her own ill health. Days are passing by where she's constantly asleep, awaking only to find herself covered in blood, tears and cuts torn into her body during her long slumber. In a bid to fix the bizarre situation that has befallen her, Dee attempts to bring a halt to her relationship and seek assistance elsewhere. But her partner may have other, more ravenous plans in mind...

[From [url=https://tinysamm.itch.io/black-cherries]itch.io[/url]]
The goat dating-sim you've been waiting for.
title: Will You Goat Out With Me?
The Souperhero
description:
Valerie has a mental breakdown after viewing the famous "Campbell's Soup Cans" painting. Help navigate her through the nightmare following this mindbreaking experience.

While the events of this Visual Novel are loosely based on the shooting of Andy Warhol, the story has been twisted into a fantasy narrative, bending the characters' personalities to suit its purpose.

[From [url=https://crazycowlady.itch.io/the-souperhero]itch.io[/url]]

Abigail, a seventeen-year-old girl, wakes up on a beach in a faraway country called Thersanom that is unknown to humans.

It’s a world where all the magical creatures humans don’t believe in exist, mermaids, unicorns, pegasus, fairies… 

And then there is one that even humans have never heard of, Enfals, the ones with the pointy ears and the golden-colored eyes, that reminded Abigail of elves. This creature is what Tarran and Ryllae belong to, the enfals that Abigail soon comes to meet.

Abigail soon learns that her getting to Thersanom is a thing that should be impossible because the mermaids make sure humans and the non-magical creatures cannot get to Thersanom, and so she wishes to find out why she got there, and her memory loss is not very helpful.

Days after getting to Thersanom, Tarran's father had gone missing, and they quickly came to know that because of a secret he had been holding, the dangerous enfals of Isdar had taken him.

And so the group went on an adventure of finding Tarran's father and on the way Abigail learned a lot about Thersanom.
title: Thersanom: The Hidden Secret

description:
When you wake from a deep sleep, the first thing the goblin doctor asks is "What's your name?" The problem is: you don't know. A mysterious retrograde amnesia has left you with barely an inkling of your past, and you have yet to decide how much that actually bothers you.

Retrace your steps. Find what you've lost. Piece together who you are from the strange and incredible things you can do as you realize you're not the only one looking for you.

Collect information and determine who can help you decipher it. Form your own feelings on your absent memories, and see what path it takes you down.
title: The Terrible Persistence of Memory
Kampo
description:
In Kampo you play as a shaman whose goal is to help the villagers to keep the village alive.

To do this you will have at your disposal various herbs whose virtues you alone know, but beware! Your stocks are limited, so it's up to you to diagnose your patients in order to know whether or not care is necessary so that the population of your village doesn't disappear.

To help you in this mission you can call upon the favors of the spirits, only the shaman can contact them, but it is up to you to discern which ones are here to help you...

title: Yasashii Kanojo to Yarashii Isekai
description:
I have a girlfriend who is very important to me.
But in the middle of a date, she and I are suddenly struck by lightning.
When we came to our senses, we were reborn in a different world.

The king who summoned us says to us:

I want you to defeat the Demon King.

I was so excited to be reincarnated into another world that I had dreamed of.
However, the "hero" was not me, but my "girlfriend.

And the king gives her an absolutely invincible cheat ability.
But thanks to that cheat ability, we are dragged into the worst misfortune of all...!

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)

“The Hurt in Secret” is a visual novel game adapted from true events. Players play the role of a practice teacher with high hopes, and experience the daily life of teachers on campus. At the beginning, players thought they could fulfill the dream of being a teacher. To their surprise, they will accidentally be involved in a troublesome case. As the story progresses , players will face difficult choices and based on every dialogue they choose will affect greatly to the ending of the story. Through playing this game, players can gradually understand what a teacher’s life is like besides teaching. In addition, the players may realize that whether or not they can be the ideal teacher as they wish.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1591910/]Steam[/url]]
title: Bu Yuan Kanjian de Shang
Underworld Office
description: The main character is Eugene who accidentally falls into the world of ghosts and almost gets killed by monsters. A mysterious ghost saves Eugene and demands him to work at the Underworld Office in return…
Riley, the game's player character, is a substitute agent with the purpose of supporting a superhero's everyday activities.
title: Hero Anibnida

description:
Diwatas are a type of deity regarded as 'guardians of nature'. Said to be capable of mysterious feats such as bringing luck or misfortune, they were revered to by the people of the past. The human kind would give them offerings, and in return, the diwata would grant them blessings.

This coexistence continued until a thousand years ago where a tragic event occurred that would severe the relationship between the two worlds. Then coincidentally enough, I saw one in the forest of our village.....a lone mysterious girl.
title: Makia - Tales of the Forest

description: Argo heads to his favorite place, STYX, to spend one last night in the fallen city. A long night. It’s at this place that Argo begins to open up about his past... How will Argo’s last night end?
title: Argo-ui Seontaeg
Lovewood
description:
Lovewood is a cozy fantasy dating sim in which you play the new healer in the town of Liebwald. Healing physical injuries is like second nature to you, but can you be a balm to your neighbors' hearts as well?

Features include circa 2 hours per playthrough, six romance options and a protagonist that can be named and whose pronouns can be chosen.

You've always read stories to escape your mundane school life, but your world turns upside-down when a chance encounter with a magical bookmark summons three cute fairytale girls into the real world! Sound like a dream come true? Wait until you see what else has been unleashed...

It's your chance to become the knight in shining armor, save the world, and find true love along the way. Write your very own happily ever after in this magical and heartwarming tale of adventure and romance!
title: My Fairytale Girlfriend

description:
Shimada lives in the same apartment and works in the same company with his friends Fujimoto Hiroshi and Ogura Nana, leading a monotonous life of nine to five every day.
One day, Chika, an intern rejected by other departments of the company was assigned to Shimada.
As the monotonous life gradually changed, Chika's internship ended.
One year later, the trio appeared before him at the same time, disrupting Shimada's peaceful life.

[Edited from [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1618230/]Steam[/url]]
title: Lian'ai Guanxi

description:
You're a husband of a beautiful woman, whom you're willing to share to fulfill both of your desires. Will you be able to entertain this kind of lifestyle? Give it a try, you might like it. Perhaps that might spice up your almost dead sex life. Enjoy a story full of surprises and excitement!​

[Edited from F95Zone]
title: Hotwife Ashley
Kindan no Koi 2 ~Seiryaku Kekkon no Hate ni~

description:
You know how dating sims usually have an eccentric friend characters who help you progress through the game?

This is a game where you play as one. 

[i]Songs and Flowers[/i] is a lighthearted, fun story about befriending people and learning about them as you get closer.

[from [url=https://cowboy-starshine.itch.io/songs-and-flowers]itch.io[/url]]
title: Songs and Flowers

description:
One day, I was attacked and mugged on my way home from work. When I came to, I saw a man I didn't know. Later, when we met again at a detective agency, it turned out he's the detective! That's when the gears of fate started turning. I began work as his assistant, and although he hates women, he's been nothing but kind to me, which threw me for a loop.

"I can't let you go home in the middle of the night. Please, stay here."

I don't think I'm being seduced, but I can feel my heart pounding. Is this what they call "forbidden love"?

Love. Work.
Will you have both?

[Translated from [url=https://www.4gamer.net/games/344/G034466]4Gamer[/url]]
title: Tantei wa Koi o Shiranai
Kochira, Haha Naru Hoshi Yori
description:
A virus that is said to have come from space brought unprecedented damage to earth.

A long time has passed since that catastrophe, and now there are only the six of us in Ikebukuro.

The city has shrunk in size, and its buildings have been toppled and decorated with green grass and blue water.

The scent of an air conditioner comes from somewhere…

“This is Mother Earth!” And we’re doing good today!

[from [url=https://www.gematsu.com/2021/06/nippon-ichi-software-announces-yuri-visual-novel-kochira-haha-naru-hoshi-yori-for-ps4-switch]Gematsu[/url]]

title: Apathy - Arai Shouji
description:
Join Arai Shouji as he tells a different version of Bokujou Kitan.

This version of Bokujou Kitan is different from the one included in [url=https://vndb.org/v34196]Narunana[/url] and [url=https://vndb.org/v24563]Shinsei[/url] as this one has a branching scenario.

Marcel is the illegitimate son of the famous actor Georges de Saint-Rémy, a celebrated virtuoso on the stage, and a notorious rake with a penchant for sleeping with other men's wives. Owing to his father's seedy reputation and his own meek, socially awkward mannerisms, Marcel is bullied relentlessly by the other boys at his Parisian school, who seem determined to make his life miserable.

At the beginning of autumn in 1896, Marcel's brigand of a father becomes embroiled in a particularly salacious scandal, which is widely circulated in tabloids across Paris and beyond.

Fearful for her son's welfare, and desperate for him to have a respite from their family's continued drama, Marcel's long-suffering mother pulls Marcel from his school, and instead chooses to send him to her older sister's school in Myennes, deep in the French countryside. There is a catch in this seemingly innocuous plan, however. Marcel's formidable aunt, Albertine, owns an all-girls' establishment, which has never before admitted any male students. To attend his aunt's school, Marcel is bidden to dress and act like a girl – which he does, albeit, begrudgingly.

Marcel never much fit in with his male classmates at his Parisian school, but he's similarly fearful that his female classmates in Myenes will also shun him. Uneasy and afraid, Marcel expects only the worst when he arrives at his aunt's school...

Which is why he finds it so very surprising when, rather than being treated with scorn, his new classmates instead seem rather fond of him.

During his stay in the countryside, Marcel meets four girls who express an interest in him: the quiet, inscrutable Luce; the fiery troublemaker, Claudine; the elegant pianist, Celine; and the class dunce, Mirabel.

As the autumn months pass, Marcel grows closer to these four girls – but which one will he develop the strongest bond with? That is up for the reader to decide.

[From [url=https://ebihime.itch.io/embraced-by-autumn]itch.io[/url]]
title: Embraced by Autumn

description:
I made a dating sim where you can romance the monsters from Doom! "Doomed Love" features:

 - four demons to date
 - five endings 
 - all original art/music
 - absolutely no gore or violence!

[From [url=https://davidbcooper.itch.io/doomed-love]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Doomed Love

description:
The protagonist is an average run of the mill salaryman. His peers are all on career paths and are blessed with beautiful young wives. The protagonist on the other hand is just an ordinary man, with no luck when it comes to women, living a lonely life.

But one day, when he injures his arm at a drinking party at his coworker's house, he gets a chance to be taken care of by his coworker's young wife, "Suzumori Miyuki", and gets close to her. Furthermore, while on a business trip, he has a naughty encounter with his female boss "Tsujii Nagisa". 

There was no way I was going to miss out on all the attractive, frustrated women who were approaching me. Will the young wives minds and bodies fall to his sexual desires?

[Translated from [url=http://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1139459]Getchu[/url]]
title: Mesu Tsumami 2 ~Ijippari Tsuyokizuma to Seiso na Kiyowazuma to no Love Ero Seikatsu~
Higanbana
description:
When riding the bullet train "Nozomi no. 45", the protagonist, who is a female university student, becomes friends with other two female university students who are also heading to Tokyo as their destination. What awaits the three there?

[Translated from [url=https://ja.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%BD%BC%E5%B2%B8%E8%8A%B1_(%E3%83%97%E3%83%AC%E3%82%A4%E3%82%B9%E3%83%86%E3%83%BC%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%B32%E3%82%BD%E3%83%95%E3%83%88)]Wikipedia[/url]]

title: Yuzuriha no Uta -Inouryoku Soshiki Hanzai Taisaku Bu: Tokushu Kidoutai Dai Ni Ka-
description:
...After humanity had gone through the Second World War, people with supernatural abilities or grotesque features began to be discovered. Soon, these abilities or characteristics became known as "Special Powers", and those who possessed them as "Special Holders". Humanity sympathized with the early "Special Holders", but as their numbers expanded, their abilities started to be feared and avoided, and attempts to expel them from society arose. "Special Holders" also began to use their abilities against humanity. Some to defend themselves, while others to show off their abilities. Uprisings, crimes, and other similar events were commonplace as a result of this vicious cycle, and the battle between the two sides was escalating all over the world.

Likewise, Japan too was not an exception, as there was an outbreak of conflicts between humen and "Special Holders". During that period of unrest, all the time there were grievous events like the government being temporarily suspended to fulfill some of its functions or a failed coup d'état attempt in a Japanese Self-Defense Forces academy. Japanese government took steps to address the country's unstable situation. It has formed a Special Riot Police force that includes both humans and "Special Holders". The chief of its second division, Kashiwabi Ayato, and his subordinates worked hard to maintain a public security. A few years after the establishment of the Special Riot Police, crime rates fell and public order was restored as a result of its members' efforts. Every day, Special Riot Police officers in Japan, which had briefly returned to calm, fought hard to keep Special Powers crimes under control.

Following a certain case, the number of organized crimes perpetrated by Special Holders began to climb. Public unrest, government critics, and similar issues were rapidly spreading in proportion. All members of the Special Riot Police were called to investigate the case, each with their own set of suspicions. Before long, they were swallowed into a great conspiracy encompassing the whole country. The Army, which is taking actions to suppress the newly erupted conflict between humans and Special Holders with military power, and the protagonist with Special Riot Police, which is making efforts to settle the disturbance. What will you see in this critical situation, where all of these powers are mingled, after all rights and pains come together?..

[Translated from the [url=http://www.propeller-game.com/product/yuzuriha/story.html]official site[/url]]
Set in London from 1999 to 2001, the story is about Sherlock Holmes and Watson's descendants solving crimes using computer networks.
title: Digital Holmes

description: The sequel to "Eternal Ring."
title: Humanoid -INFLUENCE FLOWER-

description:
Hannah has been the manager of the Negligee lingerie store for a while now and thanks mostly to her it has become a massive success, so much so that her old manager Karen has returned and become another part owner and invester in the franchise. Now the two need to rebuild their relationship so they can work together what better way than with a night out just the two of them.

This game follows Hannah as the protagonist as she goes on a girls night with Karen her former boss.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1398680/]Steam[/url]]
title: Negligee: Girls Night
Area no Saikyou Mental! ~Seishinryoku o Kitaete Heroine o Otose~
Rikai Aru Okusan to no Icha Love Netorase Seikatsu

aliases: Corrupted Battle Girl Rurina VS Weakest Hero Ever
description:
Once-good female warrior Rurina has joined the dark side.
After a lover's quarrel she took a stroll outside the demon castle.
That's when she came across Ayta, an aspiring young hero.
"Rurina, it's you! Why? Why did you join the dark side?"
She chuckled. "You came along at just the right time..."

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ142411.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Aku Ochi Onna Senshi to Yuusha

aliases: The story of you and me
title: Bokura no Novel Game

description:
This is a spin-off mini-game of  Sengoku Rance , featuring Suzume, Kanami, and Princess Sen.

Suzume's past comes back to haunt Kanami as a Silver Eye Sect ninja named Kakusui steals Kanami's Decapitation Blade and plans to get revenge on Suzume and Inukai over the death of her leader, Gumo Danjou by using its abilities to become stronger than Suzume. The chase is on, as Kanami, Suzume and Senhime work together in order to get Kanami back her Decapitation Blade.

[From [url=https://alicesoft.fandom.com/wiki/Three_for_the_Slash!_Thrust!_Burn!]AliceSoft Wiki[/url]]
title: Sengoku Rance ~Sanbiki ga Kittari Tsuitari Moyashitari -Slash! Thrust! Burn!-

description: Visual Novel featuring Vtubers from an organization called SCT Project.
title: SCT Project Vtubers

description: Guukruux, an octopus like alien creature that relies on females of other species to reproduce and pleasure himself. One day while traveling through space to find new mates, your spacecraft malfunctions and you are luckily saved by Rebecca, a genetically altered perfect human woman and only human crew-member of the Utopia. You spend your time attempting to get as far with Rebecca as you can, manipulating creatures and beings on the ship to assault her, and impregnate her before the ship completes it's charter to earth.
title: Tentacular

description: A young man whose mother vanished under mysterious circumstances eight years ago meets humiliating, though quick death only to wake up in Hell being told his soul now belongs to a demon. Facing a second death that threatens to wipe his existence from the history books, he has no choice but to ally himself with a homicidal daughter of Lilith and a shapeshifting Rakshasa who’s come to deliver him to her mistress. He’ll have to find out what happened to his mother, why he’s here, and most of all, decide whether he wants to accept or fight the powers that be in this afterlife.
title: Hellbound
Annihilated Reverie: Implementation
description:
Welcome to Akisei University, the most prestigious institution in the Empire of Japan. Few manage to enter here and you can be thrown out as easy as shelling peas, so be on the lookout for your progress. There are several extracurricular activities to choose from: different clubs, festivals and competitions await you within the walls of this legendary university.

There is only one little piece of advice - never join the Journalism Club. Well, well, don't act like a daredevil, because no one else in their right mind will come close to this office. And if someone is destined to find out the secret of the club, then they will not survive.

Enjoy your time with the future legends of journalism and find out what each of them is hiding.

[Translated and edited from [url=https://unming.itch.io/reverie-a/devlog/265628/annihilated-reverie-implementation-announcement]Itch.io[/url]]

Normally, they're just your kind superiors, but when they put on glasses, their personality takes a full turn!
These glasses-donning beasts disturb the calm of the everyday life...
Brute Kuroda Ryuuichirou, self-absorbed Kamijou Ren, cruel Naruse Kazuma.
Which of these men will you be seduced by...?

[Translated from [url=https://web.archive.org/web/20130811220357/http://jp.apps.gree.net:80/ja/56784]official website[/url]]
title: Yajuu Megane ~Hyouhen Suru Shachou no Himitsu~

description:
You've suddenly been chosen to become a model?!
An extra sadistic model of mixed heritage, a playboy stylist and a trendy editor; they're all yours to meet, should you so desire.

"Do you even want to do this?"

"You'll be fine if you follow my lead."

Your tempting life with these sadistic hotties starts now...

[Translated from [url=https://web.archive.org/web/20130811223243/http://jp.apps.gree.net:80/ja/56663]official website[/url]]
title: Do S Model no Zettai Meirei ~Himitsu no Fukujuu~
Enzai Fandisk
description:
Desktop accessories / soundtrack / original drama CD / mini novel

(translated from [url=http://www.langmaor.com/l01/l0105.htm]official site[/url])

title: The Cryptokiller
description:
On your return to Precinct 41, play as Disco Elysium's Harry Du Bois with your new partner Kim Kitsuragi as you investigate what should be a simple open-and-shut case, that quickly devolves into something more...

[Taken from official [url=https://cryptokiller.itch.io/the-cryptokiller]itch.io page[/url]]

title: Glubokoe Ozero: Prolog
description:
Sali is a former court photographer for the criminal division.
His views on real reality will seem strange to us.
Life, as a process, does not interest him. The object of the hero's research is the manifestation of death and everything related to it.
An accident that happened to Sali reveals in him a mysterious gift. The acquisition of new abilities forced Sali to become an agent of the otherworldly forces in our world.
As he performs his duties, he unwittingly becomes embroiled in a violent confrontation of necrological beings that could lead to his terrible demise.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1649290/]Steam[/url]]

title: Shoujo Shuryou no Suiri Ryouiki -Kogane Shima no Mitsuyaku-
description:
2002. On the Guimul Islands in the Atlantic Ocean.

The story begins when the protagonist, who left the island as a child after her parents divorced, returns home for the first time in 10 years.

While reuniting with her father, a mafia boss, he dies a suspicious death.

Knowing that the island is controlled by four mafia families, and that even the police would find it difficult to investigate the case without the mafia’s help, the protagonist decides to follow in her father’s footsteps and uncover the truth behind his death.

What further incidents and treasures await as she weaponize evidences in clashes with the mafia, while occasionally under protection as a boss?

When you finally solve the mystery, you will be faced with a major decision…

[from [url=https://www.gematsu.com/2021/06/romantic-mystery-visual-novel-otome-shuryou-no-suiri-ryouiki-ougon-shima-no-mitsuyaku-announced-for-ps4-switch-pc-ios-and-android]Gematsu[/url]]

title: Sokuochi Succubus Rumiru-chan ~Kusozako Ma*ko no Mazo Mesugaki ga Namaiki Itte Sumimasen Deshita~

description:
Get ready to be reborn into a fantasy world, just seconds before the last boss' demise!

You have no memory of your adventure or heroic strength, and yet the people celebrate you as the Hero who saved the realm. This is just your typical adventure game filled with heroes and heroines... except it starts where games usually end.

[Taken from official English website]
title: Ore-tachi no Tatakai wa Kore Kara da!
Ever Maiden ~Daraku no Sono no Otome-tachi~
description:
This story is about "Puellarium", a school isolated from the outside world by fog and thorns. Here strict discipline is always in effect, the air always tense, and time flows undisturbed. However, one morning a girl was found unconscious in front of the school gate. This gate is always closed and should only open on special occasions. Viewed suspiciously by the students and asked her to name herself, she replied: "Alouette." 

At that moment, the bell of the clock tower, which was rusty and always silent, rang out. "When the bell of the clock tower rings, the end of this school will come soon." Like the gossip had hinted, it was the beginning of a nightmarish turmoil in Puellarium. Alouette who had became a student after many complications, violated curfew and left her room. What she saw there was a school that had turned into a different world, and strange misshaped beings that wandered around with a murderous intent. And finally, a girl who stood resolutely to face them in combat.

"My dream is to be a pussy pet till the day I die!"

Meet Meko Iio, the heroine of Rinko Kouguchi Series Vol. 2!
She has a pussy so exceptionally pleasurable that it should be declared a national treasure!

Lewdy Kouguchi, despite his name, was a shy virgin who lucked into the ever-horny Rinko as his wife.
He was overwhelmed by her desire for sex at first, but he eventually came to accept her perversion,
and they enjoyed a happy sex life. (This is the story in Vol. 1)

Now, Rinko has decided to take Lewdy to her parent's house in her hometown.
He's greeted by her father, who is seemingly a dog, and his master, neighborhood girl Meko Iio.
It seems Meko has not come to terms with her masochist desires,
and Rinko wants Lewdy to help her realize those hidden desires.
And so he becomes a sexual trainer, hoping Meko too will learn the pleasures of a happy sex life...

This is a comedy about sexually training a cheeky loli!

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax-touch/work/=/product_id/RJ332573.html]English DLsite[/url]]
title: Jinrui Saikyou Seiyoku no Yome no Jikka

description:
This is a horror ADV game in which you are “nursed” by a cute, but strange and dangerous looking girl.

Will you let her “take care” of you, or will you resist and run away…? The outcome is up to you, the player!

(Translated from [url=https://enoshima210.work/2019/02/05/yume/]the official site[/url]).
title: Yumemi Melancholy
Guang Yu Ye Zhi Lian
description:
There is 1 exile out of every 10,000 people in this world. They were once known as Gods’ equal. However, because they pointed out God’s crimes against the people… They were massacred. Their existence, erased from all records. Banished to the bottom of the ocean.

Many thousands of years later saw some of the survivors fighting for a place amongst the humans; to survive. Evan: “I’ve already survived and gotten out of that place alive.” Osborn: “There’s no need for us to be ashamed of who we are and what we are by hiding within the human crowds.” Sariel: “All I wish for, is to bring her back to life.”

Their obsession with finding out the truth and reason behind it all, has become the strength they draw upon to continue surviving. Charlie: “A new world… I will be waiting for you here.” Jesse: “To return the truth back to history. That is my mission.”

The past gave them the strength to continue fighting; The fateful event from which everything began.

[Translation from [url=https://jokertrap-ran.tumblr.com/post/654853233002610688/%E5%85%89%E4%B8%8E%E5%A4%9C%E4%B9%8B%E6%81%8B-light-and-night-main-story-prologue]Jokertrap-ran on Tumblr[/url]]

The protagonist Kayabuki Akira is troubled by the fact that he has no dreams.

After an unfortunate accident in which his apartment was trapped under a fallen tree, he was forced to leave where he was living and was introduced to a rundown apartment called "Shoufuku-sou" with a rent of 20,000 yen as a temporary residence. However, his misfortune is far from over.

On the night he moves into the apartment, the wall connecting his room to his neighbor collapses due to a noise problem he caused. Until repairs are completed, he is forced to live with his neighbor, Makimura Hazuki.

At first, they are confused by the unfamiliarity of living together (and with the opposite sex), but as they get to know each other, they lose their reservations and gradually grow closer.

One day, he is asked to help Hazuki with her hobby of making movies. The wheels of his lost youth slowly and quietly begin to turn.

[Translated from [url=http://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1138957]Getchu[/url]]
title: Makimura Hazuki no Koigatari
Shi Kong Zhong de Hui Luren
description:
Lovebrush Chronicles is a mobile romance game based around the concept of parallel universes.

You, a freshman art student at university, must juggle daily school life in the real world, as well as the unknown dangers in another world that you find yourself embroiled in! 

In parallel timelines, you find similar faces, yet starkly different personalities... How shall you draft this thesis of love and salvation?

[Taken from [url=http://www.lovebrushchronicles.com/]Official Site[/url]]

title: Koiyasumi ~Yuudachi ni Nureta Osananajimi~
description:
The protagonist, Izumo Hiroki, is a university student who is tired of living in the city. He returns home to the countryside during the summer holidays. His parents have left the countryside and only his grandmother remains at home.

Incidentally, Hiroki's presence always seems to bring rain. Today, too, the skies were overcast from the moment he got off the train. He headed for his parents' house as fast as he could and barely evaded the evening showers. When he returned home, he met his soaking wet childhood friend, Inaba Usaki.

"Welcome home, Hiroki! We'll be seeing each other again from today onwards!"

For one summer, the two are under one roof.

The companionship of a bright and lively childhood friend inspires affection in Hiroki's heart. And the fondness turns into love...

[Translated from [url=https://dlsoft.dmm.co.jp/detail/next_0323/]DMM[/url]]
aliases: コイヤスミ 夏休み編

title: Dimensional Prophecy of Zohar Redux Layer 1: Essence
description: Future humanity is in conflict with a mysterious, incomprehensible alien species which is defined as terrorists by the government. A group of mathematicians developed an algorithm which can predict the behavior of the attackers. A young lonely girl should become a new member of the institute but when she arrives at Kyoto Novalis, the aliens attack and she gets lost in the city. Hilal, her new guardian, a female cyborg, searches her in the city, but they don't have much time, because the government ordered a nuclear attack on the city if the aliens can't be stopped in time.   (Source: Itch.IO page and https://cyberpunkdatabase.net/movies.php)

It's been about a year since he returned from Ogasawara.

It's the start of summer. Aiuchi Shuuta, now a third year at the academy, has lazily watched the seasons pass-- his carefree classmates, his peaceful day-to-day life... and his love who hasn't returned, Arimura Romi.
He simply vacantly watched and continued to wait.

And to him comes a letter from the head of the Comet Organisation, Miko.

Once again, along with his comrades and the rest of the world, he gets caught up in their big plans regarding the comet. The final summer was about to begin.

[Adapted from [url=https://glovety.product.co.jp/apollocrisis/]the official page[/url]]
title: Einstein Yori Ai o Komete: Apollo Crisis
Immortal Heart Society
description: Summoned by a strange invitation, you and your estranged sibling find yourselves at the center of a shadowy secret society who claim to run the world. Delving into its mysteries, you discover the powerful inner circle whose members have the power to travel through time...and they want you to join them! Play as either the heroine or her brother as you discover a world of obscure rituals, family skeletons, and timeless love.

title: M.A.I.D.s
description:
A visual novel that tells the story of Mobile Autonomous Intelligent Devices (M.A.I.D.s), whose idyllic way of life in your household was ruined by an unknown and dangerous power. Socialize with M.A.I.D.s to oppose the antagonist, conciliate the conflicting girls, and maybe fall in love!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1413600/]Steam[/url]]

Born as the princess of the Pepsilia Kingdom, you were raised, doted on, and protected by everyone in the palace. Although you possessed very high magical potential, you abilities had never caused you any stress, thinking and learning very little about the power as you were born a female.

Ever since your mother Celia, the princess of Antigotra passed away early, you lacked a motherly figure in your life. King Ronald, as your sole guardian approaches parenting with a much more “open” attitude, leaving much of your care in the trustworthy hands of Albert and the guards. In turn, you grew much closer to your brother Alex and the knights as opposed to your own father.

Soon after, your carefree days playing with Alex and Albert ends, and your comfortable childhood draws to a close.

At the time of the Seven Nations Assembly, you arrive to Hubriigi with your father and elder brother, where your family is accused of treason for plotting to assassinate the king. With your family name now tainted by the crime, you find yourself spiraling deep into a massive conspiracy, like being plucked out of your safe ivory towers.

Can you stand firm, realize your dreams, and fulfill your familial duties through it all? 

[from [url=https://www.tumblr.com/ladys-throne-otome/189027548328/about-mc-a-backstory?source=share]Lady's Throne Otome[/url]]
title: Shaonü de Wangzuo
Geko Yuusha ~Sake wa Nomanedo Shuchinikurin!~
description:
Once upon a time, there was a brave man who traveled alone.
He couldn't drink alcohol, so he couldn't recruit friends in the right places.
He continued his long and arduous journey alone, with only his conviction to defeat the Demon King.

He overcame many hardships by himself and finally arrived at the Demon Lord's castle.
However, what he saw there was a castle that had already fallen into ruin.

As he had to do everything by himself, he was forced to take detours in everything.
The Demon Lord had been defeated by a party of other heroes.

He had devoted his entire life to defeating the Demon Lord, but his faith in the cause crumbled without a trace.
His mind was becoming more and more depressed, but he could not indulge in drinking.
One day, he came up with an idea to look back on his journey.

He thought to himself, "I'll do something I've never done before.

With this thought in mind, he opened the door of the town tavern, a place that was an abomination to him.

In fact, he had another goal in mind: "Let's form a party with only women. I'm going to travel the world!"

He moved as he desired.
He made a decision that would change his life forever, and made his first "traveling companion" at a tavern.
With the "female warrior" in tow, he takes the first step toward his peachy adventure.

[Translated from [url=http://www.caramel-box.com/products/geko-brave/story.html]the game's Official Homepage[/url].]

Kimisaki Academy is a prestigious all-girls school. Though, in the coming academic year, it's planned to become a coeducational academy. The player, a new transfer student, is the first male student to be enrolled. It's his job to help make school life fun and exciting for everyone at Kimisaki Academy.
title: Ensemble Girls!

aliases: N Love ~Life is Full of Stealing and Stolen~
description:
"When you steal a girl, your beloved one is also stolen by other man."

In a certain academy, guys try to corrupt lover, little sister, classmate,
junior student and female teacher with their overflowing sexual desire.
Will you defend your beloved one?.... Or like other guys do... Mate with other girls!?

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ215701.html/]DLsite English[/url]]
title: NLove -Netori Netorare Ikiru no sa-

description: Soul Labyrinth takes place in a world of humans, elves and beastkin. Choose to follow either beastkin, Jou or Katnir as they learn the art of 'soul weaving' from the elven masters. Partner with either the noble elf Reith or the cunning human Seladre. Navigate their relationship dynamics both inside and outside of the dream world.
title: Soul Labyrinth
FreshWomen
description:
You’re a young man trying to find out what happened to your father. But in doing so, you ended up having an accident that erased some of your memories. Now, with a clean slate, you moved to another town to start college. In your freshman life, you will meet several girls in a new world filled with fun, mystery, and sex.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/oppaiman]Patreon[/url]]

title: Once in a Lifetime
description:
You live in Mistbury, an apparently normal town where you live an apparently normal life with your family. However, you'll soon discover that this place hides some deep dark secrets and things can heat up very fast...

From infiltrating into a prison to exploring mysterious mansions and traveling to the other side of the world: embark on an adventure of conspiracies, meeting bizarre characters, living unique experiences, seducing gorgeous girls and, if there's time, saving the world.

If Astaroth seizes power, it will be the end for all of us.
Only you can stop him.

[i]Esse est deus.[/i]

[From [url=https://caribdis.itch.io/once-in-a-lifetime]Itch.io[/url]]

In Homecoming, you take on the role of a young Japanese snow fox named Hiroyuki Nishimura. After moving away from your hometown Minasato to Osaka five years ago, you receive an unexpected letter from an old friend inviting you back for one last summer vacation before completing your senior year of high school. What complicates things is how you've neglected to contact any of your friends over the years. Although nervous, you accept the invitation.

What awaits you back in Minasato? Will you be welcomed with open arms, or has it been so long that everyone has forgotten about you? Will this be yet another wasted summer, or will you finally have the chance to experience what makes life worth living?

[from  [url=https://stormsingerstudios.itch.io/homecoming-morenatsu-revisited]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Homecoming ~Morenatsu Revisited~
Seeds of Dreams
description:
Explore a small rural village, get to know your neighbours, and maybe even solve a mystery in this relaxing slice-of-life visual novel! Ash (name & pronouns changeable) just moved out to the country without much of a plan other than their dream of starting a new life. Fortunately for them, they're welcomed to the community by a colourful cast of characters who are happy to see a new face in town. Which one of them should Ash spend their time with? And do any of them have answers about the strange dreams Ash has been experiencing ever since they arrived?

[From [url=https://janetitor.itch.io/seeds-of-dreams]itch.io[/url]]

The Advisor Series is a player-driven narrative where your choices & decisions, both in the game, and out of the game, determine how future episodes unfold. Play the role of villain protagonist Magnus the Magician, as he wreaks havoc across the land, one well-placed fireball at a time!

The story follows a fantastic and exciting tale of Magnus the Magician, a villain protagonist that you might hate, or fall madly in love with.

[Edited from [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1601680/The_Advisor__Episode_1_Royal_Pain/]Steam[/url]]
title: The Advisor - Episode 1: Royal Pain
aliases: The Advisor - Episode One: Royal Pain

title: Guilty Gear Xrd
description:
Guilty Gear Xrd (Japanese: ギルティギア イグザード, Hepburn: Giruti Gia Iguzādo) is a fighting video game sub-series by Arc System Works and part of the Guilty Gear series. Guilty Gear Xrd was developed using Unreal Engine 3, with cel-shaded graphics in place of the series traditional hand drawn sprites. Following the storyline of the last game in the series, Guilty Gear 2: Overture, it introduced seven new characters.

[From [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guilty_Gear_Xrd]Wikipedia[/url]]

The last mode of Guilty Gear Xrd is the Story Mode, which is new in the current installment. This mode presents the full game story as a film-like animation divided into several chapters, for uninterrupted viewing. The viewer can pause the movie at any time to investigate a glossary of game terms and plot devices, which are described in the library mode.

title: PRODUCER 2021
description:
Producer (2021) is the graphic adventure novella.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1667320/]Steam[/url]]

title: Lesbian Mothman Hunters
description:
A short visual novel made in around a month for Cryptid Jam.

Guide the skeptical Charlie through a night in her local woods, helping her cute friend Mia search for the infamous Mothman (or, possibly, the less-infamous Owlman. Mia insists that the difference is academic). 

[from [url=https://zoelillitha.itch.io/lesbian-mothman-hunters]itch.io[/url]]

title: Isekai TS Tensei Cheat Nashi!? ~Juchuu Quest wa Ecchi na Mono ga Ookute Taihen Desu~
Luoxuan Yuanwuqu
description: As the adopted girl of a family fallen from grace, you now have a chance to make your mark on high society. Through ballroom dancing and clever romancing, gather the information you need to restore your family’s name.

title: Doki Doki Massive No Sense
description:
All rights for Doki Doki literature club goes to Team Salvato of course.

That said, i guess... i kinda fucked around this time too...

Just for fun.

[From [url=https://whatever-it-is-studio.itch.io/doki-doki-massive-no-sense]itch.io[/url]]

Your Boyfriend is obsessive, possessive, unstable, violent and desperate to show how much he loves you in his own twisted way. So be careful when interacting with him.

Your Boyfriend is a dating simulator, a tale about you and a strange man who is is deeply in love with you, willing to go through great lengths to prove how much you mean to him. Even if you don’t want anything to do with this man…

[From [url=https://www.blackshepherd.games/your-boyfriend/]Official Website[/url]]
title: Your Boyfriend
Anise Flowers
description:
“Anise Flowers” is a short visual novel about a farmer and a fallen angel living together on a small farm. Will their relationship blossom? Or will greater forces pull them apart... forever?

[From [url=https://sashaines127.itch.io/anise-flowers]Itch.io[/url]]

A shortage of workers due to the declining birthrate and aging society....

Tamachi Electronics, a major foreign-affiliated medical equipment manufacturer, is no exception, and is looking for motivated employees. The protagonist, Toshiaki Murakami, is one of them.

He is not a highly skilled employee, but he is willing to face anything head on and hit the ground running until he gets results. He was assigned to the Marketing Department, which continues to be the top sales department in Japan.

The department is headed by the manager, Reika Hisaya, and two talented female staff members, Julia Takano and Saori Yuki.

At first, Hisaya and the others are frustrated with Murakami, who makes a lot of mistakes, but they gradually become attracted to him as he works diligently and without hesitation.When the four of them go on a business trip together, they find that only one hotel room has not been reserved.

 "Then Murakami, one of us can share a room with you, right?"

He nodded his head and chose...
The sweet time between the virgin subordinate and the female boss began in secret.
title: Doutei no Ore ga Onna Joushi to Shucchou ni Ittara, Heya ga Onaji Datta Ken

description:
Mankind has wished since the dawn of time, but when those pleas turn dark, Heaven decides to answer. Tasked by the Archangel Michael to investigate, will our young angel Ariel follow her mission? Or will she stray from the light?

[From [url=https://galengames.itch.io/dufe]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Deliver Us From Evil
The Whistling House
description:
In The Whistling House you are Sergio Basarte, a famous architect from Chile with a tragic past. You moved to the United States in 1990 to erect a weird house in the middle of nowhere—some land you bought in the so-called Tornado Alley. Why? What are you trying to achieve? The Whistling House is a story of mourning, architecture and blood.

[From [url=https://nicosaraintaris.itch.io/the-whistling-house]Itch.io[/url]]

Six years ago, the right half of a corpse was discovered. The left half was never found…until six years later, completely fresh with no signs of decay.

Now, Special Agents Mizuki and Ryuki, along with their AI partners Aiba and Tama, are tasked to solve the bizarre Half Body serial killings while unveiling the mysterious plot known only as the Nirvana Initiative…

[From [url=https://www.spike-chunsoft.com/news/ai-the-somnium-files-nirvana-initiative-character-images-released/]Official Press Release[/url]]

[i]Six years ago:[/i]
The right half of a body suddenly appeared at the studio for an online quiz show. Rookie investigator Ryuki is assigned to this strange murder case.

[I]Present day:[/i]
The left half of the victim's body is found many years later, and the case is opened once again. New recruit Mizuki makes contact with the case's former investigator, Ryuki.

[From Weekly Famitsu 4/28 story description]
title: AI: Somnium Files - nirvanA Initiative
Apocalyptic Dream
description:
Apocalyptic Dream is a dual-MC, horror-themed otome game that takes place during a zombie outbreak in the 21st century. Follow Mikuru and Toshiro Aikyo, twins who had the misfortune of knowing what was coming.

Navigate friendships, relationships, and learn who to trust...all while trying to survive.

[From [url=https://studiomidnightsprings.crd.co/]Official site[/url]]

[url=https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/midnightsprings/apocalyptic-dream-18-otome-in-zombie-apocalypse?ref=1x6kmm]Kickstarter page[/url]

Your classmate Hoshina Risa is a bright student who treats everyone equally.

Misaki Kazuma, who sits in the seat next to her, has fallen in love with her. Unable to control his feelings, Kazuma made up his mind to confess his feelings to her. But when he looks up, Risa is gone. As it turns out, she is extremely shy! Even when he tries to chase after her, he cannot catch up to the former ace of the track and field team.

With the help of Risa’s best friend and foul-mouthed classmate Miyazono Mikumo, Kazuma chases after her by all means possible…

A hot day in the middle of summer. The runaway drama to hear her reply to your confession is about to begin.

[from [url=https://www.gematsu.com/2021/06/romance-visual-novel-keiken-zero-na-classmate-coming-to-ps4-switch-on-october-28-in-japan#gallery]Gematsu[/url]]
title: Keiken Zero na Classmate π
Roasting Report: Daehagsaeng Sumyeonje Samangsageon
description:
Can I solve a case just by listening to the clues?

Detective Lee Kang-wool, who writes mystery during the day and novels at night. Then a female college student came to him.
Called a master of chemical engineering, she asks to find out who killed her beloved junior.
The suspects she brought in, however, reveal that there is another suspect.

Don't think complicatedly. Tell the truth in ten clues!
Yujin Games' first mini-project-roasting report begins!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1666720/]Steam[/url]]

Blanche was born and raised in Namur, Belgium. One day the King of the Nordic countries, King Magnus, travels all the way to her and proposes. A year later, she sails from Belgium and receives Tunsberghus as a morning present at the wedding. She spends most of her time there and has children, but one becomes more hungry for power than the other. The kingdom's alliances go up in smoke and rumors of poison at the fortress spread quickly. Death haunts Blanche when the plague reach the land.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1644510/]Steam[/url]]
title: Reigning

description:
The world's most ancient vampire, a young and unprepared new leader of a centuries old vampire-hunting organization, thrust together by fate. Thalos knows he's found his beloved, but Dusty must never let himself grow close to a vampire.

Dusty is the next in line to lead the vampire hunting organization Jagerin, that's why he enrolled in the university owned by the world's most notorious vampire, Thalos.

He hoped to learn more about his mortal enemy. Instead he ended up in the wrong place at the wrong time and is mistaken for the man Thalos chose as his next familiar. He's put in a trance and the irrevocable blood ritual is performed.

Now Dusty is under Thalos' dark powers, and his mother has been murdered by the insidious vampire Johann. It's Dusty's turn to lead the global vampire-hunting organization, and his job to destroy Johann. He's not ready for either, and he's certainly not willing to be a vampire's familiar.

Dusty has no choice but to join forces with the vampire he's irrevocably linked to. He needs his help against a new kind of evil vampire. He just has to make sure he doesn't wind up in bed with his new master in the process.

Thalos, the immortal of immortals, has existed for eons, but he's never had a familiar who could share his dreams before. Dusty has a secret he's not letting Thalos unravel. Was their ill-fated meeting truly by chance?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1658830/]Steam[/url]]
title: Vampire Slave

description:
Help Leah find happiness or lead her to ruin in this dark slice-of-life story about a teacher whose life is turned upside down when the homeless guy she often stares at out of her window shows up at her door, claiming to have found her purse.

[From [url=https://melancholy-marionette.itch.io/apartment-no9]itch.io[/url]]
title: Apartment No.9
Fated
description: You're a postgrad student who's just gotten a job at the swanky Café Milan -- but things here are not quite as they seem. Team up with your chosen love interest to figure out what's really going on.

title: Suhoshin
description:
Yuri is a young man who has recently started working as a guard. After a long absence, he has returned home, but a series of dramatic events disturbs the tranquility of the village as people begin to mysteriously die off. Yuri is asked to investigate, but he quickly finds out that the problem is bigger than he initially thought. Through your choices, his story will be told!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1679700/Suhoshin/]Steam[/url]]

title: Sweet Elite
description:
Welcome to Arlington Academy, a prestigious boarding school for the highly ambitious, extremely talented and incredibly wealthy. Those who aren't from rich families but want to get into the exclusive school can apply for a scholarship, a limited number of which are offered each year. Only the most diligent and intelligent students are accepted.

Scholar is one such fortunate high schooler. Through a combination of hard work and determination, they managed to snag a spot into the school of their dreams.

Not everything at Arlington is as it seems, though. Secrets abound within the academy, ones that could change the lives of its students. It's up to Scholar and their new friends to uncover the truth. They maybe even develop a crush along the way.

[From the [url=https://www.dulcetgames.com/sweetelite]official website[/url]]

You play as Riley Weston, a young man who tries an experimental serum developed by his friend Jill, and inadvertently ends up turning into a girl. Riley and his friends quickly begin to accept the change, but little do they know, there are strange, nefarious forces at work in the shadows, and events already set in motion that none of them could've predicted, including a mysterious scientist and her loyal right-hand with twisted motives that threaten more than just Riley's life...

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/patternonthepants]Patreon[/url]]
title: Cellular Shift

description:
Darnell Plays with Fire, also known as Darnell's Pyro 101, is a Flash movie created by Tom Fulp and the first entry of the Pico series. 

[Paraphrased from the [url=https://pico.fandom.com/wiki/Darnell_Plays_With_Fire]Pico Wiki[/url] page]
title: Darnell Plays With Fire

aliases: Your Corpse Sparkles in the Moonlight
title: Tsukiyo ni Kirameku Kimi no Shitai
ONE NIGHT CROSS
description:
This is a romance visual novel about a sad love between a vampire and a vampire hunter.

[Translated from [url=https://www.freem.ne.jp/win/game/25913]Freem![/url]]

title: Android LIFE
description:
Just before you get hit by a truck, a strange light transports you into an unknown future. A strange girl saved your life, but this second chance doesn't come for free...

In the future, all men have died from a mysterious disease, and in the hope of filling the void left by men, women created a replacement, the androids.

These machines are capable of doing all kinds of jobs, but their main objective is to replace men in slightly less conventional tasks. Your job now is to work as a rented android, doing whatever women ask you to do for money.

[From [url=https://matedolce.itch.io/android-life]itch.io[/url]]

You’re a broke college graduate. Your rich, distant uncle has just shown up and given you 100 million dollars! And right at this moment, four handsome men come into your life. Could this be… the romance you’ve been waiting for!? But wait, there’s something behind their smiles that says otherwise…

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1578860/Billionaire_Lovers/]Steam[/url]]
title: Yi Wan Lianren

description:
This is a short slice-of-life visual novel about an average guy spending an afternoon hanging out with his girlfriend Carthaginia, [former] Eternal Dread Empress of Samhain, [retired] Nation-eater, and Immortal Lich, presently on parole for charges of attempted inter-dimensional conquest, raising a skeleton army without a permit, and disturbing the peace... he did always have a thing for powerful, assertive, older women.

Since Carthaginia's nation conquering days seem to be behind her, you'll just be watching TV with her, helping her with tech support, and *ahem* 'getting busy.' This is a pretty straightforward visual novel so don't expect much of that fancy 'gameplay' stuff. Just a lot of words to read, a few choices to make and some boobs (and ribages!) to ogle.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1668020/]Steam[/url]]
title: The Little Black Bestiary: The Salted Cookies of Carthaginia
Do M Imouto no Roshutsu Yuugi ~Dare ni mo Ienai Himitsu no Asobi~
Futanari Haha to Goumon Musume
description:
At first glance the Amashiro family seems like any other ordinary, happy family.

However, the mother, Miki, is a masochist, the father is a mad scientist, and the daughter, Misaki, never shows any sign of emotions. On top of that, a clone of Miki lives together with them, all of which makes the family more than a bit peculiar.

One day, Misaki witnesses her mother masturbating to the scent of her underwear. As she confronts her about it, Misaki and Miki's sexual preferences gradually begin to align...​

[Edited from [url=https://f95zone.to/threads/futanari-mother-and-her-torturous-daughter-final-chaos-r-freak-strike.93851/]F95Zone[/url]]

title: Ushi Kei Danshi wa Milk ga Dasenai!!
Hibiware Glass
description:
Meme and Kururu were childhood friends.

Due to his disability, Kururu was bad at reading the room, among many other things, which led him to be bullied for years. Everyone seemed to hate him, except Meme. Meme took it upon himself to be Kururu's guardian.

Who's to say when exactly Meme started feeling important about his "duty"...

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/bl/work/=/product_id/RJ308791.html]DLsite[/url]]

title: Liliet - Soushitsu Hen-
description:
Yuffy the adventurer has undertaken a quest to find a missing girl.
In exchange for a significant sum of money, our hero sets out to the Kingdom of Nardant.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ288671.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]

title: Watching My Wife
description:
The story centres around you; a happily married man with a loving wife. The game follows your journey towards a new romantic awakening in which you broaden your love life to sample wife sharing. How far you go down into this rabbit hole, and which direction you follow is up to you. What is certain is that there is no going back for the pair of you as you taste the forbidden fruit of hotwifing, cheating and cuckolding.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/illegiblemink]Patreon[/url]]

A perfect family on the outskirts of Milan lives a peaceful and serene life like many others.

The world is changing, however, and all their everyday certainties are about to be turned upside down.

A major global crisis will bring the Lussini family change their lifestyle. You will be called to take charge of the life of Sandra, the mother and wife of the family .. you will have to make very important choices and be careful not to make mistakes..your lifestyle is at stake.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/posts/scandal-versione-50420613]Patreon[/url]]
title: Scandalo
Cherish These Times
description:
Your father is murdered before your very eyes. With his dying breaths, he reveals to you that you have an Aunt who can take your family in. She agrees to take you in, but her reasons are not what you expected. Now you have to protect your family against your Aunt who wants nothing more then to knock up her Sister-in-Law and her daughters. You must be the man of the house now to Protect them and build up a relationship with them yourself.​

[From F95Zone]

When a sudden storm wrecks your ship, the only survivors are you, your sister and her nanny. The three of you are washed ashore on an uncharted island, but only two of you are rescued, taken in by an undocumented British colony.

Now your sister is missing... They're telling you she is dead, that no one could survive outside the village, but you know better. You'll find her, whatever it takes.

Soon, it becomes clear that the island holds many dark secrets which could threaten your life and sanity. Just where did these people come from? Why does no one go into the woods at night? What are these strange looks everyone gives you? And what has happened to your sister? Your quest is complicated by the island's many, beautiful women who all seem to have a special interest in you... and secret agendas of their own...

Will you uncover the island's secrets before they consume you? Or will you give in to temptation and depravity?

[From F95Zone]
title: Divimera

description:
One day, Marion wakes up in her attic. Odd—she doesn't really recall falling asleep there. Soon, she realizes that someone else—a girl—is living in her house. But she's never met her before! And although her village is similar to the one she's grown up in, it is not identical. And neither are the people.

Marion is now adrift in a world that feels familiar, but is filled with strangers.
What is this place? Who are these people? And where is her fiancé?
title: Sea of Roses
Hoshi Furu Oka made
description:
Dorothy was abandoned by his parents because he was born albino, which is considered a bad omen.

He has been discriminated and harmed since childhood.

Tenebrae, his adoptive brother, was also abandoned because he looked different. Although they aren't related by blood, they grew up like any normal brothers would.

At the suggestion of Tenebrae, Dorothy goes out to subdue the demons harming a nearby village.

[Translated from [url=https://www.freem.ne.jp/win/game/24427]Freem![/url]]

Around 4 years have passed since the married couple, Wataru and Rumi, graduated from university and got married.
Their wedded life was smooth sailing with each day passing peacefully.

One day, Rumi, who was a housewife, said that she wanted to work as well.
Since long ago, the two had been saving up for their own home and for when they had children, and so she wanted to work to help with that.

Rumi was worried since she never even worked a part-time job before, let alone a full-time one.
Wataru was troubled, but in the end, because of his own wishes, he had to go back to work.

Hearing about this, the president of Wataru's company offered if she'd like to be a private tutor and a housekeeper for his grandson——

[Translated from the [url=http://www.at-sakura.net/ntr/brand/086/index.html]original website[/url]]
title: Ijikurare Tsuma Rumi ~Saiai no Tsuma ga Shiirareru Midara na Arbeit~
Lisa
description:
The game follows Lisa, a quiet college student soon to graduate but despite everything looking up Lisa can't help but feel that the world and the people around her are moving forward at a faster pace than she.

Living a docile and quiet life with her boyfriend Danny may not be the reserved future Lisa wishes for herself.. and with so many doors opening day by day she has every opportunity to change everything.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/palegrass]Patreon[/url]]

The main character enters a school as a trainee,
but as soon as he enters the class room, he is reverse raped by a gang of school girls.
Try to escape while running from girls in this game made with RPG Maker.

[Edited from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ244945.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Nightmare School ~Mayoiba no Shoujo-tachi~
Nenorocire
description:
"I hope it's just me who worries too much. It's all in the past and we grew.
Let this peace lasts forever."

This is a story about a group of old friends, who haven't seen each other for quite a long time. Despite the happy memories they had, the group once experienced an unhappy situation that splits them up. Seven years later, they decide to spend their winter holiday together by holding a reunion. Kantha, the one who was most apathetic among her friends in high school, realizes that there is something going on between them. Wanting to change herself to be a better friend, she tries to understand what is happening to fix their friendship.

[From [url=https://chayamma.itch.io/nenorocire]itch.io[/url]]

title: Zen: A Gay Sequel
description:
Zen: A Gay Sequel, or ZAGS, is a gay, planner-focused, stat-based, dating sim set in college. It is a full sequel to Yearning: A Gay Story (YAGS), taking place during the spring semester of Chris' Freshman year of college.

[From [url=http://zags.bobcgames.com/]official website[/url]]

A small game set in a medieval fantasy universe.

[From [url=https://caesarcub.itch.io/quest-for-adventure]itch.io[/url]]
title: Quest for Adventure: That Time I Worked at an Inn in the Town Next to the Dark Lord's Dungeon.
World's end Nightmare
description:
Poor soul, who has never known love.
I'll give you one more chance...

It wakes up in a strange world, guided by an unknown voice.

(Translated from the old Chiral Mobile page)
At the suggestion of film club president Markaven, film club member Rumi Adagio must convince three boys into being exploited to save the dying newsletter club with a magazine—a fan service magazine.
title: FAN★SERVICE
Cvet zhizni - tjoplyj
description:
The eternal battle between good and evil. Between light and darkness. Between the kingdom of men and the realm of demons. But let me ask one question - has there always been white and black? Which one is which?
The wars never stopped.
The knight, being a warlord in the last of the battles, woke up in a land completely unknown to him. He remembers that battle, the banners and the drums. He rushed to his uncle's aid. The night sky lit up with fierce flames. And then...? Something or someone threw him into the mountain river. And now he was alone, surrounded by snow-capped mountain peaks. What was the outcome of the battle? Who survived...?
But it doesn't matter. These answers will not help him survive. He stands on unknown ground: will he be helped or killed?

[From [url=https://anivisual.net/stuff/34-1-0-3153]anivisual.net[/url]]

title: The Bite: Revenant
description:
Thrust into the darkness of vampire underworld, our protagonist needs to adapt fast to the decadent and depraved ways of the vampiric aristocracy. With some luck and a bit of help from a mysterious stranger he manages to survive the initial encounters with powerful individuals, but to truly prosper he needs to quickly familiarize himself with this world's ever-present scheming and high stake political games...

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/madmate_games]Patreon[/url]]

title: Taste of Seduction
description:
Taste of Seduction is a 3D high-quality, first-person, story and dialogue-driven RPG adult game that blends together themes such as college life and that of a spy adventure.
You play as Devlin, a young adult who has the ultimate goal to solve the mystery of his father’s puzzling disappearance. Before doing that, you first have to manage to balance your hectic college life, annoying family dramas, and the difficult challenges of growing your own business.
How do you do that? Making unlikely friends, amassing impressive capital, and bedding a dazzling number of stunning young ladies.​
*Note: This is a prototype and its purpose is to offer you a general view of the game features and to give you the possibility to customize the game assets and characters. The following updates will contain the first quests.

"Do you remember me?"

After coming home from work, I spotted a young woman sitting at my door.
I don't recall ever having known her.

[Translated from [url=https://www.freem.ne.jp/win/game/25714]Freem![/url]]
title: Hajimemashite Boku no Kanojo
Sengoku Hana Saku Koi no Jin
The Madness
description:
Are you ready to descend into the deepest crevass of the human subconscious?
Peel away the layers of the mind one by one as you solve perplexing puzzles, untangle webs of clues and crack codes, leading you closer and closer to the truth behind the insanity…
The surreal, almost absurdist take on Freudian psychology will take you into the mind of a madman, as you navigate around the crumbling mind solving enigmatic riddles…

But will you manage to hold on to your own sanity?

[From [url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160717184955/http://gliese.vnovel.com/?page_id=186]official website[/url]]

Experience a slice of off-grid life, and the bittersweet taste of love...

You live in the mountains, spending your days tending a vegetable garden, looking after chickens, and working remotely as a computer programmer. You don't participate in society - or whatever's left of it. You're fine with being alone.

But when a young woman appears on your secluded property, injured and lost on a stormy night, you're understandably torn. Are you obligated to help her? Is it even safe to help her?

You have no idea what to do. Your brain is mush. And the fact that she's so pretty doesn't help...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1336600]Steam[/url]]
title: Cabin Fever
Maxwell no Akuma
description:
I had a strange dream. 

An incomprehensible, abstract dream filled of images that appear and disappear.
