Rayen Lycon has suffered through many years of high school as a lonely soul, and has long felt torment and neglect as a result. Enter his senior year at Renden High, he has made a serious vow. He seeks a girlfriend by the end of the year, at any cost.

He began studying any and all resources he could find to aid in his quest to approach girls. As he knew it, that was the only way to interact with them, as he never had any luck otherwise. Being an introverted quiet type has not done him any favors, and he stubbornly tries to brute force his way through these problems alone.

Little does he know, that picking up a girlfriend this way is more than he bargained for...

[From [url=https://aniclashstudios.itch.io/zeta-wolf-chronicles]Itch.io[/url]]

description:
One hundred thousand murders and disappearances every year are estimated to have, as a cause, the occult.

In that world exists underworlds inhabited by ghosts and youma. Most underwords are not humankind's enemy, but some are, such as lewdworlds which prey on women. To exorcise such worlds, you must find the spirits at their core and purify them.

Two months have passed since your girlfriend Araka went missing after visiting an underworld she was supposed to take care of. She is a strong taimashi, an exorcist, and shouldn't have had any problem with what she usually call a little garbage cleaning. However, since then, she disappeared.

In light of the taimashi's association's inexplicable lack of action, you decide to take the matter in your hand and save Araka yourself. Your only weapon, a power you were born with: telemetry, that allows you to feel the residual thoughts of the objects you touch. With it, you hope to be able to find a trace of your girlfriend Araka.
title: Inkai Jinchuu Araka ~JK Taimashi Horror Tansaku RPG~

description: First Contact is a short visual novel about the trouble you could find yourself in if you're hooking up on a galactic scale.

After browsing a hookup app, you happen find your dream girl.
A crazy-hot goth girl with a feisty attitude.
She also admits to having a few surprises in store for a willing candidate.

You happen to be a match on the app and arrange a date.
Upon meeting, your breath is taken away.
She's everything you imagined--and more.
Little do you know, that you're in way over your head.

So you're determined to be her friend! You're determined to get through that thick skin of her, to see her for who she truly is!

title: Kunado Kokuki
description:
One day, metals have gained a will and randomly began to attack humanity all over the world―――

Without knowing the cause, all the civilization and history on the earth were destroyed, and mankind has been hit by unprecedented catastrophes for about 1,000 years.

Humans drastically reduced their numbers and managed to survive while resisting the attack against the metal with will Tekki.

Many of the remaining humans have awakened to their supernatural powers, and devoted themselves to the days of battle. Meanwhile, a girl named Natsuhime, one of the warriors belonging to the frontier country of Kanto, defeats Kurokami, the greatest threat of Tetsuoni.

The people of Kanto who survived are shaken and rejoices the disappearance of a thousand-year-old threat to human existence.

This story revolves around the boy Shin, who has no memory of being found in the remains of Kurokami after the battle. It is a story of mankind's revival and how it reconstructs history from the former civilization that humans lost to Kurokami.

[Introduction translated from [url=https://dlsoft.dmm.co.jp/detail/purple_0007/] DMM official summary[/url]]

Rabbit hole…
Rabbit hole…
What is this place?
I’ve working there for few days and don’t have idea.
Maybe can you help with this?
I think that I like there.
Yes I like there, but is not because they.

One day…

Unravel the mysteries of the strange bar you just started working on. A new guise for the Rabbit hole concept, when a different world is right here but you never stopped to look. Oh and find romance, or just friends!

description: The Elfin Empire, where elves and humans live together, is ruled by the high elves and surrounded by a deep forest. Goblin tribe, led by a shaman Zodom, attacks the country with their mechanical beasts and the princesses are bestowed with new powers to defend the nation. However, years later, the cardinal Gedlf conspires to take over the kingdom and makes a deal with goblins to make the noble elf princesses his own using immoral means. The princesses are marked with a curse that turns their bodies into lustful beings, losing their divine powers and becoming slaves.

The main character, Ryoma Honjo, is a university student who is living alone for the first time after entering university and has started working part-time at a nearby bento shop during his first summer vacation.
He is still new to the job and has some difficulties, but the people around him support him and he is enjoying his time there.

His mother's friend, Yuko Hayama, a former nurse, loves housework and is a motherly figure.
She has a tendency to spoil him and always comes to check on him, so Ryoma can't help but indulge her.
Maki Kenmochi, a senior at her part-time job and a former member of the track and field team, is a vivacious and caring person who is raising a child.
Sometimes she gets angry with him, but she always follows up with him.
Erika Tachibana, the owner of the coffee shop he frequents, has an aura of sex appeal, and enjoys teasing Ryoma about his lack of sexual knowledge and watching him freak out.

While he has never had a girlfriend or relationship, he finds himself curious about three women .......
The story follows the development of a sweet relationship with these three married women.

[Translated from [url=http://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1147309]Getchu[/url]]
title: Tsumamitsu Neburi ~Mureta Yawahada ni Koishite…~

aliases: The Magic to Destroy the World
title: Sekai o Hakai Suru Mahou
Love or Money?
description: "You have 3 years to find a partner, or else you're coming back home." That's the deal a still single girl makes with her parents when she left the small town. With a shred of hope, she enters into a matchmaking party on a luxurious cruise. Little does she know that surviving means finding a partner to avoid an enormous debt. Suspense surrounded by lies, money and love. Who will be your choice?

"So, please show me what you'll do for love when your life is at risk."

After being involved in an unfortunate accident, you sign a contract with a beautiful devil boy. For you to live longer, the proposed condition is that you find "true love" by the prom, which is in 2 months.

But the princes that you have gotten friendly with at the academy are all problematic men!? One is indecisive, the next is a playboy, another is a "bad boy" and finally an obsessive lover! But they are all handsome men that have fallen in love with you.

Can you find the perfect partner for true love by the prom?
title: Magical Kiss

description:
A girl enters a school full of celebrities and hopes for a bright and glamourous school life. This quickly falls apart due to the collapse of her father's business.

"I will crush society's ranking system!"

After falling from celebrity status to the daughter of a hotdog stand owner, the heroine fights for her dignity against the "S Rank" ones ruling over the school.

description:
Spring Garden's motto is to be "A cafe that makes people happy". Succeeding his grandfather's cafe, Yukiharu faces challenges as the store manager to continue the cafe and unexpectedly finds himself falling in love for the first time...

Luca, a cool-headed renowned patissier, Jo a rugged and hard working newbie patissier, Keigo, a reliable but a bit of a player IT company CEO, Akio, a mysterious and hard to read owner of the cafe.

How will the first love with the unique characters turn out for the desserts mania? Will it be a sweet one or...?

What is pasted in place of them are the faces of other students which cause them to go mad and shout out "LIKE" and "SHARE". That is the curse of the school. During the search, the ghost falls in love with him and eventually finds out the truth of her own death. "Words" are collected throughout the story. For the final performance you will choose which words to use for your song. What do you want to convey? To who? Your words change the ending! A youth love story.

You’ve been living by yourself for three years now, set into your own pace of life in a new town after you landed a comfy job.

She tells you that your little sister, who is 18 as of now, is moving to your city to start studying at the local college, during which she'll move to your apartment

title: The King's Matchmaker
Guardian Angel
description: As an ex-special forces soldier, a brash, rich, playboy artist wants to hire you as his personal bodyguard. What's more, you're feeling drawn closer to the widowed husband of your former commander.
Today, you have the biggest audition of your life! Will you land a role in Aaron Santos' hot new Broadway musical? It's time for you to sing, dance, and act your way to stardom!
title: No Business Like Show Business

description: It's spring break! Your tour of New Orleans with Macy has proved pretty tame thus far. Maybe a toast with a murdered specter and a trip back to the roaring 20's will shake things up...
title: Meet Me at Midnight
Holmes Homes ~Hikikomori Tantei~
description:
Crack the unsolvable crime?! You're a policeman, who has suddenly been given a difficult case to solve. But you find someone who calls themselves "The modern day Sherlock Holmes" online-- An anti-social, hospitalized, rich kid, in jail...

Take on the complex/mysterious cases with all the unique and unusual Homes' that you will meet.

This is the story of Detective Holmes...... The beginning and end, has been inscribed here.

3 classic horror tales illustrated in pixel art and supplemented with chilling audio by Kevin MacLeod! 

Sit down fiend, and see if you can stomach these three macabre tales! All introduced by our favorite fiendish ghoul with an obsession with classic literature.

[From [url=https://tj-stoker.itch.io/horror-tales]itch.io[/url]]
title: Horror Tales

description:
You meet a gorgeous girl on the way home from work, she drags you away to get coffee and then reality shatters.

[Edited from the in-game introduction]
title: (in)finite girl
Tsukihime -The other side of red garden-
description:
The second half of the remake of Type-Moon's classic doujin game Tsukihime, featuring a rewritten scenario with major differences in its setting and plot, as well as several new characters.

This release will include the Far Side routes and a new fourth route.

A girl in the seat, the artist behind the easel. They have a conversation. The girl's heart is shattered, and the artist's wrist moves no more.

[From [url=https://4noki.itch.io/draw-no-more]itch.io page[/url]]
title: Draw No More
Hypoxia - One Last Breath
description:
Since the Z gas appeared in the atmosphere 99 years ago, it is no longer possible to breath properly outside. As a result, almost all modern societies collapsed during the oxygen wars. On the Orbis Island, people survive thanks to a dome maintained and supplied with clean air by the Massive Air Company. However, the origins of the catastrophe remain unknown and the island suffers from a great political instability.

Carl Thanavan is a young scientist living in the Dome and determined to find the truth. As he accepts to host his sister’s friend Shaimaa, he doesn’t think that this decision will force him to put aside his ambitions and face his fear of the outside. On his journey, he will meet Olivia and take part unwillingly in the beginning of a revolution. He will then realize that the greatest threat for humanity was perhaps not the one he believed.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1507630/Hypoxia__One_Last_Breath/]Steam[/url]]

title: Zhiming Youxi
description:
“Lethal Gamble 1 Werewolf Puzzle” is a suspense reasoning emotional work based on werewolf killing rules.
It tells about a group of ordinary college students who accidentally came to a mysterious villa. Unprepared, they wanted to play a game of werewolf killing. The werewolf will take one person away every night, another will be judged out in the afternoon, and there are endless off-site means to sneak in. Suspicion, opposition, use, betrayal, betrayal, torture... Since stepping into this door, life has opened the countdown.
You are one of the twelve. You have only five days left to refute the truth and riddles in the werewolf killing and find out the real culprit of the tragedy of the twelve.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1728560/]Steam[/url]]

title: Eclipse Cirque ~Shinku no Tobari~
description:
The protagonist was living a slow life as a street performer. After hearing that the popular circus company "Cirque Eclipse" has arrived in town, he sneaks into the venue after their performance has finished, hoping to join the circus he admires. However, he finds out about the secrets of the circus company. "You're going to have to decide, to join us, or be killed right here right now".

What awaits him beyond his chosen path----.
A world of blood and applause begins now!

After losing your mother, you are living in poverty with your sick brother. One day, a mysterious package arrives at your front door. From the moment you open that package, your destiny starts to change drastically. To save your sick brother, you work as a "dark" deliveryman and undergo multiple dangerous missions that bring you suffering. Can you find your way out of this lawless underground society!?
title: Dead or Delivery
Sayonara Made no 30-Bun
description: “You’re the only one that sees me. Please, lend me your body.” “ECHOLL” a band that disbanded right before its major debut. One day, a year later, Souta, a university student appears in front of Yamaken, Shigeta, and Mori who are ex-members of the band. Souta steps into our everyday lives and encourages us to reform the band. Having a voice that fascinates everyone, and even though he is pushy, there is something about him that you just cannot get mad at. And the members start to feel moved by this. However, the identity of Souta was in fact Aki, the vocalist who died a year before!

title: Gemini City -Science and Magic-
description:
“In a world where two people from different countries who weren’t supposed to meet, end up falling in love”. 

“Sphere” a country of mystical powers and magic, and "Circuit" a country full of technology and gadgets that feel out of this world. These two countries make up the island that people call Gemini City, where they are at conflict and in constant competition with each other. In order to find your best friend that has gone missing, you cross over the border and dive into the unknown world!

What waits you are witches, humungous plants, a mad scientist... And a lover from the other country. Your choices change your destiny--. This is a spin-off story inspired by "DUO-WARRIOR" by Henry Gilroy, the writer of the Emmy award winning TV animation series "Star Wars: The Clone Wars".

Just before their long awaited major label debut, the idol Ridori-Troy is caught in a car accident. When they wake up, they find themselves in a different world like the Warring States Period, where idols are militant.

In order to return to their original world, they have to meet the ruler of the other world, the "Tenka-bito". In order to do so, the boys have to participate in a contest to determine the number one idol, but this is the beginning of hardship.
title: Hyakka Ryouran Sengoku Star

description:
[b]DYSTOPIAN CONSPIRACY, TIME-TRAVEL & REBELLION[/b]
The VII Enigma is a sci-fi mystery visual novel set in the shadows of futuristic dystopian conspiracy. Head down the rabbit hole and uncover the mysteries of a man set against the world, as the player must navigate the path to the true ending and overcome the tyranny of time itself.

[b]SYNOPSIS:[/b]
In the year 2060, Dr Elijah Shaw awakens in a state of confusion, the only clue to his past a mysterious orb clutched in his hand. After being hauled in for interrogation by an agent of the totalitarian ruling faction known as 'The Bureau'; Elijah is rescued by a small band of rebel fighters. Join Elijah and the rebels as they seek to untangle the web of deceit behind 'The Bureau's control and to discover the secrets of Elijah's past.

[i]Can you overcome the tyranny of time itself? Will you crack 'The VII Enigma'?[/i]
title: The VII Enigma
Vampire Doctor
description: The protagonist, who lost her mother when she was a child, became a detective to investigate the identity of her mother's killer. While looking into a different case, she gets herself into trouble and is saved by a vampire called Doctor Al. In exchange for her blood, Al helps her search for the criminal who killed her mother. However... every time Al sucks her blood, "Al's past" attacks her, sensually. But to reach the truth she must give up her own blood. Can you reach a happy conclusion, or will it be...

title: Taboo 5 ~Kindan no Kajitsu wa Amaku Konjiru~
description:
You are a female university student living in the suburbs. Returning from school, a man suddenly attacks you in a dark street. You feel the fangs pierce your neck as well as...pleasure. From that night you become his servant.

The fate of the story comes to life with the encounter of 5 men. See for yourself, the shape of love beyond the taboo...

aliases: Ghost and Joker -A thing to do for you-
title: Ghost & Joker -Kimi no Tame ni Dekirukoto-
description: One day you wake up as a ghost… "Joker", a girl dressed in black, a "Grim reaper," says you "Must help those who are living", if you want to regain your missing body and lost memory. You are approaching extinction, mysteries are arising everywhere, and the living are suffering... Can you resurrect yourself and reach the truth of this story?

You have just received a file containing an AI fresh out of the digital oven and ready for its final phase of testing.

The company you work for is awaiting your judgement on whether this little pile of data should continue on to the next step.

[From [url=https://alva-radio.itch.io/prototypemintb]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Prototype Mint B

description:
Unexpected magical disasters that are known as "Magic Calamity" still happened in the world continuously.

In the government, the department that is responsible for countermeasures against the disasters was in disarray due to the loss of some members and its dysfunctional state. There, some members ranging from extremely smart engineers to bureaucrats formed a secret organization "Enigma" in secrecy. The members of Enigma are those who believe that magic is what is breaking the world. Knowing how powerful magic is, they planned to gather all the magic power and use it to fulfill their ambition of ruling the world.

To achieve their ambition, they first must uncover, steal, and make the main culprit who had brought the magic power into the world in the first place, the Mahou Senshi (Magical Warriors) to give up their power voluntarily.

Among the Mahou Senshi, there is one person that they were eying on in particular. Her name is "Ayahime Kurumi", also known as "Lemmtear Theta". Among the Mahou Senshi, she is known as the strongest and has the most powerful magic power. Usually, she works in a magic medical department, but when an incident occurs, she would transform and join force with other Mahou Senshi. Enigma found that when Kurumi engages in battle or when she experiences sexual pleasure, her magic power will be amplified greatly. To maximize her magic power, Engima deployed an "active unit" to attack her. This unit were irrelevant mobs that had received magic power from the rapid spread of magic and wanted to use the power to fulfill their desire.

Then, Lemmtear Theta got attacked and her body which had become highly sensitive from experiencing humiliation countless times began to give in to pleasure. There, a mysterious young girl appeared and rescued Lemmtear Theta. Her name is "Lemmtear Iota" and she is a new member of Mahou Senshi dispatched from the Goddess Imperial Guard Troop in Roa. The new warrior came to this world to prevent and investigate the scheme of Zerou's remnants who had escaped to this world. However, she refused to cooperate with Theta or other Mahou Senshi and began to act alone.

Will Lemmtear Theta and her friends be able prevent Enigma's plan and protect the world once again?

[Translated from [url=http://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1147016&gc=gc]Getchu[/url]]
title: Mahou Senshi Lemmtear Knights 2 -Koware Yuku Sekai no Megami-tachi-
Kate Don't Wait
description:
Summary:
Kate Don't Wait is a visual novel, set in the near future, about love as a metaphor for utopia.

History:
Year 2043. The buts spread obedience to the Accumulator infecting other people with bioinformatic viruses.

You are in love with Kate: she is your friend, a hacker who does not want to obey the Accumulator that absorbs all human work in private databases. Although you do not know if you can win her heart, Kate is for you the horizon of a new morning; As you try to seduce her, she encourages you to keep fighting. But combat is dangerous and you could end up in jail. Are you going to let yourself be overcome by fear? Aren't Kate and the reboot worth any risk?

You find your best friend dead, and 4 suspicious students lingering around the scene. Who is the one that did it, and how come you never knew about their complicated history with your best friend? Who is lying about their intentions on that night?

Death Becomes You is a mystery visual novel where you, the reader, untangle the reasons behind Lyra's death by building friendships with 4 of your fellow magic students.

Choices matter and affect the 4 routes of the story. You find the truth - who had the motivation to kill Lyra? Or did Lyra have a secret that she was hiding?

[From [url=https://quill-studios.itch.io/death-becomes-you]itch.io[/url]]
title: Death Becomes You
Under Pretense Of Death
description:
Under Pretense of Death is a visual novel with hidden object and quest gameplay elements.

Welcome to a fantasy world! A world in which magic is as powerful as ever and technology is already able to feed the starving cities of humanity. Where on a far-off island, the Faerie and Elven aristocracy rule, and people live alongside Orcs, Trolls and Gnomes.

A half-blood elf girl, Solis, travels to the Fairy Kingdom to fulfil the last wishes of her dead friend. This event marks the beginning of a chain of mysterious events in which Solis will need to find her place in this city, make new friends and perhaps even meet the love of her life?

Solis is not a warrior. Armed only with her wits and her charm, she weaponizes these as best she can. Regardless, you would do well to be careful around her!

Find items, explore locations, learn new information from characters and make the choices that you think are right!

[From [url=https://pekaqueen.itch.io/upod]itch.io[/url]]

Life can be boring sometimes - work, daily routine... Who can change it? A new neighbor, of course! Especially a sexy goth one!
Experience a romantic story of an ordinary otaku and his new cute neighbour, who likes to bully him... "Sometimes"...

My Furry Neighbour is a short visual novel about the relationship with a new neighbour that grows into something more than just friendship.

The game's main character lives a boring otaku life in a small town where nothing interesting happens. But one day something completely unusual happens to him: he meets his new neighbor, who turns out to be not so bad. They spend time together and our character begins to experience new feelings, previously unknown to him. But will he be able to overcome his complexes and achieve happiness?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1705520/]Steam[/url]]
title: My Furry Neighbour 🐾

description:
2050, a future world we had dreamed about.
But suddenly, a disaster arrived, bringing the human into a desperate situation.
Wandering among the ruins of human civilization, I linger.
But until the day I met a bionic girl, the truth of the catastrophe was finally revealed.
Now, the fate of human civilization is in my hand...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1694100/]Steam[/url]]
title: Xingcun Zhe Leyuan
Remeslo samuraja
description:
Japan. 17th century. On the outskirts of a village, an old craftsman toils his days away. He bides his time to pass his business on to his heirs and retire from work. But this is until he is forced to take up the sword and revisit the path of violence.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1694500/]Steam[/url]]

title: My Furry Dictator 🐾
description:
Your life is a true success story - you have achieved your dreams, becames rich and got everything you've ever wanted. There is nothing that you can't buy now. But why can't you feel happy? Is this what you wanted?... Everything changes when your personal plane crashes in the ocean and you find yourself on an unknown island, which changes your life completly in the next few days.

My Furry Dictator is a short visual novel about love, succes, goals and happines. Our heroes are completly different but feel the same emotions, have the same thoughts. Maybe political views don't matter so much, maybe this is a chance for them to find their love? Find it yourself in "My Furry Dictator"!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1719460/My_Furry_Dictator/?curator_clanid=41000285]Steam[/url]]

The protagonist, Tomoki Motosu, is living with his girlfriend, Saori Kawakita, and is considering proposing marriage.

One day, however, he is shocked to hear from their mutual childhood friend, Souta Nonomiya, that he is suffering from a disease and has no idea how long he has left to live. The two of them vow to help him in any way they can, and bring him home to live with them.

When Tomoki hears Souta's wish to touch a woman before he dies, he consults with Saori and decides to make his wish come true. At first, Saori gives him a blowjob. Eventually, however, she allows him to have sex with her as well. For Tomoki, although he was jealous of having his girlfriend embraced, he remembered how it felt like when they used to play together.

However, when Souta's condition did not progress even after some time had passed, he began to feel some skepticism in his joy. Then, he witnesses Saori being embraced by his friend without telling him.

From that point on, the three of them begin to drift apart...

[Translated from [url=https://dlsoft.dmm.co.jp/detail/aquras_0161/]DMM[/url]]
title: Shin'yuu ni Kodane o Sosogareru Ore no Tsuma ~Watashi, Ano Hito o Erabimasu...~

aliases: High School Girls Detective ~Escape from the Murder Time Loop~
title: JK Tantei ~Satsujin Loop Kara no Dasshutsu~
description:
――But who is the culprit?

At prom, you follow your best friend Melinda to a storage house where a secret party is planned to take place. However, as you arrive at the venue you are met with a huge explosion. When you wake up, you realize that you have gone back in time by a month.

"Unless you find out who's behind all this, you cannot prevent the explosion at prom."

title: Kunoichi Ryoujoku Zashikirou
description:
It was an act of revenge. She struck at the enemy in their own tower
... but the revenge was a failure.
The enemy placed her in a holding cell called the "zashikiro",
a kind of prison for the insane, but for this ninja,
she knew it would be the place of her death.
Resigned to this fate, her only reason to keep going
was if it could somehow spare the lives of her clansmen.
Five days.
If she could endure the next five days,
her captured friends can go free.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ137318.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]

title: Storia Stories
description: One day, a white rabbit appears in front of the protagonist and invites her into the world of “Storia”, which is a world full of countries that are based on classic fairy tales. However, the evil "Dream Killers" have stopped these fairy tales from ending in the way they should. If nothing is done, then happy endings will be no more. As the "Girl of destiny", the protagonist is determined to save the world, and goes on an adventure to fix these stories that have been distorted. Will the protagonist see a happy ending?

On a quiet Saturday in September, Maria goes to her room to text her best friend, Genny, something very important.

Only, it might be too late to tell Genny and Maria doesn't have much in the way of courage.

[From [url=https://that-wannabe-cat.itch.io/dear-genny]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Dear Genny
Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Jan
description:
Higurashi no Naku Koro ni takes place during June 1983, at a fictional rural village called Hinamizawa, which has a population of approximately 2000. The main character, Keiichi Maebara, moves to Hinamizawa and befriends his new classmates Rena Ryugu, Mion Sonozaki, Rika Furude, and Satoko Hojo. Keiichi joins their after-school club activities, which consist mostly of card and board games (and punishment games for the loser, usually him.) Hinamizawa appears to be a normal, peaceful, rural village to Keiichi. However, the tranquility abruptly ends after the annual Watanagashi Festival, a celebration to commemorate and give thanks to the local god, Oyashiro-sama. Keiichi learns that every year for the past four years, one person has been murdered and another has gone missing on the day of the Watanagashi Festival. Keiichi himself soon becomes drawn into the strange events surrounding the Watanagashi Festival and Oyashiro-sama. In each story arc, he or one of his friends become paranoid, and a crime is committed. Usually, the crime involves the murder of one of their own friends. While it seems impossible to tell their delusions apart from the mystery of Hinamizawa, slowly the truth is revealed.

[from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Higurashi_no_Naku_Koro_ni]Wikipedia[/url]]

In this game, the club game of choice is Mahjong. The story is told through NVL segments interspersed with Mahjong minigames.

Here you will have to make decisions during the summer vacations in the mountain house. Having a good student means giving her a lot of whims and accepting what she wants. But be careful the mountains have some mysterious places and it would be very easy to get lost.​
title: Oh Daddy
Summer Story
description:
This story is about a young girl and her two younger brothers, who came to live with her for the whole summer.
We will take on the role of the eldest brother and start making history on his behalf.
How the story will develop and what events will happen depends on him, well, that is, on us. Well you get the idea.​

title: One Shot in the Dark, Now I’m Dead.
description:
They killed the world generations ago. Find out the truth and ascend to the Wire. 

[From [url=https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/one-shot-in-the-dark-now-im-dead]Ludum Dare[/url]]

title: Tettou no Shoujo
description:
Ritarou Akaike, the eldest son of a family that owns a western bookstore, accidentally runs into a hostage standoff incident at the prefectural office. However, this was just the beginning of a huge scheme that had been meticulously planned.

Ritarou, with the help of his childhood friend, Seiran, and Boris, who works at the British embassy, pursue difficult cases that continuously occur, which all seem to have some sort of inexplicable connection with one another. As they pursue such cases, time and time again they have a vision of a mysterious steel tower and a little girl standing next to it. Are these visions some sort of message?

Based during the early Shouwa period in the international city of Yokohama, where foreigners were making huge strides, a story where mystery calls upon more mystery -- begins now.
aliases: The Girl in the Tower of Steel

title: The Love Interests get their Own Game
description:
Join Hong Yang and Ao on their 'first date' to the zoo. 
Explore the boys' relationship as they try to adjust from being neighbors, to friends, to lovers.
Learn some fun animal facts along the way.

A shadow hides in the darkness and leaps to protect a little life. It’s the shadow of a pet that was once kept by humans. With the help of Mr. Z, the protagonists work in the dark in the form of therians. They eventually learn the truth about the world brought to them by their own creed.

Humans and animals should all live happily. What kind of justice will these heroes, lovers of humans and beasts alike, choose?
title: Onshuu no Stray Beast

description: ――Non vem ber―― These were the mysterious words that a little girl who has never been “outside”, heard in her dreams. The next day, the doctor tells her that she will be going outside of this facility. However, the "Outside World" that she was thrown into was a high-rise area that has gone to ruin... Why was the little girl sent "outside"? Exactly "where" is this world that has turned into "ruin"? And what do the words she heard in the dream mean? As she is tossed around between the people who want to protect her and the people who want to take her away, the little girl begins to learn to stand on her own two feet.
title: November.

description:
A free-forming cute little body crying "Kyuu! Kyuu!" This is the story of your encounter with "Stella"... on the day of your friend's funeral. You choose to keep Stella as a memento, not knowing that this triggers your days being chased by a group of adults.

Why are they chasing Stella?
What is Stella?
And why did my friend die...?

The truth will bring you the largest shock and warmth you'll ever find. With the power of your four best friends, can you protect Stella? An unexpecting youth story, with an unidentified creature...
title: Yami no Naka no Stella

description: You visit a famous amusement park called, “Kawaii Kingdom” with your college classmates. But there is a creepy urban legend going around on social medal. "People who visit the amusement park vanish." You thought it was just a rumor until your friends are killed by a mascot... Can you escape from the amusement park?
title: Kawaii Kingdom

description: There is a forest that is said to be inescapable when a mist hangs over it. Though you stray into that forest, you are fortunate to find refuge in a mansion. The owner of the mansion is a beautiful yet bewitched woman, and she saves your life. You are relieved, but it only lasts a moment. The owner's daughter tells you her mother's true character and what she is scheming.
title: Kiri

description: A girl, who is an honest and sincere high schooler goes to a live music club with her best friend before their graduation. There, she meets Lon, a famous rock star from the Dragon Clan. He lives only for transient pleasures and seems to do naught but annoy her, but in the end his charms are irresistible... What kind of fate awaits these two?
title: Dual

description: Alice is a high schooler living in the "Showa" period, who meets a boy named Sho in the library, and the two instantly fall for each other. However, you find out that he's a high schooler from the "Reiwa" period. As "time" itself acts as a barrier for the two lovers, Alice also finds out that the library is struggling to stay open......
title: Toki no Hana -Chrono Alice-

description: Small novel about yandere relationship.
title: Yandere-teki x Nichijou Gokko
No Flowers Required
description: Your life is a complete wreck. With only six months to save your failing flower shop, you sell your dream house and move to an apartment to try and save money. Unfortunately, this new apartment is a little bit… leaky. Lucky for you, that hot mysterious handyman you just met can fix anything. From broken sinks to broken hearts to broken futures, Dillon James has all the right tools under his belt, and you can’t help but wonder if this handyman might secretly be a Prince Charming in disguise.

title: The Rake and The Recluse
description: Dour dukes, rakish viscounts, villainous earls, and star-crossed housemaids... the 21st century ain't got nothing on this smoldering time-traveling Victorian romance!

The Van Heusen Hotel was your whole life... until your parents were forced to sell it to your arch-nemesis, the sizzling hot, but ice-cold Reese Crane. Luckily, Reese offers you a simple solution: marry him for just 6 months, and the hotel is yours!
title: The Billionaire Bachelor

description: As a struggling grad student, you don’t believe in fairytales—until your life becomes one. When you discover you’re the long-lost heiress to a duchy in the distant country of Lilaria, you’re forced to admit that maybe fairy tales do come true.
title: Suddenly Royal

description:
A married woman (protagonist) tells her personal story of how she began sleeping with a wealthy young lover to pay her husband's debts... but over time, somehow, she fell more deeply in love with him.

An adventure style story, starring Eri (the wife), her lover, and her husband.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ084928.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]
title: Uchi no Tsuma ga Hibi Kirei ni Natte Iku Ken ni Tsuite
Grisaia: Chronos Rebellion
description:
"If you order me to, Master, I'll wipe out all of humanity."

SORD (Social Ops, Research & Development) is an agency that was established to recruit and train talented operatives for special anti-terrorism units. All kinds of misfit girls are enlisted in SORD's training schools. They are issued guns and live ammunition in the name of national defense, for that is the only way they could be granted a place in the world.
Arata is the handler of Class D at Mihama Academy, a school for SORD. Class D is nicknamed "Dead Stock", because it's full of third-rate students. In order to increase his students' chances of survival, Arata trains them using PeTS, an experimental neural signal synchronization technology.

During one extrajudicial mission, he finds a mysterious girl sleeping inside an incubator at a terrorist hideout. As if drawn together by fate, Arata is able to sync with her using PeTS, and the two narrowly escape with their lives. The girl introduces herself as "L", and Arata welcomes her into Class D.

These events trigger the beginning of Class D's fight against the mysterious terrorist organization "Hadeo."

This is a story of girls who, with nowhere else to go, have chosen the path of the gun...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2348360/]Steam[/url]]

Windows version of the now-closed mobile game. In addition to chapters 1~4 from the original version, an entirely new fifth chapter will also be added, along with new scenarios for the girls in S group.

title: Unicorn Shake
description:
A very short visual novel about customer service in a cafe, that includes a very tired cashier. That's genuinely it.

Sort of a mild comedy if you squint it a little.

[Edited from [url=https://revale.itch.io/unicornshake]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Bomi Omyeon Kkochi Pigo
description:
A mystery romance adventure game for women.

"After testing is training?!"

One lucky sweet spring day,
You awake in Silla period.

The Hwarang and the Wonhwa, Junjeong and Nammo.
Who will be your Hwarang?

[Translated from [url=https://twitter.com/team_ogm/status/1335881832827523072]official twitter[/url]]
aliases: Flowers Bloom when the Spring Comes

description:
A short, fragile moment between a badly injured man and the stranger who came to his aid.

[From [url=https://cryoslight.itch.io/ill-come-see-you]Itch.io[/url]]
title: I'll Come See You

description:
A space cadet far from home does some soul-searching...

Masa Takeshiro* is a third-year cadet plagued by nightmares, loneliness, and a lost sense of self. His friend and recent Academy graduate, Ens. Jericho Santana, is acting as his mentor to help him find his way and himself. But young Takeshiro and Santana run into trouble when Academy legend, Lt. Kaimana Warner, boards the ship with a strange prisoner...

[From [url=https://xxmissarichanxx.itch.io/fleeting]itch.io[/url]]
title: Fleeting
Hinori
description:
This is a short visual novel about Hinori, a depressed thrift store worker who also happens to be a friend of yours!

[From [url=https://flaiire.itch.io/hinori]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Twisted World
description:
What if you suddenly woke up in a parallel dimension? A dimension where women rule the world and all the gender roles are  now reversed, including the way people act or think. In this Twisted World, women have the libido of a man, and men have the libido of a woman, plus the shyness, habits, and way of thinking.

Since the pandemic that hit humanity a long time ago, the number of men massively decreased, and so this world is in a great crisis. In order to protect the existence of the human race, the women implemented rules to protect every single man, but the absence and restriction of not being able to have sexual interaction with men is leading all women to be sexually frustrated - they are beginning to revolt against the government, causing crimes every day. Only one guy with a big weapon and an absurd sex drive can change this world. That's you! The one that's still preserving his real manly libido. It's up to you, the protagonist, if you want to take advantage of this newfound situation.

[Edited from [url=https://www.patreon.com/SnatsGames]Patreon[/url]]

title: Demon Boy
description:
The game centers around a young boy who's living together with his mother in a small apartment. He's always been somewhat of and outcast, he's being bullied in school and doesn't have many friends. Until one day, he stumbles upon a book that changes his life forever. The journey he's about to embark on is one of sex, love, power and corruption, and definitely not for the light-hearted. It's up to you, the player, to decide whether you'll embrace your inner demon or remain true to your human side.

[Edited from [url=https://www.patreon.com/EroMersive]Patreon[/url]]

title: The Demon Lord is Mine!
description:
The demon lord and the hero's final battle has reached its conclusion.
The hero has won,  with their blade pointed toward the most feared demon in the land...

"Let us end this here, hero."
... Would you fulfil his wish?

[From [url=https://ant-san.itch.io/demon-lord-o2a2]Itch.io[/url]]

"I will do whatever you say if you start your job hunting."
The girls found my proposal interesting and accepted the conditions.
The reward they requested is... a date with me!?

The protagonist, Yutaro Miki is a rookie NEET rehabilitation officer.
A NEET rehabilitation officer is a staff member of a publicly funded, privately operated organization dedicated to the "rehabilitation of NEETs".
With the ongoing increase in NEETs becoming a serious public issue, Yutaro suddenly finds himself assigned to handle three female NEETs.

Mei Natsume, who is lethargic and sloppy.
Kagami Yumitsuki, who has excessive paranoid delusions.
Kaede Suda, who constantly demands game competitions.

After meeting with the three and returning to the workplace, Yutaro accidentally overhears a conversation between his superiors on break.
"If he can't rehabilitate any of the three, it would be tough for him here on out."

If things don't go well, not only failing in rehabilitation, Yutaro himself may become an internal NEET in the company!
Will Yutaro successfully rehabilitate the lazy girls and help them find new employment?
title: NEET Musume o Kousei Saseyo! ~Seigi ga Areba Ikite Ikeru~
Melancholica
description:
Albertina and Chloe are best friends and depend on each other. So when Chloe is feeling down, Albertina helps her back up. But can she prevent her from falling into the abyss of existential dread and nihilism?

[From [url=https://halfstar.itch.io/melancholica]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Magical Meow-Meow Warrior?!
description:
An evil sorcerer finds himself in a rather peculiar situation.

Meet the most vicious, cruel, and dangerous villain in history of Allthelandia!
He is old, he is bald, he's got the longest beard the world...

What could have happened to him? Read this short visual novel to find out.
May the Hat be with you!

[From [url=https://anankekeirin.itch.io/mmmw]Itch.io[/url]]

In this comedy game, you take on the role of Emma, a twenty year old college student of Mexican origin.

Emma has a secret. Everyone does. But no, it's not that she likes girls. We're in 2021 and she's pretty open about that part. No, her secret is more curious than that: she has a foot fetish. Something about feet gets her all worked up.

And what job could be more perfect for her than working part-time at a spa center doing pedicures?

Emma is quite happy with her life, but there is still one thing she'd like. Everyone needs love, after all. And for Emma, this has always been a bit of a sore spot. Even with her ex, Melanie, she's never been able to find the courage to open up about her kink.

Things are going to change for Emma though, because three women are about to enter Emma's life-- three very different women that may be able to accept Emma for who she is and make her the happiest woman alive!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1537800/]Steam[/url]]
title: At Your Feet

description:
God reflects on their long, long life on the last day of time before everything ceases to exist.

While bidding farewell to their close friend, they consider the question they were never able to answer; what is the meaning of existence?

[From [url=https://fyshku.itch.io/farewell-universe]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Farewell to the Universe
Midareru Tsuma no Mae de, Boku wa Buzama ni Iki Hateru ~Boku no Tsuma, Rental Shimasu!~
Dies irae Also sprach Zarathustra
description:
As the Soviet Union marches on Berlin in May of 1945, a secretive group of sorcerers and madmen gathers to perform a terrible ritual. They care nothing for the fate of the Reich. To them, the countless lives lost in the battle are the perfect sacrifice to fuel their spell. After the war, they vanish and are not heard from again, except in rumor. One day, it is whispered, they will return. And on that day, the world will end. Fear the demons in human form. Fear the Longinus Dreizehn Orden.

Flash forward to present-day Japan. Fujii Ren is released from the hospital after two months spent recovering from wounds suffered in a vicious brawl with his best friend Shiro. As Christmas approaches, he tries to rebuild his life, clinging to what brilliance remains. But even that is soon threatened. For the knights of the LDO have returned, and brought the apocalypse to his doorstep. Forced to wield the same unholy power as his foes, will Ren be able to protect what is dear to him from the inhuman might of the Longinus Dreizehn Orden?

title: The Penitent
description:
In a small village deep in the woods, there is a priory. The old bell tolls, and a cleric begins her confession of what happened last night.

[From [url=https://tamafry.itch.io/the-penitent]Itch.io[/url]]

A cabin in the countryside. A table. A typewriter. A short letter to your father.
But it's what you can't say that makes all the difference.

[From [url=https://pixelsandpins.itch.io/ihopethisletterfindsyou]Itch.io[/url]]
title: I Hope This Letter Finds You

description:
Why does little Marigold, the farmer's daughter,  sneak out each night to stare at the sky? Well, this little girl with a dream in her heart has a story to tell you- if you care to listen.

[From [url=https://funigami.itch.io/dragon-gazer]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Dragon Gazer
Confessions at Candlewood Lake
description:
“Confessions at Candlewood Lake” is a romantic tale of four women who take a surprise long weekend at a luxurious chalet in Candlewood Lake, Connecticut, after all their flights are cancelled on account of a volcanic eruption in Iceland. Watch as connections are created, and budding romances begin with the backdrop of a gorgeous lake behind them.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1746530/Confessions_at_Candlewood_Lake/]Steam[/url]]

title: Furry Shakespeare: Oops! All Dragons!
description:
Once more into the breach!

The business of making holiday plays is good business, and once again, the Elsinore Empire has tasked Kit Marlowe and their theater crew with making a smash hit! "Twelfth Night" is to be the crown jewel of the Winter's Tale Network's tenth-anniversary, with the fate of capitalism in the balance!

Will there even be a holiday without holiday movies? Not if you can help it! Assemble your team of actors and put on the play to be broadcast into the homes of millions! Be careful, though, because depending on how you train your actors, how their personal lives are going, and so forth, personal grudges may spill out into the production! We wouldn't want that, now would we?

Set phasers to stun and get ready to engage (wrong genre but go with it I guess) in this visual novel/light management simulator! Take on the role of writer, director, and friend as you play over five acts, both with two phases: Real Time, and Twelfth Night.

Will you ruin friendships? Start relationships? Wreck lives? Go completely ham with your godlike power over this production? Only time will tell!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1585460/]Steam[/url]]

Haruhara Kana, our heroine, was living a picture-perfect, ordinary, and relatively peaceful life. However, one day, she accidentally breaks something belonging to a pretty-faced underclassman.
The pretty boy says that she does not have to pay for the damage, but when she pleads with him that she still wants to make up for it to him, he acquiesces: "Alright. Please be my servant.''
　Why did he request something like that from her!?

　And what will happen when her siscon of an older brother finds out about this absurd situation she found herself in!?

[Translated from the [url=http://comodo.starfree.jp/servant/story.html]Official Website[/url].]
title: Bishounen no Geboku (?) ni Narimashita

description:
A shoujo manga style romcom otome game where all the love interests are gentlemen. 
You can play two different school settings, Sweet and Bitter. 
This is a short omnibus novel, with each route about 15 minutes long.

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/home/work/=/product_id/RJ338286.html/?unique_op=af&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=vndb.org%2F]DLsite[/url]]
title: Junsei Yasaotoko

description:
Tonight isn't meant to be a special occasion. You aren't expecting to make some kind of memory of a lifetime on your second date with Taylor — you're just getting ready to leave for casual dinner outing between two people who are pretty fond of each other. That's all there is to it.

Why, then, is it so hard to pick an outfit for the night? Why do none of the options feel like the right one?

[From [url=https://mousebirdstudios.itch.io/heart-on-your-sleeve]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Heart on Your Sleeve

description:
A short story about a puppeteer and their puppet.

description:
Take on the role of Clarence in his heroic quest to go to the store and buy milk.
It's only a quick walk down the road; I'm sure a full cast of quirky characters definitely won't stop you along the way to inundate you with insane problems and an obtuse trading quest leading to seven unique endings!
...After all, what are the odds of that happening?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1718040/]Steam[/url]]

In the middle of a lake, on an isolated island, lies the [b]Haven[/b].

Made up of several young women and their sole, elderly leader, the Haven is a community that shelters those who are pure of heart and mind. 

In order to protect the Haven from the corruption outside of the island, the community hosts [b]Apologia Assemblies[/b]: mandatory gatherings where misdeeds are discussed - and given appropriate punishments.

One member, [b]Magda[/b], has complicated feelings about the Haven. She loves living there, but hates its punishments. And so, after one particularly stressful Assembly, Magda wanders through the nearby woods to clear her mind.

Then, she discovers a mysterious building, and her curiosity stirs...

[From [url=https://madocallie.itch.io/badfaith]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Bad Faith

description:
Akane, a sharp-tongued student with a distaste for anything that doesn't involve academics, intends to spend her school days with a textbook in hand, at the top of the class's ranks. Unfortunately, her plan for total academic excellence is thrown out the window when a random boy claiming to be a 'magical girl' tells her that a boy is about to jump from the school roof and it's her 'divine duty' to stop him!

Things only get worse from there as she discovers that not only do these so-called 'magical girls' exist, but so do monsters born from people's darkest emotions! She now has to not only battle these monsters and deal with her classmate's emotional turmoil, but also avoid Joy's constant nagging to become a 'magical girl'.  Worst of all, there's a gorgeous girl in her class that's hell-bent on spending time with her!

[From [url=https://palinus.itch.io/akane-jam-ver]Itch.io[/url]]
title: The Distorted Case of Magical Girl Akane

description: Meet Twitch streamers! Gain clout! Build relationships!

description:
It's a little Detroit: Become Human-themed fanfic where you get to play Todd.

Todd is a drunk and extremely unstable person. He lives in his house on the outskirts of town with his android maid, Kara. Amid riots in the city involving androids, as well as reports of murders committed by androids, Todd begins to see Kara as a threat.

Choose how your relationship with Kara will develop, whether she becomes your friend or foe.​

Due to reasons out of anyone's control, you've found yourself playing understudy for someone else's life. Too bad you don't know a thing about them.

Think fast, act casual, and don't let anyone know that you're not the person they want you to be. And if you mess up? ...Well, there's always Plan C.
This is story of a young girl Anita, who is experiencing new discoveries of her sexuality, body and feelings, but also you can experience the perspective of view and feelings of her father.

You've recently joined a new college far away from home due to a unsavory home life at the behest of your best friend and potential love interest Avanna "Blue". 3 Months have passed since you've joined this new school, but you find your social life is lacking for the most part. However, that all changes one day when your "maybe girlfriend" starts becoming obsessed with the thoughts of traveling to new worlds and starts hanging out with a certain girl name Nilith...

description:
'To the Max' details true stories of a Massachusetts video arcade during the Post-Golden Age of Video Games. This visual novel highlights people relations and specific tales of being an arcade employee.

Would you like to run an idol café? 2
description: Hoping to save the café he works at from being closed, Naoya enlists the help of his cute maid co-workers, Ichigo, Kuu, Mayuki. The three girls form an idol unit, Sweet Shoreline, to popularize The Seaside Café - but becoming an idol isn't that easy!

aliases: Bear School, Which is for Bears
title: Bear School
description:
Bear School is a silly visual novel where you can attend a school full of talking bears - and maybe find the love of your life! Give it a try, life is short dude. Go date a bear. Live the good life.

Visual novel adaption of the Qing dynasty novel “Dream of a Red Chamber” about the young aristocratic heir Jia Baoyu and his relations to the women of his house, by a company from Beijing.
title: Hong Lou Meng
Hanameguri
description: A school-themed otome game made by female students from the university of Kyoto.

title: My GF doesn't know what I'm into
description:
[i]"I've always been looking at you from afar.
I began to like you from the moment we first met,
and I can't keep my feelings hidden anymore.
Please come to the big cherry tree after class.
I want to tell you how I feel."[/i]

My new girlfriend is so cute and sweet. I can't believe such a nice girl likes me so much. But... would she still want to be with me if she knew what I'm into?

[From [url=https://meiri.itch.io/mygf]Itch.io[/url]]

A mature, dark fantasy adult sandbox game set in Mirnos, a world under the fierce onslaught of a dangerous, bizarre race known as the Demorai. Born into the Kingdom of Alderay, you're sent on a suicide mission that should have cost you your life. Instead, you've been blessed with a second chance... Or rather cursed. But with your newfound "gift", you may just be able to turn the tides of war and save the realm from the clutches of the Demorai!

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/damnedstudios]Patreon[/url]]
title: Parasite Black
Meme Detective
description:
A heist has taken place in your local museum, and, after a series of unfortunate events, you found yourself in an eccentric detective's agency, who seems to have taken a liking to you because of your... vast knowledge in the art of memery. 

Coupled with both the meme detective and his suicidal secretary who resembles a dying donkey more than a human, it is now up to you and your new partners to get to the bottom of this case! 

Yeah, this is big brain time.

[From https://elseth.itch.io/meme-detective]

title: Injoku Byoutou ~Yogosareta Hakui no Tenshi - Airi no Higeki~
Elated Sorrow
description:
Max is lonely and unhappy with her life. That all changes when she goes for a walk in the forest and has a chance meeting with a woman named Lyra. Since that day she hasn't been able to stop thinking about her.

[From [url=https://foxpancakes.itch.io/elated-sorrow]itch.io[/url]]

Attack, or be attacked? A Japanese horror game where you spend a night together with a beautiful woman.

You're a man lost in the snowy mountains and a beautiful woman saves your life! The blizzard is so bad that you're going to spend the night in her hut together.

Will he attack her, or will she attack him?

[Translated from [url=https://enoshima210.work/2019/03/27/sarasa/]the official site[/url]]
title: Kubitori Sarasa
Weekend Lollygagging
description: You are playing as a Tom, who came to his classmate Melory, to do homework.

title: Sei Yariman Gakuen Pakopako Nikki 2021
description:
I vividly remember my first time with an escort.

It was last summer, my wife and I divorced after twenty years of married life. I worked my ass off so I could support us so she wouldn't have to lead an embarrassing life of poverty. It was all for naught, though. She eventually confessed that she found me repulsive, and that she was cheating on me with a guy over twenty years my junior. I was stunned, but I wasn't angry. I wasn't sad. I didn't even find it to be all that strange. The years I spent toiling away as a wage-slave stripped the love I had for my wife along with it.

That's precisely why I felt downright merry the night following our divorce. I went out drinking on my own, wandering around downtown for the first time since my bachelor days. The city had changed just like I did. As I watched the youngsters who now laid claim to downtown, I realized someone was looking at me.

The gaze belonged to a girl much younger than myself. At first glance, she seemed like the kind of girl who'd look disgusted if she had to sit next to a middle-aged guy like me on the train. But she made no effort to distance herself. In fact, she approached me... "Looking for a good time?"

And so began the tale of a divorcee with an unparalleled sex drive and his escort escapades with five young, Saintly Sluts.

[From [url=https://www.fakku.net/games/st-yarimans-little-black-book-complete-english]Fakku![/url]]

title: Kagikko L-only Case.2 ~Mii-chan Emergency!~
description:
Mii-chan found herself in an emergency level dilemma due to certain household circumstances, and ends up having to run away from home.

She has the strength to look out for herself, and do anything she puts her will too. Cute, bright, and good natured, Mii-chan is also a total 'amaenbo.' You can see why too, as hidden under the smiling facade is a sad and lonely heart...

I have to protect her! She's such an good girl, and deserves better from life! ... That's exactly what you thought when you decided to give her room and board. No ulterior motives at all. Zilch... But... Mii-chan is so cute... and she's taken a liking to you...

When she takes the initiative and makes a move on you, well... you are the one with an 'emergency level dilemma' on your hands!!

Hearts and bodies molten with lust... combine in a flirty dirty pool of love. Your innocent relationship takes on a debaucherously lewd side!!

Is this simple "Affection"? Or is this...... "True Love"?

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ326824.html/]DLsite English[/url]]

title: The Durka: Ty (ne) umrjosh'
description:
The Durka is a visual novel where every choice is important. You build your own story. You are already waiting for an announcer who will tell you a story about Mickey and his friends. The game takes place from 2019 to 2021. In 2019, you will meet your destiny because only you can save the world! Will you start as an ordinary person and end up as the savior of the world? It's up to you! Start playing now!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1595380/]Steam[/url]]

The story follows several young children who have been previously manipulated by a secret organization with ancient alien technology. These experiments resulted in the children having supernatural powers to step inside another living creatures soul/ consciousness through manipulation of space-time. They call them 'phantoms'

[From [url=https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/lostfables/phantom-the-rebound-visual-novel-0/description]Kickstarter[/url]]
title: Phantom: The Rebound Vol. 0
Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney IF
description: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney IF is a complete fangame based on Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney 4.

title: The Delusion of Dream
description:
A hot summer day.
Sumito is a normal high school student. He doesn't have any real friends or meaningful connections with other people, and he intends to keep it that way.
But everything changes when he meets a girl from his dream.
Is she just an illusion caused by summer heat? Or…

title: Doki Doki The Beginning Of Yuri's Story
description:
Welcome! We will tell you a new story about a girl named Yuri.

Every day is full of chit-chat and fun activities with all of my adorable and unique club members:

So, the story begins with the fact that Yuri went to school as usual and one annoying girl ran up to meet her, her name was Sayori, she studies at the same school and she invites her to a literary club, where she will meet Natsuki and Monica, and then you will find out everything for yourself.

[From the [url=https://derencom21.wixsite.com/derencomgames/копия-derencom]official site[/url]]
aliases: ドキドキ百合物語のはじまり

description: Maze City: A Cyberpunk Lost and Found Centre is a game that simulates the life of a wage slave in a lost and found centre of the future cyberpunk city. Go experience life and seek the truth by chatting, returning lost items, trading and playing card games.
title: Saibo Xincheng : Shiwu Zhaolingchu
Waga Himegimi ni Eikan o: Shogun no Yuuwaku
description: A standalone route for [url=/c92515]Escudo Pagan[/url].

title: Konran;Zanki
description:
Fujita Anju finds herself trapped in an unfamiliar location with several other people.
As their memory loss, as well as the ominous situation, seems to indicate that 
something wrong is going on, a weird cubic creature named Dokuroku appears 
with the intention to hack into their Prisms, a daily-use microchip implanted in the ear at birth, in order to intrude their memories and retrieve a key element that has been lost in a foggy past.

The daughter of a minor noble, Lady Briella Brukton dreams of being a true knight, slayer of evil and protector of the innocent. By day, she fakes her way through the lessons and duties expected of a lady. By night, she duels trees and smithy's boys with a stick. She dreads the day when she will be married, which grows nearer each day. But soon, she will find herself in a fight she never asked for, with powers she can barely control...

[From [url=https://xcvg.itch.io/shattered]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Shattered - Why Not Me

description: Alice falls down the rabbit hole into a Wonderland not quite right. Meeting an eclectic collection of people, animals, and somethings in between, she sets out on an adventure in this odd new place to find the missing Red Queen. Or, more specifically, to find the pieces of the dismembered queen whose body has been strewn across the land.
title: Who is the Red Queen?

aliases: The Price Of Smelling Her Panties
title: Onna no Ko no Pantsu o Itazurashita Daishou
description:
When classmate Mayuko catches you
in the girls' changing room
putting panties on your face,
she takes pictures and threatens to release them
unless you jack off while she watches.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ178108.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]

Slaughter the ghouls to save the girls! Build up your love nest and woo four heroines as you fight to survive a ruined zombie hellscape! A one-of-a-kind Post apocalyptic FPS dating sim game filled with intense zombie killing action and lusty romance!

[From: [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1566390/Seed_of_the_Dead_Sweet_Home/]Steam[/url]]
title: Seed of the Dead: Sweet Home
Game de Saiban'in! Sweet Home Enjou Jiken
A Magical Girl's Duty
description:
A decade has passed since the battle that wiped out all but one of Urbo's magical girls.

Magical Girl Sola, the only survivor, is tasked with training the first batch of magical girls that have been born since that battle. 

However, Sola struggles to motivate them—after all, there are no more monsters to fight, and peace is all these girls have ever known.  

Is the new batch of magical girls ready for battle, or does the land of Urbo have to rely on Sola's powers yet again?

[From [url=https://web.archive.org/web/20211028132256/https://frances.itch.io/a-magical-girls-duty]Itch.io[/url]]

Kozo's daily life in a boring country town is transformed by a terrifying attack by a marauding army of Monster Girl warriors. While trying to escape the sexy and scary Mea, as Kozo is trying to avoid Mea's magical explosions the cave system collapses sending him deep into its uncharted depths. As luck would have it this newly revealed area of the cave contains the magical treasure of a legendary thief, The Silver Rat, through which our hero is bestowed with the skills of the master thief! After turning the tables on Mea and successfully seducing her with his own brand of sexy skills he sets out on his own quest to steal the loyalty, and virginity, of the entire Monster Girl army and to claim his very own Monster Girl harem!

Dark elves, Onis, Wolf girls, a dragon and more! With the powers of The Silver Rat on your side all the sexiest monster girls are yours for the fucking!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1796910/]Steam[/url]]
title: Haramase Onaho Maou Gun ~Kyokon to Thief no Chikara de Saikyou no Mesu o Zako Man ni Hameotoshite Kizuku Nariagari Harem~
Kyonyuu Gunjin Shihai Saimin "Watashi no Ninmu wa Anata ni Gohoushi Suru Koto Desu. Ironna Ana o Gojiyuuni Otsukai Kudasai"
description: The protagonist is a young officer who has achieved many military successes in a short period of time, and is highly regarded by both the upper and lower ranks of the military due to his friendly personality. He is rumored to be one of the people who will support the next generation. However, these evaluations were due to the "hypnosis device" that the protagonist possessed. During a certain operation, Marcus accidentally discovers a "hypnosis device" on an enemy battleship. Without reporting it, he takes it for himself and begins to use it for his own desires. He manipulates everything to his advantage, forcing his colleagues and superiors to praise him and to have sexual relationships with women he likes. Eventually, during a transfer, Marcus was promoted to vice-captain of a new ship.

Risa has been friends with her neighbors, the Takeuchi brothers, for a long time.
Naturally, they were both into her.

Eventually, Risa married Seiichi, the older of the two brothers.
The younger brother, Ryuji, acted like he was happy for his brother, but a massive inferiority complex was simmering inside him.

One day, Ryuji hears from Risa that, due to Seiichi being infertile, they are unable to have children.
Until then, Seiichi, the golden child, had never experienced any setbacks in life.
If his first taste of failure came at this age, there's a chance he'd never be able to recover from it.

So, Ryuji makes a suggestion to Risa.

"I'll get you pregnant in place of my brother."

[Edited from [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2093850/]Steam[/url]]
title: Aniyome ni Tanezuke Haramase ~Gishi wa Ore no Kodane o Kobamenai~

description:
You have the opportunity to be the Deity of Love, and live amongst the Gods in the city of Eonia. But first, you must complete four trials with six romanceable immortals who are there to help you, and sometimes lovingly distract you...

Pass Eonia’s trials to face your destiny and win eternal life in paradise.

title: For the Love of Gods

aliases: いつまでも息子のママじゃいられない！2～愛情たっぷり香夏子母さんのむっちりボディに射精管理されていっぱい射精（だ)したい！～
description:
The main character, Toudou Takeshi, is a young man who lives with his mother, Kanako. His father died early in his life and he and his mother live a modest life together.

One day, the apartment building where they were living caught on fire. Fortunately, no one was injured and they were both safe, but the apartment burned down. In order to rebuild, they had to move into a small one-bedroom apartment as temporary housing.

While sleeping and waking up in the same room, Takeshi inadvertently peeks at Kanako's clothes changing. From that day on, he begins to worry about how he views his mother, and his feelings for her begin to grow. Packed in a small room, his mother sleeps next to him every night.

Takeshi's sexual desire increases along with his feelings, but he is unable to release it. Tension comes to an all time high when his mother sees him getting an erection, and says she is going to manage his ejaculation from now on!?

[Translated from [url=http://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1149806&gc=gc]Getchu[/url]]

description:
The protagonist, Nabeshima Tatsuya, was a world-renowned painter.

However, after a certain incident, he disappeared from the public eye.
Now as a social studies teacher, he spends his days away from the art world.

He lives in seclusion with his cat in his social studies preparation room, which is his own residence, away from the public eye.
However, with the arrival of the new school semester, a new wind begins to blow.

Kusunoki Iroha, an attractive girl who adores Tatsuya.

Kurusu Sakuya, the most talented girl in the school, who is mysteriously attracted to Tatsuya;

and Akebi Saki, the daughter of Tatsuya's former teacher.

A life of dullness, like being dead inside while living.
Now it is being colored in gorgeous and vibrant colors by the three girls.

[Translated and edited from [url=https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=1373721]Melonbooks[/url]]
title: Amaemi -longing for you-
Yumemita Shoujo no Nirvana
description:
Entering his final year of school, Yukusue Arishi was leading an ordinary, peaceful life.
But one day, he begins to experience mysterious flashbacks which show him somewhere he doesn't remember. The flashbacks become increasingly detailed each day, eventually leading Arishi to visit the location he had been shown in order to find out the truth.

There, he finds a girl sitting quietly with her knees in her arms.

"I... must remain alone."

In the midst of extreme conditions, Arishi learns the meaning of these words.
She is a "monster" capable of swallowing up a human's presence.

――There is only one year left until Arishi's presence runs out.

Predator and prey.
Two people destined to never understand each other, yet they walk together for what time they have left in order to change their predetermined fates...

[Translated from [url=https://novelgame.jp/games/show/5654]NovelGame[/url]]

title: Crossover Adventures
Exchange Student
description: The story is played in an alternate universe which is similar to ours. Here your male character who is a university student decides to join in an exchange student program, where two universities from different countries exchange students. These students will spend one semester in their new institution. All of the exchange students will live with a host family and the university decides who will go to which family. The story will focus on the main character's life at the host family. Unfortunately, his name is usually given to girls in this new country and because of this, he was put to a host family where they were expecting a female student. And this is where his story will start.​

[b]Chapter of the Water Lily[/b]

A man lost his memory.
Completely lost, unable to remember his name, he's saved by a girl named Suirin.
For Suirin's sake, he turns his existence around.
Across the sea, where the nagidori calls.
Kai's memories lie dormant in the sea.

[b]Chapter of the Red Spider Lily[/b]

Masahide's dream was to become the Lord that would rule this land.
But his dream, along with his ego, was crushed, leaving him without any pride.
However, a girl named Sahana scolded him for living his life as a mere cog of the government.
He enters into a loveless political marriage with Sahana, but that relationship slowly changes them both.
As it gradually transforms into a passionate relationship, Masahide decides to pursue a dream he once gave up on.

[Edited from [url=https://shinzoutranslations.com/en/releases/nagi/]Shinzou Translations[/url]]
title: Nagi no Koi
Seek a country ~Kare no Ji o Yume Mite~
Amaoto to Jidou Ningyou Musubi
description:
A deadly plague had decimated the human population, leading to widespread collapse of civilization. The remaining humans had banded together and crafted androids in order to help them maintain some semblance of order.

Aya, a blind android, spends her days waiting alone at an abandoned bus station. It was during then that she had encountered a man who works in containment.

title: All Ashes and Illusions
description:
“Women are snakes and liars, all of them: the more beautiful, the more conniving. Don’t let your guard down, or they will ruin you.”

Yuel was only six years old when he witnessed his mother being put to death, for the heinous crime of daring to have an affair. For other women, such a folly mightn’t have been so lethal, but for Yuel’s ill-fated mother – the wife and queen of Indra’s tyrannical king, Khalil – it spelt her doom.

As he witnesses his mother’s corpse decomposing beneath the intense sunlight, Yuel’s father offers him some sage words of wisdom: namely, not to trust women. They are, in Khalil’s words, wicked and deceitful, and becoming too attached can end in nothing save disaster.

Outwardly, Yuel must swallow his sorrow, for fear of earning his father’s ire. Kings are not, after all, supposed to cry; even future kings such as him. In private, however, Yuel turns to his nursemaid, the kindly Safiya, for succour. Safiya is Yuel’s only ally in the palace: his father cold and distant; the servants deferential, brow-beaten, and kept silent through fear. Without Safiya, Yuel would be all alone...

Yet she, too, abandons him, when Yuel grows old enough to no longer need a nursemaid to tend to him.

Bereft and embittered, Yuel has nothing to look forward to, until – after a prolonged illness – his father eventually dies, and Yuel inherits the throne and the crown in his stead.

No longer a young boy – Safiya’s ‘little prince’ – but a grown man, Yuel plots to win Safiya over once more. Unable to forget about her, and unable to trust any other woman, Yuel cannot conceive of a life without her. She did promise to stay with him, after all - and, single-minded to a fault, Yuel is determined to see this promise fulfilled at any cost.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1673020/All_Ashes_and_Illusions/]Steam[/url]]

title: PoVeşti: Childhood Drama
description:
Welcome to Inspector's world: PoVesti. A list of tales full of surprises, vicious desires and dramatic events.
Take part in the story of a Childhood Drama. Unfold, explore and find out what's going on!

wealthy and powerful businessman who plans to create a new order in the world gets betrayed by his son. After the betrayal, all of the trouble happen to the young guy. His rich life slip down from his hands. His secretary, who got the job a few months ago, wants to help the poor boy and provides him with whatever he needs. The young boy's life changes faster than he imagined.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/xpected]Patreon[/url]]
title: Unexpected
Water Girls
description:
Water Girls is a fun visual novel that follows Jasmin as she has a day out with two female friends. What wild fun will they have together as you get to choose what water activity to enjoy, visit the beach or the water park either way could lead to some crazy fun and sexy shinanigans between the three girls as your choices determine what happens during the game in this fun and frivolous adventure.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1398720/]Steam[/url]]

After nearly a decade away, Morgan Cooper (name changeable) has returned to Twin Coves. 

No one knows what made them suddenly leave their job as a journalist in the big city, and they're intent on keeping it that way. What is clear is that they seem to be a ghost of their former self.

They move in with an old family friend, Gideon Clearwater, a gruff older werewolf and private investigator, and begin working for him as a glorified secretary while doing their best to ignore the events that drove them back home.

Then Gideon dies of a heart attack. With little else to do, they take over his investigation business, Clearwater Investigations, assuming their days will be filled with missing cats and cheating spouses.

However, on their first official day on the job, a dead body is found. And despite assurances from the town's sheriff, the death bears striking similarities to a case they're intimately familiar with. The case that drove them home in the first place. 

Will they keep their head down and let their fear get the best of them? Or will they face their fears head-on and solve the case? It's up to you to decide!

But be careful. The deeper they go, the more in danger they are.

Reconnect with people from their past or make some new acquaintances, but be careful who you trust. Almost everyone has secrets, even the person they may be developing feelings for.

[From [url=https://wisteriagames.itch.io/twincoves]itch.io[/url]]

title: Ghosted
description:

The only problem? Solving a murder isn't exactly what you had in mind for date number two...

[From in-app]
