description: On a summer trip to a beach house with your friends, an accident sends you crashing into the ocean! When you wake up, you discover that you're a mermaid! Can you use the power of love to overthrow the evil king and save your true home in the sea?
title: The Sea's Lost Daughter
Apathy - Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - Shinsei 2
Pierced by Love
description: Your dreams are coming true! You’ve finally been accepted into the Imagawa College kyudo team alongside your childhood idol! But behind the curtain of prestige lie dark secrets that threaten to tear the club, and your budding relationship, apart. Finding love might not be in your sights, but it might be your only chance to save the club…

title: A Villain's Twisted Heart
description:
Since childhood, you've had the strange ability to breathe life into the words you read aloud. You recognized the dangerous potential of this gift long ago and swore never to use it — until a hooded stranger forces you to summon chaos into this world, and you accidentally read three handsome, familiar characters to life!

These are no princes in shining armor. They're selfish, evil villains with their own secrets and motivations, and now they expect you to serve them... or else! How did you end up as the heroine in such a twisted fairytale?!

In this adventure spanning two seasons, can you write your own happily-ever-after ending, or will you fall victim to these villains' wicked plans? One thing's for sure — never judge a book by its cover!

The lifestyles of the rich and famous aren't always glitter and gold, but you're determined to shine. As an inexperienced PR assistant-turned-agent, can you manage four of Tokyo’s hottest heartthrobs while your boss is out sick, or will everyone be howling from your mistakes? No matter what wildness ensues, they’re trusting you with their lives… and hearts!
title: Feral Hearts
Kamisama: Spirits of the Shrine
description:
When you accidentally damage a Shinto shrine, you’re forced to pay off your debt by becoming a miko to the handsome spirits who live there—an irritable god, sly fox familiar, and energetic lion-dog guardian.

Just as you’re starting to settle into your bizarre new life, an ancient, terrifying demon awakens from his long slumber. Can you work together with your allies to repel this ancient evil, or is the town doomed to suffer the same fate it did 500 years ago?

Embark on an epic Japanese adventure to save the shrine and uncover deep secrets buried in the past. Discover and harness your spiritual power to protect your friends, all the while shaping your love story into a tale for the ages!

title: Quest of Lost Memories
description:
You wake up inside the latest virtual reality MMORPG but have no memory of starting the game. In fact, you can't recall your past at all. Upon discovering your class as a healer and noticing a one-of-a-kind weapon in your inventory, you're quickly recruited by a dashing mage to join his guild. Things take a dark turn, however, when a virus breaks out and begins infecting and killing players in real life when they log off. In a race against the clock, you and your guildmates embark on a quest to discover and destroy the source...

Can you survive long enough to defeat the virus, or will you be forced to log off and meet your end? Will you ever regain your memories and find love along the way?

Find out when you log on for your next adventure in Quest of Lost Memories!

Orphaned at a young age, you were lucky enough to be taken in by the Faruta crime family and trained in the ways of assassination. But when your compassionate nature stops you from fulfilling your role, you’re suddenly no more than a liability to be traded away…

Your bleak future seems all but guaranteed when the Tanaka family steps in to make you one of their own. Soon, it becomes clear that this is no ordinary mafia organization hell-bent on domination at all costs, but a group with an entrenched moral code and a clear vision for a peaceful future.

Can you help them restore order to the chaotic criminal underworld, or will you once again find yourself falling short?
title: Love on the Edge
Conspiracies of the Heart
description: You're a tough-talking, quick-witted community officer committed to protecting others, but what happens when the roles get reversed? After a bizarre chain of events kicks off leading to your parents' disappearance, three enigmatic men waltz into your life, eager to avenge you. As you stumble across strange conspiracies and salvage phantom memories, it’s clear those closest to you have a past they're unwilling to reveal. At the end of the day, who can your heart really trust?

In a near-future world, crime is rampant and nowhere is safe for the average citizen. Police officers are long gone, replaced by a new breed of privatized officers - Knights.

Returning home after time abroad to take up the mantle your father left behind, you find your beloved city is rife with crime and corruption. It doesn’t take long for problems to pile up, and even though you’ve got three of the best partners a Knight could ask for, things are looking bleak.

It’s up to you to take on the biggest corporations, fighting to expose corruption and turn Rinkai ward into a safe haven inside a city on the brink of disaster.
title: Cyber City Knights
Xing Nuli Zhiyuan Shaonü
description:
Her name is Qian Xiangxiang, is a woman from the golden manor. She has no many interests, sex, is one of them.

This golden manor is set up to please the men of high society, men can pay money to come to the golden manor, play the role of chauffeur, butler, chef, florist, and even the male master and other roles, like a big family to live in peace with everyone, and every woman can be seen to have intercourse at will.

Qian Xiangxiang is blessed with the status of "Missy" in the manor. She is sweet looking and good at sex, and is at ease in this environment, living a life of indulgence and lust with the men every day, and reporting her lustful behavior to the master of the manor to please him.

The owner of the manor, the head of the Qian family, Qian Ronghao, considers Qian Xiangxiang as his adopted daughter because of her unique charm and gives her a goal in life: to marry a son of one of the four major enterprises, so as to bring the Qian family closer to the other enterprises.

Qian Xiangxiang thus meets her destiny, Ted Carter, the son of the Carter family of the Big Five. As a woman of Chuang Yuan, Qian has no right to say no to Ted, but deep in her heart, she has a small wish.

She truly loves Ted. She hopes to really marry her and return to being an ordinary woman, spending her life with the man she loves, and working hard for this.

The "Sex Slave Volunteer Girl" tells the story of such a woman's life.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1698480/]Steam[/url]]

The initial demo release ("Homestuck^2") went on hiatus on December 25, 2020. The full version picked up where it left off on October 8, 2023, with an entirely new staff.
title: Homestuck: Beyond Canon
The Inverted Spire
description:
You are a mind-reading goblin mage whose citizen score has fallen below the threshold of social acceptability.

Normally, you would spend the rest of your life in the Corrective Camps of the State of New Order, but you have volunteered yourself for an expedition into the Inverted Spire.

The Spire is an unearthly architectural marvel stretching many leagues below ground. It has no known origin, and has been altering the surrounding landscape into an unlivable wasteland.

Your Council has been sending groups of prisoners into the structure for decades with the stated intent of investigating and destroying it. This is the sole opportunity for wards of the state to have their crimes forgiven, reputation scores reset, and citizenship fully reinstated. 

None have ever returned.  But you, and the six others who have been "volunteered" alongside you, are determined to be the first survivors.

Read minds. Form alliances. Break them. Find true companionship. Make true enemies. Become the person you always wished you could be, or succumb to your darkest urges.

Anything is possible in the uncharted depths of the Spire.

[From [url=https://yozhikisblue.itch.io/the-inverted-spire]itch.io[/url]]

Who serves a servant?

THE LAST GLASSWING KNIGHT, Sir Sengreen Le (they/them), is crestfallen and confused and a little bit furious that their lifelong master has abandoned them for no reason, ending their service together. Now, Sengreen has to contend with a new Moon Emperor who calls herself THE EMPYREAN MONARCH, Lin Xue (he/she). This stranger from a strange land is Lunarian, like Sengreen, but not in any way that Sengreen can understand. As if it weren't enough to navigate the shifting seas of palace politics in the Crescent Court, Sengreen has to stand their ground against Lin Xue, who says she wishes to be their friend.

She doesn't, of course.

All the same, Sengreen ends up entangled in the kingmaking game of Divinities with Lin Xue, which is not so different from the power plays of intimacy they level against each other, as uncomfortable as it is to acknowledge.

Sengreen, if nothing else, intends to win. 

What a shame Lin Xue thinks he'll do the same.

[From [url=https://feyxuan.itch.io/liar-lioness-vol-1-remaster]itch.io[/url]]
title: LIAR, LIONESS

description:
Did you think it would be enough to be loved?

Liar Lioness 2 is about Lin Xue and whether or not it is enough to be loved. Is it enough to be loved? Or, as someone who holds power because he has known what it is like to have lost it, does Lin Xue have to learn how to be loved?

Lin Xue and Sengreen get fake-married. Except, Lin Xue is very really in love with Sengreen, and Sengreen is very really...just very really about Lin Xue.

Liar Lioness 2 asks:

Is love a form of service? Is it a form of possession? What kinds of possession are there? How is it different to possess as someone who wishes to control, and to possess as someone who has lived an entire life of subservience without a single sole belonging? Sengreen's sole sense of belonging, Sengreen's sole belonging, was in their blood service to Silverbell. Without that, who are they? And who can they be, who do they want to be, for Lin Xue?

[From [url=https://feyxuan.itch.io/liar-lioness-vol-2]itch.io[/url]]
title: LIAR, LIONESS VOL. 2

The successful man and the beautiful woman got married to each other are leading a fulfilled life enough to make appearance on TV. Fueled by intense indignation, he vows to take revenge on them. Once upon a time there was a prince, protagonist of a book whose author died before it was finished  — and for years, he's been waiting for someone who can help him.

As the latest person to find the book, you decide to help the prince as he attempts to both claim his place as the rightful heir to the throne and deal with the two mysterious strangers that he meets along the way.

Waking up in a fantasy world on the brink of war, you’ll have to rely on wits and cunning to survive, while calling on help from unlikely places!

Gather your companions and fight your way to the truth behind the vicious demon attacks before it’s too late...

This is Sayako, and her plight. For you see, Sayako is the only one in town who doesn't truly belong. All the while she is sharing a room with the mysterious new girl in town, Yoru. More than anything in the world, Sayako longs to return home to her hometown. To set off beyond the unfathomable vast desert of snow, beyond where nobody has ever gone. To the home she could only dream was out there. To be able to remember what she has forgotten, the thing she holds the most dear. That is her dream.

description:
Second-year student Tsutazawa Hiroki has a disposition to want to help people in trouble and his interest is directed at the girl sitting next to him in class: Hiiragi Kurumi.

If she was just a simple kogal with a flashy hairstyle, then perhaps he would've treated her as just another classmate.

But, people spread bad rumors about her. She looked resigned to her fate, always gazing out of the window, putting a wall between her and the rest of the class – if anyone was not meant to be there, it was her.

Hiroki's relationship with her was triggered by chance.

Being aware of the face she's always making, Hiroki starts questioning her on her situation.

Kurumi is touched by his meddling and gradually grows more interested in him... 

Concealed by her appearance, there lurks the pure and vulnerable love of a kogal.

It began with a teasing kiss and then rushed past like a spring breeze.

“Spiritshine” is a mysterious power that has long-existed in humanity and nature. Hayato Isurugi—the apprentice of a “Spiritualist,” whose livelihood is to master the use of that power and exorcise demons—was enjoying his peaceful young life at Shinwa Academy.

Working part-time making charms to earn money; enjoying silly, lighthearted conversation with good friends; and secretly planning out a gift for his older sister as thanks for all that she does for him… But his ordinary, albeit pleasant routine is shattered by the arrival of an unforeseen assailant.

While the Academy falls into pandemonium, Hayato is deathly injured trying to protect his friends. But just as he is about to die, he encounters a young woman named “Magatsu,” the incarnation of an evil spirit sealed by his ancestors. It was 1,000 years ago, during the Heian era, that the city was shaken by the 13 Demon Generals. Taking the appearance of a beautiful young woman, the Calamity Shion smiled.

“Well, now… do you want to live, fool?”

“Here is the deal. Free me thyself.”

“And I will give thee strength.”

And thus the story began. The glistening days of youth.

“Even a little rock can make something happen if it starts moving!”

Like a clear sky, Magatsu Barai.

description:
You've taken up work as a freelance journalist in an effort to unravel the mystery behind your brother's death. You’ve set up your office above his best friend’s café, but haven't found any leads—until a mysterious man hires you to tail a young yakuza leader to a bar.

This dangerous criminal seems to know you and your brother already. Before you can get more information, however, the bar is raided by police and you're soon sitting across from a handsome detective in an interrogation room.

Alongside these three men, you're thrown into a deadly web of crime, suspense, and romance that takes you to the darkest corners of Tokyo. Finding unexpected connections, you continue to piece together the puzzle behind your past. Will those responsible face justice, or will you and your new love end up on the long list of victims?

We'd been having joint practice with another college's karate club until yesterday.
At the closing party, I approached an older girl from the other school who everyone calls "the super sadistic mongoose."
During practice, she has a mean glint in her eyes when she kicks and chops… but right now, she looks so gentle.
From the current situation… we definitely did the deed.

The girl gazes at me with lustful eyes.

I've… never done anything like that before… It really turned me on…
It's embarrassing, but… I think I kind of like that sort of thing…

She looks at my erect cock like a wild animal and places her mouth around the tip.
This is Master's… ahh… mm…

Just what did I do yesterday!?

Making full use of her power that blossomed in the isekai, such as the power to use recovery magic, the heroine spends 3 months in the isekai till she’s able to get back to the original world, with great positivity―

description:
In the 90s, for the shy Jake—a gamer and noir novel enthusiast—and his brave friend Lucy, their small hometown holds no future. Seeking new opportunities in the city, Jake begins a romance with Nina, a wealthy and fascinating girl, but one who is also unsettling and full of secrets.

Their relationship becomes complicated when Jake suffers from a strange illness—poison, madness, or something even darker? With each episode, he is thrust between two different eras, stripped of his memories, unable to distinguish reality, and feeling as if a faceless destiny is pulling the strings of his fate.

Trapped between the seemingly harmless modern world and the violent, ruthless gangster underworld of Prohibition, Jake must confront not only a powerful and merciless enemy but also a painful journey of self-transformation. Surrounded by danger and horror, he becomes entangled in brutal mafia wars as well as sinister mysteries beyond his comprehension.

To protect those he loves, he will fight against his hallucinations and fears, struggle with the terrifying suspicion that nothing is as it seems, and be tormented by the collapse of the sacred values he once held dear. But his greatest challenge in this web of time and fate will be to find, among countless paths, the one that leads him back to sanity, love, and the Light. But… how can he be sure he's making the right choice?

Jake might still have a chance to save himself. Will you join him in his desperate fight to reclaim his identity?

A helping hand could make all the difference. Will you be the one to reach out? He needs you.

He still thinks of the idols as kids, but they’ve grown into full-fledged women.
“Give us the right to do whatever we want with you, Producer,” they say, and soon, they’re using every trick in the book to serve him in ways he never expected.

1985, Rock City, USA.   Ace Lee, lead singer for a local band, the Warriors, is nominated for the Bryson Award for Performer of the Year.   But after the ceremony things go awry, and Ace enters into a spiral of rage* that threatens to destroy him--and take half of Rock City with him!

(*As in the first half of the Iliad, this rage largely takes on the form of "sulking," with the occasional screaming fit.)

Can you, as Ace's drummer and boyfriend, Pat Rock, contain Ace's anger and prevent the tragedy?

An absurdist answer to the question of "what if Achilles and Hector were rock stars in the 1980s instead of Bronze Age warriors?"

description:
A vast divide between two planes, a war that’s spanned millenia. The righteous good that is the Gods of the Celestial City, and the devilish evil that is the Demons of the City Beneath the Arch. Forever locked in an insatiable conflict with no end.

That’s what they tell you, anyway. Just what is ‘good’ and ‘evil’, after all? Is there a line that divides the two so clearly that allows no mistake in judgement?

The story follows Zhang Zhenli - famed Demon commander and strategist - as he wakes up in the Celestial City and is mistaken for a god, and must survive a week without being discovered. Along the way he’ll see new and old faces, both friends and enemies, and his life will be turned upside down.

The worst part - he’ll have to face the one person he hates more than anyone else, the one who led him down the path of vengeance against the Gods long ago - Song Tao.

[From [url=https://twoandahalfstudios.itch.io/beyond-the-abyss]itch.io[/url]]

title: Actual Sunlight
description:
"I know what you’re thinking: Why keep getting up, day in and day out, even though your life is going nowhere?"

Actual Sunlight is a short interactive story about love, depression and the corporation. The game puts you in the role of Evan Winter, a young professional in Toronto, as he moves through three distinct periods of his life.

The story is linear, unavoidable and (hopefully) thought-provoking. You experience his perceptions, fall under the consequences of his decisions, and meet everyone who didn’t change him. Gameplay is minimal, and serves only to move from one part of the (admittedly) text-heavy story to the next.

[From [url=https://willoneill.com/actualsunlight/about.html]The Official website[/url]]

Beyond the steam was Nobunaga Oda.

You slipped back in time during the strange Warring States period, when Nobunaga Oda, who was about to unify the world, was pushed by Shingen Takeda, who should have died in history. Nobunaga, who was looking for a plan for rejuvenation, came up with a "strategy" when he met you. It is to create a fictitious existence, "Female Nobunaga". And he chose you for the plot!

War, plot, and love. This encounter will change your destiny!

She has always been a bit of a fathercon, though, and decides change his mind by flirting her way into a job providing some "extra service" for Papa.

title: Shin - Tange Gakuen Monogatari ~battle on the edge~

description:
A Kingdom in ruins, a Princess in chains, a Hero caught between redemption and damnation, and an ancient, worn, dusty Book...

The ruling royal dynasty of Conussia has been overthrown, and an undead Lich now sits on the throne. As a courtier to the previous regime you were partly responsible for the coup, and as such, your services have been retained by the Lich.

As the story unfolds, you learn that there is much more to this occupation than meets the eye, and must choose whether to ally yourself with the Lich and his seductive right-hand woman, with the Resistance to try and undo the damage you have unwittingly done, or to walk the dangerous thin line of the mercenary, loyal to no-one but his friends.

Lastly, of course, is the Princess, who from her prison cell holds a terrible secret that could change everything.

title: Boku ga Mitodoketa Sekai no Owari

description:
A collection of three scenarios originating from a single concept.

■ Birthday -to you-

—Happy birthday.
The protagonist (Chitose) and her beloved husband celebrate their daughter's birthday.
Lovely presents, splurging a little for a delicious meal at a restaurant...
They were happy. They were a warm family.
This is a story of one unremarkable scene in their daily lives...

■ I want to laugh in this world

A boy was on the roof of a building.
Looking down at the nighttime scenery from the rooftop, it felt like he was peering out from a different world.
The boy came to this place to end his life by suicide.
—You should give it up.
Suddenly, a voice stops the boy. In this moment, the story of a boy and girl who'll never meet began.

■ Sakura and Sakura

—What's beneath the sakura tree?
In order to attend a vocational school, Asuka moved to "this town."
At the peak of a small hill overlooking the town, there stands a sakura tree.
There, I met "Sakura". My precious, precious friend...

"I love you, onii-chan!"

Hinata ardently dotes and fawns over her older step-brother Hayato on a daily basis. However, he told her, "Isn't it high time for you to stop this now?". What will happen to her love life now!?

Inside of a small mountain, there live Sayo and her father.
One day, Sayo comes across a woman loitering around.

She had golden hair and her pointy ears.
The girl was a creature that should have only existed in fiction - an elf.

This is a short tale of two humans and elf siblings.

This is the second part of a series of three games by EIN-CHERE & mint-wings.
No choices are included.

[Translated from the [url=http://einchere.web.fc2.com/elf.html]Official website[/url]]

"My mission is to serve God, weed out evil, and lead the world to an ideal!
I'm going to create it! ...Utopia!"

Blue Flame Aoki is an eighth grader at Onigahara Second Middle School.

He feels that everything in the world is trivial, so he establishes a blog to record his daily life at school.

One day, he meets a person named MARIA through his blog and gains new aspirations. ......

Aoki stands up to create a utopia.

The hero hears stories of men going missing in a forest near the village.

so it's up to the hero to exterminate them.

In 1888 in Yoshiwara, the pleasure district of Tokyo, a man meets a woman. Soon after, the illustrious escort Hakuhi dies, her throat slit by a gilded silver hairpin.

So begins a tale of the events leading up to her death, told from the perspective of one man who loves her and another who hates her more than life itself.

Today's a cloudy day. The protagonist was going to go home from school, like always, when she spotted a boy at the gate. A mysterious boy she hasn't seen before.

She walks out, still wondering about him, and on the road, she sees an odd shadow.
For some reason, she decides to chase it.

Trisha wakes up to total darkness and a familiar voice - a voice of a person she could not confirm as either alive or dead for months.
This is far from a happy reunion though: Lena's behaving oddly, and she shouldn't be in Trisha's room to begin with... how will the story end?

description:
Seiki was currently living with his in-laws.
With the current situation, his days of remote work continued.

The cause of his current distress was the decline of sex with his wife.
Furthermore since multiple generations lived under one roof, it was difficult to find the timing to masturbate.
...In that case, the only choice left was to do it while he was working.

But in middle of the act, an unexpected visitor arrived.
Manae, his mother-in-law, who was supposed to have gone shopping.
And thus, without even having the time to fix his appearance, he was seen.

title: Rectitude
description:
Rectitude, is a Sci-Fi visual novel that centers around Timothy, a renowned professor who creates a groundbreaking technology. You play as a trusted colleague of Tim's and help him navigate through some tough decisions, moral dilemmas and obstacles.

description: An adaptation of the 1925 short story "Giwaku (translated into English as "Doubts")" by Edogawa Ranpo.

Slipping out of the shrine, Mamori went inside the forest nearby. There she comes across injured animals who were attacked by youkai.

At this rate, it was unknown when the youkai would end up attacking the residents in the neighbourhood. So Mamori decided to investigate the unusual phenomenons happening inside the forest.

With a bow in hand, Mamori enters the forest infested with youkai.

[Translated from [url=https://www.debonosu.jp/debo/game/reimeiki_19/index.html#story]Official Website[/url]]

description:
When Dayren Vel'sharek, the charming male protagonist is sent by his master to assassinate a sworn enemy, he is thrown into an epic journey that will test both his allegiances and his charms.

Explore a vast kingdom filled with beautiful and powerful women to engage, while making impactful choices that may later affect the outcome of the larger story.

But be aware, lurking within this cornucopia of conquests is the ominous Marauder, creator of dark, monstrous beings ready to bring uncertainty and unexpected events…

Curse Of Valdria is just the beginning of The Marauder Chronicles upcoming saga.
title: The Marauder Chronicles: Curse over Valdria

description:
Short visual novel based on the poem "[url=https://www.poetryfoundation.org/poems/45536/ode-intimations-of-immortality-from-recollections-of-early-childhood]Ode: Intimations of Immortality from Recollections of Early Childhood[/url]" by William Wordsworth.

[From [url=https://ellisdex.itch.io/intimations-of-immortality]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Kemomimi Euforia
description:
This is a world where humanoid races with the characteristics of beasts live in harmony.

Moko, the main character, is a second year student at Kemonomimi Academy.

She, alongside her best friend Tiny, are trying to get people to join the Gardening Club. The people she met during the process all have their own unique personalities...?

Some are friendly, while others sometimes get into trouble.

But she's sure they can all get along.

It is only the beginning of the heartwarming school life of Moko and her friends.

[Translated and edited from [url=https://kemomimisite.mystrikingly.com/#_2]official website[/url]]

title: Dating Sim! Re:Mastered
description:
After a particularly rough night, the protagonist of Dating Sim crawls into bed to forget his loneliness as yet another day of him being single passes by. When he awakens, the protagonist discovers that it’s actually May 30, 2020, twelve years after his nap!

What’s more, the protagonist finds that he’s still in college and still hasn’t found a girlfriend. While usually a successful student, the protagonist is now struggling to maintain his grades and his luck with the ladies hasn’t improved one bit.

Polishing up his grades may be hard but with your help, finding a girlfriend may not be! Can the protagonist win over his dream girl with this new chance he’s been given?

[From [url=https://pixaelsoft.com/projects/dsrm/]the official site[/url]]

title: A Steamy Conversation
description: A short visual novel about two female friends talking about Becky's romantic life and how to "bake" desserts.

Your wife has two lovely sisters. One is 24 years old, and the other is 19 years old. They both are always coming to visit, and usually stay the night, or for the weekend. This is more than all right with you because they are fun to have around. Not to mention great eye candy. One is a typical blonde and a total airhead. She is also gullible, and easy to have fun with. The other is a Wild Child. That one is hard to figure most of the time. This story is mostly facts-based and takes place over a period of about 10 to 15 years or so. Condensing it down to fit into a short story is proving to be a little challenge and getting the events in proper order is even more so. Of course, the Names have been changed ( or maybe haven't ) to protect the not-so innocent. There are only a few choices for the moment that has no effect on the story for now.
​
title: The Sister-in-Law

description:
"...the world is ending.
Hearing these words, Fubuki was dismayed.

While all of them are converging towards a single reality, two ambiguous worlds are repeatedly occurring and disappearing at the same time.
In a daydream-like world, what will Fubuki think and what will move her?
And what is the truth about the all-too-gentle "will" that controls "the world itself"?

A strange modern fantasy about a group of high school students.

[Edited from [url=https://www.freem.ne.jp/win/game/2527]Freem[/url] (MTL)]
title: Hakujitsu Yume Katasutorofu

description:
Itsuki Kinta was not the fastest, nor the smartest, nor the most popular kid in his class. He used to get bullied all the time until one day he accidentally finds a haunted bracelet...

[From [url=https://bigcatfromhell.com/]official website[/url]]
title: Big Cat from Hell

description:
Our main character is a former music sensation who has recently fallen out of popularity due to a lack of motivation. Just as he’s dwindling out of relevance, he runs into a feisty little girl named Sayaka. Along with her, he’s introduced to several characters new and old.

This is when an opportunity presents itself. Auri, a rising popstar and childhood friend, is trying to build her own record label after having disagreements with her last label. The main character, along with Sayaka, Auri, Lee and Grace, group together to help each other and create a record label!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1749440/]Steam[/url]]
title: Heartbeats
Kowai Mono ni wa Futa o Shiro

description:
A Petal Among Thorns asks the question of whether you can indulge in the forbidden fruit without falling prey to the consequences of surrendering to something considered to be taboo.

You're a middle-aged man on a winter retreat with your daughter Petal, after your failed comedy tour. A relaxing vacation soon presents new feelings of lust towards her. As she begins to show affection towards you in a more sexual manner, you begin to give in to her.

Can you find harmony in a physical relationship with your daughter or will complications arise to challenge your new bond with her?​
title: A Petal Among Thorns

description: You play as a college student that awakens his subconscious in order to change his life. With his subconscious help, he can become the man he always wanted to become. So go ahead and try to make your Dream's come true.​

Awaiting you is a room with two maids looks to give you a massage...

description: Assigned to serving your employers niece, your new Madam. A demanding, dominant woman who has no issue manipulating her new toy to meet her every need. You arrive expecting to serve and clean, just as you've done previously for the lady of the house. But you soon find yourself being led into perversion by someone who lives in their own little world and has all the intention of pulling you into it.

When a popular illustrator is found dead, disgraced demonologist Harold Ludicael is hired to summon her ghost. Ghosts are the one thing he can't summon, but with sharp insight, perhaps he can solve the mystery, and resurrect the most important thing:

His career.

description:
Lazy student Haruka, received a student invitation from the most prestigious high school in the world. But what he doesn't know is that this isn't actually a high school, and once you're sign in, it's impossible to get out. Let's see if Haruka and his friends can solve the mystery of this school?

Kaidan Restaurant - Ura Menu 100-sen
description: Based on the hit children book series and anime.

title: Hachigatsu wa Hoshi no Shirabe no Yakata Kara

description:
"Grief isn’t a low. It’s a terrifying high, atop a mountain I never climbed."

Visiting her father's grave on Halloween was never the plan, but inexplicably, Elle finds herself drawn to the local cemetery.

Hoping to find a semblance of closure, she arrives at his graveside with a notebook clutched to her chest.

Sitting against his headstone, Elle talks to her dad for the first time in years. 

Drowning in a downpour of memories, she closes her eyes and focuses on breathing.

Daylight slips away, but before Elle can leave, a stranger approaches.

When Elle and Lucia meet on Hallows Eve, two grieving worlds collide...

[From [url=https://tidalblossoms.itch.io/graveyard-girls]itch.io[/url]]
title: Graveyard Girls
lemonade.
description:

Quiet, shy and anxious, confessing to your crush takes every ounce of your courage. And when it all goes wrong, the last space left that is safe is the roof.

But when a kind hand offers a carton of lemonade, how will your paths collide?

[From [url=https://fableandclover.itch.io/lemonade]itch.io[/url]]

title: When Trans Try
description: Nearos finally found his gay partner! This story is about philosophy of science and Nearos's gay moments.

description:
Insecurities can bring out the worst in anyone—including Keldran and Ace, centuries-long friends with benefits. What starts off as a fun haunted house trip soon turns sinister, as they find themselves at the mercy of a ravenous spirit that wears their faces. If they cannot navigate their unspoken feelings and conquer their fears, they may find themselves as nothing more than silent spirits, wandering the halls forever.

[From [url=https://galengames.itch.io/dufe-masquerade]itch.io[/url]]

Luna has been working too hard, fortunately as she finishes up each night she manages to find her way to a hidden out of the way café, one where the gals all dress up like different animals. It could be a place for dreams to come true, or just for Luna to blow off some steam and relax each night.

description: A wealthy family. The young son is dead, hit by a car driven by his father. His head was literally crushed. His mother, refusing his death, replaced his head with a pumpkin from the garden and continues to take care of him, claiming he is still alive. Concerned about appearances, his father pretends that nothing has happened. And the family sinks slowly into madness as the son's body decomposes...

Four boys from a unpopular sports manga that's gonna be ending soon try to find a way for the manga to continue publishing.

description:
The game follows the story of Saint Cherry, a magical girl who fights against the evil secret society known as the “Beast Army.” However, her true identity is a man named Sakurai Renji.

One day, after being defeated and violated by a monster, Renji finds himself unable to return to his male form. Determined to regain his original body, he continues to fight, but the enemy’s cruel traps prove too much. Will Saint Cherry be able to turn back into a man? And can she defeat the colossal enemy?

■ Features
This game puts players in the shoes of Saint Cherry, the transformed magical girl protagonist.

Trapped in her female form and captured by the enemy, she faces terrifying traps: tentacle-based body modification, personality destruction, and brainwashing devices.

This installment focuses heavily on breaking down her pride as a hero and her dignity as a man. Once her spirit is shattered, players can enjoy the aftermath as her mind is toyed with and reshaped.

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ311448.html/]dlsite[/url]]

The game follows the story of Josh and Ashley – a young couple stranded somewhere in the Carpathian Mountains who eventually find themselves in a secluded village whose denizens live in the shadow of a menacing castle towering over the landscape, in which the mysterious Countess resides.

Uncover the dark secrets of the secluded Carpathian village while engaging in passionate romance along the way.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1455070/Countess_in_Crimson/]Steam[/url]]

title: Suiyue
description:
Your heart is plagued with shadows.
Right now, there are too many chains.
It's not that you can't shake them off.

It's just that you won't.

This is a story about the loss of innocence.

[From [url=https://tsukimii.itch.io/suiyue]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Bloodlines of Shadow Springs
description:
You were a normal man, barely more than a boy, living in uneasy truce with your step-mother and step-sister. Were.

Now? Now you are a vampire, because you had the blood of monsters running through your veins, because your recently met benefactor, Vittoria Bosco, needs to raise an army. Because, just after achieving immortality, you are about to die.

Vittoria and her son, Lucca, are on the run from one of the big ones, one of the monsters who are no longer whispered about in the dark, because all that ever knew to fear him are dead or in his thrall. They stole an artifact from him, the Vial of the First Blood, and want to establish a clan, a powerbase that will allow them to challenge him.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1580160/Bloodlines_of_Shadow_Springs/]Steam[/url]]

Years after the events of Up All Night, Nick Torres remains haunted by the ghosts of his past. Seeking help -- or at least solace -- he reaches out to licensed therapist Patricia Rathburn for guidance.

Much to her dismay, Nick's presence proves a harrowing reminder of Patricia's own inner demons... but can she see past her clouded judgement to help this troubled young man?

Unfortunately, therapy can't fix everything.

[From [url=https://fiendishfiction.itch.io/rumination]itch.io[/url]]

A direct spin-off following the events of the Up All Night 'true end.'

[Edited from [url=https://fiendishfiction.itch.io/up-all-night]itch.io[/url]]

Submission to the 3rd annual Spooktober Visual Novel Jam.
title: Up All Night: Rumination
Forever Wings Rebirth
description:
Forever Wings Rebirth is an episodic Visual Novel updated every Sunday telling the stories of 4 abnormal individuals trying to overcome the very codes that make up who they are. There’s comedy! Drama! Romance! And a bunch of psychological and philosophical themes!

[From [url=https://forever-wings.tumblr.com/post/138462686646/forever-wings-rebirth-has-launched]Tumblr[/url]]

title: Limbo Line
PROJECT: Halloween
description:
She was created for one purpose: to make sure everyone in the world enjoys Halloween. At all costs.

Released as part of the third annual Spooktober Visual Novel Jam.

[From [url=https://madeleine-chai.itch.io/project-halloween]itch.io[/url]]

Adrian Heart is a genius composer, also a secret one.

Not a soul save for his sister and her husband know the identity of the mysterious composer behind one of the worlds most beloved pop princesses.

Unfortunately for him his anonymity is about to work against him when his pop princess sister asks him to assist at their families agency.

Heart Agency, the worlds leading talent agency, home to some of the most elite popular talent....

[From [url=https://cats-on-a-lilypad-studios.itch.io/heart-agency]itch.io[/url]]
title: Heart Agency

description:
Our story starts with Myka Riley, a university graduate and barista.

Just a normal guy...

A normal guy that can't remember his childhood, whose aunt refuses to talk about their family and who carries around a sketch book full of weird and wonderful creatures he just happens to know the faces of.

A totally... normal... guy....

Things start to change for Myka when he receives a mysterious phone call connecting him to his missing past.

A world which he believed could have only existed in fairy tails begins to blossom before him, awakening within him things long hidden.

Myka's visit to the mysterious Magnus Inn will change his life forever.

In more ways than one.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1776200/]Steam[/url]]
title: The Inn Between

description:
"I'LL NEVER FORGIVE YOU"

Private Investigator Hugo Laurent was ready to busy himself with more paperwork until a young disturbed woman entered his office to request an investigation regarding her grandfather's safety. What danger awaits underneath the surface of this mystery?

[From [url=https://studioclump.itch.io/stillwater]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Stillwater
The Remains of My Affection
description:
The Remains of My Affection is a short horror game made for Spooktober 2021.

The nightmares that have been haunting Lisa for weeks are starting to bleed into reality. Words she doesn't mean and choices she wouldn't take pile up day after day, week after week - spoken by someone other than herself.

Will Lisa and her best friend, Dale, get through it together before she loses complete control of her life?

title: Mitra
description:
Ellie and Jaji are childhood friends with an affinity for the occult. However, their plan to gather enough members to start up an occult club at their high school goes a bit off course, and now the three of you have some demons to contend with...or befriend. Will you be able to convince them to stick around, or will things with your new infernal allies go south?

Mitra is a story following a reckless occult club and it’s… unlikely new members as they go about a totally normal school day. Completely normal, I say; nothing to see here.

title: Hearts and Hexes
description:
You've never been to a Halloween party before-- in fact, you've never celebrated the holiday; but all that changes tonight!

Tonight, you've made your very own Witch costume, and you're determined to break out of your shell, make new friends, and experience all the things your family banned from you. 

It's scary, and you're terrified, but you are hell-bent on doing it anyway.

Their lies end now.

So, enjoy the party! Just be mindful, Witch, on whom you cast 'your spells and charm.'

Not all is as it appears.

title: Persimmon Bloom
description:
On a day without any plans, and nowhere you need to be, you decide to take a walk and explore a new part of the city.
After rows of stores and restaurants that seem out of your budget, you find yourself before a simple cafe, "Persimmon Bloom"...

[From in-game introduction]

title: Rose Knight and Thorn Witch
description:
Rose Knight and Thorn Witch is a fairy tale yuri visual novel series.

In Chapter One, The Girl who Wanted to Become a Knight, Derin Larkspur longs to leave the Thistle Village behind and journey to the Academy where she will train as a knight.  When she hears rumors about a witch living in the woods nearby, she vows to drive the witch away to prove herself as a candidate for the Academy.

But is it a witch in the woods or something else entirely?

[From [url=https://cloverfirefly.itch.io/rktw-chapter-1]itch.io[/url]]

Nagate, who has always watched Izana's hip, finally couldn't take it anymore and attacked like a wild animal...!
At first, Izana rejects him, but then she starts to feel it...?

[From [url=https://joni-dlg.itch.io/pandora]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Pandora

description:
netcromancer is set in a post-post-apocalyptic utopian city where little is left to fix with society except the unavoidable certainty of death. Citizens have cheated death so far as limiting their environment to preserve their bodies, cloning to preserve their legacies, and uploading their consciousness to preserve their minds. The story begins when Ellie Mason receives a corrupted file with one of these uploaded minds attached.
What else is to be done except to give this mind a new body and a new life.

[Edited from [url=https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?p=532282&sid=d231c312636b50963383608e09331b65#p532282]Lemmasoft[/url]]
title: Netcromancer

description:
This is a short visual novel that was created by only a few people. It's about a guy named Leon. He finds a mysterious amulet that sends him back in time. Now in his hands is his own and the fate of people close to him. The game has a lot of music, various references, and a pinch of romance. All the backgrounds and characters were drawn with love especially for this story. In any case, we will be glad if you like this work.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1682920/]Steam[/url]]
title: Song of Life
Akogare no Seiso na Fuuki Iinchou to Gyaru Imouto no Rannyuu Namahame Live Haishin
Seikou Tenshi Maria - Aku Ochi Rensa Kuruizaki

description:
Welcome to Belorov.

You stay the night in a walled town with your travelling companion. Terrible affairs of the past leave you two lost, left with no choice.
The master of the town has invited you and three others to partake in a banquet on All Hallows' Eve. But as the moon wanes, the scent of fresh blood can be smelled as a scream punctures the night.
Your companion has been accused of murder: after all, he's beginning to take on a monstrous form, and the easiest option would be to blame him. The curse brings with it deceit.
Can you prove his innocence to these strangers?
You have until sundown.

[From [url=https://tamafry.itch.io/wolfskins-curse]itch.io[/url]]

H de Hajiketa Itazura Wizard ~Mahou no Chikara de Itazura Shihoudai!~

title: Louder Than Words ~The Story of a Field Trip~

description:
"On sunny days like these, it almost doesn’t matter where our steps take us."

description:
Maid Café is a visual novel story with multiple routes, where you take on the role of Michael, a young man returning to the area he grew up in, to work as an administrator for a local Café. However upon arrival you find it has now become a bustling Maid Café.

And surprising you even further, you find that many of the people who work there are old acquaintances of yours... Well more than that; past romantic interests from one time or another making for an even more complicated return home.

Despite being a bustling café, it is losing money and you have been tasked with working out how to keep it afloat and also justify your ongoing position. As an administrator you will need to make decisions to determine its future.

Early on, just to make things more complicated you learn that there is a secret war going on, as the various waitresses each vie for your affection and attention!

Thus it is your job to not only help manage the Café but also to juggle all the different women's  desires to prevent all out war beginning and ruining this place forever.

Your decisions throughout the game will determine the story and could even lead to a new relationship as well as a variety of other fun interactions with the women.
